column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.28.2.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.28.2 (31-Aug-2020)

Fix: Fix import of six.moves.collections_abc non existing for some six versions. (conan-io/conan#7622)
Fix: Add system libs and frameworks to components targets in cmake_find_package and cmake_find_package_multi generators. (conan-io/conan#7611)
Bugfix: Fix cpp_info filename in FindPackageHandleStandardArgs for cmake_find_package generator. (conan-io/conan#7625)
Bugfix: Fix regression in deps_cpp_info incorrectly adding directories when reading from conanbuildinfo.txt file. (conan-io/conan#7599)

1.28.1 (06-Aug-2020)

Feature: Add user_info_build attribute to txt generator. (conan-io/conan#7488)
Fix: Attribute user_info_build is available for commands in the local development workflow. (conan-io/conan#7488)
Fix: Do not override value of public_deps in pkg_config generator. (conan-io/conan#7482)
Bugfix: correctly set CMAKE_OSX_SYSROOT and CMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES. (conan-io/conan#7512)
Bugfix: When using build_requires defined in a profile that is passed as profile_host, it was not being applied to build_requires that live in the host context (with force_host_context=True). (conan-io/conan#7500)
Bugfix: Fix broken cmake_find_package_multi when using components, as different configurations were being resolved to the same name, overwriting each other. (conan-io/conan#7492)
Bugfix: Powershell files generated by virtualenv generators use proper path separators. (conan-io/conan#7472)

1.28.0 (31-Jul-2020)

Feature: Show Conan version on HTML output. (conan-io/conan#7443). Docs: 📃
Feature: Support for cpp_info.components in pkg_config generator. (conan-io/conan#7413). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adds ps1 virtualenv to other OS for use with powershell 7. #7407 (conan-io/conan#7408). Docs: 📃
Feature: Propose init() method to unconditionally initialize class attributes like license or description. (conan-io/conan#7404). Docs: 📃
Feature: add deprecated attribute (conan-io/conan#7399). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow conan.conf user configuration of paths to client certificate and key, outside of the Conan cache. (conan-io/conan#7398). Docs: 📃
Feature: Document return value of self.copy() in the package() method. (conan-io/conan#7389). Docs: 📃
Feature: Complete cli2.0 framework to handle sub-commands and add conan user command for cli 2.0 (conan-io/conan#7372)
Feature: Implement required_conan_version in conanfile.py, will raise if the current Conan version does not match the defined version range. (conan-io/conan#7360). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add provides attribute to ConanFile: recipes can declare what they provide and Conan will fail if several recipes provide the same functionality (ODR violation). (conan-io/conan#7337). Docs: 📃
Feature: When using CONAN_V2_MODE if build_type or compiler are not defined Conan will raise an error. (conan-io/conan#7327). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adds "filenames" to cppinfo attribute, and changes cmake_find_package and cmake_find_package_multi generators so that they support it. (conan-io/conan#7320). Docs: 📃
Feature: Define recipe_folder attribute pointing to the folder containing conanfile.py (conan-io/conan#7314). Docs: 📃
Feature: Checking if a Linux distro uses apt is now based on the existence of apt in the system, instead of checking if the distro currently being used is in a hard-coded list of distros known to use apt. (conan-io/conan#7309)
Feature: Add commands management for cli 2.0. (conan-io/conan#7278)
Feature: Complete revamp of the lockfiles feature. Including version-only lockfiles, partial lockfiles, new command line syntax, improved management of build-order and many pending fixes. (conan-io/conan#7243). Docs: 📃
Feature: More detailed description for --update argument. (conan-io/conan#7167). Docs: 📃
Feature: improve compiler detection for CONAN_V2_MODE. (conan-io/conan#5740). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add settings for clang-cl (clang on Windows). (conan-io/conan#5705). Docs: 📃
Fix: Relax pluginbase requirement to pluginbase>=0.5, including latest 1.0.0 . (conan-io/conan#7441)
Fix: Make explicit the file writing of toolchain() helpers, so the method can be used to save custom files. (conan-io/conan#7435). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fixing --help for commands in proposal for command line v2.0. (conan-io/conan#7394)
Fix: Show outdated packages when running search --table. (conan-io/conan#7364). Docs: 📃
Fix: Relax msbuild generator to not raise in Linux. (conan-io/conan#7361)
Fix: Conan config install does not trigger scheduled config command. (conan-io/conan#7311)
Fix: Implement missing __contains__ method, so checking if "myoption" in self.info.options is possible in package_id(). (conan-io/conan#7303)
Fix: Build first ocurrence of a node in a lockfile when it is repeated (build requires) (conan-io/conan#7144)
BugFix: Only add User-Agent to headers dict if it was not provided by the user. (conan-io/conan#7390)
Bugfix: cppstd was missing in settings.yml for the qcc compiler and updates to 8.3. (conan-io/conan#7384)
BugFix: Fix missing download of conan_sources.tgz created using export_sources() method. (conan-io/conan#7380)
Bugfix: Intel Compiler install location detection on Windows. (conan-io/conan#7370)
Bugfix: Avoid crash while computing package_id when using package_revision_mode, and also incorrectly using installed binaries and reporting them installed after the re-computation of package_id resolved to a different binary. (conan-io/conan#7353)
Bugfix: cmake_multi generator used with Xcode CMake generator. (conan-io/conan#7341)
Bugfix: Do not fail for conan remove -r remote -p when there are no packages in the remote. (conan-io/conan#7338)





Commits

e9c3e98 Fix filename in FindPackageHandleStandardArgs for cmake_find_package generato...
1e69713 version 1.28.2
2b04758 fix import of iterable in six library (#7622)
f48724f Add system libs and frameworks to components targets (#7611)
af05bb0 Keep default of 'CppInfo.filter_empty' after reading from 'conanbuildinfo.txt...
3e5fee6 fix test (#7516)
a08d79c bump version to 1.28.1
504160b Bugfix: correctly set CMAKE_OSX_SYSROOT and CMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES (#7512)
bdd2ce7 fixing application of build_requires to host context build_requires (#7500)
e157492 [fix] Propagate 'user_info_build' using package development commands (#7488)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

Bugfix: Powershell files generated by virtualenv generators use proper path separators. (conan-io/conan#7472)

1.28.0 (31-Jul-2020)

Feature: Show Conan version on HTML output. (conan-io/conan#7443). Docs: 📃
Feature: Support for cpp_info.components in pkg_config generator. (conan-io/conan#7413). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adds ps1 virtualenv to other OS for use with powershell 7. #7407 (conan-io/conan#7408). Docs: 📃
Feature: Propose init() method to unconditionally initialize class attributes like license or description. (conan-io/conan#7404). Docs: 📃
Feature: add deprecated attribute (conan-io/conan#7399). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow conan.conf user configuration of paths to client certificate and key, outside of the Conan cache. (conan-io/conan#7398). Docs: 📃
Feature: Document return value of self.copy() in the package() method. (conan-io/conan#7389). Docs: 📃
Feature: Complete cli2.0 framework to handle sub-commands and add conan user command for cli 2.0 (conan-io/conan#7372)
Feature: Implement required_conan_version in conanfile.py, will raise if the current Conan version does not match the defined version range. (conan-io/conan#7360). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add provides attribute to ConanFile: recipes can declare what they provide and Conan will fail if several recipes provide the same functionality (ODR violation). (conan-io/conan#7337). Docs: 📃
Feature: When using CONAN_V2_MODE if build_type or compiler are not defined Conan will raise an error. (conan-io/conan#7327). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adds "filenames" to cppinfo attribute, and changes cmake_find_package and cmake_find_package_multi generators so that they support it. (conan-io/conan#7320). Docs: 📃
Feature: Define recipe_folder attribute pointing to the folder containing conanfile.py (conan-io/conan#7314). Docs: 📃
Feature: Checking if a Linux distro uses apt is now based on the existence of apt in the system, instead of checking if the distro currently being used is in a hard-coded list of distros known to use apt. (conan-io/conan#7309)
Feature: Add commands management for cli 2.0. (conan-io/conan#7278)
Feature: Complete revamp of the lockfiles feature. Including version-only lockfiles, partial lockfiles, new command line syntax, improved management of build-order and many pending fixes. (conan-io/conan#7243). Docs: 📃
Feature: More detailed description for --update argument. (conan-io/conan#7167). Docs: 📃
Feature: improve compiler detection for CONAN_V2_MODE. (conan-io/conan#5740). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add settings for clang-cl (clang on Windows). (conan-io/conan#5705). Docs: 📃
Fix: Relax pluginbase requirement to pluginbase>=0.5, including latest 1.0.0 . (conan-io/conan#7441)
Fix: Make explicit the file writing of toolchain() helpers, so the method can be used to save custom files. (conan-io/conan#7435). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fixing --help for commands in proposal for command line v2.0. (conan-io/conan#7394)
Fix: Show outdated packages when running search --table. (conan-io/conan#7364). Docs: 📃
Fix: Relax msbuild generator to not raise in Linux. (conan-io/conan#7361)
Fix: Conan config install does not trigger scheduled config command. (conan-io/conan#7311)
Fix: Implement missing __contains__ method, so checking if "myoption" in self.info.options is possible in package_id(). (conan-io/conan#7303)
Fix: Build first ocurrence of a node in a lockfile when it is repeated (build requires) (conan-io/conan#7144)
BugFix: Only add User-Agent to headers dict if it was not provided by the user. (conan-io/conan#7390)
Bugfix: cppstd was missing in settings.yml for the qcc compiler and updates to 8.3. (conan-io/conan#7384)
BugFix: Fix missing download of conan_sources.tgz created using export_sources() method. (conan-io/conan#7380)
Bugfix: Intel Compiler install location detection on Windows. (conan-io/conan#7370)
Bugfix: Avoid crash while computing package_id when using package_revision_mode, and also incorrectly using installed binaries and reporting them installed after the re-computation of package_id resolved to a different binary. (conan-io/conan#7353)
Bugfix: cmake_multi generator used with Xcode CMake generator. (conan-io/conan#7341)
Bugfix: Do not fail for conan remove -r remote -p when there are no packages in the remote. (conan-io/conan#7338)





Commits

1e69713 version 1.28.2
2b04758 fix import of iterable in six library (#7622)
f48724f Add system libs and frameworks to components targets (#7611)
af05bb0 Keep default of 'CppInfo.filter_empty' after reading from 'conanbuildinfo.txt...
3e5fee6 fix test (#7516)
a08d79c bump version to 1.28.1
504160b Bugfix: correctly set CMAKE_OSX_SYSROOT and CMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES (#7512)
bdd2ce7 fixing application of build_requires to host context build_requires (#7500)
e157492 [fix] Propagate 'user_info_build' using package development commands (#7488)

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.28.2.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.28.2 (31-Aug-2020)

Fix: Fix import of six.moves.collections_abc non existing for some six versions. (conan-io/conan#7622)
Fix: Add system libs and frameworks to components targets in cmake_find_package and cmake_find_package_multi generators. (conan-io/conan#7611)
Bugfix: Fix cpp_info filename in FindPackageHandleStandardArgs for cmake_find_package generator. (conan-io/conan#7625)
Bugfix: Fix regression in deps_cpp_info incorrectly adding directories when reading from conanbuildinfo.txt file. (conan-io/conan#7599)

1.28.1 (06-Aug-2020)

Feature: Add user_info_build attribute to txt generator. (conan-io/conan#7488)
Fix: Attribute user_info_build is available for commands in the local development workflow. (conan-io/conan#7488)
Fix: Do not override value of public_deps in pkg_config generator. (conan-io/conan#7482)
Bugfix: correctly set CMAKE_OSX_SYSROOT and CMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES. (conan-io/conan#7512)
Bugfix: When using build_requires defined in a profile that is passed as profile_host, it was not being applied to build_requires that live in the host context (with force_host_context=True). (conan-io/conan#7500)
Bugfix: Fix broken cmake_find_package_multi when using components, as different configurations were being resolved to the same name, overwriting each other. (conan-io/conan#7492)
Bugfix: Powershell files generated by virtualenv generators use proper path separators. (conan-io/conan#7472)

1.28.0 (31-Jul-2020)

Feature: Show Conan version on HTML output. (conan-io/conan#7443). Docs: 📃
Feature: Support for cpp_info.components in pkg_config generator. (conan-io/conan#7413). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adds ps1 virtualenv to other OS for use with powershell 7. #7407 (conan-io/conan#7408). Docs: 📃

Feature: Implement required_conan_version in conanfile.py, will raise if the current Conan version does not match the defined version range. (conan-io/conan#7360). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add provides attribute to ConanFile: recipes can declare what they provide and Conan will fail if several recipes provide the same functionality (ODR violation). (conan-io/conan#7337). Docs: 📃
Feature: When using CONAN_V2_MODE if build_type or compiler are not defined Conan will raise an error. (conan-io/conan#7327). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adds "filenames" to cppinfo attribute, and changes cmake_find_package and cmake_find_package_multi generators so that they support it. (conan-io/conan#7320). Docs: 📃
Feature: Define recipe_folder attribute pointing to the folder containing conanfile.py (conan-io/conan#7314). Docs: 📃
Feature: Checking if a Linux distro uses apt is now based on the existence of apt in the system, instead of checking if the distro currently being used is in a hard-coded list of distros known to use apt. (conan-io/conan#7309)
Feature: Add commands management for cli 2.0. (conan-io/conan#7278)
Feature: Complete revamp of the lockfiles feature. Including version-only lockfiles, partial lockfiles, new command line syntax, improved management of build-order and many pending fixes. (conan-io/conan#7243). Docs: 📃
Feature: More detailed description for --update argument. (conan-io/conan#7167). Docs: 📃
Feature: improve compiler detection for CONAN_V2_MODE. (conan-io/conan#5740). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add settings for clang-cl (clang on Windows). (conan-io/conan#5705). Docs: 📃
Fix: Relax pluginbase requirement to pluginbase>=0.5, including latest 1.0.0 . (conan-io/conan#7441)
Fix: Make explicit the file writing of toolchain() helpers, so the method can be used to save custom files. (conan-io/conan#7435). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fixing --help for commands in proposal for command line v2.0. (conan-io/conan#7394)
Fix: Show outdated packages when running search --table. (conan-io/conan#7364). Docs: 📃
Fix: Relax msbuild generator to not raise in Linux. (conan-io/conan#7361)
Fix: Conan config install does not trigger scheduled config command. (conan-io/conan#7311)
Fix: Implement missing __contains__ method, so checking if "myoption" in self.info.options is possible in package_id(). (conan-io/conan#7303)
Fix: Build first ocurrence of a node in a lockfile when it is repeated (build requires) (conan-io/conan#7144)
BugFix: Only add User-Agent to headers dict if it was not provided by the user. (conan-io/conan#7390)
Bugfix: cppstd was missing in settings.yml for the qcc compiler and updates to 8.3. (conan-io/conan#7384)
BugFix: Fix missing download of conan_sources.tgz created using export_sources() method. (conan-io/conan#7380)
Bugfix: Intel Compiler install location detection on Windows. (conan-io/conan#7370)

Bugfix: Do not fail for conan remove -r remote -p when there are no packages in the remote. (conan-io/conan#7338)

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.29.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.29.0 (02-Sep-2020)

Feature: Add QNX Neutrino version 7.1 to settings. (conan-io/conan#7627)
Feature: Added support for cpp_info.system_libs, cpp_info.framework_paths and cpp_info.frameworks for qbs generator. (conan-io/conan#7619)
Feature: Provide useful information trying to compute the build order using a --base lockfile. (conan-io/conan#7551)
Feature: Add user_info_build field to JSON generator. (conan-io/conan#7550)
Feature: PkgConfig tools now exposes the packages's version as property. (conan-io/conan#7534). Docs: 📃
Feature: Support from iOS 13.2 to 13.6. (conan-io/conan#7507). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add an experimental toolchain for gnu make. (conan-io/conan#7430). Docs: 📃
Feature: New tools.rename function to rename a file or folder to avoid 'Access is denied' on Windows. (conan-io/conan#6774). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix conan info --build-order deprecation message. (conan-io/conan#7632)
Fix: Set CMake targets compile options based on language (conan-io/conan#7600)
Fix: Support installing configs from non-regular files. (conan-io/conan#7583). Docs: 📃
Fix: Update docs in conan info -bo command. (conan-io/conan#7570)
Fix: Relax python six dependency to allow 1.15. (conan-io/conan#7538)
Fix: Add pre-release versions when resolving required_conan_version. (conan-io/conan#7535)
Fix: Adds support of URL-like git ssh syntax. (conan-io/conan#7509)
Fix: Improve message of missing dependencies for components. (conan-io/conan#7483)
Fix: Changed requirements.txt to include distro package version 1.5.0. (conan-io/conan#7461)
Fix: Avoid requiring the existence of all conanbuildinfo_xxx.cmake files in cmake_multi generator. (conan-io/conan#7376)
Bugfix: Fix cpp_info filename in FindPackageHandleStandardArgs for cmake_find_package generator. (conan-io/conan#7610)
Bugfix: Avoid marking as "modified" packages in a lockfile computed from a base lockfile. (conan-io/conan#7592)
Bugfix: Update correctly "Package_ID_Unknown" nodes when using conan lock update and package_revision_mode. (conan-io/conan#7592)
Bugfix: Respect winsdk_version for WindowsStore. (conan-io/conan#7584)
Bugfix: Fix frameworks usage with components for cmake_find_package_multi generator. (conan-io/conan#7580)
Bugfix: Support frameworks and framework_paths in qmake generator. (conan-io/conan#7579)
Bugfix: Provide a more descriptive error when an unknown statement is added to a profile (conan-io/conan#7577)
Bugfix: Add support for cpp_info.system_libs to QMake generator. (conan-io/conan#7563)
Bugfix: Make frogarian show up as a whole (not sliced) on linux terminal. (conan-io/conan#7553)
Bugfix: Fix import of collections.Iterable compatible with Python2. (conan-io/conan#7545)
Bugfix: Propagate the global version of the recipe for components. (conan-io/conan#7524)
Bugfix: Use CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH_BOTH to locate frameworks. (conan-io/conan#7515)

1.28.2 (31-Aug-2020)

Fix: Fix import of six.moves.collections_abc non existing for some six versions. (conan-io/conan#7622)
Fix: Add system libs and frameworks to components targets in cmake_find_package and cmake_find_package_multi generators. (conan-io/conan#7611)
Bugfix: Fix cpp_info filename in FindPackageHandleStandardArgs for cmake_find_package generator. (conan-io/conan#7625)
Bugfix: Fix regression in deps_cpp_info incorrectly adding directories when reading from conanbuildinfo.txt file. (conan-io/conan#7599)

1.28.1 (06-Aug-2020)

Feature: Add user_info_build attribute to txt generator. (conan-io/conan#7488)
Fix: Attribute user_info_build is available for commands in the local development workflow. (conan-io/conan#7488)
Fix: Do not override value of public_deps in pkg_config generator. (conan-io/conan#7482)
Bugfix: correctly set CMAKE_OSX_SYSROOT and CMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES. (conan-io/conan#7512)
Bugfix: When using build_requires defined in a profile that is passed as profile_host, it was not being applied to build_requires that live in the host context (with force_host_context=True). (conan-io/conan#7500)
Bugfix: Fix broken cmake_find_package_multi when using components, as different configurations were being resolved to the same name, overwriting each other. (conan-io/conan#7492)
Bugfix: Powershell files generated by virtualenv generators use proper path separators. (conan-io/conan#7472)

1.28.0 (31-Jul-2020)

Feature: Show Conan version on HTML output. (conan-io/conan#7443). Docs: 📃
Feature: Support for cpp_info.components in pkg_config generator. (conan-io/conan#7413). Docs: 📃





Commits

050a65e Merge pull request #7638 from czoido/revert/7586
5e5e024 revert changes from PR 7586
4774567 Merge pull request #7633 from memsharded/hotfix/test
92a4a80 fix broken test
87a35ec version 1.29.0
29b0442 fix warning message (#7632)
372a66f Set cmake compile options based on language (#7600)
e235592 fixing lockfiles (#7592)
7894237 Merge branch 'release/1.28' into develop
1bcf304 - consider /usr/bin/cc and usr/bin/c++ for auto-detection (#7586)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.29.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.29.0 (02-Sep-2020)

Feature: Add QNX Neutrino version 7.1 to settings. (conan-io/conan#7627)
Feature: Added support for cpp_info.system_libs, cpp_info.framework_paths and cpp_info.frameworks for qbs generator. (conan-io/conan#7619)
Feature: Provide useful information trying to compute the build order using a --base lockfile. (conan-io/conan#7551)
Feature: Add user_info_build field to JSON generator. (conan-io/conan#7550)
Feature: PkgConfig tools now exposes the packages's version as property. (conan-io/conan#7534). Docs: 📃
Feature: Support from iOS 13.2 to 13.6. (conan-io/conan#7507). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add an experimental toolchain for gnu make. (conan-io/conan#7430). Docs: 📃
Feature: New tools.rename function to rename a file or folder to avoid 'Access is denied' on Windows. (conan-io/conan#6774). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix conan info --build-order deprecation message. (conan-io/conan#7632)
Fix: Set CMake targets compile options based on language (conan-io/conan#7600)
Fix: Support installing configs from non-regular files. (conan-io/conan#7583). Docs: 📃
Fix: Update docs in conan info -bo command. (conan-io/conan#7570)
Fix: Relax python six dependency to allow 1.15. (conan-io/conan#7538)
Fix: Add pre-release versions when resolving required_conan_version. (conan-io/conan#7535)
Fix: Adds support of URL-like git ssh syntax. (conan-io/conan#7509)
Fix: Improve message of missing dependencies for components. (conan-io/conan#7483)
Fix: Changed requirements.txt to include distro package version 1.5.0. (conan-io/conan#7461)
Fix: Avoid requiring the existence of all conanbuildinfo_xxx.cmake files in cmake_multi generator. (conan-io/conan#7376)
Bugfix: Fix cpp_info filename in FindPackageHandleStandardArgs for cmake_find_package generator. (conan-io/conan#7610)
Bugfix: Avoid marking as "modified" packages in a lockfile computed from a base lockfile. (conan-io/conan#7592)
Bugfix: Update correctly "Package_ID_Unknown" nodes when using conan lock update and package_revision_mode. (conan-io/conan#7592)
Bugfix: Respect winsdk_version for WindowsStore. (conan-io/conan#7584)
Bugfix: Fix frameworks usage with components for cmake_find_package_multi generator. (conan-io/conan#7580)
Bugfix: Support frameworks and framework_paths in qmake generator. (conan-io/conan#7579)
Bugfix: Provide a more descriptive error when an unknown statement is added to a profile (conan-io/conan#7577)
Bugfix: Add support for cpp_info.system_libs to QMake generator. (conan-io/conan#7563)
Bugfix: Make frogarian show up as a whole (not sliced) on linux terminal. (conan-io/conan#7553)
Bugfix: Fix import of collections.Iterable compatible with Python2. (conan-io/conan#7545)
Bugfix: Propagate the global version of the recipe for components. (conan-io/conan#7524)
Bugfix: Use CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH_BOTH to locate frameworks. (conan-io/conan#7515)

1.28.2 (31-Aug-2020)

Fix: Fix import of six.moves.collections_abc non existing for some six versions. (conan-io/conan#7622)
Fix: Add system libs and frameworks to components targets in cmake_find_package and cmake_find_package_multi generators. (conan-io/conan#7611)
Bugfix: Fix cpp_info filename in FindPackageHandleStandardArgs for cmake_find_package generator. (conan-io/conan#7625)
Bugfix: Fix regression in deps_cpp_info incorrectly adding directories when reading from conanbuildinfo.txt file. (conan-io/conan#7599)

1.28.1 (06-Aug-2020)

Feature: Add user_info_build attribute to txt generator. (conan-io/conan#7488)
Fix: Attribute user_info_build is available for commands in the local development workflow. (conan-io/conan#7488)
Fix: Do not override value of public_deps in pkg_config generator. (conan-io/conan#7482)
Bugfix: correctly set CMAKE_OSX_SYSROOT and CMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES. (conan-io/conan#7512)
Bugfix: When using build_requires defined in a profile that is passed as profile_host, it was not being applied to build_requires that live in the host context (with force_host_context=True). (conan-io/conan#7500)
Bugfix: Fix broken cmake_find_package_multi when using components, as different configurations were being resolved to the same name, overwriting each other. (conan-io/conan#7492)
Bugfix: Powershell files generated by virtualenv generators use proper path separators. (conan-io/conan#7472)

1.28.0 (31-Jul-2020)

Feature: Show Conan version on HTML output. (conan-io/conan#7443). Docs: 📃
Feature: Support for cpp_info.components in pkg_config generator. (conan-io/conan#7413). Docs: 📃





Commits

050a65e Merge pull request #7638 from czoido/revert/7586
5e5e024 revert changes from PR 7586
4774567 Merge pull request #7633 from memsharded/hotfix/test
92a4a80 fix broken test
87a35ec version 1.29.0
29b0442 fix warning message (#7632)
372a66f Set cmake compile options based on language (#7600)
e235592 fixing lockfiles (#7592)
7894237 Merge branch 'release/1.28' into develop
1bcf304 - consider /usr/bin/cc and usr/bin/c++ for auto-detection (#7586)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

column20:
Bumps isort from 4.3.21 to 5.5.0.

Release notes
Sourced from isort's releases.

5.5.0 September 3, 2020

Fixed #1398: isort: off comment doesn't work, if it's the top comment in the file.
Fixed #1395: reverse_relative setting doesn't have any effect when combined with force_sort_within_sections.
Fixed #1399: --skip can error in the case of projects that contain recursive symlinks.
Fixed #1389: ensure_newline_before_comments doesn't work if comment is at top of section and sections don't have lines between them.
Fixed #1396: comments in imports with ";" can keep isort from recognizing import line.
Fixed #1380: As imports removed when combine_star is set.
Fixed #1382: --float-to-top has no effect if no import is already at the top.
Fixed #1420: isort never settles on module docstring + add import.
Fixed #1421: Error raised when repo contains circular symlinks.
Fixed #1427: noqa comment is moved from star import to constant import.
Fixed #1444 & 1445: Incorrect placement of import additions.
Fixed #1447: isort5 throws error when stdin used on Windows with deprecated args.
Implemented #1397: Added support for specifying config file when using git hook (thanks @diseraluca!).
Implemented #1405: Added support for coloring diff output.
Implemented #1434: New multi-line grid mode without parentheses.

Goal Zero (Tickets related to aspirational goal of achieving 0 regressions for remaining 5.0.0 lifespan):

Implemented #1392: Extensive profile testing.
Implemented #1393: Proprety based testing applied to code snippets.
Implemented #1391: Create automated integration test that includes full code base of largest OpenSource isort users.

Potentially breaking changes:

Fixed #1429: --check doesn't print to stderr as the documentation says. This means if you were looking for ERROR: messages for files that contain incorrect imports within stdout you will now need to look in stderr.

5.4.2 Aug 14, 2020

Fixed #1383: Known other does not work anymore with .editorconfig.
Fixed: Regression in first known party path expansion.

5.4.1 [Hotfix] Aug 13, 2020

Fixed #1381: --combine-as loses # noqa in different circumstances.

5.4.0 Aug 12, 2020

Implemented #1373: support for length sort only of direct (AKA straight) imports.
Fixed #1321: --combine-as loses # noqa.
Fixed #1375: --dont-order-by-type CLI broken.

5.3.2 [Hotfix] Aug 7, 2020

Fixed incorrect warning code (W503->W0503).

5.3.1 Aug 7, 2020

Improve upgrade warnings to be less noisy and point to error codes for easy interoperability with Visual Studio Code (see: #1363).

5.3.0 Aug 4, 2020

Implemented ability to treat all or select comments as code (issue #1357)
Implemented ability to use different configs for different file extensions (issue #1162)
Implemented ability to specify the types of imports (issue #1181)
Implemented ability to dedup import headings (issue #953)
Added experimental support for sorting literals (issue #1358)
Added experimental support for sorting and deduping groupings of assignments.

Implemented ability to treat all or select comments as code (issue #1357)
Implemented ability to use different configs for different file extensions (issue #1162)
Implemented ability to specify the types of imports (issue #1181)
Implemented ability to dedup import headings (issue #953)
Added experimental support for sorting literals (issue #1358)
Added experimental support for sorting and deduping groupings of assignments.

column20:
Bumps isort from 4.3.21 to 5.5.1.

Release notes
Sourced from isort's releases.

5.5.1 September 4, 2020

Fixed #1454: Ensure indented import sections with import heading and a preceding comment don't cause import sorting loops.
Fixed #1453: isort error when float to top on almost empty file.
Fixed #1456 and #1415: noqa comment moved to where flake8 cant see it.
Fixed #1460: .svn missing from default ignore list.

5.5.0 September 3, 2020

Fixed #1398: isort: off comment doesn't work, if it's the top comment in the file.
Fixed #1395: reverse_relative setting doesn't have any effect when combined with force_sort_within_sections.
Fixed #1399: --skip can error in the case of projects that contain recursive symlinks.
Fixed #1389: ensure_newline_before_comments doesn't work if comment is at top of section and sections don't have lines between them.
Fixed #1396: comments in imports with ";" can keep isort from recognizing import line.
Fixed #1380: As imports removed when combine_star is set.
Fixed #1382: --float-to-top has no effect if no import is already at the top.
Fixed #1420: isort never settles on module docstring + add import.
Fixed #1421: Error raised when repo contains circular symlinks.
Fixed #1427: noqa comment is moved from star import to constant import.
Fixed #1444 & 1445: Incorrect placement of import additions.
Fixed #1447: isort5 throws error when stdin used on Windows with deprecated args.
Implemented #1397: Added support for specifying config file when using git hook (thanks @diseraluca!).
Implemented #1405: Added support for coloring diff output.
Implemented #1434: New multi-line grid mode without parentheses.

Goal Zero (Tickets related to aspirational goal of achieving 0 regressions for remaining 5.0.0 lifespan):

Implemented #1392: Extensive profile testing.
Implemented #1393: Proprety based testing applied to code snippets.
Implemented #1391: Create automated integration test that includes full code base of largest OpenSource isort users.

Potentially breaking changes:

Fixed #1429: --check doesn't print to stderr as the documentation says. This means if you were looking for ERROR: messages for files that contain incorrect imports within stdout you will now need to look in stderr.

5.4.2 Aug 14, 2020

Fixed #1383: Known other does not work anymore with .editorconfig.

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.29.1.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.29.1 (17-Sep-2020)

Bugfix: Fix pkg_config generator adding to .pc files empty include and lib dirs. (conan-io/conan#7703)
Bugfix: Fix non existing (failed import) tools.remove_files_by_mask. (conan-io/conan#7700)
BugFix: Removed lockfile checking build_requires when they come from 2 different origins: profiles and recipes. (conan-io/conan#7698)
Bugfix: CMake build helper: Use actual CMake generator version to append platform generator, instead of the Conan setting compiler.version. (conan-io/conan#7684)

1.29.0 (02-Sep-2020)

Feature: Add QNX Neutrino version 7.1 to settings. (conan-io/conan#7627)
Feature: Added support for cpp_info.system_libs, cpp_info.framework_paths and cpp_info.frameworks for qbs generator. (conan-io/conan#7619)
Feature: Provide useful information trying to compute the build order using a --base lockfile. (conan-io/conan#7551)
Feature: Add user_info_build field to JSON generator. (conan-io/conan#7550)
Feature: PkgConfig tools now exposes the packages's version as property. (conan-io/conan#7534). Docs: 📃
Feature: Support from iOS 13.2 to 13.6. (conan-io/conan#7507). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add an experimental toolchain for gnu make. (conan-io/conan#7430). Docs: 📃
Feature: New tools.rename function to rename a file or folder to avoid 'Access is denied' on Windows. (conan-io/conan#6774). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix conan info --build-order deprecation message. (conan-io/conan#7632)
Fix: Set CMake targets compile options based on language (conan-io/conan#7600)
Fix: Support installing configs from non-regular files. (conan-io/conan#7583). Docs: 📃
Fix: Update docs in conan info -bo command. (conan-io/conan#7570)
Fix: Relax python six dependency to allow 1.15. (conan-io/conan#7538)
Fix: Add pre-release versions when resolving required_conan_version. (conan-io/conan#7535)
Fix: Adds support of URL-like git ssh syntax. (conan-io/conan#7509)
Fix: Improve message of missing dependencies for components. (conan-io/conan#7483)
Fix: Changed requirements.txt to include distro package version 1.5.0. (conan-io/conan#7461)
Fix: Avoid requiring the existence of all conanbuildinfo_xxx.cmake files in cmake_multi generator. (conan-io/conan#7376)
Bugfix: Fix cpp_info filename in FindPackageHandleStandardArgs for cmake_find_package generator. (conan-io/conan#7610)
Bugfix: Avoid marking as "modified" packages in a lockfile computed from a base lockfile. (conan-io/conan#7592)
Bugfix: Update correctly "Package_ID_Unknown" nodes when using conan lock update and package_revision_mode. (conan-io/conan#7592)
Bugfix: Respect winsdk_version for WindowsStore. (conan-io/conan#7584)
Bugfix: Fix frameworks usage with components for cmake_find_package_multi generator. (conan-io/conan#7580)
Bugfix: Support frameworks and framework_paths in qmake generator. (conan-io/conan#7579)
Bugfix: Provide a more descriptive error when an unknown statement is added to a profile (conan-io/conan#7577)
Bugfix: Add support for cpp_info.system_libs to QMake generator. (conan-io/conan#7563)
Bugfix: Make frogarian show up as a whole (not sliced) on linux terminal. (conan-io/conan#7553)
Bugfix: Fix import of collections.Iterable compatible with Python2. (conan-io/conan#7545)
Bugfix: Propagate the global version of the recipe for components. (conan-io/conan#7524)
Bugfix: Use CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH_BOTH to locate frameworks. (conan-io/conan#7515)

1.28.2 (31-Aug-2020)

Fix: Fix import of six.moves.collections_abc non existing for some six versions. (conan-io/conan#7622)
Fix: Add system libs and frameworks to components targets in cmake_find_package and cmake_find_package_multi generators. (conan-io/conan#7611)
Bugfix: Fix cpp_info filename in FindPackageHandleStandardArgs for cmake_find_package generator. (conan-io/conan#7625)
Bugfix: Fix regression in deps_cpp_info incorrectly adding directories when reading from conanbuildinfo.txt file. (conan-io/conan#7599)

1.28.1 (06-Aug-2020)

Feature: Add user_info_build attribute to txt generator. (conan-io/conan#7488)
Fix: Attribute user_info_build is available for commands in the local development workflow. (conan-io/conan#7488)
Fix: Do not override value of public_deps in pkg_config generator. (conan-io/conan#7482)
Bugfix: correctly set CMAKE_OSX_SYSROOT and CMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES. (conan-io/conan#7512)
Bugfix: When using build_requires defined in a profile that is passed as profile_host, it was not being applied to build_requires that live in the host context (with force_host_context=True). (conan-io/conan#7500)

a39cfc5 fix locking of build_requires from profile (#7698)
79da939 fix applying generator_platform based on version instead of actual generator ...

5e5e024 revert changes from PR 7586

Sourced from conan's releases.

1.29.1 (17-Sep-2020)

Bugfix: Fix pkg_config generator adding to .pc files empty include and lib dirs. (conan-io/conan#7703)
Bugfix: Fix non existing (failed import) tools.remove_files_by_mask. (conan-io/conan#7700)
BugFix: Removed lockfile checking build_requires when they come from 2 different origins: profiles and recipes. (conan-io/conan#7698)
Bugfix: CMake build helper: Use actual CMake generator version to append platform generator, instead of the Conan setting compiler.version. (conan-io/conan#7684)

1.29.0 (02-Sep-2020)

Feature: Add QNX Neutrino version 7.1 to settings. (conan-io/conan#7627)
Feature: Added support for cpp_info.system_libs, cpp_info.framework_paths and cpp_info.frameworks for qbs generator. (conan-io/conan#7619)
Feature: Provide useful information trying to compute the build order using a --base lockfile. (conan-io/conan#7551)
Feature: Add user_info_build field to JSON generator. (conan-io/conan#7550)
Feature: PkgConfig tools now exposes the packages's version as property. (conan-io/conan#7534). Docs: 📃
Feature: Support from iOS 13.2 to 13.6. (conan-io/conan#7507). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add an experimental toolchain for gnu make. (conan-io/conan#7430). Docs: 📃
Feature: New tools.rename function to rename a file or folder to avoid 'Access is denied' on Windows. (conan-io/conan#6774). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix conan info --build-order deprecation message. (conan-io/conan#7632)
Fix: Set CMake targets compile options based on language (conan-io/conan#7600)
Fix: Support installing configs from non-regular files. (conan-io/conan#7583). Docs: 📃
Fix: Update docs in conan info -bo command. (conan-io/conan#7570)
Fix: Relax python six dependency to allow 1.15. (conan-io/conan#7538)
Fix: Add pre-release versions when resolving required_conan_version. (conan-io/conan#7535)
Fix: Adds support of URL-like git ssh syntax. (conan-io/conan#7509)
Fix: Improve message of missing dependencies for components. (conan-io/conan#7483)
Fix: Changed requirements.txt to include distro package version 1.5.0. (conan-io/conan#7461)
Fix: Avoid requiring the existence of all conanbuildinfo_xxx.cmake files in cmake_multi generator. (conan-io/conan#7376)
Bugfix: Fix cpp_info filename in FindPackageHandleStandardArgs for cmake_find_package generator. (conan-io/conan#7610)
Bugfix: Avoid marking as "modified" packages in a lockfile computed from a base lockfile. (conan-io/conan#7592)
Bugfix: Update correctly "Package_ID_Unknown" nodes when using conan lock update and package_revision_mode. (conan-io/conan#7592)
Bugfix: Respect winsdk_version for WindowsStore. (conan-io/conan#7584)
Bugfix: Fix frameworks usage with components for cmake_find_package_multi generator. (conan-io/conan#7580)
Bugfix: Support frameworks and framework_paths in qmake generator. (conan-io/conan#7579)
Bugfix: Provide a more descriptive error when an unknown statement is added to a profile (conan-io/conan#7577)
Bugfix: Add support for cpp_info.system_libs to QMake generator. (conan-io/conan#7563)
Bugfix: Make frogarian show up as a whole (not sliced) on linux terminal. (conan-io/conan#7553)
Bugfix: Fix import of collections.Iterable compatible with Python2. (conan-io/conan#7545)
Bugfix: Propagate the global version of the recipe for components. (conan-io/conan#7524)
Bugfix: Use CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH_BOTH to locate frameworks. (conan-io/conan#7515)

1.28.2 (31-Aug-2020)

Fix: Fix import of six.moves.collections_abc non existing for some six versions. (conan-io/conan#7622)
Fix: Add system libs and frameworks to components targets in cmake_find_package and cmake_find_package_multi generators. (conan-io/conan#7611)
Bugfix: Fix cpp_info filename in FindPackageHandleStandardArgs for cmake_find_package generator. (conan-io/conan#7625)
Bugfix: Fix regression in deps_cpp_info incorrectly adding directories when reading from conanbuildinfo.txt file. (conan-io/conan#7599)

1.28.1 (06-Aug-2020)

Feature: Add user_info_build attribute to txt generator. (conan-io/conan#7488)
Fix: Attribute user_info_build is available for commands in the local development workflow. (conan-io/conan#7488)
Fix: Do not override value of public_deps in pkg_config generator. (conan-io/conan#7482)
Bugfix: correctly set CMAKE_OSX_SYSROOT and CMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES. (conan-io/conan#7512)
Bugfix: When using build_requires defined in a profile that is passed as profile_host, it was not being applied to build_requires that live in the host context (with force_host_context=True). (conan-io/conan#7500)





Commits

b417d0a version 1.29.1
a39cfc5 fix locking of build_requires from profile (#7698)
79da939 fix applying generator_platform based on version instead of actual generator ...
2f07a81 fixing pkg_config empty dirs (#7703)
d492c83 fix bug in import remove_files_by_mask (#7700)
050a65e Merge pull request #7638 from czoido/revert/7586
5e5e024 revert changes from PR 7586
4774567 Merge pull request #7633 from memsharded/hotfix/test
92a4a80 fix broken test
87a35ec version 1.29.0
Additional commits viewable in compare view

column20:
Bumps isort from 4.3.21 to 5.5.3.

Release notes
Sourced from isort's releases.

5.5.3 [Hotfix] September 20, 2020

Fixed #1488: in rare cases isort can mangle yield from or raise from statements.

5.5.2 [Hotfix] September 9, 2020

Fixed #1469: --diff option is ignored when input is from stdin.

5.5.1 September 4, 2020

Fixed #1454: Ensure indented import sections with import heading and a preceding comment don't cause import sorting loops.
Fixed #1453: isort error when float to top on almost empty file.
Fixed #1456 and #1415: noqa comment moved to where flake8 cant see it.
Fixed #1460: .svn missing from default ignore list.

5.5.0 September 3, 2020

Fixed #1398: isort: off comment doesn't work, if it's the top comment in the file.
Fixed #1395: reverse_relative setting doesn't have any effect when combined with force_sort_within_sections.
Fixed #1399: --skip can error in the case of projects that contain recursive symlinks.
Fixed #1389: ensure_newline_before_comments doesn't work if comment is at top of section and sections don't have lines between them.
Fixed #1396: comments in imports with ";" can keep isort from recognizing import line.
Fixed #1380: As imports removed when combine_star is set.
Fixed #1382: --float-to-top has no effect if no import is already at the top.
Fixed #1420: isort never settles on module docstring + add import.
Fixed #1421: Error raised when repo contains circular symlinks.
Fixed #1427: noqa comment is moved from star import to constant import.
Fixed #1444 & 1445: Incorrect placement of import additions.
Fixed #1447: isort5 throws error when stdin used on Windows with deprecated args.
Implemented #1397: Added support for specifying config file when using git hook (thanks @diseraluca!).
Implemented #1405: Added support for coloring diff output.
Implemented #1434: New multi-line grid mode without parentheses.

Goal Zero (Tickets related to aspirational goal of achieving 0 regressions for remaining 5.0.0 lifespan):

Implemented #1392: Extensive profile testing.
Implemented #1393: Proprety based testing applied to code snippets.
Implemented #1391: Create automated integration test that includes full code base of largest OpenSource isort users.

Potentially breaking changes:

Fixed #1429: --check doesn't print to stderr as the documentation says. This means if you were looking for ERROR: messages for files that contain incorrect imports within stdout you will now need to look in stderr.

5.4.2 Aug 14, 2020

Fixed #1383: Known other does not work anymore with .editorconfig.
Fixed: Regression in first known party path expansion.

5.4.1 [Hotfix] Aug 13, 2020

Fixed #1381: --combine-as loses # noqa in different circumstances.

5.4.0 Aug 12, 2020

Implemented #1373: support for length sort only of direct (AKA straight) imports.
Fixed #1321: --combine-as loses # noqa.
Fixed #1375: --dont-order-by-type CLI broken.

5.3.2 [Hotfix] Aug 7, 2020

27768b0 Merge pull request #1490 from PyCQA/issue/1488/isort-mangling-lines-that-star...
8095ede Match format of surrounding tests
d2f858f Add note to changelog
c7afdcd Fix #1488: isort should never mangle non-import from statements
e2cc148 Add more extensive testing for raise issue
d4ae7cc Add support for skipping parens

column20:
Bumps isort from 4.3.21 to 5.5.3.

Release notes
Sourced from isort's releases.

5.5.3 [Hotfix] September 20, 2020

Fixed #1488: in rare cases isort can mangle yield from or raise from statements.

5.5.2 [Hotfix] September 9, 2020

Fixed #1469: --diff option is ignored when input is from stdin.

5.5.1 September 4, 2020

Fixed #1454: Ensure indented import sections with import heading and a preceding comment don't cause import sorting loops.
Fixed #1453: isort error when float to top on almost empty file.
Fixed #1456 and #1415: noqa comment moved to where flake8 cant see it.
Fixed #1460: .svn missing from default ignore list.

5.5.0 September 3, 2020

Fixed #1398: isort: off comment doesn't work, if it's the top comment in the file.
Fixed #1395: reverse_relative setting doesn't have any effect when combined with force_sort_within_sections.
Fixed #1399: --skip can error in the case of projects that contain recursive symlinks.
Fixed #1389: ensure_newline_before_comments doesn't work if comment is at top of section and sections don't have lines between them.
Fixed #1396: comments in imports with ";" can keep isort from recognizing import line.
Fixed #1380: As imports removed when combine_star is set.
Fixed #1382: --float-to-top has no effect if no import is already at the top.
Fixed #1420: isort never settles on module docstring + add import.
Fixed #1421: Error raised when repo contains circular symlinks.
Fixed #1427: noqa comment is moved from star import to constant import.
Fixed #1444 & 1445: Incorrect placement of import additions.
Fixed #1447: isort5 throws error when stdin used on Windows with deprecated args.
Implemented #1397: Added support for specifying config file when using git hook (thanks @diseraluca!).
Implemented #1405: Added support for coloring diff output.
Implemented #1434: New multi-line grid mode without parentheses.

Goal Zero (Tickets related to aspirational goal of achieving 0 regressions for remaining 5.0.0 lifespan):

Implemented #1392: Extensive profile testing.
Implemented #1393: Proprety based testing applied to code snippets.
Implemented #1391: Create automated integration test that includes full code base of largest OpenSource isort users.

Potentially breaking changes:

Fixed #1429: --check doesn't print to stderr as the documentation says. This means if you were looking for ERROR: messages for files that contain incorrect imports within stdout you will now need to look in stderr.

5.4.2 Aug 14, 2020

Fixed #1383: Known other does not work anymore with .editorconfig.
Fixed: Regression in first known party path expansion.

5.4.1 [Hotfix] Aug 13, 2020

Fixed #1381: --combine-as loses # noqa in different circumstances.

5.4.0 Aug 12, 2020

Implemented #1373: support for length sort only of direct (AKA straight) imports.
Fixed #1321: --combine-as loses # noqa.
Fixed #1375: --dont-order-by-type CLI broken.

5.3.2 [Hotfix] Aug 7, 2020




Changelog
Sourced from isort's changelog.

Fixed #1488: in rare cases isort can mangle yield from or raise from statements.

5.5.2 [Hotfix] September 9, 2020

5.5.1 September 4, 2020

Fixed #1454: Ensure indented import sections with import heading and a preceding comment don't cause import sorting loops.

Fixed #1456 and #1415: noqa comment moved to where flake8 cant see it.
Fixed #1460: .svn missing from default ignore list.

5.5.0 September 3, 2020

Fixed #1398: isort: off comment doesn't work, if it's the top comment in the file.
Fixed #1395: reverse_relative setting doesn't have any effect when combined with force_sort_within_sections.
Fixed #1399: --skip can error in the case of projects that contain recursive symlinks.
Fixed #1389: ensure_newline_before_comments doesn't work if comment is at top of section and sections don't have lines between them.
Fixed #1396: comments in imports with ";" can keep isort from recognizing import line.

Fixed #1383: Known other does not work anymore with .editorconfig.
Fixed: Regression in first known party path expansion.

Fixed #1321: --combine-as loses # noqa.
Fixed #1375: --dont-order-by-type CLI broken.

5.3.2 [Hotfix] Aug 7, 2020




Commits

ec78bf3 Bump version to 5.5.3
27768b0 Merge pull request #1490 from PyCQA/issue/1488/isort-mangling-lines-that-star...
8095ede Match format of surrounding tests
d2f858f Add note to changelog
c7afdcd Fix #1488: isort should never mangle non-import from statements
e2cc148 Add more extensive testing for raise issue
d4ae7cc Add support for skipping parens
7960bf7 Simpler strategy for following line continuations
67fb11b Extend testing to include paren case
e74dc82 Improve test cases, add test for comment that looks like line continuation

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.29.2.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.29.2 (21-Sep-2020)

Feature: Add support for apple-clang 12.0. (conan-io/conan#7722). Docs: 📃

1.29.1 (17-Sep-2020)

Bugfix: Fix pkg_config generator adding to .pc files empty include and lib dirs. (conan-io/conan#7703)
Bugfix: Fix non existing (failed import) tools.remove_files_by_mask. (conan-io/conan#7700)
BugFix: Removed lockfile checking build_requires when they come from 2 different origins: profiles and recipes. (conan-io/conan#7698)
Bugfix: CMake build helper: Use actual CMake generator version to append platform generator, instead of the Conan setting compiler.version. (conan-io/conan#7684)

1.29.0 (02-Sep-2020)

Feature: Add QNX Neutrino version 7.1 to settings. (conan-io/conan#7627)
Feature: Added support for cpp_info.system_libs, cpp_info.framework_paths and cpp_info.frameworks for qbs generator. (conan-io/conan#7619)
Feature: Provide useful information trying to compute the build order using a --base lockfile. (conan-io/conan#7551)
Feature: Add user_info_build field to JSON generator. (conan-io/conan#7550)
Feature: PkgConfig tools now exposes the packages's version as property. (conan-io/conan#7534). Docs: 📃
Feature: Support from iOS 13.2 to 13.6. (conan-io/conan#7507). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add an experimental toolchain for gnu make. (conan-io/conan#7430). Docs: 📃
Feature: New tools.rename function to rename a file or folder to avoid 'Access is denied' on Windows. (conan-io/conan#6774). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix conan info --build-order deprecation message. (conan-io/conan#7632)
Fix: Set CMake targets compile options based on language (conan-io/conan#7600)
Fix: Support installing configs from non-regular files. (conan-io/conan#7583). Docs: 📃
Fix: Update docs in conan info -bo command. (conan-io/conan#7570)
Fix: Relax python six dependency to allow 1.15. (conan-io/conan#7538)
Fix: Add pre-release versions when resolving required_conan_version. (conan-io/conan#7535)
Fix: Adds support of URL-like git ssh syntax. (conan-io/conan#7509)
Fix: Improve message of missing dependencies for components. (conan-io/conan#7483)
Fix: Changed requirements.txt to include distro package version 1.5.0. (conan-io/conan#7461)
Fix: Avoid requiring the existence of all conanbuildinfo_xxx.cmake files in cmake_multi generator. (conan-io/conan#7376)
Bugfix: Fix cpp_info filename in FindPackageHandleStandardArgs for cmake_find_package generator. (conan-io/conan#7610)
Bugfix: Avoid marking as "modified" packages in a lockfile computed from a base lockfile. (conan-io/conan#7592)
Bugfix: Update correctly "Package_ID_Unknown" nodes when using conan lock update and package_revision_mode. (conan-io/conan#7592)
Bugfix: Respect winsdk_version for WindowsStore. (conan-io/conan#7584)
Bugfix: Fix frameworks usage with components for cmake_find_package_multi generator. (conan-io/conan#7580)
Bugfix: Support frameworks and framework_paths in qmake generator. (conan-io/conan#7579)
Bugfix: Provide a more descriptive error when an unknown statement is added to a profile (conan-io/conan#7577)
Bugfix: Add support for cpp_info.system_libs to QMake generator. (conan-io/conan#7563)
Bugfix: Make frogarian show up as a whole (not sliced) on linux terminal. (conan-io/conan#7553)
Bugfix: Fix import of collections.Iterable compatible with Python2. (conan-io/conan#7545)
Bugfix: Propagate the global version of the recipe for components. (conan-io/conan#7524)
Bugfix: Use CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH_BOTH to locate frameworks. (conan-io/conan#7515)

1.28.2 (31-Aug-2020)

Fix: Fix import of six.moves.collections_abc non existing for some six versions. (conan-io/conan#7622)
Fix: Add system libs and frameworks to components targets in cmake_find_package and cmake_find_package_multi generators. (conan-io/conan#7611)
Bugfix: Fix cpp_info filename in FindPackageHandleStandardArgs for cmake_find_package generator. (conan-io/conan#7625)
Bugfix: Fix regression in deps_cpp_info incorrectly adding directories when reading from conanbuildinfo.txt file. (conan-io/conan#7599)

1.28.1 (06-Aug-2020)

Feature: Add user_info_build attribute to txt generator. (conan-io/conan#7488)
Fix: Attribute user_info_build is available for commands in the local development workflow. (conan-io/conan#7488)





Commits

f948afb Add support for apple-clang 12 (#7722)
39d49e5 open 1.29.2
b417d0a version 1.29.1
a39cfc5 fix locking of build_requires from profile (#7698)
79da939 fix applying generator_platform based on version instead of actual generator ...
2f07a81 fixing pkg_config empty dirs (#7703)
d492c83 fix bug in import remove_files_by_mask (#7700)
050a65e Merge pull request #7638 from czoido/revert/7586
5e5e024 revert changes from PR 7586
4774567 Merge pull request #7633 from memsharded/hotfix/test
Additional commits viewable in compare view

column20:
Bumps isort from 4.3.21 to 5.5.4.

Release notes
Sourced from isort's releases.

5.5.4 [Hotfix] September 29, 2020

Fixed #1507: in rare cases isort changes the content of multiline strings after a yield statement.
Fixed #1505: Support case where known_SECTION points to a section not listed in sections.

5.5.3 [Hotfix] September 20, 2020

Fixed #1488: in rare cases isort can mangle yield from or raise from statements.

5.5.2 [Hotfix] September 9, 2020

Fixed #1469: --diff option is ignored when input is from stdin.

5.5.1 September 4, 2020

Fixed #1454: Ensure indented import sections with import heading and a preceding comment don't cause import sorting loops.
Fixed #1453: isort error when float to top on almost empty file.
Fixed #1456 and #1415: noqa comment moved to where flake8 cant see it.
Fixed #1460: .svn missing from default ignore list.

5.5.0 September 3, 2020

Fixed #1398: isort: off comment doesn't work, if it's the top comment in the file.
Fixed #1395: reverse_relative setting doesn't have any effect when combined with force_sort_within_sections.
Fixed #1399: --skip can error in the case of projects that contain recursive symlinks.
Fixed #1389: ensure_newline_before_comments doesn't work if comment is at top of section and sections don't have lines between them.
Fixed #1396: comments in imports with ";" can keep isort from recognizing import line.
Fixed #1380: As imports removed when combine_star is set.
Fixed #1382: --float-to-top has no effect if no import is already at the top.
Fixed #1420: isort never settles on module docstring + add import.
Fixed #1421: Error raised when repo contains circular symlinks.
Fixed #1427: noqa comment is moved from star import to constant import.
Fixed #1444 & 1445: Incorrect placement of import additions.
Fixed #1447: isort5 throws error when stdin used on Windows with deprecated args.
Implemented #1397: Added support for specifying config file when using git hook (thanks @diseraluca!).
Implemented #1405: Added support for coloring diff output.
Implemented #1434: New multi-line grid mode without parentheses.

Goal Zero (Tickets related to aspirational goal of achieving 0 regressions for remaining 5.0.0 lifespan):

Implemented #1392: Extensive profile testing.
Implemented #1393: Proprety based testing applied to code snippets.
Implemented #1391: Create automated integration test that includes full code base of largest OpenSource isort users.

Potentially breaking changes:

Fixed #1429: --check doesn't print to stderr as the documentation says. This means if you were looking for ERROR: messages for files that contain incorrect imports within stdout you will now need to look in stderr.

5.4.2 Aug 14, 2020

Fixed #1383: Known other does not work anymore with .editorconfig.
Fixed: Regression in first known party path expansion.

5.4.1 [Hotfix] Aug 13, 2020

Fixed #1381: --combine-as loses # noqa in different circumstances.

5.4.0 Aug 12, 2020

Implemented #1373: support for length sort only of direct (AKA straight) imports.



... (truncated)

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.30.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.30.0 (05-Oct-2020)

Feature: Implement real detection of compiler.libcxx value for gcc compiler. Only enabled in CONAN_V2_MODE, otherwise it would be breaking. (conan-io/conan#7776)
Feature: Added Depends items for every public dependency of conanfiles requires/dependencies. (conan-io/conan#7729). Docs: 📃
Feature: Instructions on how to run conan tests against a real Artifactory server. (conan-io/conan#7697)
Feature: List cpp_info.names and cpp_info.filenames in JSON and Markdown generator. (conan-io/conan#7690). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add information about components to markdown generator. (conan-io/conan#7677)
Feature: New experimental MSBuildToolchain to generate conan_toolchain.props files (it is multi-config, will generate one specific toolchain file per configuration) for more transparent integration and better developer experience with Visual Studio. (conan-io/conan#7674). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow packages that do not declare components to depend on other packages components and manage transitivity correctly, with the new self.cpp_info.requires attribute. (conan-io/conan#7644). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add MacOS 11 ("Big Sur") support. (conan-io/conan#7601). Docs: 📃
Feature: Expose intel_installation_path, compilervars, compilervars_dict, and compilervars_command under tools module in order to support usage of the intel compiler. (conan-io/conan#7572). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow user-defined generators to be installed and used from the Conan cache. (conan-io/conan#7527). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add conan remote proposal for cli 2.0. (conan-io/conan#7401)
Fix: Allow usage of MD5 checksums in FIPS systems that would raise error otherwise. (conan-io/conan#7807)
Fix: Fix capture output when running tests that call the ConanRunner in the conanfile. (conan-io/conan#7799)
Fix: Consider absolute paths when parsing conanbuildinfo.txt (conan-io/conan#7797)
Fix: Update parallel uploads help message. (conan-io/conan#7785). Docs: 📃
Fix: Removed check in lockfiles computed from other lockfile that it should be part of it. Users can check the resulting lockfile themselves if they want to. (conan-io/conan#7763). Docs: 📃
Fix: Extend help message indicating how to run conan export without user/channel. (conan-io/conan#7757). Docs: 📃
Fix: Conan copy shows better description when using full reference for destination. (conan-io/conan#7741)
Fix: Do not capture output for normal conan run (no logging or testing) when launching processes via ConanRunner so that color from build tools output is not lost. (conan-io/conan#7740)
Fix: self.copy() follows igore_case correctly on Windows. (conan-io/conan#7704). Docs: 📃
Fix: Use patterns in server query when resolving version ranges. (conan-io/conan#7673)
Fix: Raising conflict errors when options doesn't match in the evaluation of graphs with lockfiles. (conan-io/conan#7513)
Bugfix: Fixed bug where uploading to multiple remotes in a single conan upload command would fail. (conan-io/conan#7781)
BugFix: Add armv5hf and armv5el to the Android ABI architectures. (conan-io/conan#7730)
Bugfix: Correctly inherit and use system_requirements when using python_requires. (conan-io/conan#7721)
Bugfix: Translate settings.os value Macos to Darwin for CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME to allow compiling CMake-based packages for MacOS. (conan-io/conan#7695)

1.29.2 (21-Sep-2020)

Feature: Add support for apple-clang 12.0. (conan-io/conan#7722). Docs: 📃

1.29.1 (17-Sep-2020)

Bugfix: Fix pkg_config generator adding to .pc files empty include and lib dirs. (conan-io/conan#7703)
Bugfix: Fix non existing (failed import) tools.remove_files_by_mask. (conan-io/conan#7700)
BugFix: Removed lockfile checking build_requires when they come from 2 different origins: profiles and recipes. (conan-io/conan#7698)
Bugfix: CMake build helper: Use actual CMake generator version to append platform generator, instead of the Conan setting compiler.version. (conan-io/conan#7684)

1.29.0 (02-Sep-2020)

Feature: Add QNX Neutrino version 7.1 to settings. (conan-io/conan#7627)
Feature: Added support for cpp_info.system_libs, cpp_info.framework_paths and cpp_info.frameworks for qbs generator. (conan-io/conan#7619)
Feature: Provide useful information trying to compute the build order using a --base lockfile. (conan-io/conan#7551)
Feature: Add user_info_build field to JSON generator. (conan-io/conan#7550)
Feature: PkgConfig tools now exposes the packages's version as property. (conan-io/conan#7534). Docs: 📃
Feature: Support from iOS 13.2 to 13.6. (conan-io/conan#7507). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add an experimental toolchain for gnu make. (conan-io/conan#7430). Docs: 📃
Feature: New tools.rename function to rename a file or folder to avoid 'Access is denied' on Windows. (conan-io/conan#6774). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix conan info --build-order deprecation message. (conan-io/conan#7632)
Fix: Set CMake targets compile options based on language (conan-io/conan#7600)
Fix: Support installing configs from non-regular files. (conan-io/conan#7583). Docs: 📃
Fix: Update docs in conan info -bo command. (conan-io/conan#7570)

column21:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.30.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.30.0 (05-Oct-2020)

Feature: Implement real detection of compiler.libcxx value for gcc compiler. Only enabled in CONAN_V2_MODE, otherwise it would be breaking. (conan-io/conan#7776)
Feature: Added Depends items for every public dependency of conanfiles requires/dependencies. (conan-io/conan#7729). Docs: 📃
Feature: Instructions on how to run conan tests against a real Artifactory server. (conan-io/conan#7697)
Feature: List cpp_info.names and cpp_info.filenames in JSON and Markdown generator. (conan-io/conan#7690). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add information about components to markdown generator. (conan-io/conan#7677)
Feature: New experimental MSBuildToolchain to generate conan_toolchain.props files (it is multi-config, will generate one specific toolchain file per configuration) for more transparent integration and better developer experience with Visual Studio. (conan-io/conan#7674). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow packages that do not declare components to depend on other packages components and manage transitivity correctly, with the new self.cpp_info.requires attribute. (conan-io/conan#7644). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add MacOS 11 ("Big Sur") support. (conan-io/conan#7601). Docs: 📃
Feature: Expose intel_installation_path, compilervars, compilervars_dict, and compilervars_command under tools module in order to support usage of the intel compiler. (conan-io/conan#7572). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow user-defined generators to be installed and used from the Conan cache. (conan-io/conan#7527). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add conan remote proposal for cli 2.0. (conan-io/conan#7401)
Fix: Allow usage of MD5 checksums in FIPS systems that would raise error otherwise. (conan-io/conan#7807)
Fix: Fix capture output when running tests that call the ConanRunner in the conanfile. (conan-io/conan#7799)
Fix: Consider absolute paths when parsing conanbuildinfo.txt (conan-io/conan#7797)
Fix: Update parallel uploads help message. (conan-io/conan#7785). Docs: 📃
Fix: Removed check in lockfiles computed from other lockfile that it should be part of it. Users can check the resulting lockfile themselves if they want to. (conan-io/conan#7763). Docs: 📃
Fix: Extend help message indicating how to run conan export without user/channel. (conan-io/conan#7757). Docs: 📃
Fix: Conan copy shows better description when using full reference for destination. (conan-io/conan#7741)
Fix: Do not capture output for normal conan run (no logging or testing) when launching processes via ConanRunner so that color from build tools output is not lost. (conan-io/conan#7740)
Fix: self.copy() follows igore_case correctly on Windows. (conan-io/conan#7704). Docs: 📃
Fix: Use patterns in server query when resolving version ranges. (conan-io/conan#7673)
Fix: Raising conflict errors when options doesn't match in the evaluation of graphs with lockfiles. (conan-io/conan#7513)
Bugfix: Fixed bug where uploading to multiple remotes in a single conan upload command would fail. (conan-io/conan#7781)
BugFix: Add armv5hf and armv5el to the Android ABI architectures. (conan-io/conan#7730)
Bugfix: Correctly inherit and use system_requirements when using python_requires. (conan-io/conan#7721)
Bugfix: Translate settings.os value Macos to Darwin for CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME to allow compiling CMake-based packages for MacOS. (conan-io/conan#7695)

1.29.2 (21-Sep-2020)

Feature: Add support for apple-clang 12.0. (conan-io/conan#7722). Docs: 📃

1.29.1 (17-Sep-2020)

Bugfix: Fix pkg_config generator adding to .pc files empty include and lib dirs. (conan-io/conan#7703)
Bugfix: Fix non existing (failed import) tools.remove_files_by_mask. (conan-io/conan#7700)
BugFix: Removed lockfile checking build_requires when they come from 2 different origins: profiles and recipes. (conan-io/conan#7698)
Bugfix: CMake build helper: Use actual CMake generator version to append platform generator, instead of the Conan setting compiler.version. (conan-io/conan#7684)

1.29.0 (02-Sep-2020)

Feature: Add QNX Neutrino version 7.1 to settings. (conan-io/conan#7627)
Feature: Added support for cpp_info.system_libs, cpp_info.framework_paths and cpp_info.frameworks for qbs generator. (conan-io/conan#7619)
Feature: Provide useful information trying to compute the build order using a --base lockfile. (conan-io/conan#7551)
Feature: Add user_info_build field to JSON generator. (conan-io/conan#7550)
Feature: PkgConfig tools now exposes the packages's version as property. (conan-io/conan#7534). Docs: 📃
Feature: Support from iOS 13.2 to 13.6. (conan-io/conan#7507). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add an experimental toolchain for gnu make. (conan-io/conan#7430). Docs: 📃
Feature: New tools.rename function to rename a file or folder to avoid 'Access is denied' on Windows. (conan-io/conan#6774). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix conan info --build-order deprecation message. (conan-io/conan#7632)
Fix: Set CMake targets compile options based on language (conan-io/conan#7600)
Fix: Support installing configs from non-regular files. (conan-io/conan#7583). Docs: 📃
Fix: Update docs in conan info -bo command. (conan-io/conan#7570)



... (truncated)

4238de0 fix md5 error in fips systems (#7807)
e000c38 Fix capture output when running tests that call the ConanRunner in the conanf...
d2397e4 [fix] Add test with absolute paths to 'txt' generator (#7797)
9d00ff1 open release branch
30ce7dd Update help parallel uploads (#7785)
c09563b fixing upload remote (#7784)
8a6f827 checking that locked build requires are used (#7771)
c3c8a79 [bugfix] multiple remotes with single conan upload (#7781)
f767fa1 Feature/lockfiles partial (#7763)
2541915 Make sure that options are fully locked when creating lockfiles based on an e...

column20:
Bumps isort from 4.3.21 to 5.6.1.

Release notes
Sourced from isort's releases.

5.6.1 [Hotfix] October 8, 2020

Fixed #1546: Unstable (non-idempotent) behavior with certain src trees.

5.6.0 October 7, 2020

Implemented #1433: Provide helpful feedback in case a custom config file is specified without a configuration.
Implemented #1494: Default to sorting imports within .pxd files.
Implemented #1502: Improved float-to-top behavior when there is an existing import section present at top-of-file.
Implemented #1511: Support for easily seeing all files isort will be ran against using isort . --show-files.
Implemented #1487: Improved handling of encoding errors.
Improved handling of unsupported configuration option errors (see #1475).
Fixed #1463: Better interactive documentation for future option.
Fixed #1461: Quiet config option not respected by file API in some circumstances.
Fixed #1482: pylama integration is not working correctly out-of-the-box.
Fixed #1492: --check does not work with stdin source.
Fixed #1499: isort gets confused by single line, multi-line style comments when using float-to-top.
Fixed #1525: Some warnings can't be disabled with --quiet.
Fixed #1523: in rare cases isort can ignore direct from import if as import is also on same line.

Potentially breaking changes:

Implemented #1540: Officially support Python 3.9 stdlib imports by default.
Fixed #1443: Incorrect third vs first party categorization - namespace packages.
Fixed #1486: "Google" profile is not quite Google style.
Fixed "PyCharm" profile to always add 2 lines to be consistent with what PyCharm "Optimize Imports" does.

Goal Zero: (Tickets related to aspirational goal of achieving 0 regressions for remaining 5.0.0 lifespan):

Implemented #1472: Full testing of stdin CLI Options
Added additional branch coverage.
More projects added to integration test suite.

5.5.5 [Hotfix] October 7, 2020

Fixed #1539: in extremely rare cases isort 5.5.4 introduces syntax error by removing closing paren.

5.5.4 [Hotfix] September 29, 2020

Fixed #1507: in rare cases isort changes the content of multiline strings after a yield statement.
Fixed #1505: Support case where known_SECTION points to a section not listed in sections.

5.5.3 [Hotfix] September 20, 2020

Fixed #1488: in rare cases isort can mangle yield from or raise from statements.

5.5.2 [Hotfix] September 9, 2020

Fixed #1469: --diff option is ignored when input is from stdin.

5.5.1 September 4, 2020

Fixed #1454: Ensure indented import sections with import heading and a preceding comment don't cause import sorting loops.
Fixed #1453: isort error when float to top on almost empty file.
Fixed #1456 and #1415: noqa comment moved to where flake8 cant see it.
Fixed #1460: .svn missing from default ignore list.

5.5.0 September 3, 2020

Fixed #1398: isort: off comment doesn't work, if it's the top comment in the file.



... (truncated)

Sourced from isort's changelog.

5.5.2 [Hotfix] September 9, 2020

Fixed #1469: --diff option is ignored when input is from stdin.

5.5.1 September 4, 2020

Fixed #1454: Ensure indented import sections with import heading and a preceding comment don't cause import sorting loops.
Fixed #1453: isort error when float to top on almost empty file.
Fixed #1456 and #1415: noqa comment moved to where flake8 cant see it.
Fixed #1460: .svn missing from default ignore list.

5.5.0 September 3, 2020

Fixed #1398: isort: off comment doesn't work, if it's the top comment in the file.



... (truncated)


Changelog
Sourced from isort's changelog.

5.6.1 [Hotfix] October 8, 2020

Fixed #1546: Unstable (non-idempotent) behavior with certain src trees.

5.6.0 October 7, 2020

Implemented #1433: Provide helpful feedback in case a custom config file is specified without a configuration.
Implemented #1494: Default to sorting imports within .pxd files.
Implemented #1502: Improved float-to-top behavior when there is an existing import section present at top-of-file.
Implemented #1511: Support for easily seeing all files isort will be ran against using isort . --show-files.
Implemented #1487: Improved handling of encoding errors.
Improved handling of unsupported configuration option errors (see #1475).
Fixed #1463: Better interactive documentation for future option.
Fixed #1461: Quiet config option not respected by file API in some circumstances.
Fixed #1482: pylama integration is not working correctly out-of-the-box.
Fixed #1492: --check does not work with stdin source.
Fixed #1499: isort gets confused by single line, multi-line style comments when using float-to-top.
Fixed #1525: Some warnings can't be disabled with --quiet.
Fixed #1523: in rare cases isort can ignore direct from import if as import is also on same line.

Potentially breaking changes:

Implemented #1540: Officially support Python 3.9 stdlib imports by default.
Fixed #1443: Incorrect third vs first party categorization - namespace packages.
Fixed #1486: "Google" profile is not quite Google style.
Fixed "PyCharm" profile to always add 2 lines to be consistent with what PyCharm "Optimize Imports" does.

Goal Zero: (Tickets related to aspirational goal of achieving 0 regressions for remaining 5.0.0 lifespan):

Implemented #1472: Full testing of stdin CLI Options
Added additional branch coverage.
More projects added to integration test suite.

Fixed #1539: in extremely rare cases isort 5.5.4 introduces syntax error by removing closing paren.

5.5.4 [Hotfix] September 29, 2020

Fixed #1507: in rare cases isort changes the content of multiline strings after a yield statement.

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.30.1.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.30.1 (09-Oct-2020)

Fix: Use quotes around the install path, it can contain spaces. (conan-io/conan#7842)
Fix: prefix intel functions with intel_ because they are now exposed via tools. Fixes conan-io/conan#7820. (conan-io/conan#7821). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fix regression introduced in 1.30 (conan-io/conan#7673), with incorrect matches of user/channel for version ranges. (conan-io/conan#7847)
Bugfix: Fix CMakeToolchain with multiple variables definitions. (conan-io/conan#7833)
Bugfix: Check comparing the host and the build architecture to decide if cross building and set CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME in the CMake build helper. (conan-io/conan#7827)

1.30.0 (05-Oct-2020)

Feature: Implement real detection of compiler.libcxx value for gcc compiler. Only enabled in CONAN_V2_MODE, otherwise it would be breaking. (conan-io/conan#7776)
Feature: Added Depends items for every public dependency of conanfiles requires/dependencies. (conan-io/conan#7729). Docs: 📃
Feature: Instructions on how to run conan tests against a real Artifactory server. (conan-io/conan#7697)
Feature: List cpp_info.names and cpp_info.filenames in JSON and Markdown generator. (conan-io/conan#7690). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add information about components to markdown generator. (conan-io/conan#7677)
Feature: New experimental MSBuildToolchain to generate conan_toolchain.props files (it is multi-config, will generate one specific toolchain file per configuration) for more transparent integration and better developer experience with Visual Studio. (conan-io/conan#7674). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow packages that do not declare components to depend on other packages components and manage transitivity correctly, with the new self.cpp_info.requires attribute. (conan-io/conan#7644). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add MacOS 11 ("Big Sur") support. (conan-io/conan#7601). Docs: 📃
Feature: Expose intel_installation_path, compilervars, compilervars_dict, and compilervars_command under tools module in order to support usage of the intel compiler. (conan-io/conan#7572). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow user-defined generators to be installed and used from the Conan cache. (conan-io/conan#7527). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add conan remote proposal for cli 2.0. (conan-io/conan#7401)
Fix: Allow usage of MD5 checksums in FIPS systems that would raise error otherwise. (conan-io/conan#7807)
Fix: Fix capture output when running tests that call the ConanRunner in the conanfile. (conan-io/conan#7799)
Fix: Consider absolute paths when parsing conanbuildinfo.txt (conan-io/conan#7797)
Fix: Update parallel uploads help message. (conan-io/conan#7785). Docs: 📃
Fix: Removed check in lockfiles computed from other lockfile that it should be part of it. Users can check the resulting lockfile themselves if they want to. (conan-io/conan#7763). Docs: 📃
Fix: Extend help message indicating how to run conan export without user/channel. (conan-io/conan#7757). Docs: 📃
Fix: Conan copy shows better description when using full reference for destination. (conan-io/conan#7741)
Fix: Do not capture output for normal conan run (no logging or testing) when launching processes via ConanRunner so that color from build tools output is not lost. (conan-io/conan#7740)
Fix: self.copy() follows igore_case correctly on Windows. (conan-io/conan#7704). Docs: 📃
Fix: Use patterns in server query when resolving version ranges. (conan-io/conan#7673)
Fix: Raising conflict errors when options doesn't match in the evaluation of graphs with lockfiles. (conan-io/conan#7513)
Bugfix: Fixed bug where uploading to multiple remotes in a single conan upload command would fail. (conan-io/conan#7781)
BugFix: Add armv5hf and armv5el to the Android ABI architectures. (conan-io/conan#7730)
Bugfix: Correctly inherit and use system_requirements when using python_requires. (conan-io/conan#7721)
Bugfix: Translate settings.os value Macos to Darwin for CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME to allow compiling CMake-based packages for MacOS. (conan-io/conan#7695)

1.29.2 (21-Sep-2020)

Feature: Add support for apple-clang 12.0. (conan-io/conan#7722). Docs: 📃

1.29.1 (17-Sep-2020)

Bugfix: Fix pkg_config generator adding to .pc files empty include and lib dirs. (conan-io/conan#7703)
Bugfix: Fix non existing (failed import) tools.remove_files_by_mask. (conan-io/conan#7700)
BugFix: Removed lockfile checking build_requires when they come from 2 different origins: profiles and recipes. (conan-io/conan#7698)
Bugfix: CMake build helper: Use actual CMake generator version to append platform generator, instead of the Conan setting compiler.version. (conan-io/conan#7684)

1.29.0 (02-Sep-2020)

Feature: Add QNX Neutrino version 7.1 to settings. (conan-io/conan#7627)
Feature: Added support for cpp_info.system_libs, cpp_info.framework_paths and cpp_info.frameworks for qbs generator. (conan-io/conan#7619)
Feature: Provide useful information trying to compute the build order using a --base lockfile. (conan-io/conan#7551)
Feature: Add user_info_build field to JSON generator. (conan-io/conan#7550)
Feature: PkgConfig tools now exposes the packages's version as property. (conan-io/conan#7534). Docs: 📃



... (truncated)


Commits

565dabe release 1.30.1
6769d59 cross build arch check in cmake build helper (#7827)
6bf2df8 add quotes, it might contain spaces (#7842)
156a245 Fix/range resolver without userchannel (#7847)
3e13729 fix CMakeToolchain with multiple variables (#7833)
9e244a7 prefix intel functions with intel_ because they are now exposed via tools (#7...
4238de0 fix md5 error in fips systems (#7807)
e000c38 Fix capture output when running tests that call the ConanRunner in the conanf...
d2397e4 [fix] Add test with absolute paths to 'txt' generator (#7797)
9d00ff1 open release branch
Additional commits viewable in compare view
