1.30.1 (09-Oct-2020)

Fix: Use quotes around the install path, it can contain spaces. (conan-io/conan#7842)
Fix: prefix intel functions with intel_ because they are now exposed via tools. Fixes conan-io/conan#7820. (conan-io/conan#7821). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fix regression introduced in 1.30 (conan-io/conan#7673), with incorrect matches of user/channel for version ranges. (conan-io/conan#7847)
Bugfix: Fix CMakeToolchain with multiple variables definitions. (conan-io/conan#7833)
Bugfix: Check comparing the host and the build architecture to decide if cross building and set CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME in the CMake build helper. (conan-io/conan#7827)

1.30.0 (05-Oct-2020)

Feature: Implement real detection of compiler.libcxx value for gcc compiler. Only enabled in CONAN_V2_MODE, otherwise it would be breaking. (conan-io/conan#7776)
Feature: Added Depends items for every public dependency of conanfiles requires/dependencies. (conan-io/conan#7729). Docs: 📃
Feature: Instructions on how to run conan tests against a real Artifactory server. (conan-io/conan#7697)
Feature: List cpp_info.names and cpp_info.filenames in JSON and Markdown generator. (conan-io/conan#7690). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add information about components to markdown generator. (conan-io/conan#7677)
Feature: New experimental MSBuildToolchain to generate conan_toolchain.props files (it is multi-config, will generate one specific toolchain file per configuration) for more transparent integration and better developer experience with Visual Studio. (conan-io/conan#7674). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow packages that do not declare components to depend on other packages components and manage transitivity correctly, with the new self.cpp_info.requires attribute. (conan-io/conan#7644). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add MacOS 11 ("Big Sur") support. (conan-io/conan#7601). Docs: 📃
Feature: Expose intel_installation_path, compilervars, compilervars_dict, and compilervars_command under tools module in order to support usage of the intel compiler. (conan-io/conan#7572). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow user-defined generators to be installed and used from the Conan cache. (conan-io/conan#7527). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add conan remote proposal for cli 2.0. (conan-io/conan#7401)
Fix: Allow usage of MD5 checksums in FIPS systems that would raise error otherwise. (conan-io/conan#7807)
Fix: Fix capture output when running tests that call the ConanRunner in the conanfile. (conan-io/conan#7799)
Fix: Consider absolute paths when parsing conanbuildinfo.txt (conan-io/conan#7797)
Fix: Update parallel uploads help message. (conan-io/conan#7785). Docs: 📃
Fix: Removed check in lockfiles computed from other lockfile that it should be part of it. Users can check the resulting lockfile themselves if they want to. (conan-io/conan#7763). Docs: 📃
Fix: Extend help message indicating how to run conan export without user/channel. (conan-io/conan#7757). Docs: 📃
Fix: Conan copy shows better description when using full reference for destination. (conan-io/conan#7741)
Fix: Do not capture output for normal conan run (no logging or testing) when launching processes via ConanRunner so that color from build tools output is not lost. (conan-io/conan#7740)
Fix: self.copy() follows igore_case correctly on Windows. (conan-io/conan#7704). Docs: 📃
Fix: Use patterns in server query when resolving version ranges. (conan-io/conan#7673)
Fix: Raising conflict errors when options doesn't match in the evaluation of graphs with lockfiles. (conan-io/conan#7513)
Bugfix: Fixed bug where uploading to multiple remotes in a single conan upload command would fail. (conan-io/conan#7781)
BugFix: Add armv5hf and armv5el to the Android ABI architectures. (conan-io/conan#7730)
Bugfix: Correctly inherit and use system_requirements when using python_requires. (conan-io/conan#7721)
Bugfix: Translate settings.os value Macos to Darwin for CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME to allow compiling CMake-based packages for MacOS. (conan-io/conan#7695)

1.29.2 (21-Sep-2020)

Feature: Add support for apple-clang 12.0. (conan-io/conan#7722). Docs: 📃

1.29.1 (17-Sep-2020)

Bugfix: Fix pkg_config generator adding to .pc files empty include and lib dirs. (conan-io/conan#7703)
Bugfix: Fix non existing (failed import) tools.remove_files_by_mask. (conan-io/conan#7700)
BugFix: Removed lockfile checking build_requires when they come from 2 different origins: profiles and recipes. (conan-io/conan#7698)
Bugfix: CMake build helper: Use actual CMake generator version to append platform generator, instead of the Conan setting compiler.version. (conan-io/conan#7684)

1.29.0 (02-Sep-2020)

Feature: Add QNX Neutrino version 7.1 to settings. (conan-io/conan#7627)
Feature: Added support for cpp_info.system_libs, cpp_info.framework_paths and cpp_info.frameworks for qbs generator. (conan-io/conan#7619)
Feature: Provide useful information trying to compute the build order using a --base lockfile. (conan-io/conan#7551)
Feature: Add user_info_build field to JSON generator. (conan-io/conan#7550)
Feature: PkgConfig tools now exposes the packages's version as property. (conan-io/conan#7534). Docs: 📃



... (truncated)


Commits

6769d59 cross build arch check in cmake build helper (#7827)
6bf2df8 add quotes, it might contain spaces (#7842)
156a245 Fix/range resolver without userchannel (#7847)
3e13729 fix CMakeToolchain with multiple variables (#7833)
9e244a7 prefix intel functions with intel_ because they are now exposed via tools (#7...
4238de0 fix md5 error in fips systems (#7807)
e000c38 Fix capture output when running tests that call the ConanRunner in the conanf...
d2397e4 [fix] Add test with absolute paths to 'txt' generator (#7797)
9d00ff1 open release branch

column20:
Bumps isort from 4.3.21 to 5.6.3.

Release notes
Sourced from isort's releases.

5.6.3 October 11, 2020

Improved packaging of test files alongside source distribution (see: PyCQA/isort#1555).

5.6.2 October 10, 2020

Fixed #1548: On rare occasions an unecessary empty line can be added when an import is marked as skipped.
Fixed #1542: Bug in VERTICAL_PREFIX_FROM_MODULE_IMPORT wrap mode.
Fixed #1552: Pylama test dependent on source layout.

5.6.1 [Hotfix] October 8, 2020

Fixed #1546: Unstable (non-idempotent) behavior with certain src trees.

5.6.0 October 7, 2020

Implemented #1433: Provide helpful feedback in case a custom config file is specified without a configuration.
Implemented #1494: Default to sorting imports within .pxd files.
Implemented #1502: Improved float-to-top behavior when there is an existing import section present at top-of-file.
Implemented #1511: Support for easily seeing all files isort will be ran against using isort . --show-files.
Implemented #1487: Improved handling of encoding errors.
Improved handling of unsupported configuration option errors (see #1475).
Fixed #1463: Better interactive documentation for future option.
Fixed #1461: Quiet config option not respected by file API in some circumstances.
Fixed #1482: pylama integration is not working correctly out-of-the-box.
Fixed #1492: --check does not work with stdin source.
Fixed #1499: isort gets confused by single line, multi-line style comments when using float-to-top.
Fixed #1525: Some warnings can't be disabled with --quiet.
Fixed #1523: in rare cases isort can ignore direct from import if as import is also on same line.

Potentially breaking changes:

Implemented #1540: Officially support Python 3.9 stdlib imports by default.
Fixed #1443: Incorrect third vs first party categorization - namespace packages.
Fixed #1486: "Google" profile is not quite Google style.
Fixed "PyCharm" profile to always add 2 lines to be consistent with what PyCharm "Optimize Imports" does.

Goal Zero: (Tickets related to aspirational goal of achieving 0 regressions for remaining 5.0.0 lifespan):

Implemented #1472: Full testing of stdin CLI Options
Added additional branch coverage.
More projects added to integration test suite.

5.5.5 [Hotfix] October 7, 2020

Fixed #1539: in extremely rare cases isort 5.5.4 introduces syntax error by removing closing paren.

5.5.4 [Hotfix] September 29, 2020

Fixed #1507: in rare cases isort changes the content of multiline strings after a yield statement.
Fixed #1505: Support case where known_SECTION points to a section not listed in sections.

5.5.3 [Hotfix] September 20, 2020

Fixed #1488: in rare cases isort can mangle yield from or raise from statements.

5.5.2 [Hotfix] September 9, 2020

Fixed #1469: --diff option is ignored when input is from stdin.



... (truncated)

column20:
Bumps isort from 4.3.21 to 5.6.4.

Release notes
Sourced from isort's releases.

5.6.4 October 12, 2020

Fixed #1556: Empty line added between imports that should be skipped.

5.6.3 October 11, 2020

Improved packaging of test files alongside source distribution (see: PyCQA/isort#1555).

5.6.2 October 10, 2020

Fixed #1548: On rare occasions an unecessary empty line can be added when an import is marked as skipped.
Fixed #1542: Bug in VERTICAL_PREFIX_FROM_MODULE_IMPORT wrap mode.
Fixed #1552: Pylama test dependent on source layout.

5.6.1 [Hotfix] October 8, 2020

Fixed #1546: Unstable (non-idempotent) behavior with certain src trees.

5.6.0 October 7, 2020

Implemented #1433: Provide helpful feedback in case a custom config file is specified without a configuration.
Implemented #1494: Default to sorting imports within .pxd files.
Implemented #1502: Improved float-to-top behavior when there is an existing import section present at top-of-file.
Implemented #1511: Support for easily seeing all files isort will be ran against using isort . --show-files.
Implemented #1487: Improved handling of encoding errors.
Improved handling of unsupported configuration option errors (see #1475).
Fixed #1463: Better interactive documentation for future option.
Fixed #1461: Quiet config option not respected by file API in some circumstances.
Fixed #1482: pylama integration is not working correctly out-of-the-box.
Fixed #1492: --check does not work with stdin source.
Fixed #1499: isort gets confused by single line, multi-line style comments when using float-to-top.
Fixed #1525: Some warnings can't be disabled with --quiet.
Fixed #1523: in rare cases isort can ignore direct from import if as import is also on same line.

Potentially breaking changes:

Implemented #1540: Officially support Python 3.9 stdlib imports by default.
Fixed #1443: Incorrect third vs first party categorization - namespace packages.
Fixed #1486: "Google" profile is not quite Google style.
Fixed "PyCharm" profile to always add 2 lines to be consistent with what PyCharm "Optimize Imports" does.

Goal Zero: (Tickets related to aspirational goal of achieving 0 regressions for remaining 5.0.0 lifespan):

Implemented #1472: Full testing of stdin CLI Options
Added additional branch coverage.
More projects added to integration test suite.

5.5.5 [Hotfix] October 7, 2020

Fixed #1539: in extremely rare cases isort 5.5.4 introduces syntax error by removing closing paren.

5.5.4 [Hotfix] September 29, 2020

Fixed #1507: in rare cases isort changes the content of multiline strings after a yield statement.
Fixed #1505: Support case where known_SECTION points to a section not listed in sections.

5.5.3 [Hotfix] September 20, 2020

Fixed #1488: in rare cases isort can mangle yield from or raise from statements.



... (truncated)

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.30.2.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.30.2 (15-Oct-2020)

Feature: Supports Clang 11. (conan-io/conan#7871). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fix regression conan-io/conan#7856, imports failing to match subfolders in Windows due to backslash differences. (conan-io/conan#7861)
Bugfix: Allow defining new options values when creating a new lockfile from an existing base lockfile. (conan-io/conan#7859)

1.30.1 (09-Oct-2020)

Fix: Use quotes around the install path, it can contain spaces. (conan-io/conan#7842)
Fix: prefix intel functions with intel_ because they are now exposed via tools. Fixes conan-io/conan#7820. (conan-io/conan#7821). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fix regression introduced in 1.30 (conan-io/conan#7673), with incorrect matches of user/channel for version ranges. (conan-io/conan#7847)
Bugfix: Fix CMakeToolchain with multiple variables definitions. (conan-io/conan#7833)
Bugfix: Check comparing the host and the build architecture to decide if cross building and set CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME in the CMake build helper. (conan-io/conan#7827)

1.30.0 (05-Oct-2020)

Feature: Implement real detection of compiler.libcxx value for gcc compiler. Only enabled in CONAN_V2_MODE, otherwise it would be breaking. (conan-io/conan#7776)
Feature: Added Depends items for every public dependency of conanfiles requires/dependencies. (conan-io/conan#7729). Docs: 📃
Feature: Instructions on how to run conan tests against a real Artifactory server. (conan-io/conan#7697)
Feature: List cpp_info.names and cpp_info.filenames in JSON and Markdown generator. (conan-io/conan#7690). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add information about components to markdown generator. (conan-io/conan#7677)
Feature: New experimental MSBuildToolchain to generate conan_toolchain.props files (it is multi-config, will generate one specific toolchain file per configuration) for more transparent integration and better developer experience with Visual Studio. (conan-io/conan#7674). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow packages that do not declare components to depend on other packages components and manage transitivity correctly, with the new self.cpp_info.requires attribute. (conan-io/conan#7644). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add MacOS 11 ("Big Sur") support. (conan-io/conan#7601). Docs: 📃
Feature: Expose intel_installation_path, compilervars, compilervars_dict, and compilervars_command under tools module in order to support usage of the intel compiler. (conan-io/conan#7572). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow user-defined generators to be installed and used from the Conan cache. (conan-io/conan#7527). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add conan remote proposal for cli 2.0. (conan-io/conan#7401)
Fix: Allow usage of MD5 checksums in FIPS systems that would raise error otherwise. (conan-io/conan#7807)
Fix: Fix capture output when running tests that call the ConanRunner in the conanfile. (conan-io/conan#7799)
Fix: Consider absolute paths when parsing conanbuildinfo.txt (conan-io/conan#7797)
Fix: Update parallel uploads help message. (conan-io/conan#7785). Docs: 📃
Fix: Removed check in lockfiles computed from other lockfile that it should be part of it. Users can check the resulting lockfile themselves if they want to. (conan-io/conan#7763). Docs: 📃
Fix: Extend help message indicating how to run conan export without user/channel. (conan-io/conan#7757). Docs: 📃
Fix: Conan copy shows better description when using full reference for destination. (conan-io/conan#7741)
Fix: Do not capture output for normal conan run (no logging or testing) when launching processes via ConanRunner so that color from build tools output is not lost. (conan-io/conan#7740)
Fix: self.copy() follows igore_case correctly on Windows. (conan-io/conan#7704). Docs: 📃
Fix: Use patterns in server query when resolving version ranges. (conan-io/conan#7673)
Fix: Raising conflict errors when options doesn't match in the evaluation of graphs with lockfiles. (conan-io/conan#7513)
Bugfix: Fixed bug where uploading to multiple remotes in a single conan upload command would fail. (conan-io/conan#7781)
BugFix: Add armv5hf and armv5el to the Android ABI architectures. (conan-io/conan#7730)
Bugfix: Correctly inherit and use system_requirements when using python_requires. (conan-io/conan#7721)
Bugfix: Translate settings.os value Macos to Darwin for CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME to allow compiling CMake-based packages for MacOS. (conan-io/conan#7695)

1.29.2 (21-Sep-2020)

Feature: Add support for apple-clang 12.0. (conan-io/conan#7722). Docs: 📃

1.29.1 (17-Sep-2020)

Bugfix: Fix pkg_config generator adding to .pc files empty include and lib dirs. (conan-io/conan#7703)
Bugfix: Fix non existing (failed import) tools.remove_files_by_mask. (conan-io/conan#7700)
BugFix: Removed lockfile checking build_requires when they come from 2 different origins: profiles and recipes. (conan-io/conan#7698)

column21:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.30.2.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.30.2 (15-Oct-2020)

Feature: Supports Clang 11. (conan-io/conan#7871). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fix regression conan-io/conan#7856, imports failing to match subfolders in Windows due to backslash differences. (conan-io/conan#7861)
Bugfix: Allow defining new options values when creating a new lockfile from an existing base lockfile. (conan-io/conan#7859)

1.30.1 (09-Oct-2020)

Fix: Use quotes around the install path, it can contain spaces. (conan-io/conan#7842)
Fix: prefix intel functions with intel_ because they are now exposed via tools. Fixes conan-io/conan#7820. (conan-io/conan#7821). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fix regression introduced in 1.30 (conan-io/conan#7673), with incorrect matches of user/channel for version ranges. (conan-io/conan#7847)
Bugfix: Fix CMakeToolchain with multiple variables definitions. (conan-io/conan#7833)
Bugfix: Check comparing the host and the build architecture to decide if cross building and set CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME in the CMake build helper. (conan-io/conan#7827)

1.30.0 (05-Oct-2020)

Feature: Implement real detection of compiler.libcxx value for gcc compiler. Only enabled in CONAN_V2_MODE, otherwise it would be breaking. (conan-io/conan#7776)
Feature: Added Depends items for every public dependency of conanfiles requires/dependencies. (conan-io/conan#7729). Docs: 📃
Feature: Instructions on how to run conan tests against a real Artifactory server. (conan-io/conan#7697)
Feature: List cpp_info.names and cpp_info.filenames in JSON and Markdown generator. (conan-io/conan#7690). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add information about components to markdown generator. (conan-io/conan#7677)
Feature: New experimental MSBuildToolchain to generate conan_toolchain.props files (it is multi-config, will generate one specific toolchain file per configuration) for more transparent integration and better developer experience with Visual Studio. (conan-io/conan#7674). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow packages that do not declare components to depend on other packages components and manage transitivity correctly, with the new self.cpp_info.requires attribute. (conan-io/conan#7644). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add MacOS 11 ("Big Sur") support. (conan-io/conan#7601). Docs: 📃
Feature: Expose intel_installation_path, compilervars, compilervars_dict, and compilervars_command under tools module in order to support usage of the intel compiler. (conan-io/conan#7572). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow user-defined generators to be installed and used from the Conan cache. (conan-io/conan#7527). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add conan remote proposal for cli 2.0. (conan-io/conan#7401)
Fix: Allow usage of MD5 checksums in FIPS systems that would raise error otherwise. (conan-io/conan#7807)
Fix: Fix capture output when running tests that call the ConanRunner in the conanfile. (conan-io/conan#7799)
Fix: Consider absolute paths when parsing conanbuildinfo.txt (conan-io/conan#7797)
Fix: Update parallel uploads help message. (conan-io/conan#7785). Docs: 📃
Fix: Removed check in lockfiles computed from other lockfile that it should be part of it. Users can check the resulting lockfile themselves if they want to. (conan-io/conan#7763). Docs: 📃
Fix: Extend help message indicating how to run conan export without user/channel. (conan-io/conan#7757). Docs: 📃
Fix: Conan copy shows better description when using full reference for destination. (conan-io/conan#7741)
Fix: Do not capture output for normal conan run (no logging or testing) when launching processes via ConanRunner so that color from build tools output is not lost. (conan-io/conan#7740)
Fix: self.copy() follows igore_case correctly on Windows. (conan-io/conan#7704). Docs: 📃
Fix: Use patterns in server query when resolving version ranges. (conan-io/conan#7673)
Fix: Raising conflict errors when options doesn't match in the evaluation of graphs with lockfiles. (conan-io/conan#7513)
Bugfix: Fixed bug where uploading to multiple remotes in a single conan upload command would fail. (conan-io/conan#7781)
BugFix: Add armv5hf and armv5el to the Android ABI architectures. (conan-io/conan#7730)
Bugfix: Correctly inherit and use system_requirements when using python_requires. (conan-io/conan#7721)
Bugfix: Translate settings.os value Macos to Darwin for CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME to allow compiling CMake-based packages for MacOS. (conan-io/conan#7695)

1.29.2 (21-Sep-2020)

Feature: Add support for apple-clang 12.0. (conan-io/conan#7722). Docs: 📃

1.29.1 (17-Sep-2020)

Bugfix: Fix pkg_config generator adding to .pc files empty include and lib dirs. (conan-io/conan#7703)
Bugfix: Fix non existing (failed import) tools.remove_files_by_mask. (conan-io/conan#7700)
BugFix: Removed lockfile checking build_requires when they come from 2 different origins: profiles and recipes. (conan-io/conan#7698)
Bugfix: CMake build helper: Use actual CMake generator version to append platform generator, instead of the Conan setting compiler.version. (conan-io/conan#7684)

1.29.0 (02-Sep-2020)


... (truncated)


Commits

e1ff81c Fix/lockfile options base (#7859)
e88f961 Add Clang 11 in settings.yml (#7871)
ada785f fix regression in imports due to incorrect pattern matching of backslash in W...
6527394 open release 1.30.2
565dabe release 1.30.1
6769d59 cross build arch check in cmake build helper (#7827)
6bf2df8 add quotes, it might contain spaces (#7842)
156a245 Fix/range resolver without userchannel (#7847)
3e13729 fix CMakeToolchain with multiple variables (#7833)
9e244a7 prefix intel functions with intel_ because they are now exposed via tools (#7...

column20:
Bumps pre-commit from 2.6.0 to 2.8.1.

Release notes
Sourced from pre-commit's releases.

pre-commit v2.8.1
Fixes

Allow default language_version of system when the homedir is /

#1669 PR by @asottile.



pre-commit v2.8.0
Features

Update rbenv / ruby-build

#1612 issue by @tdeo.
#1614 PR by @asottile.


Update sample-config versions

#1611 PR by @mcsitter.


Add new language: dotnet

#1598 by @rkm.


Add --negate option to language: pygrep hooks

#1643 PR by @MarcoGorelli.


Add zipapp support

#1616 PR by @asottile.


Run pre-commit through https://pre-commit.ci

#1662 PR by @asottile.


Add new language: coursier (a jvm-based package manager)

#1633 PR by @JosephMoniz.


Exit with distinct codes: 1 (user error), 3 (unexpected error), 130 (^C)

#1601 PR by @int3l.



Fixes

Improve healthy() check for language: node + language_version: system hooks when the system executable goes missing.

pre-commit/action#45 issue by @KOliver94.
#1589 issue by @asottile.
#1590 PR by @asottile.


Fix excess whitespace in error log traceback

#1592 PR by @asottile.


Fix posixlike shebang invocations with shim executables of the git hook script on windows.

#1593 issue by @Celeborn2BeAlive.
#1595 PR by @Celeborn2BeAlive.


Remove hard-coded C:\PythonXX\python.exe path on windows as it caused confusion (and virtualenv can sometimes do better)

#1599 PR by @asottile.


Fix language: ruby hooks when --format-executable is present in a gemrc

issue by Rainbow Tux (discord).
#1603 PR by @asottile.


Move cygwin / win32 mismatch error earlier to catch msys2 mismatches

#1605 issue by @danyeaw.
#1606 PR by @asottile.


Remove -p workaround for old virtualenv

#1617 PR by @asottile.


Fix language: node installations to not symlink outside of the environment

pre-commit-ci/issues#2 issue by @DanielJSottile.
#1667 PR by @asottile.


Don't identify shim executables as valid system for defaulting
language_version for language: node / language: ruby

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.31.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.31.0 (30-Oct-2020)

Feature: Add argument conanfile to pre_download_package and post_download_package hook functions. (conan-io/conan#7968). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add CONAN_LOGIN_ENCRYPTION_KEY environment variable to obfuscate stored auth token. (conan-io/conan#7958). Docs: 📃
Feature: Use profile to filter results in the conan search HTML output. (conan-io/conan#7956)
Feature: Changed recommended way to launch test suite, with pytest over nosetests. (conan-io/conan#7952)
Feature: Provide a MSBuildCmd helper class that encapsulates calling MSBuild. (conan-io/conan#7941). Docs: 📃
Feature: Download and keep the conan_export.tgz and conan_source.tgz in the cache, so they are not affected by different Operating Systems compression and de-compression and uploading is way more efficient. (conan-io/conan#7938)
Feature: Add provides and deprecated fields to conan info output (conan-io/conan#7916)
Feature: Including package revision information in output from conan info (when revisions are enabled). (conan-io/conan#7890)
Feature: Download and keep the conan_package.tgz in the cache, so they are not affected by different Operating Systems compression and de-compression and uploading is way more efficient. (conan-io/conan#7886)
Feature: Add POC on a toolchain for iOS (using CMake XCode generator). (conan-io/conan#7855). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add POC on a toolchain for Android (using CMake provided modules). (conan-io/conan#7843). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow conan config install of a single file (conan-io/conan#7840). Docs: 📃
Feature: Use Python loggers for Conan output in cli 2.0. (conan-io/conan#7502)
Fix: Improve permission error message when migrating cache folder. (conan-io/conan#7966)
Fix: Make per-package settings definition complete the existing settings values, not requiring a complete redefinition. (conan-io/conan#7953)
Fix: Avoid unnecessary extra loading of conan.conf file in the version migrations check. (conan-io/conan#7949)
Fix: Simplified MakeToolchain to remove things that were not checked by tests or unused. (conan-io/conan#7942)
Fix: displayed message when settings of the recipe are constrained. (conan-io/conan#7930). Docs: 📃
Fix: Set CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME set to iOS, tvOS or watchOS or Darwin depending on the CMake version. (conan-io/conan#7924)
Fix: Remove duplicate entries while modifying PATH-like environment variables internally. Especially important for Windows where system PATH size is limited by 8192 charachers (when using cmd.exe). (conan-io/conan#7891)
Fix: Make default behaviour explicit in search help output. (conan-io/conan#7877). Docs: 📃
Fix: Automatically add OSX deployment flags in AutootoolsBuildEnvironment with the value of os_version, unless the values are already defined in environment variables CFLAGS or CXXFLAGS. (conan-io/conan#7862)
Fix: Remove toolset variability from the msbuild generator and MSBuildToolchain. (conan-io/conan#7825)
Fix: Component requirement checking now properly handles private and override requirements. (conan-io/conan#7585)
Bugfix: Set default storage_folder to .conan/data in case if storage_path entry fails to be defined by conan.conf. (conan-io/conan#7910)
Bugfix: Fix regression in self.run(output=xxxx) that have a write() method but do not wrap a stream. (conan-io/conan#7905)
Bugfix: Fix local flow (conan install + build) support for cpp_info.names and cpp_info.filenames. (conan-io/conan#7867)
Bugfix: Fix inspect --remote forcing to retrieve the remote for evaluation, overwriting what is in the local cache. (conan-io/conan#7749)
Bugfix: Copy symbolic links to directory with deploy generator. (conan-io/conan#7655). Docs: 📃

1.30.2 (15-Oct-2020)

Feature: Supports Clang 11. (conan-io/conan#7871). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fix regression conan-io/conan#7856, imports failing to match subfolders in Windows due to backslash differences. (conan-io/conan#7861)
Bugfix: Allow defining new options values when creating a new lockfile from an existing base lockfile. (conan-io/conan#7859)

1.30.1 (09-Oct-2020)

Fix: Use quotes around the install path, it can contain spaces. (conan-io/conan#7842)
Fix: prefix intel functions with intel_ because they are now exposed via tools. Fixes conan-io/conan#7820. (conan-io/conan#7821). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fix regression introduced in 1.30 (conan-io/conan#7673), with incorrect matches of user/channel for version ranges. (conan-io/conan#7847)
Bugfix: Fix CMakeToolchain with multiple variables definitions. (conan-io/conan#7833)
Bugfix: Check comparing the host and the build architecture to decide if cross building and set CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME in the CMake build helper. (conan-io/conan#7827)

1.30.0 (05-Oct-2020)

Feature: Implement real detection of compiler.libcxx value for gcc compiler. Only enabled in CONAN_V2_MODE, otherwise it would be breaking. (conan-io/conan#7776)
Feature: Added Depends items for every public dependency of conanfiles requires/dependencies. (conan-io/conan#7729). Docs: 📃
Feature: Instructions on how to run conan tests against a real Artifactory server. (conan-io/conan#7697)
Feature: List cpp_info.names and cpp_info.filenames in JSON and Markdown generator. (conan-io/conan#7690). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add information about components to markdown generator. (conan-io/conan#7677)
Feature: New experimental MSBuildToolchain to generate conan_toolchain.props files (it is multi-config, will generate one specific toolchain file per configuration) for more transparent integration and better developer experience with Visual Studio. (conan-io/conan#7674). Docs: 📃



... (truncated)


Commits

f322a74 Fix config install help message  (#7973)
8acccb2 open release 1.31.0
706e9b9 Feature/toolchain msbuild cmd (#7941)
c7f6749 Better UX error for migrations (#7966)
fabef25 Set default storage folder to $CONAN_USER_HOME/.conan/data (#7910)
1fa41eb moving tests
b5feb86 Add conan search suggestion to missing binary message (#7970)
d1766da [poc] CMake + iOS (#7855)
0caff8e Use key/secret to obfuscate values in the local database (#7958)
8bbd75c [poc] CMake + Android (#7843)

column21:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.31.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.31.0 (30-Oct-2020)

Feature: Add argument conanfile to pre_download_package and post_download_package hook functions. (conan-io/conan#7968). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add CONAN_LOGIN_ENCRYPTION_KEY environment variable to obfuscate stored auth token. (conan-io/conan#7958). Docs: 📃
Feature: Use profile to filter results in the conan search HTML output. (conan-io/conan#7956)
Feature: Changed recommended way to launch test suite, with pytest over nosetests. (conan-io/conan#7952)
Feature: Provide a MSBuildCmd helper class that encapsulates calling MSBuild. (conan-io/conan#7941). Docs: 📃
Feature: Download and keep the conan_export.tgz and conan_source.tgz in the cache, so they are not affected by different Operating Systems compression and de-compression and uploading is way more efficient. (conan-io/conan#7938)
Feature: Add provides and deprecated fields to conan info output (conan-io/conan#7916)
Feature: Including package revision information in output from conan info (when revisions are enabled). (conan-io/conan#7890)
Feature: Download and keep the conan_package.tgz in the cache, so they are not affected by different Operating Systems compression and de-compression and uploading is way more efficient. (conan-io/conan#7886)
Feature: Add POC on a toolchain for iOS (using CMake XCode generator). (conan-io/conan#7855). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add POC on a toolchain for Android (using CMake provided modules). (conan-io/conan#7843). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow conan config install of a single file (conan-io/conan#7840). Docs: 📃
Feature: Use Python loggers for Conan output in cli 2.0. (conan-io/conan#7502)
Fix: Improve permission error message when migrating cache folder. (conan-io/conan#7966)
Fix: Make per-package settings definition complete the existing settings values, not requiring a complete redefinition. (conan-io/conan#7953)
Fix: Avoid unnecessary extra loading of conan.conf file in the version migrations check. (conan-io/conan#7949)
Fix: Simplified MakeToolchain to remove things that were not checked by tests or unused. (conan-io/conan#7942)
Fix: displayed message when settings of the recipe are constrained. (conan-io/conan#7930). Docs: 📃
Fix: Set CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME set to iOS, tvOS or watchOS or Darwin depending on the CMake version. (conan-io/conan#7924)
Fix: Remove duplicate entries while modifying PATH-like environment variables internally. Especially important for Windows where system PATH size is limited by 8192 charachers (when using cmd.exe). (conan-io/conan#7891)
Fix: Make default behaviour explicit in search help output. (conan-io/conan#7877). Docs: 📃
Fix: Automatically add OSX deployment flags in AutootoolsBuildEnvironment with the value of os_version, unless the values are already defined in environment variables CFLAGS or CXXFLAGS. (conan-io/conan#7862)
Fix: Remove toolset variability from the msbuild generator and MSBuildToolchain. (conan-io/conan#7825)
Fix: Component requirement checking now properly handles private and override requirements. (conan-io/conan#7585)
Bugfix: Set default storage_folder to .conan/data in case if storage_path entry fails to be defined by conan.conf. (conan-io/conan#7910)
Bugfix: Fix regression in self.run(output=xxxx) that have a write() method but do not wrap a stream. (conan-io/conan#7905)
Bugfix: Fix local flow (conan install + build) support for cpp_info.names and cpp_info.filenames. (conan-io/conan#7867)
Bugfix: Fix inspect --remote forcing to retrieve the remote for evaluation, overwriting what is in the local cache. (conan-io/conan#7749)
Bugfix: Copy symbolic links to directory with deploy generator. (conan-io/conan#7655). Docs: 📃

1.30.2 (15-Oct-2020)

Feature: Supports Clang 11. (conan-io/conan#7871). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fix regression conan-io/conan#7856, imports failing to match subfolders in Windows due to backslash differences. (conan-io/conan#7861)
Bugfix: Allow defining new options values when creating a new lockfile from an existing base lockfile. (conan-io/conan#7859)

1.30.1 (09-Oct-2020)

Fix: Use quotes around the install path, it can contain spaces. (conan-io/conan#7842)
Fix: prefix intel functions with intel_ because they are now exposed via tools. Fixes conan-io/conan#7820. (conan-io/conan#7821). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fix regression introduced in 1.30 (conan-io/conan#7673), with incorrect matches of user/channel for version ranges. (conan-io/conan#7847)
Bugfix: Fix CMakeToolchain with multiple variables definitions. (conan-io/conan#7833)
Bugfix: Check comparing the host and the build architecture to decide if cross building and set CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME in the CMake build helper. (conan-io/conan#7827)

1.30.0 (05-Oct-2020)

Feature: Implement real detection of compiler.libcxx value for gcc compiler. Only enabled in CONAN_V2_MODE, otherwise it would be breaking. (conan-io/conan#7776)
Feature: Added Depends items for every public dependency of conanfiles requires/dependencies. (conan-io/conan#7729). Docs: 📃
Feature: Instructions on how to run conan tests against a real Artifactory server. (conan-io/conan#7697)
Feature: List cpp_info.names and cpp_info.filenames in JSON and Markdown generator. (conan-io/conan#7690). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add information about components to markdown generator. (conan-io/conan#7677)
Feature: New experimental MSBuildToolchain to generate conan_toolchain.props files (it is multi-config, will generate one specific toolchain file per configuration) for more transparent integration and better developer experience with Visual Studio. (conan-io/conan#7674). Docs: 📃



... (truncated)


Commits

f322a74 Fix config install help message  (#7973)
8acccb2 open release 1.31.0
706e9b9 Feature/toolchain msbuild cmd (#7941)
c7f6749 Better UX error for migrations (#7966)
fabef25 Set default storage folder to $CONAN_USER_HOME/.conan/data (#7910)
1fa41eb moving tests
b5feb86 Add conan search suggestion to missing binary message (#7970)
d1766da [poc] CMake + iOS (#7855)
0caff8e Use key/secret to obfuscate values in the local database (#7958)
8bbd75c [poc] CMake + Android (#7843)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.31.1.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.31.1 (10-Nov-2020)

Fix: Bump cryptography dependency in MacOS to equal or later than 3.2. (conan-io/conan#7962)
Bugfix: Fix a problem with the init() function not being called when the recipe loader uses some cached data, which can happen when using lockfiles and with python_requires. (conan-io/conan#8018)
Bugfix: Fixed self.copy() incorrectly handling ignore_case. (conan-io/conan#8009)
Bugfix: Fixed wrong ignore_case default in [imports] section of conanfile.txt. (conan-io/conan#8009)
Bugfix: Do not try to encrypt a None value when using CONAN_LOGIN_ENCRYPTION_KEY environment variable. (conan-io/conan#8004)

1.31.1 (10-Nov-2020)

Fix: Bump cryptography dependency in MacOS to equal or later than 3.2. (conan-io/conan#7962)
Bugfix: Fix a problem with the init() function not being called when the recipe loader uses some cached data, which can happen when using lockfiles and with python_requires. (conan-io/conan#8018)
Bugfix: Fixed self.copy() incorrectly handling ignore_case. (conan-io/conan#8009)
Bugfix: Fixed wrong ignore_case default in [imports] section of conanfile.txt. (conan-io/conan#8009)
Bugfix: Do not try to encrypt a None value when using CONAN_LOGIN_ENCRYPTION_KEY environment variable. (conan-io/conan#8004)

1.31.0 (30-Oct-2020)

Feature: Add argument conanfile to pre_download_package and post_download_package hook functions. (conan-io/conan#7968). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add CONAN_LOGIN_ENCRYPTION_KEY environment variable to obfuscate stored auth token. (conan-io/conan#7958). Docs: 📃
Feature: Use profile to filter results in the conan search HTML output. (conan-io/conan#7956)
Feature: Changed recommended way to launch test suite, with pytest over nosetests. (conan-io/conan#7952)
Feature: Provide a MSBuildCmd helper class that encapsulates calling MSBuild. (conan-io/conan#7941). Docs: 📃
Feature: Download and keep the conan_export.tgz and conan_source.tgz in the cache, so they are not affected by different Operating Systems compression and de-compression and uploading is way more efficient. (conan-io/conan#7938)
Feature: Add provides and deprecated fields to conan info output (conan-io/conan#7916)
Feature: Including package revision information in output from conan info (when revisions are enabled). (conan-io/conan#7890)
Feature: Download and keep the conan_package.tgz in the cache, so they are not affected by different Operating Systems compression and de-compression and uploading is way more efficient. (conan-io/conan#7886)
Feature: Add POC on a toolchain for iOS (using CMake XCode generator). (conan-io/conan#7855). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add POC on a toolchain for Android (using CMake provided modules). (conan-io/conan#7843). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow conan config install of a single file (conan-io/conan#7840). Docs: 📃
Feature: Use Python loggers for Conan output in cli 2.0. (conan-io/conan#7502)
Fix: Improve permission error message when migrating cache folder. (conan-io/conan#7966)
Fix: Make per-package settings definition complete the existing settings values, not requiring a complete redefinition. (conan-io/conan#7953)
Fix: Avoid unnecessary extra loading of conan.conf file in the version migrations check. (conan-io/conan#7949)
Fix: Simplified MakeToolchain to remove things that were not checked by tests or unused. (conan-io/conan#7942)
Fix: displayed message when settings of the recipe are constrained. (conan-io/conan#7930). Docs: 📃
Fix: Set CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME set to iOS, tvOS or watchOS or Darwin depending on the CMake version. (conan-io/conan#7924)
Fix: Remove duplicate entries while modifying PATH-like environment variables internally. Especially important for Windows where system PATH size is limited by 8192 charachers (when using cmd.exe). (conan-io/conan#7891)
Fix: Make default behaviour explicit in search help output. (conan-io/conan#7877). Docs: 📃
Fix: Automatically add OSX deployment flags in AutootoolsBuildEnvironment with the value of os_version, unless the values are already defined in environment variables CFLAGS or CXXFLAGS. (conan-io/conan#7862)
Fix: Remove toolset variability from the msbuild generator and MSBuildToolchain. (conan-io/conan#7825)
Fix: Component requirement checking now properly handles private and override requirements. (conan-io/conan#7585)
Bugfix: Set default storage_folder to .conan/data in case if storage_path entry fails to be defined by conan.conf. (conan-io/conan#7910)
Bugfix: Fix regression in self.run(output=xxxx) that have a write() method but do not wrap a stream. (conan-io/conan#7905)
Bugfix: Fix local flow (conan install + build) support for cpp_info.names and cpp_info.filenames. (conan-io/conan#7867)
Bugfix: Fix inspect --remote forcing to retrieve the remote for evaluation, overwriting what is in the local cache. (conan-io/conan#7749)
Bugfix: Copy symbolic links to directory with deploy generator. (conan-io/conan#7655). Docs: 📃

1.30.2 (15-Oct-2020)

Feature: Supports Clang 11. (conan-io/conan#7871). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fix regression conan-io/conan#7856, imports failing to match subfolders in Windows due to backslash differences. (conan-io/conan#7861)
Bugfix: Allow defining new options values when creating a new lockfile from an existing base lockfile. (conan-io/conan#7859)

1.30.1 (09-Oct-2020)

Fix: Use quotes around the install path, it can contain spaces. (conan-io/conan#7842)
Fix: prefix intel functions with intel_ because they are now exposed via tools. Fixes conan-io/conan#7820. (conan-io/conan#7821). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fix regression introduced in 1.30 (conan-io/conan#7673), with incorrect matches of user/channel for version ranges. (conan-io/conan#7847)
Bugfix: Fix CMakeToolchain with multiple variables definitions. (conan-io/conan#7833)
Bugfix: Check comparing the host and the build architecture to decide if cross building and set CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME in the CMake build helper. (conan-io/conan#7827)



... (truncated)


Commits

172dd39 release 1.31.1
61d375b init needs to be called also when used cached classes in loader (#8018)
21d2f8f bump cryptography to >= 3.2 (#7962)
d0cce79 fixing self.copy() ignore_case for excludes (#8009)
500d61b do not try to encode a value if it is None (#8004)
f322a74 Fix config install help message  (#7973)
8acccb2 open release 1.31.0
706e9b9 Feature/toolchain msbuild cmd (#7941)
c7f6749 Better UX error for migrations (#7966)
fabef25 Set default storage folder to $CONAN_USER_HOME/.conan/data (#7910)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

Dependabot commands and options

You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR:

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.31.2.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.31.2 (11-Nov-2020)

Bugfix: Recent liburl3 1.26 library updates is breaking the constraints in Conan requirements.txt  as requests 2.24 has a limitation for liburl3. This PR constrains liburl3 version to be less than 1.26, so it does not break with requests 2.24. (conan-io/conan#8042)

1.31.1 (10-Nov-2020)

Fix: Bump cryptography dependency in MacOS to equal or later than 3.2. (conan-io/conan#7962)
Bugfix: Fix a problem with the init() function not being called when the recipe loader uses some cached data, which can happen when using lockfiles and with python_requires. (conan-io/conan#8018)
Bugfix: Fixed self.copy() incorrectly handling ignore_case. (conan-io/conan#8009)
Bugfix: Fixed wrong ignore_case default in [imports] section of conanfile.txt. (conan-io/conan#8009)
Bugfix: Do not try to encrypt a None value when using CONAN_LOGIN_ENCRYPTION_KEY environment variable. (conan-io/conan#8004)

1.31.0 (30-Oct-2020)

Feature: Add argument conanfile to pre_download_package and post_download_package hook functions. (conan-io/conan#7968). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add CONAN_LOGIN_ENCRYPTION_KEY environment variable to obfuscate stored auth token. (conan-io/conan#7958). Docs: 📃

Feature: Add POC on a toolchain for Android (using CMake provided modules). (conan-io/conan#7843). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow conan config install of a single file (conan-io/conan#7840). Docs: 📃
Feature: Use Python loggers for Conan output in cli 2.0. (conan-io/conan#7502)
Fix: Improve permission error message when migrating cache folder. (conan-io/conan#7966)
Fix: Make per-package settings definition complete the existing settings values, not requiring a complete redefinition. (conan-io/conan#7953)
Fix: Avoid unnecessary extra loading of conan.conf file in the version migrations check. (conan-io/conan#7949)
Fix: Simplified MakeToolchain to remove things that were not checked by tests or unused. (conan-io/conan#7942)
Fix: displayed message when settings of the recipe are constrained. (conan-io/conan#7930). Docs: 📃
Fix: Set CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME set to iOS, tvOS or watchOS or Darwin depending on the CMake version. (conan-io/conan#7924)
Fix: Remove duplicate entries while modifying PATH-like environment variables internally. Especially important for Windows where system PATH size is limited by 8192 charachers (when using cmd.exe). (conan-io/conan#7891)
Fix: Make default behaviour explicit in search help output. (conan-io/conan#7877). Docs: 📃
Fix: Automatically add OSX deployment flags in AutootoolsBuildEnvironment with the value of os_version, unless the values are already defined in environment variables CFLAGS or CXXFLAGS. (conan-io/conan#7862)
Fix: Remove toolset variability from the msbuild generator and MSBuildToolchain. (conan-io/conan#7825)
Fix: Component requirement checking now properly handles private and override requirements. (conan-io/conan#7585)
Bugfix: Set default storage_folder to .conan/data in case if storage_path entry fails to be defined by conan.conf. (conan-io/conan#7910)
Bugfix: Fix regression in self.run(output=xxxx) that have a write() method but do not wrap a stream. (conan-io/conan#7905)
Bugfix: Fix local flow (conan install + build) support for cpp_info.names and cpp_info.filenames. (conan-io/conan#7867)
Bugfix: Fix inspect --remote forcing to retrieve the remote for evaluation, overwriting what is in the local cache. (conan-io/conan#7749)
Bugfix: Copy symbolic links to directory with deploy generator. (conan-io/conan#7655). Docs: 📃

1.30.2 (15-Oct-2020)

Feature: Supports Clang 11. (conan-io/conan#7871). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fix regression conan-io/conan#7856, imports failing to match subfolders in Windows due to backslash differences. (conan-io/conan#7861)
Bugfix: Allow defining new options values when creating a new lockfile from an existing base lockfile. (conan-io/conan#7859)

Fix: prefix intel functions with intel_ because they are now exposed via tools. Fixes conan-io/conan#7820. (conan-io/conan#7821). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fix regression introduced in 1.30 (conan-io/conan#7673), with incorrect matches of user/channel for version ranges. (conan-io/conan#7847)

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.31.2.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.31.2 (11-Nov-2020)

Bugfix: Recent liburl3 1.26 library updates is breaking the constraints in Conan requirements.txt  as requests 2.24 has a limitation for liburl3. This PR constrains liburl3 version to be less than 1.26, so it does not break with requests 2.24. (conan-io/conan#8042)

1.31.1 (10-Nov-2020)

Fix: Bump cryptography dependency in MacOS to equal or later than 3.2. (conan-io/conan#7962)
Bugfix: Fix a problem with the init() function not being called when the recipe loader uses some cached data, which can happen when using lockfiles and with python_requires. (conan-io/conan#8018)
Bugfix: Fixed self.copy() incorrectly handling ignore_case. (conan-io/conan#8009)
Bugfix: Fixed wrong ignore_case default in [imports] section of conanfile.txt. (conan-io/conan#8009)
Bugfix: Do not try to encrypt a None value when using CONAN_LOGIN_ENCRYPTION_KEY environment variable. (conan-io/conan#8004)

1.31.0 (30-Oct-2020)

Feature: Add argument conanfile to pre_download_package and post_download_package hook functions. (conan-io/conan#7968). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add CONAN_LOGIN_ENCRYPTION_KEY environment variable to obfuscate stored auth token. (conan-io/conan#7958). Docs: 📃
Feature: Use profile to filter results in the conan search HTML output. (conan-io/conan#7956)
Feature: Changed recommended way to launch test suite, with pytest over nosetests. (conan-io/conan#7952)
Feature: Provide a MSBuildCmd helper class that encapsulates calling MSBuild. (conan-io/conan#7941). Docs: 📃
Feature: Download and keep the conan_export.tgz and conan_source.tgz in the cache, so they are not affected by different Operating Systems compression and de-compression and uploading is way more efficient. (conan-io/conan#7938)
Feature: Add provides and deprecated fields to conan info output (conan-io/conan#7916)
Feature: Including package revision information in output from conan info (when revisions are enabled). (conan-io/conan#7890)
Feature: Download and keep the conan_package.tgz in the cache, so they are not affected by different Operating Systems compression and de-compression and uploading is way more efficient. (conan-io/conan#7886)
Feature: Add POC on a toolchain for iOS (using CMake XCode generator). (conan-io/conan#7855). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add POC on a toolchain for Android (using CMake provided modules). (conan-io/conan#7843). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow conan config install of a single file (conan-io/conan#7840). Docs: 📃
Feature: Use Python loggers for Conan output in cli 2.0. (conan-io/conan#7502)
Fix: Improve permission error message when migrating cache folder. (conan-io/conan#7966)
Fix: Make per-package settings definition complete the existing settings values, not requiring a complete redefinition. (conan-io/conan#7953)
Fix: Avoid unnecessary extra loading of conan.conf file in the version migrations check. (conan-io/conan#7949)
Fix: Simplified MakeToolchain to remove things that were not checked by tests or unused. (conan-io/conan#7942)
Fix: displayed message when settings of the recipe are constrained. (conan-io/conan#7930). Docs: 📃
Fix: Set CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME set to iOS, tvOS or watchOS or Darwin depending on the CMake version. (conan-io/conan#7924)
Fix: Remove duplicate entries while modifying PATH-like environment variables internally. Especially important for Windows where system PATH size is limited by 8192 charachers (when using cmd.exe). (conan-io/conan#7891)
Fix: Make default behaviour explicit in search help output. (conan-io/conan#7877). Docs: 📃
Fix: Automatically add OSX deployment flags in AutootoolsBuildEnvironment with the value of os_version, unless the values are already defined in environment variables CFLAGS or CXXFLAGS. (conan-io/conan#7862)
Fix: Remove toolset variability from the msbuild generator and MSBuildToolchain. (conan-io/conan#7825)
Fix: Component requirement checking now properly handles private and override requirements. (conan-io/conan#7585)
Bugfix: Set default storage_folder to .conan/data in case if storage_path entry fails to be defined by conan.conf. (conan-io/conan#7910)
Bugfix: Fix regression in self.run(output=xxxx) that have a write() method but do not wrap a stream. (conan-io/conan#7905)
Bugfix: Fix local flow (conan install + build) support for cpp_info.names and cpp_info.filenames. (conan-io/conan#7867)
Bugfix: Fix inspect --remote forcing to retrieve the remote for evaluation, overwriting what is in the local cache. (conan-io/conan#7749)
Bugfix: Copy symbolic links to directory with deploy generator. (conan-io/conan#7655). Docs: 📃

1.30.2 (15-Oct-2020)

Feature: Supports Clang 11. (conan-io/conan#7871). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fix regression conan-io/conan#7856, imports failing to match subfolders in Windows due to backslash differences. (conan-io/conan#7861)
Bugfix: Allow defining new options values when creating a new lockfile from an existing base lockfile. (conan-io/conan#7859)

1.30.1 (09-Oct-2020)

Fix: Use quotes around the install path, it can contain spaces. (conan-io/conan#7842)
Fix: prefix intel functions with intel_ because they are now exposed via tools. Fixes conan-io/conan#7820. (conan-io/conan#7821). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fix regression introduced in 1.30 (conan-io/conan#7673), with incorrect matches of user/channel for version ranges. (conan-io/conan#7847)



... (truncated)


Commits

b7e147a release 1.31.2
a8c6fb4 check usage f urllib3 (#8042)
172dd39 release 1.31.1
61d375b init needs to be called also when used cached classes in loader (#8018)
21d2f8f bump cryptography to >= 3.2 (#7962)
d0cce79 fixing self.copy() ignore_case for excludes (#8009)
500d61b do not try to encode a value if it is None (#8004)
f322a74 Fix config install help message  (#7973)
8acccb2 open release 1.31.0
706e9b9 Feature/toolchain msbuild cmd (#7941)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

Fix: Simplified MakeToolchain to remove things that were not checked by tests or unused. (conan-io/conan#7942)
Fix: displayed message when settings of the recipe are constrained. (conan-io/conan#7930). Docs: 📃
Fix: Set CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME set to iOS, tvOS or watchOS or Darwin depending on the CMake version. (conan-io/conan#7924)
Fix: Remove duplicate entries while modifying PATH-like environment variables internally. Especially important for Windows where system PATH size is limited by 8192 charachers (when using cmd.exe). (conan-io/conan#7891)
Fix: Make default behaviour explicit in search help output. (conan-io/conan#7877). Docs: 📃
Fix: Automatically add OSX deployment flags in AutootoolsBuildEnvironment with the value of os_version, unless the values are already defined in environment variables CFLAGS or CXXFLAGS. (conan-io/conan#7862)
Fix: Remove toolset variability from the msbuild generator and MSBuildToolchain. (conan-io/conan#7825)
Fix: Component requirement checking now properly handles private and override requirements. (conan-io/conan#7585)
Bugfix: Set default storage_folder to .conan/data in case if storage_path entry fails to be defined by conan.conf. (conan-io/conan#7910)
Bugfix: Fix regression in self.run(output=xxxx) that have a write() method but do not wrap a stream. (conan-io/conan#7905)
Bugfix: Fix local flow (conan install + build) support for cpp_info.names and cpp_info.filenames. (conan-io/conan#7867)
Bugfix: Fix inspect --remote forcing to retrieve the remote for evaluation, overwriting what is in the local cache. (conan-io/conan#7749)
Bugfix: Copy symbolic links to directory with deploy generator. (conan-io/conan#7655). Docs: 📃

1.30.2 (15-Oct-2020)

Feature: Supports Clang 11. (conan-io/conan#7871). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fix regression conan-io/conan#7856, imports failing to match subfolders in Windows due to backslash differences. (conan-io/conan#7861)
Bugfix: Allow defining new options values when creating a new lockfile from an existing base lockfile. (conan-io/conan#7859)

1.30.1 (09-Oct-2020)


... (truncated)

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.31.4.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.31.4 (25-Nov-2020)

Feature: Add new CONAN_CMAKE_SYSROOT environment variable to enable the definition of sysroot from environment, without abusing CONAN_CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH. (conan-io/conan#8097). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: remove definition of sysroot from CONAN_CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH. (conan-io/conan#8097). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Solve os.rename crash when using short_paths with a short path storage located in another Windows drive unit. Ported from: (conan-io/conan#8103)

1.31.3 (17-Nov-2020)

Bugfix: Fix addition of CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME for SunOS and AIX 64->32 bits builds (conan-io/conan#8059)

1.31.2 (11-Nov-2020)

Bugfix: Recent liburl3 1.26 library updates is breaking the constraints in Conan requirements.txt  as requests 2.24 has a limitation for liburl3. This PR constrains liburl3 version to be less than 1.26, so it does not break with requests 2.24. (conan-io/conan#8042)

1.31.1 (10-Nov-2020)

Fix: Bump cryptography dependency in MacOS to equal or later than 3.2. (conan-io/conan#7962)
Bugfix: Fix a problem with the init() function not being called when the recipe loader uses some cached data, which can happen when using lockfiles and with python_requires. (conan-io/conan#8018)
Bugfix: Fixed self.copy() incorrectly handling ignore_case. (conan-io/conan#8009)
Bugfix: Fixed wrong ignore_case default in [imports] section of conanfile.txt. (conan-io/conan#8009)
Bugfix: Do not try to encrypt a None value when using CONAN_LOGIN_ENCRYPTION_KEY environment variable. (conan-io/conan#8004)

1.31.0 (30-Oct-2020)

Feature: Add argument conanfile to pre_download_package and post_download_package hook functions. (conan-io/conan#7968). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add CONAN_LOGIN_ENCRYPTION_KEY environment variable to obfuscate stored auth token. (conan-io/conan#7958). Docs: 📃
Feature: Use profile to filter results in the conan search HTML output. (conan-io/conan#7956)
Feature: Changed recommended way to launch test suite, with pytest over nosetests. (conan-io/conan#7952)
Feature: Provide a MSBuildCmd helper class that encapsulates calling MSBuild. (conan-io/conan#7941). Docs: 📃
Feature: Download and keep the conan_export.tgz and conan_source.tgz in the cache, so they are not affected by different Operating Systems compression and de-compression and uploading is way more efficient. (conan-io/conan#7938)
Feature: Add provides and deprecated fields to conan info output (conan-io/conan#7916)
Feature: Including package revision information in output from conan info (when revisions are enabled). (conan-io/conan#7890)
Feature: Download and keep the conan_package.tgz in the cache, so they are not affected by different Operating Systems compression and de-compression and uploading is way more efficient. (conan-io/conan#7886)
Feature: Add POC on a toolchain for iOS (using CMake XCode generator). (conan-io/conan#7855). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add POC on a toolchain for Android (using CMake provided modules). (conan-io/conan#7843). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow conan config install of a single file (conan-io/conan#7840). Docs: 📃
Feature: Use Python loggers for Conan output in cli 2.0. (conan-io/conan#7502)
Fix: Improve permission error message when migrating cache folder. (conan-io/conan#7966)
Fix: Make per-package settings definition complete the existing settings values, not requiring a complete redefinition. (conan-io/conan#7953)
Fix: Avoid unnecessary extra loading of conan.conf file in the version migrations check. (conan-io/conan#7949)
Fix: Simplified MakeToolchain to remove things that were not checked by tests or unused. (conan-io/conan#7942)
Fix: displayed message when settings of the recipe are constrained. (conan-io/conan#7930). Docs: 📃
Fix: Set CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME set to iOS, tvOS or watchOS or Darwin depending on the CMake version. (conan-io/conan#7924)
Fix: Remove duplicate entries while modifying PATH-like environment variables internally. Especially important for Windows where system PATH size is limited by 8192 charachers (when using cmd.exe). (conan-io/conan#7891)
Fix: Make default behaviour explicit in search help output. (conan-io/conan#7877). Docs: 📃
Fix: Automatically add OSX deployment flags in AutootoolsBuildEnvironment with the value of os_version, unless the values are already defined in environment variables CFLAGS or CXXFLAGS. (conan-io/conan#7862)
Fix: Remove toolset variability from the msbuild generator and MSBuildToolchain. (conan-io/conan#7825)
Fix: Component requirement checking now properly handles private and override requirements. (conan-io/conan#7585)
Bugfix: Set default storage_folder to .conan/data in case if storage_path entry fails to be defined by conan.conf. (conan-io/conan#7910)
Bugfix: Fix regression in self.run(output=xxxx) that have a write() method but do not wrap a stream. (conan-io/conan#7905)
Bugfix: Fix local flow (conan install + build) support for cpp_info.names and cpp_info.filenames. (conan-io/conan#7867)
Bugfix: Fix inspect --remote forcing to retrieve the remote for evaluation, overwriting what is in the local cache. (conan-io/conan#7749)
Bugfix: Copy symbolic links to directory with deploy generator. (conan-io/conan#7655). Docs: 📃

1.30.2 (15-Oct-2020)


... (truncated)


Commits

69d3eca fix error in file moving from short_paths cache
dd375cb remove definition of sysroot from CONAN_CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH (#8097)
f0520ff open release 1.31.4
9c844d8 release 1.31.3
c93e0e7 fix addition of CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME for SunOS and AIX 64->32 bits builds (#8059)
b7e147a release 1.31.2
a8c6fb4 check usage f urllib3 (#8042)
172dd39 release 1.31.1
61d375b init needs to be called also when used cached classes in loader (#8018)
21d2f8f bump cryptography to >= 3.2 (#7962)

Feature: Add new CONAN_CMAKE_SYSROOT environment variable to enable the definition of sysroot from environment, without abusing CONAN_CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH. (conan-io/conan#8097). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: remove definition of sysroot from CONAN_CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH. (conan-io/conan#8097). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Solve os.rename crash when using short_paths with a short path storage located in another Windows drive unit. Ported from: (conan-io/conan#8103)

1.31.3 (17-Nov-2020)

Bugfix: Fix addition of CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME for SunOS and AIX 64->32 bits builds (conan-io/conan#8059)

1.31.2 (11-Nov-2020)

Bugfix: Recent liburl3 1.26 library updates is breaking the constraints in Conan requirements.txt  as requests 2.24 has a limitation for liburl3. This PR constrains liburl3 version to be less than 1.26, so it does not break with requests 2.24. (conan-io/conan#8042)

1.31.1 (10-Nov-2020)

Fix: Bump cryptography dependency in MacOS to equal or later than 3.2. (conan-io/conan#7962)
Bugfix: Fix a problem with the init() function not being called when the recipe loader uses some cached data, which can happen when using lockfiles and with python_requires. (conan-io/conan#8018)
Bugfix: Fixed self.copy() incorrectly handling ignore_case. (conan-io/conan#8009)
Bugfix: Fixed wrong ignore_case default in [imports] section of conanfile.txt. (conan-io/conan#8009)
Bugfix: Do not try to encrypt a None value when using CONAN_LOGIN_ENCRYPTION_KEY environment variable. (conan-io/conan#8004)

1.31.0 (30-Oct-2020)

Feature: Add argument conanfile to pre_download_package and post_download_package hook functions. (conan-io/conan#7968). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add CONAN_LOGIN_ENCRYPTION_KEY environment variable to obfuscate stored auth token. (conan-io/conan#7958). Docs: 📃
Feature: Use profile to filter results in the conan search HTML output. (conan-io/conan#7956)
Feature: Changed recommended way to launch test suite, with pytest over nosetests. (conan-io/conan#7952)
Feature: Provide a MSBuildCmd helper class that encapsulates calling MSBuild. (conan-io/conan#7941). Docs: 📃
Feature: Download and keep the conan_export.tgz and conan_source.tgz in the cache, so they are not affected by different Operating Systems compression and de-compression and uploading is way more efficient. (conan-io/conan#7938)
Feature: Add provides and deprecated fields to conan info output (conan-io/conan#7916)
Feature: Including package revision information in output from conan info (when revisions are enabled). (conan-io/conan#7890)
Feature: Download and keep the conan_package.tgz in the cache, so they are not affected by different Operating Systems compression and de-compression and uploading is way more efficient. (conan-io/conan#7886)
Feature: Add POC on a toolchain for iOS (using CMake XCode generator). (conan-io/conan#7855). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add POC on a toolchain for Android (using CMake provided modules). (conan-io/conan#7843). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow conan config install of a single file (conan-io/conan#7840). Docs: 📃
Feature: Use Python loggers for Conan output in cli 2.0. (conan-io/conan#7502)
Fix: Improve permission error message when migrating cache folder. (conan-io/conan#7966)
Fix: Make per-package settings definition complete the existing settings values, not requiring a complete redefinition. (conan-io/conan#7953)
Fix: Avoid unnecessary extra loading of conan.conf file in the version migrations check. (conan-io/conan#7949)
Fix: Simplified MakeToolchain to remove things that were not checked by tests or unused. (conan-io/conan#7942)
Fix: displayed message when settings of the recipe are constrained. (conan-io/conan#7930). Docs: 📃
Fix: Set CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME set to iOS, tvOS or watchOS or Darwin depending on the CMake version. (conan-io/conan#7924)
Fix: Remove duplicate entries while modifying PATH-like environment variables internally. Especially important for Windows where system PATH size is limited by 8192 charachers (when using cmd.exe). (conan-io/conan#7891)
Fix: Make default behaviour explicit in search help output. (conan-io/conan#7877). Docs: 📃
Fix: Automatically add OSX deployment flags in AutootoolsBuildEnvironment with the value of os_version, unless the values are already defined in environment variables CFLAGS or CXXFLAGS. (conan-io/conan#7862)
Fix: Remove toolset variability from the msbuild generator and MSBuildToolchain. (conan-io/conan#7825)
Fix: Component requirement checking now properly handles private and override requirements. (conan-io/conan#7585)
Bugfix: Set default storage_folder to .conan/data in case if storage_path entry fails to be defined by conan.conf. (conan-io/conan#7910)
Bugfix: Fix regression in self.run(output=xxxx) that have a write() method but do not wrap a stream. (conan-io/conan#7905)
Bugfix: Fix local flow (conan install + build) support for cpp_info.names and cpp_info.filenames. (conan-io/conan#7867)
Bugfix: Fix inspect --remote forcing to retrieve the remote for evaluation, overwriting what is in the local cache. (conan-io/conan#7749)
Bugfix: Copy symbolic links to directory with deploy generator. (conan-io/conan#7655). Docs: 📃

1.30.2 (15-Oct-2020)


... (truncated)


Commits

69d3eca fix error in file moving from short_paths cache
dd375cb remove definition of sysroot from CONAN_CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH (#8097)
f0520ff open release 1.31.4
9c844d8 release 1.31.3
c93e0e7 fix addition of CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME for SunOS and AIX 64->32 bits builds (#8059)
b7e147a release 1.31.2
a8c6fb4 check usage f urllib3 (#8042)
172dd39 release 1.31.1
61d375b init needs to be called also when used cached classes in loader (#8018)
21d2f8f bump cryptography to >= 3.2 (#7962)

column21: Superseded by #174.

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.32.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.32.0 (03-Dec-2020)

Feature: Generate <pkgname>-config.cmake files for lowercase packages to improve case compatibility. (conan-io/conan#8129). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add meson cross-build toolchain. (conan-io/conan#8111)
Feature: Temporary acquire write permissions in replace_in_file. (conan-io/conan#8107)
Feature: Update conan new to latest guidelines. (conan-io/conan#8106)
Feature: Deprecate experimental toolchain() in favor of more generic generate() method. Deprecate toolchains write_toolchain_files() to new generate() method. (conan-io/conan#8101). Docs: 📃
Feature: Move the CMakeToolchain and new CMake experimental helpers to the new from conan.tools.cmake import. (conan-io/conan#8096). Docs: 📃
Feature: Move the MSBuildToolchain and new MSBuild experimental helpers to the new from conan.tools.microsoft import. (conan-io/conan#8096). Docs: 📃
Feature: Move the MakeToolchain experimental helper to the new from conan.tools.gnu import. (conan-io/conan#8096). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add conan remote list_ref --no-remote to list recipes without a remote defined. (conan-io/conan#8094). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add conan remote list_pref --no-remote to list packages without a remote defined. (conan-io/conan#8094). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add --lockfile-node-id argument to conan install --lockfile so it can target different packages with same reference (different binary, this can happen with private requirements). (conan-io/conan#8077). Docs: 📃
Feature: Proof that python_requires can be used (as a workaround) to affect the package_id of consumers of build_requires that otherwise will not be rebuilt based on changes. (conan-io/conan#8076). Docs: 📃
Feature: Introduce configuration general.keep_python_files to allow packaging of Python .pyc files. (conan-io/conan#8070). Docs: 📃
Feature: Tests for toolchains and Intel compiler. (conan-io/conan#8062)
Feature: Add recipe and package revision to show a complete Conan reference when generating the build_info --v2 id fields. (conan-io/conan#8055)
Feature: Introduce a new BINARY_INVALID mode for more flexible definition and management of invalid configurations. (conan-io/conan#8053). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add headers with settings and options to HTTP GET requests when searching for packages. (conan-io/conan#8046)
Feature: Preliminary experimental support for toolchains with CMake + Visual + Ninja. (conan-io/conan#8034)
Feature: Allow (experimental) custom configuration of the msbuild generator. (conan-io/conan#8014)
Feature: Rename msbuild generator to MSBuildDeps and use the new generate() method. (conan-io/conan#8014)
Feature: Make the conan new bye/0.1 -s -t to provide variable filenames and messages that include the package name and version, instead of a hardcoded "hello" one. (conan-io/conan#7989)
Feature: Tagged tests and created a conftest.py to run the tests with pytest skipping the tests using not available tools (cmake, visual studio...). (conan-io/conan#7975)
Feature: Provide correct --pure_c implementation to conan new. (conan-io/conan#7947)
Feature: System package tools can install a list of different packages. (conan-io/conan#7779). Docs: 📃
Feature: meson toolchain (conan-io/conan#7662). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add Conan package name and version to Visual Studio generator properties file. (conan-io/conan#7645)
Fix: Remove __init__.py in the root of the repo, which was useless, without a purpose, but caused issues with other projects importing Conan Python code. (conan-io/conan#8132)
Fix: Make variables defined in CMakeToolchain cache variables, so they can define directly values defined in CMakeLists.txt. (conan-io/conan#8124)
Fix: Remove cryptography, pyopenssl and idna from OSX requirements in Python. (conan-io/conan#8075)
Fix: Rename the generated file of MSBuildToolchain to conantoolchain.props so it doesn't collide with a potential toolchain package name and the msbuild generator. (conan-io/conan#8073). Docs: 📃
Fix: Avoid warning in msbuild generator importing multiple times the same .props file due to transitive dependencies. (conan-io/conan#8072)
Fix: Set username or password individually in git SCM with ssh. (conan-io/conan#8016)
Fix: When using lockfiles, allow config_options and configure to compute different options as long as the final evaluated values match the locked ones. (conan-io/conan#7993)
Fix: Make the conan new --pure_c pure C template to remove both compiler.libcxx and compiler.cppstd settings, as described in the docs. (conan-io/conan#7989)
BugFix: Fix linkage to a same global target of different package components in cmake_find_package/_multi generators. (conan-io/conan#8114). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Solve os.rename crash when using short_paths with a short path storage located in another Windows drive unit. (conan-io/conan#8103)
BugFix: Allow lockfiles to be relaxed with the --build argument. (conan-io/conan#8054). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Append existing LocalDebuggerEnvironment in msbuild generator. (conan-io/conan#8040)
Bugfix: Remove correctly short-paths folders in Windows. (conan-io/conan#7986)

1.31.4 (25-Nov-2020)

Feature: Add new CONAN_CMAKE_SYSROOT environment variable to enable the definition of sysroot from environment, without abusing CONAN_CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH. (conan-io/conan#8097). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: remove definition of sysroot from CONAN_CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH. (conan-io/conan#8097). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Solve os.rename crash when using short_paths with a short path storage located in another Windows drive unit. Ported from: (conan-io/conan#8103)

1.31.3 (17-Nov-2020)

Bugfix: Fix addition of CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME for SunOS and AIX 64->32 bits builds (conan-io/conan#8059)

1.31.2 (11-Nov-2020)


... (truncated)


Commits

61d75d9 release/1.32.0
ffb8abc housekeeping repo of root (#8137)
8c02cca msbuild generator custom configs (#8014)
57336f5 Relax lockfiles config_options and configure options evaluation (#7993)
5e0add2 [test] Remove 'init.py' from the root of the repository (#8132)
9b66664 Feature: add meson cross-build toolchain (#8111)
f60a9df Feature: update conan new to latest guidelines (#8106)
aeb9693 add keep_python_files (#8134)
2af4572 small refactor of add_permissions (#8131)
6d5ed71 make variables defined in cmake tolchain cache ones (#8124)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

Feature: Deprecate experimental toolchain() in favor of more generic generate() method. Deprecate toolchains write_toolchain_files() to new generate() method. (conan-io/conan#8101). Docs: 📃
Feature: Move the CMakeToolchain and new CMake experimental helpers to the new from conan.tools.cmake import. (conan-io/conan#8096). Docs: 📃
Feature: Move the MSBuildToolchain and new MSBuild experimental helpers to the new from conan.tools.microsoft import. (conan-io/conan#8096). Docs: 📃
Feature: Move the MakeToolchain experimental helper to the new from conan.tools.gnu import. (conan-io/conan#8096). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add conan remote list_ref --no-remote to list recipes without a remote defined. (conan-io/conan#8094). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add conan remote list_pref --no-remote to list packages without a remote defined. (conan-io/conan#8094). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add --lockfile-node-id argument to conan install --lockfile so it can target different packages with same reference (different binary, this can happen with private requirements). (conan-io/conan#8077). Docs: 📃
Feature: Proof that python_requires can be used (as a workaround) to affect the package_id of consumers of build_requires that otherwise will not be rebuilt based on changes. (conan-io/conan#8076). Docs: 📃
Feature: Introduce configuration general.keep_python_files to allow packaging of Python .pyc files. (conan-io/conan#8070). Docs: 📃
Feature: Tests for toolchains and Intel compiler. (conan-io/conan#8062)
Feature: Add recipe and package revision to show a complete Conan reference when generating the build_info --v2 id fields. (conan-io/conan#8055)
Feature: Introduce a new BINARY_INVALID mode for more flexible definition and management of invalid configurations. (conan-io/conan#8053). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add headers with settings and options to HTTP GET requests when searching for packages. (conan-io/conan#8046)
Feature: Preliminary experimental support for toolchains with CMake + Visual + Ninja. (conan-io/conan#8034)
Feature: Allow (experimental) custom configuration of the msbuild generator. (conan-io/conan#8014)
Feature: Rename msbuild generator to MSBuildDeps and use the new generate() method. (conan-io/conan#8014)
Feature: Make the conan new bye/0.1 -s -t to provide variable filenames and messages that include the package name and version, instead of a hardcoded "hello" one. (conan-io/conan#7989)
Feature: Tagged tests and created a conftest.py to run the tests with pytest skipping the tests using not available tools (cmake, visual studio...). (conan-io/conan#7975)
Feature: Provide correct --pure_c implementation to conan new. (conan-io/conan#7947)
Feature: System package tools can install a list of different packages. (conan-io/conan#7779). Docs: 📃
Feature: meson toolchain (conan-io/conan#7662). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add Conan package name and version to Visual Studio generator properties file. (conan-io/conan#7645)
Fix: Remove __init__.py in the root of the repo, which was useless, without a purpose, but caused issues with other projects importing Conan Python code. (conan-io/conan#8132)
Fix: Make variables defined in CMakeToolchain cache variables, so they can define directly values defined in CMakeLists.txt. (conan-io/conan#8124)
Fix: Remove cryptography, pyopenssl and idna from OSX requirements in Python. (conan-io/conan#8075)
Fix: Rename the generated file of MSBuildToolchain to conantoolchain.props so it doesn't collide with a potential toolchain package name and the msbuild generator. (conan-io/conan#8073). Docs: 📃
Fix: Avoid warning in msbuild generator importing multiple times the same .props file due to transitive dependencies. (conan-io/conan#8072)
Fix: Set username or password individually in git SCM with ssh. (conan-io/conan#8016)
Fix: When using lockfiles, allow config_options and configure to compute different options as long as the final evaluated values match the locked ones. (conan-io/conan#7993)
Fix: Make the conan new --pure_c pure C template to remove both compiler.libcxx and compiler.cppstd settings, as described in the docs. (conan-io/conan#7989)
BugFix: Fix linkage to a same global target of different package components in cmake_find_package/_multi generators. (conan-io/conan#8114). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Solve os.rename crash when using short_paths with a short path storage located in another Windows drive unit. (conan-io/conan#8103)
BugFix: Allow lockfiles to be relaxed with the --build argument. (conan-io/conan#8054). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Append existing LocalDebuggerEnvironment in msbuild generator. (conan-io/conan#8040)
Bugfix: Remove correctly short-paths folders in Windows. (conan-io/conan#7986)

1.31.4 (25-Nov-2020)

Feature: Add new CONAN_CMAKE_SYSROOT environment variable to enable the definition of sysroot from environment, without abusing CONAN_CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH. (conan-io/conan#8097). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: remove definition of sysroot from CONAN_CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH. (conan-io/conan#8097). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Solve os.rename crash when using short_paths with a short path storage located in another Windows drive unit. Ported from: (conan-io/conan#8103)

1.31.3 (17-Nov-2020)

Bugfix: Fix addition of CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME for SunOS and AIX 64->32 bits builds (conan-io/conan#8059)

1.31.2 (11-Nov-2020)


... (truncated)


Commits

61d75d9 release/1.32.0
ffb8abc housekeeping repo of root (#8137)
8c02cca msbuild generator custom configs (#8014)
57336f5 Relax lockfiles config_options and configure options evaluation (#7993)
5e0add2 [test] Remove 'init.py' from the root of the repository (#8132)
9b66664 Feature: add meson cross-build toolchain (#8111)
f60a9df Feature: update conan new to latest guidelines (#8106)
aeb9693 add keep_python_files (#8134)
2af4572 small refactor of add_permissions (#8131)
6d5ed71 make variables defined in cmake tolchain cache ones (#8124)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.32.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.32.0 (03-Dec-2020)

Feature: Generate <pkgname>-config.cmake files for lowercase packages to improve case compatibility. (conan-io/conan#8129). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add meson cross-build toolchain. (conan-io/conan#8111)
Feature: Temporary acquire write permissions in replace_in_file. (conan-io/conan#8107)
Feature: Update conan new to latest guidelines. (conan-io/conan#8106)
Feature: Deprecate experimental toolchain() in favor of more generic generate() method. Deprecate toolchains write_toolchain_files() to new generate() method. (conan-io/conan#8101). Docs: 📃
Feature: Move the CMakeToolchain and new CMake experimental helpers to the new from conan.tools.cmake import. (conan-io/conan#8096). Docs: 📃

Feature: Move the MakeToolchain experimental helper to the new from conan.tools.gnu import. (conan-io/conan#8096). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add conan remote list_ref --no-remote to list recipes without a remote defined. (conan-io/conan#8094). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add conan remote list_pref --no-remote to list packages without a remote defined. (conan-io/conan#8094). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add --lockfile-node-id argument to conan install --lockfile so it can target different packages with same reference (different binary, this can happen with private requirements). (conan-io/conan#8077). Docs: 📃
