Feature: Preliminary experimental support for toolchains with CMake + Visual + Ninja. (conan-io/conan#8034)
Feature: Allow (experimental) custom configuration of the msbuild generator. (conan-io/conan#8014)
Feature: Rename msbuild generator to MSBuildDeps and use the new generate() method. (conan-io/conan#8014)
Feature: Make the conan new bye/0.1 -s -t to provide variable filenames and messages that include the package name and version, instead of a hardcoded "hello" one. (conan-io/conan#7989)

Feature: Provide correct --pure_c implementation to conan new. (conan-io/conan#7947)
Feature: System package tools can install a list of different packages. (conan-io/conan#7779). Docs: 📃
Feature: meson toolchain (conan-io/conan#7662). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add Conan package name and version to Visual Studio generator properties file. (conan-io/conan#7645)
Fix: Remove __init__.py in the root of the repo, which was useless, without a purpose, but caused issues with other projects importing Conan Python code. (conan-io/conan#8132)
Fix: Make variables defined in CMakeToolchain cache variables, so they can define directly values defined in CMakeLists.txt. (conan-io/conan#8124)
Fix: Remove cryptography, pyopenssl and idna from OSX requirements in Python. (conan-io/conan#8075)
Fix: Rename the generated file of MSBuildToolchain to conantoolchain.props so it doesn't collide with a potential toolchain package name and the msbuild generator. (conan-io/conan#8073). Docs: 📃
Fix: Avoid warning in msbuild generator importing multiple times the same .props file due to transitive dependencies. (conan-io/conan#8072)
Fix: Set username or password individually in git SCM with ssh. (conan-io/conan#8016)
Fix: When using lockfiles, allow config_options and configure to compute different options as long as the final evaluated values match the locked ones. (conan-io/conan#7993)
Fix: Make the conan new --pure_c pure C template to remove both compiler.libcxx and compiler.cppstd settings, as described in the docs. (conan-io/conan#7989)
BugFix: Fix linkage to a same global target of different package components in cmake_find_package/_multi generators. (conan-io/conan#8114). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Solve os.rename crash when using short_paths with a short path storage located in another Windows drive unit. (conan-io/conan#8103)

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.32.1.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.32.1 (15-Dec-2020)

Bugfix: Avoid conflict of user custom generators names with new generators. (conan-io/conan#8183)
Bugfix: Fix errors when using conan info --paths and short_paths=True in Windows, due to creation of empty folders in the short-paths storage. (conan-io/conan#8181)
Bugfix: conan new <pkg-name>/version -t wrong include when not using -s (using the hardcoded git repo). (conan-io/conan#8175)
Bugfix: Fix excludes pattern case-insensitive in non Windows platforms. (conan-io/conan#8155)
Bugfix: Enabling set_name, set_version for lockfile roo not location. (conan-io/conan#8151)

1.32.0 (03-Dec-2020)

Feature: Generate <pkgname>-config.cmake files for lowercase packages to improve case compatibility. (conan-io/conan#8129). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add meson cross-build toolchain. (conan-io/conan#8111)
Feature: Temporary acquire write permissions in replace_in_file. (conan-io/conan#8107)
Feature: Update conan new to latest guidelines. (conan-io/conan#8106)
Feature: Deprecate experimental toolchain() in favor of more generic generate() method. Deprecate toolchains write_toolchain_files() to new generate() method. (conan-io/conan#8101). Docs: 📃
Feature: Move the CMakeToolchain and new CMake experimental helpers to the new from conan.tools.cmake import. (conan-io/conan#8096). Docs: 📃
Feature: Move the MSBuildToolchain and new MSBuild experimental helpers to the new from conan.tools.microsoft import. (conan-io/conan#8096). Docs: 📃
Feature: Move the MakeToolchain experimental helper to the new from conan.tools.gnu import. (conan-io/conan#8096). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add conan remote list_ref --no-remote to list recipes without a remote defined. (conan-io/conan#8094). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add conan remote list_pref --no-remote to list packages without a remote defined. (conan-io/conan#8094). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add --lockfile-node-id argument to conan install --lockfile so it can target different packages with same reference (different binary, this can happen with private requirements). (conan-io/conan#8077). Docs: 📃
Feature: Proof that python_requires can be used (as a workaround) to affect the package_id of consumers of build_requires that otherwise will not be rebuilt based on changes. (conan-io/conan#8076). Docs: 📃
Feature: Introduce configuration general.keep_python_files to allow packaging of Python .pyc files. (conan-io/conan#8070). Docs: 📃
Feature: Tests for toolchains and Intel compiler. (conan-io/conan#8062)
Feature: Add recipe and package revision to show a complete Conan reference when generating the build_info --v2 id fields. (conan-io/conan#8055)
Feature: Introduce a new BINARY_INVALID mode for more flexible definition and management of invalid configurations. (conan-io/conan#8053). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add headers with settings and options to HTTP GET requests when searching for packages. (conan-io/conan#8046)
Feature: Preliminary experimental support for toolchains with CMake + Visual + Ninja. (conan-io/conan#8034)
Feature: Allow (experimental) custom configuration of the msbuild generator. (conan-io/conan#8014). Docs: 📃
Feature: Rename msbuild generator to MSBuildDeps and use the new generate() method. (conan-io/conan#8014). Docs: 📃
Feature: Make the conan new bye/0.1 -s -t to provide variable filenames and messages that include the package name and version, instead of a hardcoded "hello" one. (conan-io/conan#7989)
Feature: Tagged tests and created a conftest.py to run the tests with pytest skipping the tests using not available tools (cmake, visual studio...). (conan-io/conan#7975)
Feature: Provide correct --pure_c implementation to conan new. (conan-io/conan#7947)
Feature: System package tools can install a list of different packages. (conan-io/conan#7779). Docs: 📃
Feature: meson toolchain (conan-io/conan#7662). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add Conan package name and version to Visual Studio generator properties file. (conan-io/conan#7645)
Fix: Remove __init__.py in the root of the repo, which was useless, without a purpose, but caused issues with other projects importing Conan Python code. (conan-io/conan#8132)
Fix: Make variables defined in CMakeToolchain cache variables, so they can define directly values defined in CMakeLists.txt. (conan-io/conan#8124)
Fix: Remove cryptography, pyopenssl and idna from OSX requirements in Python. (conan-io/conan#8075)
Fix: Rename the generated file of MSBuildToolchain to conantoolchain.props so it doesn't collide with a potential toolchain package name and the msbuild generator. (conan-io/conan#8073). Docs: 📃
Fix: Avoid warning in msbuild generator importing multiple times the same .props file due to transitive dependencies. (conan-io/conan#8072)
Fix: Set username or password individually in git SCM with ssh. (conan-io/conan#8016)
Fix: When using lockfiles, allow config_options and configure to compute different options as long as the final evaluated values match the locked ones. (conan-io/conan#7993)
Fix: Make the conan new --pure_c pure C template to remove both compiler.libcxx and compiler.cppstd settings, as described in the docs. (conan-io/conan#7989)
BugFix: Fix linkage to a same global target of different package components in cmake_find_package/_multi generators. (conan-io/conan#8114). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Solve os.rename crash when using short_paths with a short path storage located in another Windows drive unit. (conan-io/conan#8103)
BugFix: Allow lockfiles to be relaxed with the --build argument. (conan-io/conan#8054). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Append existing LocalDebuggerEnvironment in msbuild generator. (conan-io/conan#8040)
Bugfix: Remove correctly short-paths folders in Windows. (conan-io/conan#7986)

1.31.4 (25-Nov-2020)

Feature: Add new CONAN_CMAKE_SYSROOT environment variable to enable the definition of sysroot from environment, without abusing CONAN_CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH. (conan-io/conan#8097). Docs: 📃



... (truncated)


Commits

e856ed5 release/1.32.1
8be0570 Fix excludes in FileCopier failures for case-insensitive in non-Windows (#8155)
0971e63 enabling set_name, set_version for lockfile root_node finding (#8151)
d361872 avoid conflict of custom generators with new generators (#8183)
8955ba5 fix conan new -t includes (#8175)
dcba201 Hotfix/short paths info paths (#8181)
3aaa928 Test migration to new ci (#8064) (#8184)
61d75d9 release/1.32.0
ffb8abc housekeeping repo of root (#8137)
8c02cca msbuild generator custom configs (#8014)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

Dependabot commands and options

@dependabot ignore this minor version will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

column20:
Bumps isort from 4.3.21 to 5.7.0.

Release notes
Sourced from isort's releases.

5.7.0 December 30th 2020

Fixed #1612: In rare circumstances an extra comma is added after import and before comment.
Fixed #1593: isort encounters bug in Python 3.6.0.
Implemented #1596: Provide ways for extension formatting and file paths to be specified when using streaming input from CLI.
Implemented #1583: Ability to output and diff within a single API call to isort.file.
Implemented #1562, #1592 & #1593: Better more useful fatal error messages.
Implemented #1575: Support for automatically fixing mixed indentation of import sections.
Implemented #1582: Added a CLI option for skipping symlinks.
Implemented #1603: Support for disabling float_to_top from the command line.
Implemented #1604: Allow toggling section comments on and off for indented import sections.

5.6.4 October 12, 2020

Fixed #1556: Empty line added between imports that should be skipped.

5.6.3 October 11, 2020

Improved packaging of test files alongside source distribution (see: PyCQA/isort#1555).

5.6.2 October 10, 2020

Fixed #1548: On rare occasions an unecessary empty line can be added when an import is marked as skipped.
Fixed #1542: Bug in VERTICAL_PREFIX_FROM_MODULE_IMPORT wrap mode.
Fixed #1552: Pylama test dependent on source layout.

5.6.1 [Hotfix] October 8, 2020

Fixed #1546: Unstable (non-idempotent) behavior with certain src trees.

5.6.0 October 7, 2020

Implemented #1433: Provide helpful feedback in case a custom config file is specified without a configuration.
Implemented #1494: Default to sorting imports within .pxd files.
Implemented #1502: Improved float-to-top behavior when there is an existing import section present at top-of-file.
Implemented #1511: Support for easily seeing all files isort will be ran against using isort . --show-files.
Implemented #1487: Improved handling of encoding errors.
Improved handling of unsupported configuration option errors (see #1475).
Fixed #1463: Better interactive documentation for future option.
Fixed #1461: Quiet config option not respected by file API in some circumstances.
Fixed #1482: pylama integration is not working correctly out-of-the-box.
Fixed #1492: --check does not work with stdin source.
Fixed #1499: isort gets confused by single line, multi-line style comments when using float-to-top.
Fixed #1525: Some warnings can't be disabled with --quiet.
Fixed #1523: in rare cases isort can ignore direct from import if as import is also on same line.

Potentially breaking changes:

Implemented #1540: Officially support Python 3.9 stdlib imports by default.
Fixed #1443: Incorrect third vs first party categorization - namespace packages.
Fixed #1486: "Google" profile is not quite Google style.
Fixed "PyCharm" profile to always add 2 lines to be consistent with what PyCharm "Optimize Imports" does.

Goal Zero: (Tickets related to aspirational goal of achieving 0 regressions for remaining 5.0.0 lifespan):

Implemented #1472: Full testing of stdin CLI Options
Added additional branch coverage.
More projects added to integration test suite.



... (truncated)

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.33.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.33.0 (20-Jan-2021)

Feature: Introducing a new [conf] section in profiles that allows a more systematic configuration management for recipes and helpers (build helpers, toolchains). Introducing a new conan_conf.txt cache configuration file that contains configuration definition with the same syntax as in profiles. (conan-io/conan#8266). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add Apple Catalyst support (as new os.subsystem) (conan-io/conan#8264). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add os.sdk sub-settings for Apple (conan-io/conan#8263). Docs: 📃
Feature: Provide support for msvc compiler in MSBuild tools (conan-io/conan#8238). Docs: 📃
Feature: Specify build modules by the generator in cpp_info. Added backwards compatibility for *.cmake build modules added at global scope, but not for other file extensions. (conan-io/conan#8232). Docs: 📃
Feature: The tools.get, tools.unzip and tools.untargz now accept a new argument strip_root=True to unzip moving all the files to the parent folder when all of them belongs to a single folder. (conan-io/conan#8208). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add new msvc compiler setting and preliminary support in conan.tools.cmake generator and toolchain. (conan-io/conan#8201). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMakeDeps now takes values for configurations from settings.yml. (conan-io/conan#8194). Docs: 📃
Feature: Implement ConanXXXRootFolder in MSBuildDeps generator. (conan-io/conan#8177)
Feature: Add Meson build helper. (conan-io/conan#8147). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add QbsToolchain and a Qbs build helper class (currently working for Mcus, not for Android or iOS). (conan-io/conan#8125). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add e2k (elbrus) architectures and mcst-lcc compiler (conan-io/conan#8032). Docs: 📃
Feature: New CMakeDeps generator (at the moment is the cmake_find_package_multi, that allows custom configurations, like ReleaseShared. (conan-io/conan#8024). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow MSBuildToolchain custom configurations in generate() method. (conan-io/conan#7754). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fixed help message in command conan remove --outdated with reference or pattern (conan-io/conan#8350). Docs: 📃
Fix: Do not define CMAKE_GENERATOR_PLATFORM and CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET in the CMakeToolchain file unless the CMake generator is "Visual Studio". Fix conan-io/conan#7485 (conan-io/conan#8333)
Fix: Remove spurious '-find' argument to XCodes xcrun tool. (conan-io/conan#8329)
Fix: Update pylint plugin, some fields are now available in the base ConanFile. (conan-io/conan#8320)
Fix: Remove PyJWT deprecation warning by adding explicitly algorithms argument. (conan-io/conan#8267)
Fix: CMake's generator name for Visual Studio compiler uses only the major version. (conan-io/conan#8257)
Fix: Remove nosetests support, now using pytest for the test suite. (conan-io/conan#8253)
Fix: Remove CMAKE_PROJECT_INCLUDE in CMakeToolchain, no longer necessary as the MSVC runtime can be defined with a generator expression in the toolchain. (conan-io/conan#8251)
Fix: Temporarily allow cmake_paths generator for CMakeToolchain, to allow start using the toolchain for users that depend on that generator. (conan-io/conan#8230)
Fix: Let CMake generator generate code for checking against "ClangCL" msvc toolset. (conan-io/conan#8218)
Fix: Include build_requires in the global conandeps.props file generated by MSBuildDeps. (conan-io/conan#8186)
Fix: Change MSBuildDeps file conan_deps.props to conandeps.props to avoid collision with a package named "deps". (conan-io/conan#8186)
Fix: Throw error when the recipe description is not a string. (conan-io/conan#8143)
Fix: Inject build modules after CMake targets are created (conan-io/conan#8130). Docs: 📃
Fix: Define package_folder in the test_package folder (defaulting to "package"), so the test recipe can execute cmake.install() in its build() method. (conan-io/conan#8117)
Fix: Remove the downloaded file if it doesn't satisfy provided checksums (modifies tools.download). (conan-io/conan#8116). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Solved assert node.package_id != PACKAGE_ID_UNKNOWN assertion that happened when using build_requires that also exist in requires, and using package_revision_mode and full_transitive_package_id=1 (conan-io/conan#8358)
BugFix: Fix SCM user and password by making them url-encoded (conan-io/conan#8355)
Bugfix: Fix bug in definition of ROOT variables in MakeGenerator. (conan-io/conan#8301)
BugFix: fix -j being passed to NMake in AutotoolsBuildEnvironment. (conan-io/conan#8285)
BugFix: Fix per-package settings exact match for packages without user/channel. (conan-io/conan#8281)
BugFix: Fix detected_architecture() for Apple M1, mapping to armv8 (from returned arm64). (conan-io/conan#8262)
Bugfix: Make prompt names unique when using multiple virtualenv scripts in Powershell. (conan-io/conan#8228)
Bugfix: Fix when conandata.yml is empty and scm_to_conandata is enabled (conan-io/conan#8215)
Bugfix: Removed a reference to deprecated FlagsForFile function in place of current Settings function. (conan-io/conan#8167)
Bugfix: Add test for AutoToolsBuildEnvironment on Apple platforms (conan-io/conan#8118)
Bugfix: Change the rpath_flags flag to always use the comma separator instead of "=", because the current behaviour causes linker error messages when attempting to cross-compile to Mac OS, and the comma separator is accepted everywhere. (conan-io/conan#7716)

1.32.1 (15-Dec-2020)

Bugfix: Avoid conflict of user custom generators names with new generators. (conan-io/conan#8183)
Bugfix: Fix errors when using conan info --paths and short_paths=True in Windows, due to creation of empty folders in the short-paths storage. (conan-io/conan#8181)
Bugfix: conan new <pkg-name>/version -t wrong include when not using -s (using the hardcoded git repo). (conan-io/conan#8175)
Bugfix: Fix excludes pattern case-insensitive in non Windows platforms. (conan-io/conan#8155)
Bugfix: Enabling set_name, set_version for lockfile roo not location. (conan-io/conan#8151)

column21:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.33.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.33.0 (20-Jan-2021)

Feature: Introducing a new [conf] section in profiles that allows a more systematic configuration management for recipes and helpers (build helpers, toolchains). Introducing a new conan_conf.txt cache configuration file that contains configuration definition with the same syntax as in profiles. (conan-io/conan#8266). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add Apple Catalyst support (as new os.subsystem) (conan-io/conan#8264). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add os.sdk sub-settings for Apple (conan-io/conan#8263). Docs: 📃
Feature: Provide support for msvc compiler in MSBuild tools (conan-io/conan#8238). Docs: 📃
Feature: Specify build modules by the generator in cpp_info. Added backwards compatibility for *.cmake build modules added at global scope, but not for other file extensions. (conan-io/conan#8232). Docs: 📃
Feature: The tools.get, tools.unzip and tools.untargz now accept a new argument strip_root=True to unzip moving all the files to the parent folder when all of them belongs to a single folder. (conan-io/conan#8208). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add new msvc compiler setting and preliminary support in conan.tools.cmake generator and toolchain. (conan-io/conan#8201). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMakeDeps now takes values for configurations from settings.yml. (conan-io/conan#8194). Docs: 📃
Feature: Implement ConanXXXRootFolder in MSBuildDeps generator. (conan-io/conan#8177)
Feature: Add Meson build helper. (conan-io/conan#8147). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add QbsToolchain and a Qbs build helper class (currently working for Mcus, not for Android or iOS). (conan-io/conan#8125). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add e2k (elbrus) architectures and mcst-lcc compiler (conan-io/conan#8032). Docs: 📃
Feature: New CMakeDeps generator (at the moment is the cmake_find_package_multi, that allows custom configurations, like ReleaseShared. (conan-io/conan#8024). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow MSBuildToolchain custom configurations in generate() method. (conan-io/conan#7754). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fixed help message in command conan remove --outdated with reference or pattern (conan-io/conan#8350). Docs: 📃
Fix: Do not define CMAKE_GENERATOR_PLATFORM and CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET in the CMakeToolchain file unless the CMake generator is "Visual Studio". Fix conan-io/conan#7485 (conan-io/conan#8333)
Fix: Remove spurious '-find' argument to XCodes xcrun tool. (conan-io/conan#8329)
Fix: Update pylint plugin, some fields are now available in the base ConanFile. (conan-io/conan#8320)
Fix: Remove PyJWT deprecation warning by adding explicitly algorithms argument. (conan-io/conan#8267)
Fix: CMake's generator name for Visual Studio compiler uses only the major version. (conan-io/conan#8257)
Fix: Remove nosetests support, now using pytest for the test suite. (conan-io/conan#8253)
Fix: Remove CMAKE_PROJECT_INCLUDE in CMakeToolchain, no longer necessary as the MSVC runtime can be defined with a generator expression in the toolchain. (conan-io/conan#8251)
Fix: Temporarily allow cmake_paths generator for CMakeToolchain, to allow start using the toolchain for users that depend on that generator. (conan-io/conan#8230)
Fix: Let CMake generator generate code for checking against "ClangCL" msvc toolset. (conan-io/conan#8218)
Fix: Include build_requires in the global conandeps.props file generated by MSBuildDeps. (conan-io/conan#8186)
Fix: Change MSBuildDeps file conan_deps.props to conandeps.props to avoid collision with a package named "deps". (conan-io/conan#8186)
Fix: Throw error when the recipe description is not a string. (conan-io/conan#8143)
Fix: Inject build modules after CMake targets are created (conan-io/conan#8130). Docs: 📃
Fix: Define package_folder in the test_package folder (defaulting to "package"), so the test recipe can execute cmake.install() in its build() method. (conan-io/conan#8117)
Fix: Remove the downloaded file if it doesn't satisfy provided checksums (modifies tools.download). (conan-io/conan#8116). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Solved assert node.package_id != PACKAGE_ID_UNKNOWN assertion that happened when using build_requires that also exist in requires, and using package_revision_mode and full_transitive_package_id=1 (conan-io/conan#8358)
BugFix: Fix SCM user and password by making them url-encoded (conan-io/conan#8355)
Bugfix: Fix bug in definition of ROOT variables in MakeGenerator. (conan-io/conan#8301)
BugFix: fix -j being passed to NMake in AutotoolsBuildEnvironment. (conan-io/conan#8285)
BugFix: Fix per-package settings exact match for packages without user/channel. (conan-io/conan#8281)
BugFix: Fix detected_architecture() for Apple M1, mapping to armv8 (from returned arm64). (conan-io/conan#8262)
Bugfix: Make prompt names unique when using multiple virtualenv scripts in Powershell. (conan-io/conan#8228)
Bugfix: Fix when conandata.yml is empty and scm_to_conandata is enabled (conan-io/conan#8215)
Bugfix: Removed a reference to deprecated FlagsForFile function in place of current Settings function. (conan-io/conan#8167)
Bugfix: Add test for AutoToolsBuildEnvironment on Apple platforms (conan-io/conan#8118)
Bugfix: Change the rpath_flags flag to always use the comma separator instead of "=", because the current behaviour causes linker error messages when attempting to cross-compile to Mac OS, and the comma separator is accepted everywhere. (conan-io/conan#7716)

1.32.1 (15-Dec-2020)

Bugfix: Avoid conflict of user custom generators names with new generators. (conan-io/conan#8183)
Bugfix: Fix errors when using conan info --paths and short_paths=True in Windows, due to creation of empty folders in the short-paths storage. (conan-io/conan#8181)
Bugfix: conan new <pkg-name>/version -t wrong include when not using -s (using the hardcoded git repo). (conan-io/conan#8175)
Bugfix: Fix excludes pattern case-insensitive in non Windows platforms. (conan-io/conan#8155)
Bugfix: Enabling set_name, set_version for lockfile roo not location. (conan-io/conan#8151)



... (truncated)


Commits

5c09f3e Fix SCM by making user and password url-encoded (#8355)
b4653a1 bumped version
99a5e2f Fix package-id-unknown issues with package_revision_mode and full_transitive_...
040a556 Feature/msvc msbuild (#8238)
06442b9 update tests (#8354)
4e9d8b0 [test] Add test creating a target without namespaces (CMake) (#8338)
21da356 Fix help message in command remove --outdated (#8350)
af763e6 modernizing tests (#8345)
ed88fa3 extracting some common code to base class (#8341)
9773ecc modernizing tests (#8340)

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.33.1.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.33.1 (02-Feb-2021)

Fix: Rename conan.cfg to global.conf. (conan-io/conan#8422). Docs: 📃
Fix: Make CMakeDeps generator available in declarative mode generators = "CMakeDeps" (conan-io/conan#8416)
Fix: Make the new Macos subsystem Catalyst lowercase to be consistent with existing subsystems. (conan-io/conan#8389). Docs: 📃
BugFix: Fix Apple Catalyst flags. (conan-io/conan#8389). Docs: 📃

1.33.0 (20-Jan-2021)

Feature: Introducing a new [conf] section in profiles that allows a more systematic configuration management for recipes and helpers (build helpers, toolchains). Introducing a new conan_conf.txt cache configuration file that contains configuration definition with the same syntax as in profiles. (conan-io/conan#8266). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add Apple Catalyst support (as new os.subsystem) (conan-io/conan#8264). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add os.sdk sub-settings for Apple (conan-io/conan#8263). Docs: 📃
Feature: Provide support for msvc compiler in MSBuild tools (conan-io/conan#8238). Docs: 📃
Feature: Specify build modules by the generator in cpp_info. Added backwards compatibility for *.cmake build modules added at global scope, but not for other file extensions. (conan-io/conan#8232). Docs: 📃
Feature: The tools.get, tools.unzip and tools.untargz now accept a new argument strip_root=True to unzip moving all the files to the parent folder when all of them belongs to a single folder. (conan-io/conan#8208). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add new msvc compiler setting and preliminary support in conan.tools.cmake generator and toolchain. (conan-io/conan#8201). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMakeDeps now takes values for configurations from settings.yml. (conan-io/conan#8194). Docs: 📃
Feature: Implement ConanXXXRootFolder in MSBuildDeps generator. (conan-io/conan#8177)
Feature: Add Meson build helper. (conan-io/conan#8147). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add QbsToolchain and a Qbs build helper class (currently working for Mcus, not for Android or iOS). (conan-io/conan#8125). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add e2k (elbrus) architectures and mcst-lcc compiler (conan-io/conan#8032). Docs: 📃
Feature: New CMakeDeps generator (at the moment is the cmake_find_package_multi, that allows custom configurations, like ReleaseShared. (conan-io/conan#8024). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow MSBuildToolchain custom configurations in generate() method. (conan-io/conan#7754). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fixed help message in command conan remove --outdated with reference or pattern (conan-io/conan#8350). Docs: 📃
Fix: Do not define CMAKE_GENERATOR_PLATFORM and CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET in the CMakeToolchain file unless the CMake generator is "Visual Studio". Fix conan-io/conan#7485 (conan-io/conan#8333)
Fix: Remove spurious '-find' argument to XCodes xcrun tool. (conan-io/conan#8329)
Fix: Update pylint plugin, some fields are now available in the base ConanFile. (conan-io/conan#8320)
Fix: Remove PyJWT deprecation warning by adding explicitly algorithms argument. (conan-io/conan#8267)
Fix: CMake's generator name for Visual Studio compiler uses only the major version. (conan-io/conan#8257)
Fix: Remove nosetests support, now using pytest for the test suite. (conan-io/conan#8253)
Fix: Remove CMAKE_PROJECT_INCLUDE in CMakeToolchain, no longer necessary as the MSVC runtime can be defined with a generator expression in the toolchain. (conan-io/conan#8251)
Fix: Temporarily allow cmake_paths generator for CMakeToolchain, to allow start using the toolchain for users that depend on that generator. (conan-io/conan#8230)
Fix: Let CMake generator generate code for checking against "ClangCL" msvc toolset. (conan-io/conan#8218)
Fix: Include build_requires in the global conandeps.props file generated by MSBuildDeps. (conan-io/conan#8186)
Fix: Change MSBuildDeps file conan_deps.props to conandeps.props to avoid collision with a package named "deps". (conan-io/conan#8186)
Fix: Throw error when the recipe description is not a string. (conan-io/conan#8143)
Fix: Inject build modules after CMake targets are created (conan-io/conan#8130). Docs: 📃
Fix: Define package_folder in the test_package folder (defaulting to "package"), so the test recipe can execute cmake.install() in its build() method. (conan-io/conan#8117)
Fix: Remove the downloaded file if it doesn't satisfy provided checksums (modifies tools.download). (conan-io/conan#8116). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Solved assert node.package_id != PACKAGE_ID_UNKNOWN assertion that happened when using build_requires that also exist in requires, and using package_revision_mode and full_transitive_package_id=1 (conan-io/conan#8358)
BugFix: Fix SCM user and password by making them url-encoded (conan-io/conan#8355)
Bugfix: Fix bug in definition of ROOT variables in MakeGenerator. (conan-io/conan#8301)
BugFix: fix -j being passed to NMake in AutotoolsBuildEnvironment. (conan-io/conan#8285)
BugFix: Fix per-package settings exact match for packages without user/channel. (conan-io/conan#8281)
BugFix: Fix detected_architecture() for Apple M1, mapping to armv8 (from returned arm64). (conan-io/conan#8262)
Bugfix: Make prompt names unique when using multiple virtualenv scripts in Powershell. (conan-io/conan#8228)
Bugfix: Fix when conandata.yml is empty and scm_to_conandata is enabled (conan-io/conan#8215)
Bugfix: Removed a reference to deprecated FlagsForFile function in place of current Settings function. (conan-io/conan#8167)
Bugfix: Add test for AutoToolsBuildEnvironment on Apple platforms (conan-io/conan#8118)
Bugfix: Change the rpath_flags flag to always use the comma separator instead of "=", because the current behaviour causes linker error messages when attempting to cross-compile to Mac OS, and the comma separator is accepted everywhere. (conan-io/conan#7716)

1.32.1 (15-Dec-2020)


... (truncated)


Commits

134c016 rename conan.cfg to global.conf (#8422)
d5b5864 make CMakeDeps available declarative (#8416)
4e90c23 BugFix: fix Apple Catalyst flags (#8389)
5c09f3e Fix SCM by making user and password url-encoded (#8355)
b4653a1 bumped version
99a5e2f Fix package-id-unknown issues with package_revision_mode and full_transitive_...
040a556 Feature/msvc msbuild (#8238)
06442b9 update tests (#8354)
4e9d8b0 [test] Add test creating a target without namespaces (CMake) (#8338)
21da356 Fix help message in command remove --outdated (#8350)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

Fix: Remove spurious '-find' argument to XCodes xcrun tool. (conan-io/conan#8329)
Fix: Update pylint plugin, some fields are now available in the base ConanFile. (conan-io/conan#8320)
Fix: Remove PyJWT deprecation warning by adding explicitly algorithms argument. (conan-io/conan#8267)
Fix: CMake's generator name for Visual Studio compiler uses only the major version. (conan-io/conan#8257)
Fix: Remove nosetests support, now using pytest for the test suite. (conan-io/conan#8253)
Fix: Remove CMAKE_PROJECT_INCLUDE in CMakeToolchain, no longer necessary as the MSVC runtime can be defined with a generator expression in the toolchain. (conan-io/conan#8251)
Fix: Temporarily allow cmake_paths generator for CMakeToolchain, to allow start using the toolchain for users that depend on that generator. (conan-io/conan#8230)
Fix: Let CMake generator generate code for checking against "ClangCL" msvc toolset. (conan-io/conan#8218)
Fix: Include build_requires in the global conandeps.props file generated by MSBuildDeps. (conan-io/conan#8186)
Fix: Change MSBuildDeps file conan_deps.props to conandeps.props to avoid collision with a package named "deps". (conan-io/conan#8186)
Fix: Throw error when the recipe description is not a string. (conan-io/conan#8143)
Fix: Inject build modules after CMake targets are created (conan-io/conan#8130). Docs: 📃
Fix: Define package_folder in the test_package folder (defaulting to "package"), so the test recipe can execute cmake.install() in its build() method. (conan-io/conan#8117)
Fix: Remove the downloaded file if it doesn't satisfy provided checksums (modifies tools.download). (conan-io/conan#8116). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Solved assert node.package_id != PACKAGE_ID_UNKNOWN assertion that happened when using build_requires that also exist in requires, and using package_revision_mode and full_transitive_package_id=1 (conan-io/conan#8358)
BugFix: Fix SCM user and password by making them url-encoded (conan-io/conan#8355)
Bugfix: Fix bug in definition of ROOT variables in MakeGenerator. (conan-io/conan#8301)
BugFix: fix -j being passed to NMake in AutotoolsBuildEnvironment. (conan-io/conan#8285)
BugFix: Fix per-package settings exact match for packages without user/channel. (conan-io/conan#8281)
BugFix: Fix detected_architecture() for Apple M1, mapping to armv8 (from returned arm64). (conan-io/conan#8262)
Bugfix: Make prompt names unique when using multiple virtualenv scripts in Powershell. (conan-io/conan#8228)
Bugfix: Fix when conandata.yml is empty and scm_to_conandata is enabled (conan-io/conan#8215)
Bugfix: Removed a reference to deprecated FlagsForFile function in place of current Settings function. (conan-io/conan#8167)
Bugfix: Add test for AutoToolsBuildEnvironment on Apple platforms (conan-io/conan#8118)
Bugfix: Change the rpath_flags flag to always use the comma separator instead of "=", because the current behaviour causes linker error messages when attempting to cross-compile to Mac OS, and the comma separator is accepted everywhere. (conan-io/conan#7716)

1.32.1 (15-Dec-2020)


... (truncated)


Commits

d5b5864 make CMakeDeps available declarative (#8416)
4e90c23 BugFix: fix Apple Catalyst flags (#8389)
5c09f3e Fix SCM by making user and password url-encoded (#8355)
b4653a1 bumped version
99a5e2f Fix package-id-unknown issues with package_revision_mode and full_transitive_...
040a556 Feature/msvc msbuild (#8238)
06442b9 update tests (#8354)
4e9d8b0 [test] Add test creating a target without namespaces (CMake) (#8338)
21da356 Fix help message in command remove --outdated (#8350)

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.34.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.34.0 (26-Feb-2021)

Feature: Add path and repository properties to conan_build_info --v2. (conan-io/conan#8436)
Feature: Setting conan as name for buildAgent in conan_build_info. (conan-io/conan#8433)
Feature: Using actual conan version in version for buildAgent in conan_build_info instead of 1.X. (conan-io/conan#8433)
Feature: Add type conan to Conan build info modules. (conan-io/conan#8433)
Feature: Add scm output in conan info command. (conan-io/conan#8380)
Feature: Forked cmake_find_package_multi into CMakeDeps, to allow evolution without breaking. (conan-io/conan#8371)
Feature: Use built-in retries in requests lib to retry http requests with 5xx response code. (conan-io/conan#8352)
Feature: New lockfile "bundle" feature that can integrate different lockfiles for different configurations and different graphs into a single lockfile bundle that can be used to vastly optimize CI (specially for multiple products), implementing bundle build-order and bundle update operations. (conan-io/conan#8344). Docs: 📃
Fix: Renamed generator QbsToolchain to QbsProfile. (conan-io/conan#8537). Docs: 📃
Fix: Renamed default filename of QbsProfile generated file to conan_toolchain_profile.qbs. (conan-io/conan#8537). Docs: 📃
Fix: Renamed Qbs attribute use_toolchain_profile to profile. (conan-io/conan#8537). Docs: 📃
Fix: Remove extra spaces in flags and colons in path variables. (conan-io/conan#8496)
Fix: conan_v2_error if scm_to_conandata is not enabled. (conan-io/conan#8447)
Fix: CONAN_V2_MODE env-var does not longer alter behavior, only raises errors for Conan 2.0 incompatibilities (conan-io/conan#8399). Docs: 📃
Fix: meson : Add target and jobs arguments. (conan-io/conan#8384). Docs: 📃
Fix: Set qbs.targetPlatform with qbs toolchain. (conan-io/conan#8372)
Fix: Remove warnings for old toolchains imports and generate_toolchain_files() calls (use new imports and generate() calls. (conan-io/conan#8361)
BugFix: Improve tools.unix_path for Cygwin. (conan-io/conan#8509)
BugFix: Allow run_in_windows_bash in MSYS/Cygwin. (conan-io/conan#8506)
BugFix: Add some sanity check to avoid a vague error for custom architectures. (conan-io/conan#8502)
BugFix: Fix Apple M1 detection. (conan-io/conan#8501)
Bugfix: Fix repeated build_requires, including conflicting versions in profile composition or inclusion that repeats [build_requires] values. (conan-io/conan#8463)
Bugfix: Fixing a CMakeDeps bug with components, not finding the conan_macros.cmake file. (conan-io/conan#8445)
Bugfix: Fix exit code for conan_build_info. (conan-io/conan#8408)

1.33.1 (02-Feb-2021)

Fix: Rename conan.cfg to global.conf. (conan-io/conan#8422). Docs: 📃
Fix: Make CMakeDeps generator available in declarative mode generators = "CMakeDeps" (conan-io/conan#8416)
Fix: Make the new Macos subsystem Catalyst lowercase to be consistent with existing subsystems. (conan-io/conan#8389). Docs: 📃
BugFix: Fix Apple Catalyst flags. (conan-io/conan#8389). Docs: 📃

1.33.0 (20-Jan-2021)

Feature: Introducing a new [conf] section in profiles that allows a more systematic configuration management for recipes and helpers (build helpers, toolchains). Introducing a new conan_conf.txt cache configuration file that contains configuration definition with the same syntax as in profiles. (conan-io/conan#8266). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add Apple Catalyst support (as new os.subsystem) (conan-io/conan#8264). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add os.sdk sub-settings for Apple (conan-io/conan#8263). Docs: 📃
Feature: Provide support for msvc compiler in MSBuild tools (conan-io/conan#8238). Docs: 📃
Feature: Specify build modules by the generator in cpp_info. Added backwards compatibility for *.cmake build modules added at global scope, but not for other file extensions. (conan-io/conan#8232). Docs: 📃
Feature: The tools.get, tools.unzip and tools.untargz now accept a new argument strip_root=True to unzip moving all the files to the parent folder when all of them belongs to a single folder. (conan-io/conan#8208). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add new msvc compiler setting and preliminary support in conan.tools.cmake generator and toolchain. (conan-io/conan#8201). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMakeDeps now takes values for configurations from settings.yml. (conan-io/conan#8194). Docs: 📃
Feature: Implement ConanXXXRootFolder in MSBuildDeps generator. (conan-io/conan#8177)
Feature: Add Meson build helper. (conan-io/conan#8147). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add QbsToolchain and a Qbs build helper class (currently working for Mcus, not for Android or iOS). (conan-io/conan#8125). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add e2k (elbrus) architectures and mcst-lcc compiler (conan-io/conan#8032). Docs: 📃
Feature: New CMakeDeps generator (at the moment is the cmake_find_package_multi, that allows custom configurations, like ReleaseShared. (conan-io/conan#8024). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow MSBuildToolchain custom configurations in generate() method. (conan-io/conan#7754). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fixed help message in command conan remove --outdated with reference or pattern (conan-io/conan#8350). Docs: 📃
Fix: Do not define CMAKE_GENERATOR_PLATFORM and CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET in the CMakeToolchain file unless the CMake generator is "Visual Studio". Fix conan-io/conan#7485 (conan-io/conan#8333)
Fix: Remove spurious '-find' argument to XCodes xcrun tool. (conan-io/conan#8329)



... (truncated)


Commits

4bbaf8c Return right toolchain generator for Qbs (#8553)
1769013 release/1.34.0
bf4fe85 Fix extra spaces and colons in flags and environment variables (#8496)
5a3a4e8 unix_path not necessary here (#8540)

column21:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.34.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.34.0 (26-Feb-2021)

Feature: Add path and repository properties to conan_build_info --v2. (conan-io/conan#8436)
Feature: Setting conan as name for buildAgent in conan_build_info. (conan-io/conan#8433)
Feature: Using actual conan version in version for buildAgent in conan_build_info instead of 1.X. (conan-io/conan#8433)
Feature: Add type conan to Conan build info modules. (conan-io/conan#8433)
Feature: Add scm output in conan info command. (conan-io/conan#8380)
Feature: Forked cmake_find_package_multi into CMakeDeps, to allow evolution without breaking. (conan-io/conan#8371)
Feature: Use built-in retries in requests lib to retry http requests with 5xx response code. (conan-io/conan#8352)
Feature: New lockfile "bundle" feature that can integrate different lockfiles for different configurations and different graphs into a single lockfile bundle that can be used to vastly optimize CI (specially for multiple products), implementing bundle build-order and bundle update operations. (conan-io/conan#8344). Docs: 📃
Fix: Renamed generator QbsToolchain to QbsProfile. (conan-io/conan#8537). Docs: 📃
Fix: Renamed default filename of QbsProfile generated file to conan_toolchain_profile.qbs. (conan-io/conan#8537). Docs: 📃
Fix: Renamed Qbs attribute use_toolchain_profile to profile. (conan-io/conan#8537). Docs: 📃
Fix: Remove extra spaces in flags and colons in path variables. (conan-io/conan#8496)
Fix: conan_v2_error if scm_to_conandata is not enabled. (conan-io/conan#8447)
Fix: CONAN_V2_MODE env-var does not longer alter behavior, only raises errors for Conan 2.0 incompatibilities (conan-io/conan#8399). Docs: 📃
Fix: meson : Add target and jobs arguments. (conan-io/conan#8384). Docs: 📃
Fix: Set qbs.targetPlatform with qbs toolchain. (conan-io/conan#8372)
Fix: Remove warnings for old toolchains imports and generate_toolchain_files() calls (use new imports and generate() calls. (conan-io/conan#8361)
BugFix: Improve tools.unix_path for Cygwin. (conan-io/conan#8509)
BugFix: Allow run_in_windows_bash in MSYS/Cygwin. (conan-io/conan#8506)
BugFix: Add some sanity check to avoid a vague error for custom architectures. (conan-io/conan#8502)
BugFix: Fix Apple M1 detection. (conan-io/conan#8501)
Bugfix: Fix repeated build_requires, including conflicting versions in profile composition or inclusion that repeats [build_requires] values. (conan-io/conan#8463)
Bugfix: Fixing a CMakeDeps bug with components, not finding the conan_macros.cmake file. (conan-io/conan#8445)
Bugfix: Fix exit code for conan_build_info. (conan-io/conan#8408)

1.33.1 (02-Feb-2021)

Fix: Rename conan.cfg to global.conf. (conan-io/conan#8422). Docs: 📃
Fix: Make CMakeDeps generator available in declarative mode generators = "CMakeDeps" (conan-io/conan#8416)
Fix: Make the new Macos subsystem Catalyst lowercase to be consistent with existing subsystems. (conan-io/conan#8389). Docs: 📃
BugFix: Fix Apple Catalyst flags. (conan-io/conan#8389). Docs: 📃

1.33.0 (20-Jan-2021)

Feature: Introducing a new [conf] section in profiles that allows a more systematic configuration management for recipes and helpers (build helpers, toolchains). Introducing a new conan_conf.txt cache configuration file that contains configuration definition with the same syntax as in profiles. (conan-io/conan#8266). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add Apple Catalyst support (as new os.subsystem) (conan-io/conan#8264). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add os.sdk sub-settings for Apple (conan-io/conan#8263). Docs: 📃
Feature: Provide support for msvc compiler in MSBuild tools (conan-io/conan#8238). Docs: 📃
Feature: Specify build modules by the generator in cpp_info. Added backwards compatibility for *.cmake build modules added at global scope, but not for other file extensions. (conan-io/conan#8232). Docs: 📃
Feature: The tools.get, tools.unzip and tools.untargz now accept a new argument strip_root=True to unzip moving all the files to the parent folder when all of them belongs to a single folder. (conan-io/conan#8208). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add new msvc compiler setting and preliminary support in conan.tools.cmake generator and toolchain. (conan-io/conan#8201). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMakeDeps now takes values for configurations from settings.yml. (conan-io/conan#8194). Docs: 📃
Feature: Implement ConanXXXRootFolder in MSBuildDeps generator. (conan-io/conan#8177)
Feature: Add Meson build helper. (conan-io/conan#8147). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add QbsToolchain and a Qbs build helper class (currently working for Mcus, not for Android or iOS). (conan-io/conan#8125). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add e2k (elbrus) architectures and mcst-lcc compiler (conan-io/conan#8032). Docs: 📃
Feature: New CMakeDeps generator (at the moment is the cmake_find_package_multi, that allows custom configurations, like ReleaseShared. (conan-io/conan#8024). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow MSBuildToolchain custom configurations in generate() method. (conan-io/conan#7754). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fixed help message in command conan remove --outdated with reference or pattern (conan-io/conan#8350). Docs: 📃
Fix: Do not define CMAKE_GENERATOR_PLATFORM and CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET in the CMakeToolchain file unless the CMake generator is "Visual Studio". Fix conan-io/conan#7485 (conan-io/conan#8333)
Fix: Remove spurious '-find' argument to XCodes xcrun tool. (conan-io/conan#8329)



... (truncated)


Commits

4bbaf8c Return right toolchain generator for Qbs (#8553)
1769013 release/1.34.0
bf4fe85 Fix extra spaces and colons in flags and environment variables (#8496)
5a3a4e8 unix_path not necessary here (#8540)
32495a9 - check cmake (#8492)
54fd723 - allow run_in_windows_bash in MSYS/Cygwin (#8506)
a318be7 BugFix: improve tools.unix_path for Cygwin (#8509)
55ccd5c Rename QbsToolchain to QbsProfile (#8537)
8c9a7a5 Recipe Layouts: Step 1 (local methods + cache) (#8246)
e04135f Fix mingw marks (#8521)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

Release notes
Sourced from pre-commit's releases.

pre-commit v2.11.0
Features

Improve warning for mutable ref.

#1809 PR by @​JamMarHer.


Add support for post-merge hook.

#1800 PR by @​psacawa.

Add r as a supported hook language.

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.34.1.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.34.1 (10-Mar-2021)

Fix: Allow cmake_find_package_multi and CMakeDeps to be aliases for cpp_info.names and cpp_info.filenames to allow easy migration. (conan-io/conan#8568)
Bugfix: Restoring the behavior that exports and exports_sources were case sensitive by default. (conan-io/conan#8621)
BugFix: Solved issues with already existing packages appearing in conan lock bundle build-order. (conan-io/conan#8579)

1.34.0 (26-Feb-2021)

Feature: Add path and repository properties to conan_build_info --v2. (conan-io/conan#8436)
Feature: Setting conan as name for buildAgent in conan_build_info. (conan-io/conan#8433)
Feature: Using actual conan version in version for buildAgent in conan_build_info instead of 1.X. (conan-io/conan#8433)
Feature: Add type conan to Conan build info modules. (conan-io/conan#8433)
Feature: Add scm output in conan info command. (conan-io/conan#8380)
Feature: Forked cmake_find_package_multi into CMakeDeps, to allow evolution without breaking. (conan-io/conan#8371)
Feature: Use built-in retries in requests lib to retry http requests with 5xx response code. (conan-io/conan#8352)
Feature: New lockfile "bundle" feature that can integrate different lockfiles for different configurations and different graphs into a single lockfile bundle that can be used to vastly optimize CI (specially for multiple products), implementing bundle build-order and bundle update operations. (conan-io/conan#8344). Docs: 📃
Fix: Renamed generator QbsToolchain to QbsProfile. (conan-io/conan#8537). Docs: 📃
Fix: Renamed default filename of QbsProfile generated file to conan_toolchain_profile.qbs. (conan-io/conan#8537). Docs: 📃
Fix: Renamed Qbs attribute use_toolchain_profile to profile. (conan-io/conan#8537). Docs: 📃
Fix: Remove extra spaces in flags and colons in path variables. (conan-io/conan#8496)
Fix: conan_v2_error if scm_to_conandata is not enabled. (conan-io/conan#8447)
Fix: CONAN_V2_MODE env-var does not longer alter behavior, only raises errors for Conan 2.0 incompatibilities (conan-io/conan#8399). Docs: 📃
Fix: meson : Add target and jobs arguments. (conan-io/conan#8384). Docs: 📃
Fix: Set qbs.targetPlatform with qbs toolchain. (conan-io/conan#8372)
Fix: Remove warnings for old toolchains imports and generate_toolchain_files() calls (use new imports and generate() calls. (conan-io/conan#8361)
BugFix: Improve tools.unix_path for Cygwin. (conan-io/conan#8509)
BugFix: Allow run_in_windows_bash in MSYS/Cygwin. (conan-io/conan#8506)
BugFix: Add some sanity check to avoid a vague error for custom architectures. (conan-io/conan#8502)
BugFix: Fix Apple M1 detection. (conan-io/conan#8501)
Bugfix: Fix repeated build_requires, including conflicting versions in profile composition or inclusion that repeats [build_requires] values. (conan-io/conan#8463)
Bugfix: Fixing a CMakeDeps bug with components, not finding the conan_macros.cmake file. (conan-io/conan#8445)
Bugfix: Fix exit code for conan_build_info. (conan-io/conan#8408)

1.33.1 (02-Feb-2021)

Fix: Rename conan.cfg to global.conf. (conan-io/conan#8422). Docs: 📃
Fix: Make CMakeDeps generator available in declarative mode generators = "CMakeDeps" (conan-io/conan#8416)
Fix: Make the new Macos subsystem Catalyst lowercase to be consistent with existing subsystems. (conan-io/conan#8389). Docs: 📃
BugFix: Fix Apple Catalyst flags. (conan-io/conan#8389). Docs: 📃

1.33.0 (20-Jan-2021)

Feature: Introducing a new [conf] section in profiles that allows a more systematic configuration management for recipes and helpers (build helpers, toolchains). Introducing a new conan_conf.txt cache configuration file that contains configuration definition with the same syntax as in profiles. (conan-io/conan#8266). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add Apple Catalyst support (as new os.subsystem) (conan-io/conan#8264). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add os.sdk sub-settings for Apple (conan-io/conan#8263). Docs: 📃
Feature: Provide support for msvc compiler in MSBuild tools (conan-io/conan#8238). Docs: 📃
Feature: Specify build modules by the generator in cpp_info. Added backwards compatibility for *.cmake build modules added at global scope, but not for other file extensions. (conan-io/conan#8232). Docs: 📃
Feature: The tools.get, tools.unzip and tools.untargz now accept a new argument strip_root=True to unzip moving all the files to the parent folder when all of them belongs to a single folder. (conan-io/conan#8208). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add new msvc compiler setting and preliminary support in conan.tools.cmake generator and toolchain. (conan-io/conan#8201). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMakeDeps now takes values for configurations from settings.yml. (conan-io/conan#8194). Docs: 📃
Feature: Implement ConanXXXRootFolder in MSBuildDeps generator. (conan-io/conan#8177)
Feature: Add Meson build helper. (conan-io/conan#8147). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add QbsToolchain and a Qbs build helper class (currently working for Mcus, not for Android or iOS). (conan-io/conan#8125). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add e2k (elbrus) architectures and mcst-lcc compiler (conan-io/conan#8032). Docs: 📃



... (truncated)

column21:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.34.1.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.34.1 (10-Mar-2021)

Fix: Allow cmake_find_package_multi and CMakeDeps to be aliases for cpp_info.names and cpp_info.filenames to allow easy migration. (conan-io/conan#8568)
Bugfix: Restoring the behavior that exports and exports_sources were case sensitive by default. (conan-io/conan#8621)
BugFix: Solved issues with already existing packages appearing in conan lock bundle build-order. (conan-io/conan#8579)

1.34.0 (26-Feb-2021)

Feature: Add path and repository properties to conan_build_info --v2. (conan-io/conan#8436)
Feature: Setting conan as name for buildAgent in conan_build_info. (conan-io/conan#8433)
Feature: Using actual conan version in version for buildAgent in conan_build_info instead of 1.X. (conan-io/conan#8433)
Feature: Add type conan to Conan build info modules. (conan-io/conan#8433)
Feature: Add scm output in conan info command. (conan-io/conan#8380)
Feature: Forked cmake_find_package_multi into CMakeDeps, to allow evolution without breaking. (conan-io/conan#8371)
Feature: Use built-in retries in requests lib to retry http requests with 5xx response code. (conan-io/conan#8352)
Feature: New lockfile "bundle" feature that can integrate different lockfiles for different configurations and different graphs into a single lockfile bundle that can be used to vastly optimize CI (specially for multiple products), implementing bundle build-order and bundle update operations. (conan-io/conan#8344). Docs: 📃
Fix: Renamed generator QbsToolchain to QbsProfile. (conan-io/conan#8537). Docs: 📃
Fix: Renamed default filename of QbsProfile generated file to conan_toolchain_profile.qbs. (conan-io/conan#8537). Docs: 📃
Fix: Renamed Qbs attribute use_toolchain_profile to profile. (conan-io/conan#8537). Docs: 📃
Fix: Remove extra spaces in flags and colons in path variables. (conan-io/conan#8496)
Fix: conan_v2_error if scm_to_conandata is not enabled. (conan-io/conan#8447)
Fix: CONAN_V2_MODE env-var does not longer alter behavior, only raises errors for Conan 2.0 incompatibilities (conan-io/conan#8399). Docs: 📃
Fix: meson : Add target and jobs arguments. (conan-io/conan#8384). Docs: 📃
Fix: Set qbs.targetPlatform with qbs toolchain. (conan-io/conan#8372)
Fix: Remove warnings for old toolchains imports and generate_toolchain_files() calls (use new imports and generate() calls. (conan-io/conan#8361)
BugFix: Improve tools.unix_path for Cygwin. (conan-io/conan#8509)
BugFix: Allow run_in_windows_bash in MSYS/Cygwin. (conan-io/conan#8506)
BugFix: Add some sanity check to avoid a vague error for custom architectures. (conan-io/conan#8502)
BugFix: Fix Apple M1 detection. (conan-io/conan#8501)
Bugfix: Fix repeated build_requires, including conflicting versions in profile composition or inclusion that repeats [build_requires] values. (conan-io/conan#8463)
Bugfix: Fixing a CMakeDeps bug with components, not finding the conan_macros.cmake file. (conan-io/conan#8445)
Bugfix: Fix exit code for conan_build_info. (conan-io/conan#8408)

1.33.1 (02-Feb-2021)

Fix: Rename conan.cfg to global.conf. (conan-io/conan#8422). Docs: 📃
Fix: Make CMakeDeps generator available in declarative mode generators = "CMakeDeps" (conan-io/conan#8416)
Fix: Make the new Macos subsystem Catalyst lowercase to be consistent with existing subsystems. (conan-io/conan#8389). Docs: 📃
BugFix: Fix Apple Catalyst flags. (conan-io/conan#8389). Docs: 📃

1.33.0 (20-Jan-2021)

Feature: Introducing a new [conf] section in profiles that allows a more systematic configuration management for recipes and helpers (build helpers, toolchains). Introducing a new conan_conf.txt cache configuration file that contains configuration definition with the same syntax as in profiles. (conan-io/conan#8266). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add Apple Catalyst support (as new os.subsystem) (conan-io/conan#8264). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add os.sdk sub-settings for Apple (conan-io/conan#8263). Docs: 📃
Feature: Provide support for msvc compiler in MSBuild tools (conan-io/conan#8238). Docs: 📃
Feature: Specify build modules by the generator in cpp_info. Added backwards compatibility for *.cmake build modules added at global scope, but not for other file extensions. (conan-io/conan#8232). Docs: 📃
Feature: The tools.get, tools.unzip and tools.untargz now accept a new argument strip_root=True to unzip moving all the files to the parent folder when all of them belongs to a single folder. (conan-io/conan#8208). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add new msvc compiler setting and preliminary support in conan.tools.cmake generator and toolchain. (conan-io/conan#8201). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMakeDeps now takes values for configurations from settings.yml. (conan-io/conan#8194). Docs: 📃
Feature: Implement ConanXXXRootFolder in MSBuildDeps generator. (conan-io/conan#8177)
Feature: Add Meson build helper. (conan-io/conan#8147). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add QbsToolchain and a Qbs build helper class (currently working for Mcus, not for Android or iOS). (conan-io/conan#8125). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add e2k (elbrus) architectures and mcst-lcc compiler (conan-io/conan#8032). Docs: 📃



... (truncated)


Commits

210df98 Fix/export case insensitive (#8585) (#8621)
2e57d24 Backport pytest mark fixes to release 1.34 branch (#8617)
e2e437c release 1.34.1
4660d80 preparing migration of names to CMakeDeps (#8568)
40aa789 fix lock bundle build (#8579)
4bbaf8c Return right toolchain generator for Qbs (#8553)
1769013 release/1.34.0
bf4fe85 Fix extra spaces and colons in flags and environment variables (#8496)
5a3a4e8 unix_path not necessary here (#8540)
32495a9 - check cmake (#8492)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

column20:
Bumps isort from 4.3.21 to 5.8.0.

Release notes
Sourced from isort's releases.

5.8.0 March 20th 2021

Fixed #1631: as import comments can in some cases be duplicated.
Fixed #1667: extra newline added with float-to-top, after skip, in some cases.
Fixed #1594: incorrect placement of noqa comments with multiple from imports.
Fixed #1566: in some cases different length limits for dos based line endings.
Implemented #1648: Export MyPY type hints.
Implemented #1641: Identified import statements now return runnable code.
Implemented #1661: Added "wemake" profile.
Implemented #1669: Parallel (-j) now defaults to number of CPU cores if no value is provided.
Implemented #1668: Added a safeguard against accidental usage against /.
Implemented #1638 / #1644: Provide a flag --overwrite-in-place to ensure same file handle is used after sorting.
Implemented #1684: Added support for extending skips with --extend-skip and --extend-skip-glob.
Implemented #1688: Auto identification and skipping of some invalid import statements.
Implemented #1645: Ability to reverse the import sorting order.
Implemented #1504: Added ability to push star imports to the top to avoid overriding explicitly defined imports.
Documented #1685: Skip doesn't support plain directory names, but skip_glob does.

5.7.0 December 30th 2020

Fixed #1612: In rare circumstances an extra comma is added after import and before comment.
Fixed #1593: isort encounters bug in Python 3.6.0.
Implemented #1596: Provide ways for extension formatting and file paths to be specified when using streaming input from CLI.
Implemented #1583: Ability to output and diff within a single API call to isort.file.
Implemented #1562, #1592 & #1593: Better more useful fatal error messages.
Implemented #1575: Support for automatically fixing mixed indentation of import sections.
Implemented #1582: Added a CLI option for skipping symlinks.
Implemented #1603: Support for disabling float_to_top from the command line.
Implemented #1604: Allow toggling section comments on and off for indented import sections.

5.6.4 October 12, 2020

Fixed #1556: Empty line added between imports that should be skipped.

5.6.3 October 11, 2020

Improved packaging of test files alongside source distribution (see: PyCQA/isort#1555).

5.6.2 October 10, 2020

Fixed #1548: On rare occasions an unecessary empty line can be added when an import is marked as skipped.
Fixed #1542: Bug in VERTICAL_PREFIX_FROM_MODULE_IMPORT wrap mode.
Fixed #1552: Pylama test dependent on source layout.

5.6.1 [Hotfix] October 8, 2020

Fixed #1546: Unstable (non-idempotent) behavior with certain src trees.

5.6.0 October 7, 2020

Implemented #1433: Provide helpful feedback in case a custom config file is specified without a configuration.
Implemented #1494: Default to sorting imports within .pxd files.
Implemented #1502: Improved float-to-top behavior when there is an existing import section present at top-of-file.
Implemented #1511: Support for easily seeing all files isort will be ran against using isort . --show-files.
Implemented #1487: Improved handling of encoding errors.
Improved handling of unsupported configuration option errors (see #1475).
Fixed #1463: Better interactive documentation for future option.



... (truncated)

Zope added to integration test suite
Additional testing of CLI (simulate unseekable streams)

Implemented #1575: Support for automatically fixing mixed indentation of import sections.
Implemented #1582: Added a CLI option for skipping symlinks.
Implemented #1603: Support for disabling float_to_top from the command line.
Implemented #1604: Allow toggling section comments on and off for indented import sections.

5.6.4 October 12, 2020

Fixed #1556: Empty line added between imports that should be skipped.

5.6.3 October 11, 2020

Improved packaging of test files alongside source distribution (see: PyCQA/isort#1555).

5.6.2 October 10, 2020

Fixed #1548: On rare occasions an unecessary empty line can be added when an import is marked as skipped.
Fixed #1542: Bug in VERTICAL_PREFIX_FROM_MODULE_IMPORT wrap mode.
Fixed #1552: Pylama test dependent on source layout.

5.6.1 [Hotfix] October 8, 2020

Fixed #1546: Unstable (non-idempotent) behavior with certain src trees.

5.6.0 October 7, 2020

Implemented #1433: Provide helpful feedback in case a custom config file is specified without a configuration.
Implemented #1494: Default to sorting imports within .pxd files.
Implemented #1502: Improved float-to-top behavior when there is an existing import section present at top-of-file.
Implemented #1511: Support for easily seeing all files isort will be ran against using isort . --show-files.
Implemented #1487: Improved handling of encoding errors.
Improved handling of unsupported configuration option errors (see #1475).
Fixed #1463: Better interactive documentation for future option.

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.35.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.35.0 (30-Mar-2021)

Feature: MSBuildDeps generator uses new visitor model and handles conditional requirements correctly. (conan-io/conan#8733). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMake toolchain supports include_guard() feature (conan-io/conan#8728)
Feature: New conan lock bundle clean-modified command. (conan-io/conan#8726). Docs: 📃
Feature: Use conancvvars.bat file for Meson toolchain (conan-io/conan#8719)
Feature: Allow arbitrary defines in conan new templates. (conan-io/conan#8718). Docs: 📃
Feature: Automatically handle CONAN_RUN_TESTS to avoid extra boilerplate. (conan-io/conan#8687). Docs: 📃
Feature: More fine-grained control (using [conf]) for build parallelization. (conan-io/conan#8665). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add support for testing with different tools versions. (conan-io/conan#8656)
Feature: Add different CMake versions for testing. (conan-io/conan#8656)
Feature: Move the definition of CMakeDeps variables to its own file (conan-io/conan#8655). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added conan.tools.files.patch to apply a single patch (new interface for legacy conans.tools.patch function. (conan-io/conan#8650). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added conan.tools.files.apply_conandata_patches to apply patches defined in conandata.yml. (conan-io/conan#8650). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow integers as preprocessor_definitions in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#8645)
Feature: New Environment model for recipes and profiles (conan-io/conan#8630). Docs: 📃
Feature: Do not remove sh from the path in the new CMake helper. (conan-io/conan#8625). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow definition of custom Visual Studio version for msvc compiler in MSBuild helpers. (conan-io/conan#8603). Docs: 📃
Feature: MSBuildToolchain creates conanvcvars.bat containing vcvars command for command line building. (conan-io/conan#8603). Docs: 📃
Feature: Set CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_PREFER_CONFIG=ON. (conan-io/conan#8599)
Feature: Include the recipe name when constrained settings prevent install. (conan-io/conan#8559). Docs: 📃
Feature: Create new conan.tools.files for 2.0. (conan-io/conan#8550)
Feature: New AutotoolsDeps, AutotoolsToolchain helpers in conan.tools.gnu (conan-io/conan#8457). Docs: 📃
Feature: Experimental conan lock install that can install a lockfile in the cache, all the binaries or only the recipes with --recipes, intended for CI flows. (conan-io/conan#8021). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix incorrect output of default_user and default_channel in export. (conan-io/conan#8732)
Fix: remotes not being loaded for the conan alias command, which was preventing conan alias from working if python_requires is used. (conan-io/conan#8704)
Fix: Improve error message for lock create providing a path instead of full path with filename. (conan-io/conan#8695)
Fix: Rename tools.microsoft:msbuild_verbosity to tools.microsoft.msbuild:verbosity (conan-io/conan#8692). Docs: 📃
Fix: Simplifications to CMakeDeps generator to remove legacy code. (conan-io/conan#8666)
Fix: Add dirty management in download cache, so interrupted downloads doesn't need a manual cleaning of such download cache. (conan-io/conan#8664)
Fix: Build helper qbs install now installs directly into package_folder. (conan-io/conan#8660)
Fix: Allow arbitrary template structure. (conan-io/conan#8641)
Fix: Restoring the behavior that exports and exports_sources were case sensitive by default. (conan-io/conan#8585)
Fix: Remove default dummy value for iOS XCode signature. (conan-io/conan#8576)
Fix: Do not order Settings lists, so error messages are in declared order. (conan-io/conan#8573)
BugFix: Command conan new accepts short reference with address sign. (conan-io/conan#8721)
Bugfix: Fix profile definitions of env-vars per-package using patterns, not only the package name. (conan-io/conan#8688)
Bugfix: Preserve the explicit value None for SCM attributes if the default is a different value. (conan-io/conan#8622)
Bugfix: Properly detect Amazon Linux 2 distro. (conan-io/conan#8612)
Bugfix: Fix config install not working when .git* folder is in the path. (conan-io/conan#8605)
Bugfix: Fix: Transitive python requires not working with the new syntax. (conan-io/conan#8604)

1.34.1 (10-Mar-2021)

Fix: Allow cmake_find_package_multi and CMakeDeps to be aliases for cpp_info.names and cpp_info.filenames to allow easy migration. (conan-io/conan#8568)
Bugfix: Restoring the behavior that exports and exports_sources were case sensitive by default. (conan-io/conan#8621)
BugFix: Solved issues with already existing packages appearing in conan lock bundle build-order. (conan-io/conan#8579)

1.34.0 (26-Feb-2021)

Feature: Add path and repository properties to conan_build_info --v2. (conan-io/conan#8436)
Feature: Setting conan as name for buildAgent in conan_build_info. (conan-io/conan#8433)
Feature: Using actual conan version in version for buildAgent in conan_build_info instead of 1.X. (conan-io/conan#8433)



... (truncated)


Commits

fa11854 bumped version 1.35
56a1aef Feature/tools msbuilddeps visitor improved (#8733)
a78b3ab display user/channel correctly in export output (#8732)
2f7de1b Feature: MSBuildDeps generator: CAExcludePath (#8682)
ba02860 creating conanvcvars file for toolchains (#8719)
4619476 Add CMake include_guard() for cmake toolchain (#8728)
ea15adb New AutotoolsDeps, AutotoolsToolchain helpers in conan.tools.gnu (#8457)
9032904 proposing conan lock bundle clean-modified command (#8726)
55323dc added new lock install <lockfile> command (#8021)
92454a8 - use get_reference_fields for conan new (#8721)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.35.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.35.0 (30-Mar-2021)

Feature: MSBuildDeps generator uses new visitor model and handles conditional requirements correctly. (conan-io/conan#8733). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMake toolchain supports include_guard() feature (conan-io/conan#8728)
Feature: New conan lock bundle clean-modified command. (conan-io/conan#8726). Docs: 📃
Feature: Use conancvvars.bat file for Meson toolchain (conan-io/conan#8719)
Feature: Allow arbitrary defines in conan new templates. (conan-io/conan#8718). Docs: 📃
Feature: Automatically handle CONAN_RUN_TESTS to avoid extra boilerplate. (conan-io/conan#8687). Docs: 📃
Feature: More fine-grained control (using [conf]) for build parallelization. (conan-io/conan#8665). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add support for testing with different tools versions. (conan-io/conan#8656)
Feature: Add different CMake versions for testing. (conan-io/conan#8656)
Feature: Move the definition of CMakeDeps variables to its own file (conan-io/conan#8655). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added conan.tools.files.patch to apply a single patch (new interface for legacy conans.tools.patch function. (conan-io/conan#8650). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added conan.tools.files.apply_conandata_patches to apply patches defined in conandata.yml. (conan-io/conan#8650). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow integers as preprocessor_definitions in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#8645)
Feature: New Environment model for recipes and profiles (conan-io/conan#8630). Docs: 📃
Feature: Do not remove sh from the path in the new CMake helper. (conan-io/conan#8625). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow definition of custom Visual Studio version for msvc compiler in MSBuild helpers. (conan-io/conan#8603). Docs: 📃
Feature: MSBuildToolchain creates conanvcvars.bat containing vcvars command for command line building. (conan-io/conan#8603). Docs: 📃
Feature: Set CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_PREFER_CONFIG=ON. (conan-io/conan#8599)
Feature: Include the recipe name when constrained settings prevent install. (conan-io/conan#8559). Docs: 📃
Feature: Create new conan.tools.files for 2.0. (conan-io/conan#8550)
Feature: New AutotoolsDeps, AutotoolsToolchain helpers in conan.tools.gnu (conan-io/conan#8457). Docs: 📃
Feature: Experimental conan lock install that can install a lockfile in the cache, all the binaries or only the recipes with --recipes, intended for CI flows. (conan-io/conan#8021). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix incorrect output of default_user and default_channel in export. (conan-io/conan#8732)
Fix: remotes not being loaded for the conan alias command, which was preventing conan alias from working if python_requires is used. (conan-io/conan#8704)
Fix: Improve error message for lock create providing a path instead of full path with filename. (conan-io/conan#8695)
Fix: Rename tools.microsoft:msbuild_verbosity to tools.microsoft.msbuild:verbosity (conan-io/conan#8692). Docs: 📃
Fix: Simplifications to CMakeDeps generator to remove legacy code. (conan-io/conan#8666)
Fix: Add dirty management in download cache, so interrupted downloads doesn't need a manual cleaning of such download cache. (conan-io/conan#8664)
Fix: Build helper qbs install now installs directly into package_folder. (conan-io/conan#8660)
Fix: Allow arbitrary template structure. (conan-io/conan#8641)
Fix: Restoring the behavior that exports and exports_sources were case sensitive by default. (conan-io/conan#8585)
Fix: Remove default dummy value for iOS XCode signature. (conan-io/conan#8576)
Fix: Do not order Settings lists, so error messages are in declared order. (conan-io/conan#8573)
BugFix: Command conan new accepts short reference with address sign. (conan-io/conan#8721)
Bugfix: Fix profile definitions of env-vars per-package using patterns, not only the package name. (conan-io/conan#8688)
Bugfix: Preserve the explicit value None for SCM attributes if the default is a different value. (conan-io/conan#8622)
Bugfix: Properly detect Amazon Linux 2 distro. (conan-io/conan#8612)
Bugfix: Fix config install not working when .git* folder is in the path. (conan-io/conan#8605)
Bugfix: Fix: Transitive python requires not working with the new syntax. (conan-io/conan#8604)

1.34.1 (10-Mar-2021)

Fix: Allow cmake_find_package_multi and CMakeDeps to be aliases for cpp_info.names and cpp_info.filenames to allow easy migration. (conan-io/conan#8568)
Bugfix: Restoring the behavior that exports and exports_sources were case sensitive by default. (conan-io/conan#8621)
BugFix: Solved issues with already existing packages appearing in conan lock bundle build-order. (conan-io/conan#8579)

1.34.0 (26-Feb-2021)

Feature: Add path and repository properties to conan_build_info --v2. (conan-io/conan#8436)
Feature: Setting conan as name for buildAgent in conan_build_info. (conan-io/conan#8433)
Feature: Using actual conan version in version for buildAgent in conan_build_info instead of 1.X. (conan-io/conan#8433)



... (truncated)


Commits

56a1aef Feature/tools msbuilddeps visitor improved (#8733)
a78b3ab display user/channel correctly in export output (#8732)
2f7de1b Feature: MSBuildDeps generator: CAExcludePath (#8682)
ba02860 creating conanvcvars file for toolchains (#8719)
4619476 Add CMake include_guard() for cmake toolchain (#8728)
ea15adb New AutotoolsDeps, AutotoolsToolchain helpers in conan.tools.gnu (#8457)
9032904 proposing conan lock bundle clean-modified command (#8726)
55323dc added new lock install <lockfile> command (#8021)
92454a8 - use get_reference_fields for conan new (#8721)

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.35.1.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.35.1 (13-Apr-2021)

Fix: Avoid breaking users calling forbidden private api conanfile.__init__. (conan-io/conan#8746)
Bugfix: Fix opensuse SystemPackageTools incorrectly using apt-get when zypper-aptitude. (conan-io/conan#8747)
Bugfix: Fix linker flags in cmake (find_package based) generators. (conan-io/conan#8740)
Bugfix: Fixed bug in transitive build_requires of MSBuildDeps. (conan-io/conan#8734)

1.35.0 (30-Mar-2021)

Feature: MSBuildDeps generator uses new visitor model and handles conditional requirements correctly. (conan-io/conan#8733). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMake toolchain supports include_guard() feature (conan-io/conan#8728)
Feature: New conan lock bundle clean-modified command. (conan-io/conan#8726). Docs: 📃
Feature: Use conancvvars.bat file for Meson toolchain (conan-io/conan#8719)
Feature: Allow arbitrary defines in conan new templates. (conan-io/conan#8718). Docs: 📃
Feature: Automatically handle CONAN_RUN_TESTS to avoid extra boilerplate. (conan-io/conan#8687). Docs: 📃
Feature: More fine-grained control (using [conf]) for build parallelization. (conan-io/conan#8665). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add support for testing with different tools versions. (conan-io/conan#8656)
Feature: Add different CMake versions for testing. (conan-io/conan#8656)
Feature: Move the definition of CMakeDeps variables to its own file (conan-io/conan#8655). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added conan.tools.files.patch to apply a single patch (new interface for legacy conans.tools.patch function. (conan-io/conan#8650). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added conan.tools.files.apply_conandata_patches to apply patches defined in conandata.yml. (conan-io/conan#8650). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow integers as preprocessor_definitions in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#8645)
Feature: New Environment model for recipes and profiles (conan-io/conan#8630). Docs: 📃
Feature: Do not remove sh from the path in the new CMake helper. (conan-io/conan#8625). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow definition of custom Visual Studio version for msvc compiler in MSBuild helpers. (conan-io/conan#8603). Docs: 📃
Feature: MSBuildToolchain creates conanvcvars.bat containing vcvars command for command line building. (conan-io/conan#8603). Docs: 📃
Feature: Set CMAKE_FIND_PACKAGE_PREFER_CONFIG=ON. (conan-io/conan#8599)
Feature: Include the recipe name when constrained settings prevent install. (conan-io/conan#8559). Docs: 📃
Feature: Create new conan.tools.files for 2.0. (conan-io/conan#8550)
Feature: New AutotoolsDeps, AutotoolsToolchain helpers in conan.tools.gnu (conan-io/conan#8457). Docs: 📃
Feature: Experimental conan lock install that can install a lockfile in the cache, all the binaries or only the recipes with --recipes, intended for CI flows. (conan-io/conan#8021). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix incorrect output of default_user and default_channel in export. (conan-io/conan#8732)
Fix: remotes not being loaded for the conan alias command, which was preventing conan alias from working if python_requires is used. (conan-io/conan#8704)
Fix: Improve error message for lock create providing a path instead of full path with filename. (conan-io/conan#8695)
Fix: Rename tools.microsoft:msbuild_verbosity to tools.microsoft.msbuild:verbosity (conan-io/conan#8692). Docs: 📃
Fix: Simplifications to CMakeDeps generator to remove legacy code. (conan-io/conan#8666)
Fix: Add dirty management in download cache, so interrupted downloads doesn't need a manual cleaning of such download cache. (conan-io/conan#8664)
Fix: Build helper qbs install now installs directly into package_folder. (conan-io/conan#8660)
Fix: Allow arbitrary template structure. (conan-io/conan#8641)
Fix: Restoring the behavior that exports and exports_sources were case sensitive by default. (conan-io/conan#8585)
Fix: Remove default dummy value for iOS XCode signature. (conan-io/conan#8576)
Fix: Do not order Settings lists, so error messages are in declared order. (conan-io/conan#8573)
BugFix: Command conan new accepts short reference with address sign. (conan-io/conan#8721)
Bugfix: Fix profile definitions of env-vars per-package using patterns, not only the package name. (conan-io/conan#8688)
Bugfix: Preserve the explicit value None for SCM attributes if the default is a different value. (conan-io/conan#8622)
Bugfix: Properly detect Amazon Linux 2 distro. (conan-io/conan#8612)
Bugfix: Fix config install not working when .git* folder is in the path. (conan-io/conan#8605)
Bugfix: Fix: Transitive python requires not working with the new syntax. (conan-io/conan#8604)

1.34.1 (10-Mar-2021)

Fix: Allow cmake_find_package_multi and CMakeDeps to be aliases for cpp_info.names and cpp_info.filenames to allow easy migration. (conan-io/conan#8568)
Bugfix: Restoring the behavior that exports and exports_sources were case sensitive by default. (conan-io/conan#8621)
