Fix: Do not fail in CMakeDeps when there are build_requires with same name as host requires, unless build_context_activated is enabled for those and a different suffix has not been defined. (conan-io/conan#9046)
Fix: When using the new self.folders.source (at layout(self) method) the sources (from export, export_sources and scm) are copied to the base source folder and not to the self.folders.source that is intended to describe where the sources are after fetching them. (conan-io/conan#9043). Docs: 📃
BugFix: Do not quote all values and allow integer and macro referencing in MSBuildToolchain.preprocessor_definitions (conan-io/conan#9056)
Bugfix: The new generators like CMakeDeps and CMakeToolchainwrite the generated files defaulting to the install folder if no self.folders.generators is specified in the layout() method. (conan-io/conan#9050)
Bugfix: The CMakeToolchain generator now manages correctly a recipe without arch declared in an Apple system. (conan-io/conan#9045)

1.37.0 (31-May-2021)

Feature: Remove CMAKE_SKIP_RPATHS by default to True in CMakeToolchain, it is not necessary by default, users can opt-in, and new test validates shared libs will work with VirtualEnv generator conanrunenv. (conan-io/conan#9024). Docs: 📃
Feature: simplified CMakeToolchain with only 1 category of blocks, made try-compile template code as another block, and reordered blocks so relevant flags for try-compile are taken into account. (conan-io/conan#9009). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add new default conancenter remote for https://center.conan.io as first in the list. (conan-io/conan#8999). Docs: 📃
Feature: Implements a new experimental conan.tools.google Bazel integration with BazelDeps, BazelToolchain and Bazel. (conan-io/conan#8991). Docs: 📃
Feature: Introduced new options for the CMakeDeps generator allowing to manage build_requires even declaring the same package as a require and build_require avoiding the collision of the config cmake files and enabling to specify which build_modules should be included (e.g protobuf issue) (conan-io/conan#8985). Docs: 📃
Feature: Expand user-agent string to include OS info. (conan-io/conan#8947)
Feature: Implement build_policy=never for conan export-pkg packages that cannot be rebuilt with --build=xxx. (conan-io/conan#8946). Docs: 📃
Feature: Define [conf] for defining the user toolchain for CMakeToolchain, both for injecting a user toolchain in the CMakeToolchain generated conan_toolchain.cmake and for completely replacing conan_toolchain.cmake. (conan-io/conan#8945). Docs: 📃
Feature: add GCC 11 to settings.yml. (conan-io/conan#8924)
Feature: Add new tools.rename() interface. (conan-io/conan#8915). Docs: 📃
Feature: Update urlib3 Conan dependency setting version >=1.25.8 to avoid CVE-2020-7212. (conan-io/conan#8914)
Feature: Build-requires can define [conf] for its consumers. (conan-io/conan#8895). Docs: 📃
Feature: support M1 Catalyst. (conan-io/conan#8818)
Feature: New conan install <ref> --build-require and conan create <path> --build-require  (when not using test_package) arguments to explicitly define that the installed or created package has to be a build-require, receiving the build profile instead of the host one. (conan-io/conan#8627). Docs: 📃
Feature: Introduced the layout() method to the recipe to be able to declare the folder structure both for the local development methods (conan source, conan build...) and in the cache. Also, associated to the folders, cppinfo objects to be used in editable packages and file pattern descriptions to enable "auto packaging". (conan-io/conan#8554). Docs: 📃
Fix: CMakeDeps generator: The transitive requirements for a build_require are not included in the xxx-config.cmake files generated. (conan-io/conan#9015)
Fix: The CMakeToolchain now supports Apple M1 cross-building with a profile without environment declared pointing to the system toolchain. (conan-io/conan#9011)
Fix: Set env_info.DYLD_FRAMEWORK_PATH correctly. (conan-io/conan#8984)
Fix: Fix some typos in the code. (conan-io/conan#8977)
Fix: Improve error message when a directory doesn't contain a valid repository. (conan-io/conan#8956)
Fix: The build_modules defined per generator in cpp_info now are rendered properly using the markdown generator. (conan-io/conan#8942)
Fix: Simplify code access to [conf] variables removing attribute based access. (conan-io/conan#8901)
Bugfix: Prevent unintended evil insertions into metadata.json resulted in corrupted package and inability to install. (conan-io/conan#9022)
Bugfix: Allow MSBuildDeps to correctly process packages with dots in the package name. (conan-io/conan#9012)
Bugfix: Avoid errors because of package_id mismatch in lockfiles when using compatible_packages feature. (conan-io/conan#9008)
BugFix: Respect order of declared directories when using components. (conan-io/conan#8927)
Bugfix: Raise an exception when response header Content-type is different than application/json or application/json; charset=utf-8. (conan-io/conan#8912)
Bugfix: Fix exception in CMakeToolchain when settings remove known compilers. (conan-io/conan#8900)
Bugfix: Fix current directory definition in vcvars commands in new toolchains. (conan-io/conan#8899)
Bugfix: AptTool: add repo key before running apt-add-repository. (conan-io/conan#8861)
BugFix: Prevent evil insertions into metadata.json resulted in corrupted package and inability to install. (conan-io/conan#8532)

1.36.0 (28-Apr-2021)

Feature: Add support to tools.cmake.CMake for Ninja toolchain defined with CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#8887)
Feature: The CMakeDeps generator will print CMake traces with the declared targets. e.g: Target declared: 'OpenSSL::Crypto'. (conan-io/conan#8843)
Feature: Add clang 12 support. (conan-io/conan#8828)
Feature: List tools and core from profile and global.conf. (conan-io/conan#8821). Docs: 📃



... (truncated)


Commits

e160680 version 1.37.2
5cbb6fe fix lockfile with test command (#9089)
89b7d5d Fix 9071 (#9073)
fcf5735 fixing preprocessor_definitions in MSBuildToolchain (#9056)
72897e7 update v2_cmake template to use layout() (#9053)
cca8d1d if the build_require not activated shouldn't fail (#9046)
7dcda7a Default to install folder when no generators declared in the layout (#9050)
f25ff3c Skip when no arch is present (#9045)
c7f243a Fix self.folders.source (#9043)
df4c368 bump version 1.37
Additional commits viewable in compare view

column20:
Bumps isort from 4.3.21 to 5.9.1.

Release notes
Sourced from isort's releases.

5.9.1 June 21st 2021 [hotfix]

Fixed #1758: projects with many files and skip_ignore set can lead to a command-line overload.

5.9.0 June 21st 2021

Improved CLI startup time.
Implemented #1697: Provisional support for PEP 582: skip __pypackages__ directories by default.
Implemented #1705: More intuitive handling of isort:skip_file comments on streams.
Implemented #1737: Support for using action comments to avoid adding imports to individual files.
Implemented #1750: Ability to customize output format lines.
Implemented #1732: Support for custom sort functions.
Implemented #1722: Improved behavior for running isort in atomic mode over Cython source files.
Fixed (PyCQA/isort#1695): added imports being added to doc string in some cases.
Fixed (PyCQA/isort#1714): in rare cases line continuation combined with tabs can output invalid code.
Fixed (PyCQA/isort#1726): isort ignores reverse_sort when force_sort_within_sections is true.
Fixed #1741: comments in hanging indent modes can lead to invalid code.
Fixed #1744: repeat noqa comments dropped when * import and non * imports exist from the same package.
Fixed #1721: repeat noqa comments on separate from lines with force-single-line set, sometimes get dropped.

5.8.0 March 20th 2021

Fixed #1631: as import comments can in some cases be duplicated.
Fixed #1667: extra newline added with float-to-top, after skip, in some cases.
Fixed #1594: incorrect placement of noqa comments with multiple from imports.
Fixed #1566: in some cases different length limits for dos based line endings.
Implemented #1648: Export MyPY type hints.
Implemented #1641: Identified import statements now return runnable code.
Implemented #1661: Added "wemake" profile.
Implemented #1669: Parallel (-j) now defaults to number of CPU cores if no value is provided.
Implemented #1668: Added a safeguard against accidental usage against /.
Implemented #1638 / #1644: Provide a flag --overwrite-in-place to ensure same file handle is used after sorting.
Implemented #1684: Added support for extending skips with --extend-skip and --extend-skip-glob.
Implemented #1688: Auto identification and skipping of some invalid import statements.
Implemented #1645: Ability to reverse the import sorting order.
Implemented #1504: Added ability to push star imports to the top to avoid overriding explicitly defined imports.
Documented #1685: Skip doesn't support plain directory names, but skip_glob does.

5.7.0 December 30th 2020

Fixed #1612: In rare circumstances an extra comma is added after import and before comment.
Fixed #1593: isort encounters bug in Python 3.6.0.
Implemented #1596: Provide ways for extension formatting and file paths to be specified when using streaming input from CLI.
Implemented #1583: Ability to output and diff within a single API call to isort.file.
Implemented #1562, #1592 & #1593: Better more useful fatal error messages.
Implemented #1575: Support for automatically fixing mixed indentation of import sections.
Implemented #1582: Added a CLI option for skipping symlinks.
Implemented #1603: Support for disabling float_to_top from the command line.
Implemented #1604: Allow toggling section comments on and off for indented import sections.

5.6.4 October 12, 2020

Fixed #1556: Empty line added between imports that should be skipped.

5.6.3 October 11, 2020


... (truncated)


Changelog
Sourced from isort's changelog.

5.9.1 June 21st 2021 [hotfix]

Fixed #1758: projects with many files and skip_ignore set can lead to a command-line overload.

5.9.0 June 21st 2021

Improved CLI startup time.
Implemented #1697: Provisional support for PEP 582: skip __pypackages__ directories by default.
Implemented #1705: More intuitive handling of isort:skip_file comments on streams.
Implemented #1737: Support for using action comments to avoid adding imports to individual files.
Implemented #1750: Ability to customize output format lines.
Implemented #1732: Support for custom sort functions.
Implemented #1722: Improved behavior for running isort in atomic mode over Cython source files.
Fixed (PyCQA/isort#1695): added imports being added to doc string in some cases.
Fixed (PyCQA/isort#1714): in rare cases line continuation combined with tabs can output invalid code.
Fixed (PyCQA/isort#1726): isort ignores reverse_sort when force_sort_within_sections is true.
Fixed #1741: comments in hanging indent modes can lead to invalid code.
Fixed #1744: repeat noqa comments dropped when * import and non * imports exist from the same package.
Fixed #1721: repeat noqa comments on separate from lines with force-single-line set, sometimes get dropped.

Goal Zero (Tickets related to aspirational goal of achieving 0 regressions for remaining 5.0.0 lifespan):

Implemented #1394: 100% branch coverage (in addition to line coverage) enforced.
Implemented #1751: Strict typing enforcement (turned on mypy strict mode).

5.8.0 March 20th 2021

Fixed #1631: as import comments can in some cases be duplicated.
Fixed #1667: extra newline added with float-to-top, after skip, in some cases.
Fixed #1594: incorrect placement of noqa comments with multiple from imports.
Fixed #1566: in some cases different length limits for dos based line endings.
Implemented #1648: Export MyPY type hints.
Implemented #1641: Identified import statements now return runnable code.
Implemented #1661: Added "wemake" profile.
Implemented #1669: Parallel (-j) now defaults to number of CPU cores if no value is provided.
Implemented #1668: Added a safeguard against accidental usage against /.
Implemented #1638 / #1644: Provide a flag --overwrite-in-place to ensure same file handle is used after sorting.
Implemented #1684: Added support for extending skips with --extend-skip and --extend-skip-glob.
Implemented #1688: Auto identification and skipping of some invalid import statements.
Implemented #1645: Ability to reverse the import sorting order.
Implemented #1504: Added ability to push star imports to the top to avoid overriding explicitly defined imports.
Documented #1685: Skip doesn't support plain directory names, but skip_glob does.

5.7.0 December 30th 2020

Fixed #1612: In rare circumstances an extra comma is added after import and before comment.
Fixed #1593: isort encounters bug in Python 3.6.0.
Implemented #1596: Provide ways for extension formatting and file paths to be specified when using streaming input from CLI.
Implemented #1583: Ability to output and diff within a single API call to isort.file.
Implemented #1562, #1592 & #1593: Better more useful fatal error messages.
Implemented #1575: Support for automatically fixing mixed indentation of import sections.
Implemented #1582: Added a CLI option for skipping symlinks.
Implemented #1603: Support for disabling float_to_top from the command line.
Implemented #1604: Allow toggling section comments on and off for indented import sections.



... (truncated)


Commits

1d7e37c Bump version to 5.9.1 (hotfix)
8e1b2a4 Merge pull request #1759 from mjpieters/issues/1758
84664a6 Use escape_decode to address windows based usage
761aff4 Use a pipe to pass filenames to git check-ignore
0ccefec Fix remaining broken links
6f42a66 Fix links
ee53d09 Re-run integration tests
3d7d131 Regenerate options
9f39d7e Add recent contributors
bacec68 Bump version to 5.9.0

5.9.0 June 21st 2021

Improved CLI startup time.
Implemented #1697: Provisional support for PEP 582: skip __pypackages__ directories by default.
Implemented #1705: More intuitive handling of isort:skip_file comments on streams.
Implemented #1737: Support for using action comments to avoid adding imports to individual files.
Implemented #1750: Ability to customize output format lines.
Implemented #1732: Support for custom sort functions.
Implemented #1722: Improved behavior for running isort in atomic mode over Cython source files.
Fixed (PyCQA/isort#1695): added imports being added to doc string in some cases.
Fixed (PyCQA/isort#1714): in rare cases line continuation combined with tabs can output invalid code.
Fixed (PyCQA/isort#1726): isort ignores reverse_sort when force_sort_within_sections is true.
Fixed #1741: comments in hanging indent modes can lead to invalid code.
Fixed #1744: repeat noqa comments dropped when * import and non * imports exist from the same package.
Fixed #1721: repeat noqa comments on separate from lines with force-single-line set, sometimes get dropped.

Goal Zero (Tickets related to aspirational goal of achieving 0 regressions for remaining 5.0.0 lifespan):

Implemented #1394: 100% branch coverage (in addition to line coverage) enforced.
Implemented #1751: Strict typing enforcement (turned on mypy strict mode).

5.8.0 March 20th 2021

Fixed #1631: as import comments can in some cases be duplicated.
Fixed #1667: extra newline added with float-to-top, after skip, in some cases.
Fixed #1594: incorrect placement of noqa comments with multiple from imports.
Fixed #1566: in some cases different length limits for dos based line endings.
Implemented #1648: Export MyPY type hints.
Implemented #1641: Identified import statements now return runnable code.
Implemented #1661: Added "wemake" profile.
Implemented #1669: Parallel (-j) now defaults to number of CPU cores if no value is provided.
Implemented #1668: Added a safeguard against accidental usage against /.
Implemented #1638 / #1644: Provide a flag --overwrite-in-place to ensure same file handle is used after sorting.
Implemented #1684: Added support for extending skips with --extend-skip and --extend-skip-glob.
Implemented #1688: Auto identification and skipping of some invalid import statements.
Implemented #1645: Ability to reverse the import sorting order.
Implemented #1504: Added ability to push star imports to the top to avoid overriding explicitly defined imports.
Documented #1685: Skip doesn't support plain directory names, but skip_glob does.

5.7.0 December 30th 2020

Fixed #1612: In rare circumstances an extra comma is added after import and before comment.
Fixed #1593: isort encounters bug in Python 3.6.0.
Implemented #1596: Provide ways for extension formatting and file paths to be specified when using streaming input from CLI.
Implemented #1583: Ability to output and diff within a single API call to isort.file.
Implemented #1562, #1592 & #1593: Better more useful fatal error messages.
Implemented #1575: Support for automatically fixing mixed indentation of import sections.
Implemented #1582: Added a CLI option for skipping symlinks.
Implemented #1603: Support for disabling float_to_top from the command line.
Implemented #1604: Allow toggling section comments on and off for indented import sections.



... (truncated)

8e1b2a4 Merge pull request #1759 from mjpieters/issues/1758
84664a6 Use escape_decode to address windows based usage
761aff4 Use a pipe to pass filenames to git check-ignore
0ccefec Fix remaining broken links

ee53d09 Re-run integration tests
3d7d131 Regenerate options
9f39d7e Add recent contributors
bacec68 Bump version to 5.9.0

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.38.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.38.0 (30-Jun-2021)

Feature: New PkgConfigDeps generator. (conan-io/conan#9152). Docs: 📃
Feature: Proposal of jinja2 templates for profiles. (conan-io/conan#9147). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add support for CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#9144)
Feature: Add context information to conan info output both to stdout and json outputs. (conan-io/conan#9137). Docs: 📃
Feature: Improved the new AutotoolsToolchain, AutotoolsDeps and Autotools build helper. (conan-io/conan#9131). Docs: 📃
Feature: Initial cross-build support in CMakeToolchain with definition of CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME, CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR and CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION, deduced from self.settings_build (only using the 2 profiles) and from new [conf] items. (conan-io/conan#9115). Docs: 📃
Feature: Easier access to modify or update context values in CMakeToolchain blocks. (conan-io/conan#9109). Docs: 📃
Feature: Provide [conf] command line support. (conan-io/conan#9103). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added support for using server config from a custom location, setting CONAN_SERVER_HOME env variable or using -d or --server_dir flag when launching the server with conan_server command. (conan-io/conan#9099). Docs: 📃
Feature: Support for CMakeDeps generator of a new property "skip_deps_file" to be declared in the cpp_info of a package to skip creating xxx-config.cmake files for it, allowing to create "system wrapper" recipes easily. (conan-io/conan#9087). Docs: 📃
Feature: New conanfile.dependencies model, using a dict {requirement: ConanFileInterface} to prepare for Conan 2.0. (conan-io/conan#9062). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow a explicit requires = "pkg..#recipe_revision" to update cache revision without --update. (conan-io/conan#9058). Docs: 📃
Feature: New cmake_layout() layout helper to define a multi-platform CMake layout that will work for different generators (ninja, xcode, visual, unix), and is multi-config. (conan-io/conan#9057). Docs: 📃
Feature: The conan_toolchain.cmake now includes xxx_DIR variables for the dependencies to ease the find_package mechanism to locate them. The declaration of these directories is a must when cross-building in OSX where CMake ignores CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH and CMAKE_MODULE_PATH to look only at the system framework directories. (conan-io/conan#9032). Docs: 📃
Feature: Provide access in the recipes to the environment declared with the new environment system. (conan-io/conan#9030). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix Bazel build string defines. (conan-io/conan#9139)
Fix: Fixed behavior in the self.folders feature whereby the sources saved or downloaded inside the source(self) were saved at the self.folders.source folder. But self.folders.source is intended to describe where the sources are instead of forcing where the sources are saved. (conan-io/conan#9124). Docs: 📃
Fix: Properly generate qbs profile for msvc. (conan-io/conan#9122)
Fix: Configuration general.user_home_short works with "None" value. (conan-io/conan#9118)
Fix: Avoid CMakeToolchain to generate OSX and Apple config for non Apple builds. (conan-io/conan#9107)
Fix: The new MesonToolchain now takes the declared environment variables (CC, CXX...) from build-requires and profiles to set the variables c, cpp, c_ld, cpp_ld etc, into the conan_meson_native.ini (conan-io/conan#8353). Docs: 📃
Fix: Added new preprocessor_definitions to new Meson build helper. (conan-io/conan#8353). Docs: 📃
Fix: The new MesonToolchain now allows adjusting any variable before generating the conan_meson_native.ini file. (conan-io/conan#8353). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Disabled remotes shouldn't fail if not used at all (conan-io/conan#9184)
BugFix: ConanFileDependencies.build["dep"] was retrieving the host dependency if existing, or failing otherwise, because the default requires was hardcoded to fetch the host (build=False) dependency. (conan-io/conan#9148). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Now, conan profile {show, update, get, remove} is working fine with new experimental [conf] section. (conan-io/conan#9114)

1.37.2 (14-Jun-2021)

Bugfix: Avoid crash when using --lockfile with the conan test command. (conan-io/conan#9089)
Bugfix: The CMakeDeps generator variables were named wrongly when a component had the same name as the package. (conan-io/conan#9073)

1.37.1 (08-Jun-2021)

Fix: Update the experimental conan new ... -m=v2_cmake template to start using the new layout() basic info. (conan-io/conan#9053)
Fix: Do not fail in CMakeDeps when there are build_requires with same name as host requires, unless build_context_activated is enabled for those and a different suffix has not been defined. (conan-io/conan#9046)
Fix: When using the new self.folders.source (at layout(self) method) the sources (from export, export_sources and scm) are copied to the base source folder and not to the self.folders.source that is intended to describe where the sources are after fetching them. (conan-io/conan#9043). Docs: 📃
BugFix: Do not quote all values and allow integer and macro referencing in MSBuildToolchain.preprocessor_definitions (conan-io/conan#9056)
Bugfix: The new generators like CMakeDeps and CMakeToolchainwrite the generated files defaulting to the install folder if no self.folders.generators is specified in the layout() method. (conan-io/conan#9050)
Bugfix: The CMakeToolchain generator now manages correctly a recipe without arch declared in an Apple system. (conan-io/conan#9045)

1.37.0 (31-May-2021)

Feature: Remove CMAKE_SKIP_RPATHS by default to True in CMakeToolchain, it is not necessary by default, users can opt-in, and new test validates shared libs will work with VirtualEnv generator conanrunenv. (conan-io/conan#9024). Docs: 📃
Feature: simplified CMakeToolchain with only 1 category of blocks, made try-compile template code as another block, and reordered blocks so relevant flags for try-compile are taken into account. (conan-io/conan#9009). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add new default conancenter remote for https://center.conan.io as first in the list. (conan-io/conan#8999). Docs: 📃
Feature: Implements a new experimental conan.tools.google Bazel integration with BazelDeps, BazelToolchain and Bazel. (conan-io/conan#8991). Docs: 📃
Feature: Introduced new options for the CMakeDeps generator allowing to manage build_requires even declaring the same package as a require and build_require avoiding the collision of the config cmake files and enabling to specify which build_modules should be included (e.g protobuf issue) (conan-io/conan#8985). Docs: 📃
Feature: Expand user-agent string to include OS info. (conan-io/conan#8947)
Feature: Implement build_policy=never for conan export-pkg packages that cannot be rebuilt with --build=xxx. (conan-io/conan#8946). Docs: 📃
Feature: Define [conf] for defining the user toolchain for CMakeToolchain, both for injecting a user toolchain in the CMakeToolchain generated conan_toolchain.cmake and for completely replacing conan_toolchain.cmake. (conan-io/conan#8945). Docs: 📃
Feature: add GCC 11 to settings.yml. (conan-io/conan#8924)



... (truncated)


Commits

1c742e8 fixing cmaketoolchain cross for Android (#9186)
4d8655b Fix/disabled remotes (#9184)
5f6f793 bumped version to 1.38
9ebc2e4 fix ConanFileDependencies.build[dep] access (#9148)
e4a416f New PkgConfigDeps generator #9110 (#9152)
5477496 making Paths explicit in new Environment (#9168)
cf5a68d Add msvc runtime value to profile (#9122)
413ac92 Fix general.user_home_short None value (#9118)
509296c wip (#9147)
1c5a764 adding context information to conan-info command (#9137)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

Bugfix: The CMakeToolchain generator now manages correctly a recipe without arch declared in an Apple system. (conan-io/conan#9045)

1.37.0 (31-May-2021)

Feature: Remove CMAKE_SKIP_RPATHS by default to True in CMakeToolchain, it is not necessary by default, users can opt-in, and new test validates shared libs will work with VirtualEnv generator conanrunenv. (conan-io/conan#9024). Docs: 📃
Feature: simplified CMakeToolchain with only 1 category of blocks, made try-compile template code as another block, and reordered blocks so relevant flags for try-compile are taken into account. (conan-io/conan#9009). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add new default conancenter remote for https://center.conan.io as first in the list. (conan-io/conan#8999). Docs: 📃
Feature: Implements a new experimental conan.tools.google Bazel integration with BazelDeps, BazelToolchain and Bazel. (conan-io/conan#8991). Docs: 📃
Feature: Introduced new options for the CMakeDeps generator allowing to manage build_requires even declaring the same package as a require and build_require avoiding the collision of the config cmake files and enabling to specify which build_modules should be included (e.g protobuf issue) (conan-io/conan#8985). Docs: 📃
Feature: Expand user-agent string to include OS info. (conan-io/conan#8947)
Feature: Implement build_policy=never for conan export-pkg packages that cannot be rebuilt with --build=xxx. (conan-io/conan#8946). Docs: 📃
Feature: Define [conf] for defining the user toolchain for CMakeToolchain, both for injecting a user toolchain in the CMakeToolchain generated conan_toolchain.cmake and for completely replacing conan_toolchain.cmake. (conan-io/conan#8945). Docs: 📃
Feature: add GCC 11 to settings.yml. (conan-io/conan#8924)



... (truncated)


Commits

4d8655b Fix/disabled remotes (#9184)
5f6f793 bumped version to 1.38
9ebc2e4 fix ConanFileDependencies.build[dep] access (#9148)
e4a416f New PkgConfigDeps generator #9110 (#9152)
5477496 making Paths explicit in new Environment (#9168)
cf5a68d Add msvc runtime value to profile (#9122)
413ac92 Fix general.user_home_short None value (#9118)

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.38.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.38.0 (30-Jun-2021)

Feature: New PkgConfigDeps generator. (conan-io/conan#9152). Docs: 📃
Feature: Proposal of jinja2 templates for profiles. (conan-io/conan#9147). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add support for CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#9144)
Feature: Add context information to conan info output both to stdout and json outputs. (conan-io/conan#9137). Docs: 📃
Feature: Improved the new AutotoolsToolchain, AutotoolsDeps and Autotools build helper. (conan-io/conan#9131). Docs: 📃
Feature: Initial cross-build support in CMakeToolchain with definition of CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME, CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR and CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION, deduced from self.settings_build (only using the 2 profiles) and from new [conf] items. (conan-io/conan#9115). Docs: 📃
Feature: Easier access to modify or update context values in CMakeToolchain blocks. (conan-io/conan#9109). Docs: 📃
Feature: Provide [conf] command line support. (conan-io/conan#9103). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added support for using server config from a custom location, setting CONAN_SERVER_HOME env variable or using -d or --server_dir flag when launching the server with conan_server command. (conan-io/conan#9099). Docs: 📃
Feature: Support for CMakeDeps generator of a new property "skip_deps_file" to be declared in the cpp_info of a package to skip creating xxx-config.cmake files for it, allowing to create "system wrapper" recipes easily. (conan-io/conan#9087). Docs: 📃
Feature: New conanfile.dependencies model, using a dict {requirement: ConanFileInterface} to prepare for Conan 2.0. (conan-io/conan#9062). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow a explicit requires = "pkg..#recipe_revision" to update cache revision without --update. (conan-io/conan#9058). Docs: 📃
Feature: New cmake_layout() layout helper to define a multi-platform CMake layout that will work for different generators (ninja, xcode, visual, unix), and is multi-config. (conan-io/conan#9057). Docs: 📃
Feature: The conan_toolchain.cmake now includes xxx_DIR variables for the dependencies to ease the find_package mechanism to locate them. The declaration of these directories is a must when cross-building in OSX where CMake ignores CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH and CMAKE_MODULE_PATH to look only at the system framework directories. (conan-io/conan#9032). Docs: 📃
Feature: Provide access in the recipes to the environment declared with the new environment system. (conan-io/conan#9030). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix Bazel build string defines. (conan-io/conan#9139)
Fix: Fixed behavior in the self.folders feature whereby the sources saved or downloaded inside the source(self) were saved at the self.folders.source folder. But self.folders.source is intended to describe where the sources are instead of forcing where the sources are saved. (conan-io/conan#9124). Docs: 📃
Fix: Properly generate qbs profile for msvc. (conan-io/conan#9122)
Fix: Configuration general.user_home_short works with "None" value. (conan-io/conan#9118)
Fix: Avoid CMakeToolchain to generate OSX and Apple config for non Apple builds. (conan-io/conan#9107)
Fix: The new MesonToolchain now takes the declared environment variables (CC, CXX...) from build-requires and profiles to set the variables c, cpp, c_ld, cpp_ld etc, into the conan_meson_native.ini (conan-io/conan#8353). Docs: 📃
Fix: Added new preprocessor_definitions to new Meson build helper. (conan-io/conan#8353). Docs: 📃
Fix: The new MesonToolchain now allows adjusting any variable before generating the conan_meson_native.ini file. (conan-io/conan#8353). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Disabled remotes shouldn't fail if not used at all (conan-io/conan#9184)
BugFix: ConanFileDependencies.build["dep"] was retrieving the host dependency if existing, or failing otherwise, because the default requires was hardcoded to fetch the host (build=False) dependency. (conan-io/conan#9148). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Now, conan profile {show, update, get, remove} is working fine with new experimental [conf] section. (conan-io/conan#9114)

1.37.2 (14-Jun-2021)

Bugfix: Avoid crash when using --lockfile with the conan test command. (conan-io/conan#9089)
Bugfix: The CMakeDeps generator variables were named wrongly when a component had the same name as the package. (conan-io/conan#9073)

1.37.1 (08-Jun-2021)

Fix: Update the experimental conan new ... -m=v2_cmake template to start using the new layout() basic info. (conan-io/conan#9053)
Fix: Do not fail in CMakeDeps when there are build_requires with same name as host requires, unless build_context_activated is enabled for those and a different suffix has not been defined. (conan-io/conan#9046)
Fix: When using the new self.folders.source (at layout(self) method) the sources (from export, export_sources and scm) are copied to the base source folder and not to the self.folders.source that is intended to describe where the sources are after fetching them. (conan-io/conan#9043). Docs: 📃
BugFix: Do not quote all values and allow integer and macro referencing in MSBuildToolchain.preprocessor_definitions (conan-io/conan#9056)
Bugfix: The new generators like CMakeDeps and CMakeToolchainwrite the generated files defaulting to the install folder if no self.folders.generators is specified in the layout() method. (conan-io/conan#9050)
Bugfix: The CMakeToolchain generator now manages correctly a recipe without arch declared in an Apple system. (conan-io/conan#9045)

1.37.0 (31-May-2021)

Feature: Remove CMAKE_SKIP_RPATHS by default to True in CMakeToolchain, it is not necessary by default, users can opt-in, and new test validates shared libs will work with VirtualEnv generator conanrunenv. (conan-io/conan#9024). Docs: 📃
Feature: simplified CMakeToolchain with only 1 category of blocks, made try-compile template code as another block, and reordered blocks so relevant flags for try-compile are taken into account. (conan-io/conan#9009). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add new default conancenter remote for https://center.conan.io as first in the list. (conan-io/conan#8999). Docs: 📃
Feature: Implements a new experimental conan.tools.google Bazel integration with BazelDeps, BazelToolchain and Bazel. (conan-io/conan#8991). Docs: 📃
Feature: Introduced new options for the CMakeDeps generator allowing to manage build_requires even declaring the same package as a require and build_require avoiding the collision of the config cmake files and enabling to specify which build_modules should be included (e.g protobuf issue) (conan-io/conan#8985). Docs: 📃
Feature: Expand user-agent string to include OS info. (conan-io/conan#8947)
Feature: Implement build_policy=never for conan export-pkg packages that cannot be rebuilt with --build=xxx. (conan-io/conan#8946). Docs: 📃
Feature: Define [conf] for defining the user toolchain for CMakeToolchain, both for injecting a user toolchain in the CMakeToolchain generated conan_toolchain.cmake and for completely replacing conan_toolchain.cmake. (conan-io/conan#8945). Docs: 📃
Feature: add GCC 11 to settings.yml. (conan-io/conan#8924)



... (truncated)


Commits

1c742e8 fixing cmaketoolchain cross for Android (#9186)
4d8655b Fix/disabled remotes (#9184)
5f6f793 bumped version to 1.38
9ebc2e4 fix ConanFileDependencies.build[dep] access (#9148)
e4a416f New PkgConfigDeps generator #9110 (#9152)
5477496 making Paths explicit in new Environment (#9168)
cf5a68d Add msvc runtime value to profile (#9122)
413ac92 Fix general.user_home_short None value (#9118)
509296c wip (#9147)
1c5a764 adding context information to conan-info command (#9137)

column20:
Bumps isort from 4.3.21 to 5.9.2.

Release notes
Sourced from isort's releases.

5.9.2 July 8th 2021

Improved behavior of isort --check --atomic against Cython files.
Fixed #1769: Future imports added below assignments when no other imports present.
Fixed #1772: skip-gitignore will check files not in the git repository.
Fixed #1762: in some cases when skip-gitignore is set, isort fails to skip any files.
Fixed #1767: Encoding issues surfacing when invalid characters set in __init__.py files during placement.
Fixed #1771: Improved handling of skips against named streamed in content.

5.9.1 June 21st 2021 [hotfix]

Fixed #1758: projects with many files and skip_ignore set can lead to a command-line overload.

5.9.0 June 21st 2021

Improved CLI startup time.
Implemented #1697: Provisional support for PEP 582: skip __pypackages__ directories by default.
Implemented #1705: More intuitive handling of isort:skip_file comments on streams.
Implemented #1737: Support for using action comments to avoid adding imports to individual files.
Implemented #1750: Ability to customize output format lines.
Implemented #1732: Support for custom sort functions.
Implemented #1722: Improved behavior for running isort in atomic mode over Cython source files.
Fixed (PyCQA/isort#1695): added imports being added to doc string in some cases.
Fixed (PyCQA/isort#1714): in rare cases line continuation combined with tabs can output invalid code.
Fixed (PyCQA/isort#1726): isort ignores reverse_sort when force_sort_within_sections is true.
Fixed #1741: comments in hanging indent modes can lead to invalid code.
Fixed #1744: repeat noqa comments dropped when * import and non * imports exist from the same package.
Fixed #1721: repeat noqa comments on separate from lines with force-single-line set, sometimes get dropped.

5.8.0 March 20th 2021

Fixed #1631: as import comments can in some cases be duplicated.
Fixed #1667: extra newline added with float-to-top, after skip, in some cases.
Fixed #1594: incorrect placement of noqa comments with multiple from imports.
Fixed #1566: in some cases different length limits for dos based line endings.
Implemented #1648: Export MyPY type hints.
Implemented #1641: Identified import statements now return runnable code.
Implemented #1661: Added "wemake" profile.
Implemented #1669: Parallel (-j) now defaults to number of CPU cores if no value is provided.
Implemented #1668: Added a safeguard against accidental usage against /.
Implemented #1638 / #1644: Provide a flag --overwrite-in-place to ensure same file handle is used after sorting.
Implemented #1684: Added support for extending skips with --extend-skip and --extend-skip-glob.
Implemented #1688: Auto identification and skipping of some invalid import statements.
Implemented #1645: Ability to reverse the import sorting order.
Implemented #1504: Added ability to push star imports to the top to avoid overriding explicitly defined imports.
Documented #1685: Skip doesn't support plain directory names, but skip_glob does.

5.7.0 December 30th 2020

Fixed #1612: In rare circumstances an extra comma is added after import and before comment.
Fixed #1593: isort encounters bug in Python 3.6.0.
Implemented #1596: Provide ways for extension formatting and file paths to be specified when using streaming input from CLI.
Implemented #1583: Ability to output and diff within a single API call to isort.file.
Implemented #1562, #1592 & #1593: Better more useful fatal error messages.
Implemented #1575: Support for automatically fixing mixed indentation of import sections.



... (truncated)

Implemented #1504: Added ability to push star imports to the top to avoid overriding explicitly defined imports.

5.7.0 December 30th 2020

67494af Bump version to 5.9.2

034a5de Skip line for now
0e808e0 Add pragma: no cover comment to git link branch
83a9f68 Closes #1767: Encoding issues surfacing when invalid characters set in  files...

column20:
Bumps isort from 4.3.21 to 5.9.2.

Release notes
Sourced from isort's releases.

5.9.2 July 8th 2021

Improved behavior of isort --check --atomic against Cython files.
Fixed #1769: Future imports added below assignments when no other imports present.
Fixed #1772: skip-gitignore will check files not in the git repository.
Fixed #1762: in some cases when skip-gitignore is set, isort fails to skip any files.
Fixed #1767: Encoding issues surfacing when invalid characters set in __init__.py files during placement.
Fixed #1771: Improved handling of skips against named streamed in content.

5.9.1 June 21st 2021 [hotfix]

Fixed #1758: projects with many files and skip_ignore set can lead to a command-line overload.

5.9.0 June 21st 2021

Improved CLI startup time.
Implemented #1697: Provisional support for PEP 582: skip __pypackages__ directories by default.
Implemented #1705: More intuitive handling of isort:skip_file comments on streams.
Implemented #1737: Support for using action comments to avoid adding imports to individual files.
Implemented #1750: Ability to customize output format lines.
Implemented #1732: Support for custom sort functions.
Implemented #1722: Improved behavior for running isort in atomic mode over Cython source files.
Fixed (PyCQA/isort#1695): added imports being added to doc string in some cases.
Fixed (PyCQA/isort#1714): in rare cases line continuation combined with tabs can output invalid code.
Fixed (PyCQA/isort#1726): isort ignores reverse_sort when force_sort_within_sections is true.
Fixed #1741: comments in hanging indent modes can lead to invalid code.
Fixed #1744: repeat noqa comments dropped when * import and non * imports exist from the same package.
Fixed #1721: repeat noqa comments on separate from lines with force-single-line set, sometimes get dropped.

5.8.0 March 20th 2021

Fixed #1631: as import comments can in some cases be duplicated.
Fixed #1667: extra newline added with float-to-top, after skip, in some cases.
Fixed #1594: incorrect placement of noqa comments with multiple from imports.
Fixed #1566: in some cases different length limits for dos based line endings.
Implemented #1648: Export MyPY type hints.
Implemented #1641: Identified import statements now return runnable code.
Implemented #1661: Added "wemake" profile.
Implemented #1669: Parallel (-j) now defaults to number of CPU cores if no value is provided.
Implemented #1668: Added a safeguard against accidental usage against /.
Implemented #1638 / #1644: Provide a flag --overwrite-in-place to ensure same file handle is used after sorting.
Implemented #1684: Added support for extending skips with --extend-skip and --extend-skip-glob.
Implemented #1688: Auto identification and skipping of some invalid import statements.
Implemented #1645: Ability to reverse the import sorting order.
Implemented #1504: Added ability to push star imports to the top to avoid overriding explicitly defined imports.
Documented #1685: Skip doesn't support plain directory names, but skip_glob does.

5.7.0 December 30th 2020

Fixed #1612: In rare circumstances an extra comma is added after import and before comment.
Fixed #1593: isort encounters bug in Python 3.6.0.
Implemented #1596: Provide ways for extension formatting and file paths to be specified when using streaming input from CLI.
Implemented #1583: Ability to output and diff within a single API call to isort.file.
Implemented #1562, #1592 & #1593: Better more useful fatal error messages.
Implemented #1575: Support for automatically fixing mixed indentation of import sections.



... (truncated)

column20:
Bumps black from 19.10b0 to 21.7b0.

Release notes
Sourced from black's releases.

21.7b0
Black

Configuration files using TOML features higher than spec v0.5.0 are now supported
(#2301)
Add primer support and test for code piped into black via STDIN (#2315)
Fix internal error when FORCE_OPTIONAL_PARENTHESES feature is enabled (#2332)
Accept empty stdin (#2346)
Provide a more useful error when parsing fails during AST safety checks (#2304)

Docker

Add new latest_release tag automation to follow latest black release on docker
images (#2374)

Integrations

The vim plugin now searches upwards from the directory containing the current buffer
instead of the current working directory for pyproject.toml. (#1871)
The vim plugin now reads the correct string normalization option in pyproject.toml
(#1869)
The vim plugin no longer crashes Black when there's boolean values in pyproject.toml
(#1869)

21.6b0
Black

Fix failure caused by fmt: skip and indentation (#2281)
Account for += assignment when deciding whether to split string (#2312)
Correct max string length calculation when there are string operators (#2292)
Fixed option usage when using the --code flag (#2259)
Do not call uvloop.install() when Black is used as a library (#2303)
Added --required-version option to require a specific version to be running (#2300)
Fix incorrect custom breakpoint indices when string group contains fake f-strings
(#2311)
Fix regression where R prefixes would be lowercased for docstrings (#2285)
Fix handling of named escapes (\N{...}) when --experimental-string-processing is
used (#2319)

21.5b2
Black

A space is no longer inserted into empty docstrings (#2249)
Fix handling of .gitignore files containing non-ASCII characters on Windows (#2229)
Respect .gitignore files in all levels, not only root/.gitignore file (apply
.gitignore rules like git does) (#2225)
Restored compatibility with Click 8.0 on Python 3.6 when LANG=C used (#2227)
Add extra uvloop install + import support if in python env (#2258)
Fix --experimental-string-processing crash when matching parens are not found (#2283)
Make sure to split lines that start with a string operator (#2286)



... (truncated)


Changelog
Sourced from black's changelog.

21.7b0

Configuration files using TOML features higher than spec v0.5.0 are now supported

Account for += assignment when deciding whether to split string (#2312)
Correct max string length calculation when there are string operators (#2292)
Fixed option usage when using the --code flag (#2259)
Do not call uvloop.install() when Black is used as a library (#2303)
Added --required-version option to require a specific version to be running (#2300)
Fix incorrect custom breakpoint indices when string group contains fake f-strings
(#2311)
Fix regression where R prefixes would be lowercased for docstrings (#2285)
Fix handling of named escapes (\N{...}) when --experimental-string-processing is
used (#2319)

Integrations

The official Black action now supports choosing what version to use, and supports the
major 3 OSes. (#1940)

Black

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.39.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.39.0 (27-Jul-2021)

Feature: Use CMAKE_OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET to get -version-min set in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#9301)
Feature: Display python_requires information in the conan info output. (conan-io/conan#9290)
Feature: Now it is possible to define settings for a downstream consumer using -s &:setting=value or the same syntax in the profile even if the consumer is a conanfile.txt or a conanfile.py not declaring a name. e.g: Building a Debug application with Release dependencies: -s build_type=Release -s &:build_type=Debug (conan-io/conan#9267). Docs: 📃
Feature: The AutotoolsDeps allows to alter the generated environment corresponding to the information read from the dependencies before calling the generate() method. (conan-io/conan#9256). Docs: 📃
Feature: new remove and items methods for the Environment objects. (conan-io/conan#9256). Docs: 📃
Feature: New VCVars generator that generates a conanvcvars.bat that activates the Visual Studio Developer Command Prompt. (conan-io/conan#9230). Docs: 📃
Feature: Skip build helper test and using [conf]. (conan-io/conan#9218). Docs: 📃
Feature: Implement a new requires = "pkg/(alias)" syntax to be able to dissambiguate alias requirements and resolve them earlier in the flow, solving some limitations of the previous alias definition. This approach is intended to be the one in Conan 2.0 (issue backported from conan-io/tribe#25). (conan-io/conan#9217). Docs: 📃
Feature: Introduce the -require-override argument to define dependency overrides directly on command line. (conan-io/conan#9195). Docs: 📃
Feature: New self.win_bash mechanism to enable running commands in a bash shell in Windows. It works only with the new environment definition from the dependencies (env_buildinfo and run_buildinfo) as long as the new AutotoolsToolchain, AutotoolsDeps and Autotools build helper. It supports automatic conversion of the environment variables values declared as "path" according to the declared subsystem in the conf tools.win.bash:subsystem, that is not being auto-detected anymore. (conan-io/conan#9194). Docs: 📃
Feature: A unique environment launcher (conanenv.bat/sh) is generated to aggregate all the environment generators (VirtualRunEnv, VirtualBuildEnv, AutotoolsToolchain and AutotoolsDeps) that had been generated so the user can easily activate all of them with one command. (conan-io/conan#9161). Docs: 📃
Feature: Use CMake File API. (conan-io/conan#9005)
Fix: Add bindirs definition to cmake_layout(). (conan-io/conan#9276)
Fix: Improve error message when conan search <ref> a package in editable mode. (conan-io/conan#9262)
Fix: Add options to conanfile.dependencies model. (conan-io/conan#9258)
Fix: Fix CMake rejecting library name with special characters. (conan-io/conan#9245)
Fix: Use filename [PKG-NAME]-[COMP-NAME] for PkgConfigDeps. (conan-io/conan#9228). Docs: 📃
Fix: Saving all the toolchain args information into conanbuild.conf instead of json file. (conan-io/conan#9225). Docs: 📃
Fix: Added warning in the new toolchains (the used in the generate() method) if no build profile is being used. (conan-io/conan#9206). Docs: 📃
Fix: Implemented check that will raise an error in the CMakeDeps generator when using the build_context_activated, build_context_suffix or build_context_build_modules attributes if no build profile is being used. (conan-io/conan#9206). Docs: 📃
Fix: TheCMakeDeps generator will check if the targets specified in the find_package(foo components x y z) exist instead of checking against an internal variable. Also, this check will be done at the end of the xxx-config.cmake so any included build_module can declare the needed targets. (conan-io/conan#9206). Docs: 📃
Fix: Consistent help message for conan profile (sub-command part). (conan-io/conan#9204). Docs: 📃
Fix: Consistently put short arguments (-a) before long ones (--args). (conan-io/conan#9199)
Fix: CC=clang --gcc-toolchain is now identified as clang. (conan-io/conan#9198)
Fix: The new VirtualEnv generator has been split into VirtualRunEnv and VirtualBuildEnv. Both are automatically generated as before but only VirtualBuildEnv will be activated by default. (conan-io/conan#9161). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fixing workspace install when conanfile has imports(). (conan-io/conan#9281)
Bugfix: Fix QbsProfile toolchain qbs.architecture KeyError. (conan-io/conan#9192)
Bugfix: Do not define CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET  in CMakeToolchain for Ninja generator, and define it in vcvars_ver instead. (conan-io/conan#9187)
BugFix: build_requires in host context, like gtest, are being propagated downstream by generators in the dependencies model. (conan-io/conan#9171). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fix that overridden requirements "cannot be found in lockfile". (conan-io/conan#8907)

1.38.0 (30-Jun-2021)

Feature: New PkgConfigDeps generator. (conan-io/conan#9152). Docs: 📃
Feature: Proposal of jinja2 templates for profiles. (conan-io/conan#9147). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add support for CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#9144)
Feature: Add context information to conan info output both to stdout and json outputs. (conan-io/conan#9137). Docs: 📃
Feature: Improved the new AutotoolsToolchain, AutotoolsDeps and Autotools build helper. (conan-io/conan#9131). Docs: 📃
Feature: Initial cross-build support in CMakeToolchain with definition of CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME, CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR and CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION, deduced from self.settings_build (only using the 2 profiles) and from new [conf] items. (conan-io/conan#9115). Docs: 📃
Feature: Easier access to modify or update context values in CMakeToolchain blocks. (conan-io/conan#9109). Docs: 📃
Feature: Provide [conf] command line support. (conan-io/conan#9103). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added support for using server config from a custom location, setting CONAN_SERVER_HOME env variable or using -d or --server_dir flag when launching the server with conan_server command. (conan-io/conan#9099). Docs: 📃
Feature: Support for CMakeDeps generator of a new property "skip_deps_file" to be declared in the cpp_info of a package to skip creating xxx-config.cmake files for it, allowing to create "system wrapper" recipes easily. (conan-io/conan#9087). Docs: 📃
Feature: New conanfile.dependencies model, using a dict {requirement: ConanFileInterface} to prepare for Conan 2.0. (conan-io/conan#9062). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow a explicit requires = "pkg..#recipe_revision" to update cache revision without --update. (conan-io/conan#9058). Docs: 📃
Feature: New cmake_layout() layout helper to define a multi-platform CMake layout that will work for different generators (ninja, xcode, visual, unix), and is multi-config. (conan-io/conan#9057). Docs: 📃
Feature: The conan_toolchain.cmake now includes xxx_DIR variables for the dependencies to ease the find_package mechanism to locate them. The declaration of these directories is a must when cross-building in OSX where CMake ignores CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH and CMAKE_MODULE_PATH to look only at the system framework directories. (conan-io/conan#9032). Docs: 📃
Feature: Provide access in the recipes to the environment declared with the new environment system. (conan-io/conan#9030). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix Bazel build string defines. (conan-io/conan#9139)
Fix: Fixed behavior in the self.folders feature whereby the sources saved or downloaded inside the source(self) were saved at the self.folders.source folder. But self.folders.source is intended to describe where the sources are instead of forcing where the sources are saved. (conan-io/conan#9124). Docs: 📃



... (truncated)


Commits

d524074 branched release 1.39
b73acc9 add test to validate cpp.package works (#9297)
2f79057 Feature: Use CMAKE_OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET to get -version-min set in CMakeTool...
ae7732b --require-override in cli (#9195)
84c8010 Feature/new cpp paths (#9286)
be0b467 test for inspect alias (#9296)
79861e8 poc of new alias (#9217)
0e22f9e adding python-requires to info output (#9290)
51b6675 Replace $ with & for consumer (#9289)
6b4728b Allow defining settings for a downstream consumer (#9267)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

column21:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.39.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.39.0 (27-Jul-2021)

Feature: Use CMAKE_OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET to get -version-min set in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#9301)
Feature: Display python_requires information in the conan info output. (conan-io/conan#9290)
Feature: Now it is possible to define settings for a downstream consumer using -s &:setting=value or the same syntax in the profile even if the consumer is a conanfile.txt or a conanfile.py not declaring a name. e.g: Building a Debug application with Release dependencies: -s build_type=Release -s &:build_type=Debug (conan-io/conan#9267). Docs: 📃
Feature: The AutotoolsDeps allows to alter the generated environment corresponding to the information read from the dependencies before calling the generate() method. (conan-io/conan#9256). Docs: 📃
Feature: new remove and items methods for the Environment objects. (conan-io/conan#9256). Docs: 📃
Feature: New VCVars generator that generates a conanvcvars.bat that activates the Visual Studio Developer Command Prompt. (conan-io/conan#9230). Docs: 📃
Feature: Skip build helper test and using [conf]. (conan-io/conan#9218). Docs: 📃
Feature: Implement a new requires = "pkg/(alias)" syntax to be able to dissambiguate alias requirements and resolve them earlier in the flow, solving some limitations of the previous alias definition. This approach is intended to be the one in Conan 2.0 (issue backported from conan-io/tribe#25). (conan-io/conan#9217). Docs: 📃
Feature: Introduce the -require-override argument to define dependency overrides directly on command line. (conan-io/conan#9195). Docs: 📃
Feature: New self.win_bash mechanism to enable running commands in a bash shell in Windows. It works only with the new environment definition from the dependencies (env_buildinfo and run_buildinfo) as long as the new AutotoolsToolchain, AutotoolsDeps and Autotools build helper. It supports automatic conversion of the environment variables values declared as "path" according to the declared subsystem in the conf tools.win.bash:subsystem, that is not being auto-detected anymore. (conan-io/conan#9194). Docs: 📃
Feature: A unique environment launcher (conanenv.bat/sh) is generated to aggregate all the environment generators (VirtualRunEnv, VirtualBuildEnv, AutotoolsToolchain and AutotoolsDeps) that had been generated so the user can easily activate all of them with one command. (conan-io/conan#9161). Docs: 📃
Feature: Use CMake File API. (conan-io/conan#9005)
Fix: Add bindirs definition to cmake_layout(). (conan-io/conan#9276)
Fix: Improve error message when conan search <ref> a package in editable mode. (conan-io/conan#9262)
Fix: Add options to conanfile.dependencies model. (conan-io/conan#9258)
Fix: Fix CMake rejecting library name with special characters. (conan-io/conan#9245)
Fix: Use filename [PKG-NAME]-[COMP-NAME] for PkgConfigDeps. (conan-io/conan#9228). Docs: 📃
Fix: Saving all the toolchain args information into conanbuild.conf instead of json file. (conan-io/conan#9225). Docs: 📃
Fix: Added warning in the new toolchains (the used in the generate() method) if no build profile is being used. (conan-io/conan#9206). Docs: 📃
Fix: Implemented check that will raise an error in the CMakeDeps generator when using the build_context_activated, build_context_suffix or build_context_build_modules attributes if no build profile is being used. (conan-io/conan#9206). Docs: 📃
Fix: TheCMakeDeps generator will check if the targets specified in the find_package(foo components x y z) exist instead of checking against an internal variable. Also, this check will be done at the end of the xxx-config.cmake so any included build_module can declare the needed targets. (conan-io/conan#9206). Docs: 📃
Fix: Consistent help message for conan profile (sub-command part). (conan-io/conan#9204). Docs: 📃
Fix: Consistently put short arguments (-a) before long ones (--args). (conan-io/conan#9199)
Fix: CC=clang --gcc-toolchain is now identified as clang. (conan-io/conan#9198)
Fix: The new VirtualEnv generator has been split into VirtualRunEnv and VirtualBuildEnv. Both are automatically generated as before but only VirtualBuildEnv will be activated by default. (conan-io/conan#9161). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fixing workspace install when conanfile has imports(). (conan-io/conan#9281)
Bugfix: Fix QbsProfile toolchain qbs.architecture KeyError. (conan-io/conan#9192)
Bugfix: Do not define CMAKE_GENERATOR_TOOLSET  in CMakeToolchain for Ninja generator, and define it in vcvars_ver instead. (conan-io/conan#9187)
BugFix: build_requires in host context, like gtest, are being propagated downstream by generators in the dependencies model. (conan-io/conan#9171). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fix that overridden requirements "cannot be found in lockfile". (conan-io/conan#8907)

1.38.0 (30-Jun-2021)

Feature: New PkgConfigDeps generator. (conan-io/conan#9152). Docs: 📃
Feature: Proposal of jinja2 templates for profiles. (conan-io/conan#9147). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add support for CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#9144)
Feature: Add context information to conan info output both to stdout and json outputs. (conan-io/conan#9137). Docs: 📃
Feature: Improved the new AutotoolsToolchain, AutotoolsDeps and Autotools build helper. (conan-io/conan#9131). Docs: 📃
Feature: Initial cross-build support in CMakeToolchain with definition of CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME, CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR and CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION, deduced from self.settings_build (only using the 2 profiles) and from new [conf] items. (conan-io/conan#9115). Docs: 📃
Feature: Easier access to modify or update context values in CMakeToolchain blocks. (conan-io/conan#9109). Docs: 📃
Feature: Provide [conf] command line support. (conan-io/conan#9103). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added support for using server config from a custom location, setting CONAN_SERVER_HOME env variable or using -d or --server_dir flag when launching the server with conan_server command. (conan-io/conan#9099). Docs: 📃
Feature: Support for CMakeDeps generator of a new property "skip_deps_file" to be declared in the cpp_info of a package to skip creating xxx-config.cmake files for it, allowing to create "system wrapper" recipes easily. (conan-io/conan#9087). Docs: 📃
Feature: New conanfile.dependencies model, using a dict {requirement: ConanFileInterface} to prepare for Conan 2.0. (conan-io/conan#9062). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow a explicit requires = "pkg..#recipe_revision" to update cache revision without --update. (conan-io/conan#9058). Docs: 📃
Feature: New cmake_layout() layout helper to define a multi-platform CMake layout that will work for different generators (ninja, xcode, visual, unix), and is multi-config. (conan-io/conan#9057). Docs: 📃
Feature: The conan_toolchain.cmake now includes xxx_DIR variables for the dependencies to ease the find_package mechanism to locate them. The declaration of these directories is a must when cross-building in OSX where CMake ignores CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH and CMAKE_MODULE_PATH to look only at the system framework directories. (conan-io/conan#9032). Docs: 📃
Feature: Provide access in the recipes to the environment declared with the new environment system. (conan-io/conan#9030). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix Bazel build string defines. (conan-io/conan#9139)
Fix: Fixed behavior in the self.folders feature whereby the sources saved or downloaded inside the source(self) were saved at the self.folders.source folder. But self.folders.source is intended to describe where the sources are instead of forcing where the sources are saved. (conan-io/conan#9124). Docs: 📃



... (truncated)


Commits

d524074 branched release 1.39
b73acc9 add test to validate cpp.package works (#9297)
2f79057 Feature: Use CMAKE_OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET to get -version-min set in CMakeTool...
ae7732b --require-override in cli (#9195)
84c8010 Feature/new cpp paths (#9286)
be0b467 test for inspect alias (#9296)
79861e8 poc of new alias (#9217)
0e22f9e adding python-requires to info output (#9290)
51b6675 Replace $ with & for consumer (#9289)
6b4728b Allow defining settings for a downstream consumer (#9267)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

column20:
Bumps isort from 4.3.21 to 5.9.3.

Release notes
Sourced from isort's releases.

5.9.3 July 28 2021

Improved text of skipped file message to mention gitignore feature.
Made all exceptions pickleable.
Fixed #1779: Pylama integration ignores pylama specific isort config overrides.
Fixed #1781: --from-first CLI flag shouldn't take any arguments.
Fixed #1792: Sorting literals sometimes ignored when placed on first few lines of file.
Fixed #1777: extend_skip is not honored wit a git submodule when skip_gitignore=true.

5.9.2 July 8th 2021

Improved behavior of isort --check --atomic against Cython files.
Fixed #1769: Future imports added below assignments when no other imports present.
Fixed #1772: skip-gitignore will check files not in the git repository.
Fixed #1762: in some cases when skip-gitignore is set, isort fails to skip any files.
Fixed #1767: Encoding issues surfacing when invalid characters set in __init__.py files during placement.
Fixed #1771: Improved handling of skips against named streamed in content.

5.9.1 June 21st 2021 [hotfix]

Fixed #1758: projects with many files and skip_ignore set can lead to a command-line overload.

5.9.0 June 21st 2021

Improved CLI startup time.
Implemented #1697: Provisional support for PEP 582: skip __pypackages__ directories by default.
Implemented #1705: More intuitive handling of isort:skip_file comments on streams.
Implemented #1737: Support for using action comments to avoid adding imports to individual files.
Implemented #1750: Ability to customize output format lines.
Implemented #1732: Support for custom sort functions.
Implemented #1722: Improved behavior for running isort in atomic mode over Cython source files.
Fixed (PyCQA/isort#1695): added imports being added to doc string in some cases.
Fixed (PyCQA/isort#1714): in rare cases line continuation combined with tabs can output invalid code.
Fixed (PyCQA/isort#1726): isort ignores reverse_sort when force_sort_within_sections is true.
Fixed #1741: comments in hanging indent modes can lead to invalid code.
Fixed #1744: repeat noqa comments dropped when * import and non * imports exist from the same package.
Fixed #1721: repeat noqa comments on separate from lines with force-single-line set, sometimes get dropped.

5.8.0 March 20th 2021

Fixed #1631: as import comments can in some cases be duplicated.
Fixed #1667: extra newline added with float-to-top, after skip, in some cases.
Fixed #1594: incorrect placement of noqa comments with multiple from imports.
Fixed #1566: in some cases different length limits for dos based line endings.
Implemented #1648: Export MyPY type hints.
Implemented #1641: Identified import statements now return runnable code.
Implemented #1661: Added "wemake" profile.
Implemented #1669: Parallel (-j) now defaults to number of CPU cores if no value is provided.
Implemented #1668: Added a safeguard against accidental usage against /.
Implemented #1638 / #1644: Provide a flag --overwrite-in-place to ensure same file handle is used after sorting.
Implemented #1684: Added support for extending skips with --extend-skip and --extend-skip-glob.
Implemented #1688: Auto identification and skipping of some invalid import statements.
Implemented #1645: Ability to reverse the import sorting order.
Implemented #1504: Added ability to push star imports to the top to avoid overriding explicitly defined imports.
Documented #1685: Skip doesn't support plain directory names, but skip_glob does.



... (truncated)

column21:
OK, I won't notify you again about this release, but will get in touch when a new version is available. If you'd rather skip all updates until the next major or minor version, let me know by commenting @dependabot ignore this major version or @dependabot ignore this minor version. You can also ignore all major, minor, or patch releases for a dependency by adding an ignore condition with the desired update_types to your config file.
If you change your mind, just re-open this PR and I'll resolve any conflicts on it.

column20:
Bumps pre-commit from 2.6.0 to 2.14.0.

Release notes
Sourced from pre-commit's releases.

pre-commit v2.14.0
Features

During pre-push hooks, expose local branch as PRE_COMMIT_LOCAL_BRANCH.

#1947 PR by @​FlorentClarret.
#1410 issue by @​MaicoTimmerman.


Improve container id detection for docker-beside-docker with custom hostname.

#1919 PR by @​adarnimrod.
#1918 issue by @​adarnimrod.



Fixes

Read legacy hooks in an encoding-agnostic way.

#1943 PR by @​asottile.
#1942 issue by @​sbienkow-ninja.


Fix execution of docker hooks for docker-in-docker.

#1997 PR by @​asottile.
#1978 issue by @​robin-moss.



pre-commit v2.13.0
Features

Setting SKIP=... skips installation as well.

#1875 PR by @​asottile.
pre-commit-ci/issues#53 issue by @​TylerYep.


Attempt to mount from host with docker-in-docker.

#1888 PR by @​okainov.
#1387 issue by @​okainov.


Enable repo: local for r hooks.

#1878 PR by @​lorenzwalthert.


Upgrade ruby-build and rbenv.

#1913 PR by @​jalessio.



Fixes

Better detect r packages.

#1898 PR by @​lorenzwalthert.


Avoid warnings with mismatched renv versions.

#1841 PR by @​lorenzwalthert.


Reproducibly produce ruby tar resources.

#1915 PR by @​asottile.



pre-commit v2.12.1
Fixes

Fix race condition when stashing files in multiple parallel invocations

#1881 PR by @​adamchainz.
#1880 issue by @​adamchainz.



pre-commit v2.12.0
Features

Upgrade rbenv.

#1854 PR by @​asottile.
#1848 issue by @​sirosen.

column21: Superseded by #217.

column20:
Bumps black from 19.10b0 to 21.8b0.

Release notes
Sourced from black's releases.

21.8b0
Black

Add support for formatting Jupyter Notebook files (#2357)
Move from appdirs dependency to platformdirs (#2375)
Present a more user-friendly error if .gitignore is invalid (#2414)
The failsafe for accidentally added backslashes in f-string expressions has been hardened to handle more edge cases during quote normalization (#2437)
Avoid changing a function return type annotation's type to a tuple by adding a trailing comma (#2384)
Parsing support has been added for unparenthesized walruses in set literals, set comprehensions, and indices (#2447).
Pin setuptools-scm build-time dependency version (#2457)
Exclude typing-extensions version 3.10.0.1 due to it being broken on Python 3.10 (#2460)

Blackd

Replace sys.exit(-1) with raise ImportError as it plays more nicely with tools that scan installed packages (#2440)

Integrations

The provided pre-commit hooks no longer specify language_version to avoid overriding default_language_version (#2430)

21.7b0
Black

Configuration files using TOML features higher than spec v0.5.0 are now supported
(#2301)
Add primer support and test for code piped into black via STDIN (#2315)
Fix internal error when FORCE_OPTIONAL_PARENTHESES feature is enabled (#2332)
Accept empty stdin (#2346)
Provide a more useful error when parsing fails during AST safety checks (#2304)

Docker

Add new latest_release tag automation to follow latest black release on docker
images (#2374)

Integrations

The vim plugin now searches upwards from the directory containing the current buffer
instead of the current working directory for pyproject.toml. (#1871)
The vim plugin now reads the correct string normalization option in pyproject.toml
(#1869)
The vim plugin no longer crashes Black when there's boolean values in pyproject.toml
(#1869)

21.6b0
Black

Fix failure caused by fmt: skip and indentation (#2281)
Account for += assignment when deciding whether to split string (#2312)
Correct max string length calculation when there are string operators (#2292)



... (truncated)

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.40.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.40.0 (06-Sep-2021)

Feature: Update conan new modern templates --template=cmake_lib and --template=cmake_exe. (conan-io/conan#9516). Docs: 📃
Feature: Introduced a new cpp_info property cmake_target_namespace to declare the target namespace for the CMakeDeps generator. This feature allows declaring a global target with a different namespace like Foo::Bar. (conan-io/conan#9513). Docs: 📃
Feature: Detect Visual Studio 2022 as msvc. (conan-io/conan#9504)
Feature: Add Clang 13 support. (conan-io/conan#9502). Docs: 📃
Feature: Testing support for Windows CMake + Clang (independent LLVM, not VS) + Ninja/MinGW builds, and CMake + Clang (Visual Studio 16 internal LLVM 11 via ClangCL toolset). (conan-io/conan#9477)
Feature: Provide new [conf] core:default_build_profile to enable the usage of the build profile as default, and to allow definition of the host profile default in new [conf] core:default_profile. (conan-io/conan#9468). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMakeToolchain new member find_builddirs defaulted to True to add the cpp_info.builddirs from the requirements to the CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH/CMAKE_MODULE_PATH. That would allow finding the config files packaged and to be able to include() them from the consumer CMakeLists.txt. (conan-io/conan#9455). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMakeDeps. Added a new property cmake_find_mode with possible values to config(default), module, both or none to control the files to be generated from a package itself. The none replaces the current skip_deps_file property. (conan-io/conan#9455). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMakeDeps: Added two new properties cmake_module_file_name and cmake_module_target_name, analog to cmake_file_name and cmake_target_name, but to configure the name of FindXXX.cmake file and the target declared inside. (conan-io/conan#9455). Docs: 📃
Feature: Remove conan-center (https://conan.bintray.com) default remote. (conan-io/conan#9401). Docs: 📃
Feature: Implement round trip new profile [buildenv] section, necessary for lockfiles, and specially stdout printing. (conan-io/conan#9320)
Feature: Allow -o &:option=value wildcard for consumer, too, same it was done for settings in 1.39 (conan-io/conan#9316). Docs: 📃
Fix: Adding management of private dependencies, via new visible trait compatible with 2.0 for new CMakeDeps and MSBuildDeps. (conan-io/conan#9517)
Fix: Remove unused deprecation pip dependency (conan-io/conan#9478)
Fix: Upgrade distro dependency to allow 1.6.0 (conan-io/conan#9462)
Fix: Make conan remove accept package reference syntax. (conan-io/conan#9459). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fixed old CMake build helper to cross-build to iOS when two profiles are specified. (conan-io/conan#9437)
Fix: Fix conan export typo in help message. (conan-io/conan#9408). Docs: 📃
Fix:  Relax python six dependency to allow 1.16 (conan-io/conan#9407)
Fix: Bump urllib3 version to 1.26.6 (conan-io/conan#9405)
Fix: The new Autotools build helper accepts a build_script_folder  argument in the configure() method to specify are subfolder where the configure script is. (conan-io/conan#9393). Docs: 📃
Fix: Use frameworks in Premake generator. (conan-io/conan#9371). Docs: 📃
Fix: The tool conan.tools.files.apply_conandata_patches will use the root source folder to find the patch file and the tool conan.tools.files.patch will take the current source folder declared in the layout() method to know where is the source to apply the patches. (conan-io/conan#9361). Docs: 📃
Fix: Avoid checking other remotes when -r=remote is defined and revisions are activated and binary is not found in the defined remote. (conan-io/conan#9355)
Bugfix: Setting the CMAKE_OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET variable as a cache entry. (conan-io/conan#9498)
BugFix: Use topological ordering to define VirtualBuildEnv composition and precedence of appending variables. (conan-io/conan#9491)
Bugfix: Bazel build files have an extra ] if there are no dependencies. (conan-io/conan#9480)
Bugfix: Add AlmaLinux to with_yum. (conan-io/conan#9463)
Bugfix: CMakeToolchain. Fixed a bugfix whereby a variable declared at the .variables containing a boolean ended at CMake with a quoted "True" or "False" values, instead of ON / OFF (conan-io/conan#9455). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fixed bug whereby Conan failed when using compiler=gcc with compiler.version=5 (without specifying a minor version) and compiler.cppstd=17. (conan-io/conan#9431)
Bugfix: No verbose traceback was been printed for conanfile.layout() method. (conan-io/conan#9384)
Bugfix: Fix Bazel cc_library: deps and linkopts. (conan-io/conan#9381)
Bugfix: Fixed bug whereby using new layout() method together with cppinfo.components in the package_info method caused an exception. (conan-io/conan#9360)
Bugfix: Fix PkgConfigDeps that was failing in the case of components with requirements. (conan-io/conan#9341)

1.39.0 (27-Jul-2021)

Feature: Use CMAKE_OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET to get -version-min set in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#9301)
Feature: Display python_requires information in the conan info output. (conan-io/conan#9290)
Feature: Now it is possible to define settings for a downstream consumer using -s &:setting=value or the same syntax in the profile even if the consumer is a conanfile.txt or a conanfile.py not declaring a name. e.g: Building a Debug application with Release dependencies: -s build_type=Release -s &:build_type=Debug (conan-io/conan#9267). Docs: 📃
Feature: The AutotoolsDeps allows to alter the generated environment corresponding to the information read from the dependencies before calling the generate() method. (conan-io/conan#9256). Docs: 📃
Feature: new remove and items methods for the Environment objects. (conan-io/conan#9256). Docs: 📃
Feature: New VCVars generator that generates a conanvcvars.bat that activates the Visual Studio Developer Command Prompt. (conan-io/conan#9230). Docs: 📃
Feature: Skip build helper test and using [conf]. (conan-io/conan#9218). Docs: 📃
Feature: Implement a new requires = "pkg/(alias)" syntax to be able to dissambiguate alias requirements and resolve them earlier in the flow, solving some limitations of the previous alias definition. This approach is intended to be the one in Conan 2.0 (issue backported from conan-io/tribe#25). (conan-io/conan#9217). Docs: 📃
Feature: Introduce the -require-override argument to define dependency overrides directly on command line. (conan-io/conan#9195). Docs: 📃
Feature: New self.win_bash mechanism to enable running commands in a bash shell in Windows. It works only with the new environment definition from the dependencies (env_buildinfo and run_buildinfo) as long as the new AutotoolsToolchain, AutotoolsDeps and Autotools build helper. It supports automatic conversion of the environment variables values declared as "path" according to the declared subsystem in the conf tools.win.bash:subsystem, that is not being auto-detected anymore. (conan-io/conan#9194). Docs: 📃
Feature: A unique environment launcher (conanenv.bat/sh) is generated to aggregate all the environment generators (VirtualRunEnv, VirtualBuildEnv, AutotoolsToolchain and AutotoolsDeps) that had been generated so the user can easily activate all of them with one command. (conan-io/conan#9161). Docs: 📃
Feature: Use CMake File API. (conan-io/conan#9005)
Fix: Add bindirs definition to cmake_layout(). (conan-io/conan#9276)



... (truncated)


Commits

f3eb73d adding new confs (#9526)
ef947e7 release 1.40
320644e remove unwanted var (#9525)
88d8506 testing shared works (#9523)
2c94b9c Fixing private dependencies in CMakeDeps and MSBuildDeps (#9517)
e869976 CMakeDeps with custom namespace (#9513)
313552e update conan new modern templates (#9516)
aae78ea CMakeDeps/CMakeToolchain: Several improvements for open issues (#9455)
addd8ab allow -o &:option=value wildcard for consumer (#9316)
41266c4 Feature: detect VS2022 as msvc (#9504)
Additional commits viewable in compare view




Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting @dependabot rebase.


Dependabot commands and options

You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR:

@dependabot rebase will rebase this PR
@dependabot recreate will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it
@dependabot merge will merge this PR after your CI passes on it
@dependabot squash and merge will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it
@dependabot cancel merge will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging
@dependabot reopen will reopen this PR if it is closed
@dependabot close will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually
@dependabot ignore this major version will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)
@dependabot ignore this minor version will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)
@dependabot ignore this dependency will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)
