Feature: CMakeToolchain new member find_builddirs defaulted to True to add the cpp_info.builddirs from the requirements to the CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH/CMAKE_MODULE_PATH. That would allow finding the config files packaged and to be able to include() them from the consumer CMakeLists.txt. (conan-io/conan#9455). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMakeDeps. Added a new property cmake_find_mode with possible values to config(default), module, both or none to control the files to be generated from a package itself. The none replaces the current skip_deps_file property. (conan-io/conan#9455). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMakeDeps: Added two new properties cmake_module_file_name and cmake_module_target_name, analog to cmake_file_name and cmake_target_name, but to configure the name of FindXXX.cmake file and the target declared inside. (conan-io/conan#9455). Docs: 📃
Feature: Remove conan-center (https://conan.bintray.com) default remote. (conan-io/conan#9401). Docs: 📃
Feature: Implement round trip new profile [buildenv] section, necessary for lockfiles, and specially stdout printing. (conan-io/conan#9320)
Feature: Allow -o &:option=value wildcard for consumer, too, same it was done for settings in 1.39 (conan-io/conan#9316). Docs: 📃
Fix: Adding management of private dependencies, via new visible trait compatible with 2.0 for new CMakeDeps and MSBuildDeps. (conan-io/conan#9517)
Fix: Remove unused deprecation pip dependency (conan-io/conan#9478)
Fix: Upgrade distro dependency to allow 1.6.0 (conan-io/conan#9462)
Fix: Make conan remove accept package reference syntax. (conan-io/conan#9459). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fixed old CMake build helper to cross-build to iOS when two profiles are specified. (conan-io/conan#9437)
Fix: Fix conan export typo in help message. (conan-io/conan#9408). Docs: 📃
Fix:  Relax python six dependency to allow 1.16 (conan-io/conan#9407)
Fix: Bump urllib3 version to 1.26.6 (conan-io/conan#9405)
Fix: The new Autotools build helper accepts a build_script_folder  argument in the configure() method to specify are subfolder where the configure script is. (conan-io/conan#9393). Docs: 📃
Fix: Use frameworks in Premake generator. (conan-io/conan#9371). Docs: 📃
Fix: The tool conan.tools.files.apply_conandata_patches will use the root source folder to find the patch file and the tool conan.tools.files.patch will take the current source folder declared in the layout() method to know where is the source to apply the patches. (conan-io/conan#9361). Docs: 📃
Fix: Avoid checking other remotes when -r=remote is defined and revisions are activated and binary is not found in the defined remote. (conan-io/conan#9355)
Bugfix: Setting the CMAKE_OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET variable as a cache entry. (conan-io/conan#9498)
BugFix: Use topological ordering to define VirtualBuildEnv composition and precedence of appending variables. (conan-io/conan#9491)
Bugfix: Bazel build files have an extra ] if there are no dependencies. (conan-io/conan#9480)
Bugfix: Add AlmaLinux to with_yum. (conan-io/conan#9463)
Bugfix: CMakeToolchain. Fixed a bugfix whereby a variable declared at the .variables containing a boolean ended at CMake with a quoted "True" or "False" values, instead of ON / OFF (conan-io/conan#9455). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fixed bug whereby Conan failed when using compiler=gcc with compiler.version=5 (without specifying a minor version) and compiler.cppstd=17. (conan-io/conan#9431)
Bugfix: No verbose traceback was been printed for conanfile.layout() method. (conan-io/conan#9384)
Bugfix: Fix Bazel cc_library: deps and linkopts. (conan-io/conan#9381)
Bugfix: Fixed bug whereby using new layout() method together with cppinfo.components in the package_info method caused an exception. (conan-io/conan#9360)
Bugfix: Fix PkgConfigDeps that was failing in the case of components with requirements. (conan-io/conan#9341)

1.39.0 (27-Jul-2021)

Feature: Use CMAKE_OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET to get -version-min set in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#9301)
Feature: Display python_requires information in the conan info output. (conan-io/conan#9290)
Feature: Now it is possible to define settings for a downstream consumer using -s &:setting=value or the same syntax in the profile even if the consumer is a conanfile.txt or a conanfile.py not declaring a name. e.g: Building a Debug application with Release dependencies: -s build_type=Release -s &:build_type=Debug (conan-io/conan#9267). Docs: 📃
Feature: The AutotoolsDeps allows to alter the generated environment corresponding to the information read from the dependencies before calling the generate() method. (conan-io/conan#9256). Docs: 📃
Feature: new remove and items methods for the Environment objects. (conan-io/conan#9256). Docs: 📃
Feature: New VCVars generator that generates a conanvcvars.bat that activates the Visual Studio Developer Command Prompt. (conan-io/conan#9230). Docs: 📃
Feature: Skip build helper test and using [conf]. (conan-io/conan#9218). Docs: 📃
Feature: Implement a new requires = "pkg/(alias)" syntax to be able to dissambiguate alias requirements and resolve them earlier in the flow, solving some limitations of the previous alias definition. This approach is intended to be the one in Conan 2.0 (issue backported from conan-io/tribe#25). (conan-io/conan#9217). Docs: 📃
Feature: Introduce the -require-override argument to define dependency overrides directly on command line. (conan-io/conan#9195). Docs: 📃
Feature: New self.win_bash mechanism to enable running commands in a bash shell in Windows. It works only with the new environment definition from the dependencies (env_buildinfo and run_buildinfo) as long as the new AutotoolsToolchain, AutotoolsDeps and Autotools build helper. It supports automatic conversion of the environment variables values declared as "path" according to the declared subsystem in the conf tools.win.bash:subsystem, that is not being auto-detected anymore. (conan-io/conan#9194). Docs: 📃
Feature: A unique environment launcher (conanenv.bat/sh) is generated to aggregate all the environment generators (VirtualRunEnv, VirtualBuildEnv, AutotoolsToolchain and AutotoolsDeps) that had been generated so the user can easily activate all of them with one command. (conan-io/conan#9161). Docs: 📃
Feature: Use CMake File API. (conan-io/conan#9005)
Fix: Add bindirs definition to cmake_layout(). (conan-io/conan#9276)



... (truncated)


Commits

f3eb73d adding new confs (#9526)
ef947e7 release 1.40
320644e remove unwanted var (#9525)
88d8506 testing shared works (#9523)
2c94b9c Fixing private dependencies in CMakeDeps and MSBuildDeps (#9517)
e869976 CMakeDeps with custom namespace (#9513)
313552e update conan new modern templates (#9516)
aae78ea CMakeDeps/CMakeToolchain: Several improvements for open issues (#9455)
addd8ab allow -o &:option=value wildcard for consumer (#9316)
41266c4 Feature: detect VS2022 as msvc (#9504)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.40.1.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.40.1 (14-Sep-2021)

Feature: Change default cmake_layout() source folder from 'src' to '.' (conan-io/conan#9596). Docs: 📃
Feature: Recovered base_path argument for conan.tools.files.patch and conan.tools.files.apply_conandata_patches to be able to specify a relative folder from the conanfile.source_folder directory (that follows the layout() method). (conan-io/conan#9593). Docs: 📃
Fix: Allow user definition of CMAKE_XXX_INIT variables in user toolchains when using CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#9576)
Fix: Upgrade minimum requests>=2.25 in requirements.txt to make it compatible with latest upgrade of urllib3 to 1.26.6 (conan-io/conan#9562)
Bugfix: Aggregate [conf] from build_requires earlier so it is available for generators declared as generators. attribute. Close conan-io/conan#9571 (conan-io/conan#9573)
Bugfix: The qmake generator now assigns QMAKE_LFLAGS_SHLIB and QMAKE_LFLAGS_APP variables instead of the incorrect QMAKE_LFLAGS following the official docs. (conan-io/conan#9568). Docs: 📃

1.40.0 (06-Sep-2021)

Feature: Update conan new modern templates --template=cmake_lib and --template=cmake_exe. (conan-io/conan#9516). Docs: 📃
Feature: Introduced a new cpp_info property cmake_target_namespace to declare the target namespace for the CMakeDeps generator. This feature allows declaring a global target with a different namespace like Foo::Bar. (conan-io/conan#9513). Docs: 📃
Feature: Detect Visual Studio 2022 as msvc. (conan-io/conan#9504)
Feature: Add Clang 13 support. (conan-io/conan#9502). Docs: 📃
Feature: Testing support for Windows CMake + Clang (independent LLVM, not VS) + Ninja/MinGW builds, and CMake + Clang (Visual Studio 16 internal LLVM 11 via ClangCL toolset). (conan-io/conan#9477)
Feature: Provide new [conf] core:default_build_profile to enable the usage of the build profile as default, and to allow definition of the host profile default in new [conf] core:default_profile. (conan-io/conan#9468). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMakeToolchain new member find_builddirs defaulted to True to add the cpp_info.builddirs from the requirements to the CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH/CMAKE_MODULE_PATH. That would allow finding the config files packaged and to be able to include() them from the consumer CMakeLists.txt. (conan-io/conan#9455). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMakeDeps. Added a new property cmake_find_mode with possible values to config(default), module, both or none to control the files to be generated from a package itself. The none replaces the current skip_deps_file property. (conan-io/conan#9455). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMakeDeps: Added two new properties cmake_module_file_name and cmake_module_target_name, analog to cmake_file_name and cmake_target_name, but to configure the name of FindXXX.cmake file and the target declared inside. (conan-io/conan#9455). Docs: 📃
Feature: Remove conan-center (https://conan.bintray.com) default remote. (conan-io/conan#9401). Docs: 📃
Feature: Implement round trip new profile [buildenv] section, necessary for lockfiles, and specially stdout printing. (conan-io/conan#9320)
Feature: Allow -o &:option=value wildcard for consumer, too, same it was done for settings in 1.39 (conan-io/conan#9316). Docs: 📃
Fix: Adding management of private dependencies, via new visible trait compatible with 2.0 for new CMakeDeps and MSBuildDeps. (conan-io/conan#9517)
Fix: Remove unused deprecation pip dependency (conan-io/conan#9478)
Fix: Upgrade distro dependency to allow 1.6.0 (conan-io/conan#9462)
Fix: Make conan remove accept package reference syntax. (conan-io/conan#9459). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fixed old CMake build helper to cross-build to iOS when two profiles are specified. (conan-io/conan#9437)
Fix: Fix conan export typo in help message. (conan-io/conan#9408). Docs: 📃
Fix:  Relax python six dependency to allow 1.16 (conan-io/conan#9407)
Fix: Bump urllib3 version to 1.26.6 (conan-io/conan#9405)
Fix: The new Autotools build helper accepts a build_script_folder  argument in the configure() method to specify are subfolder where the configure script is. (conan-io/conan#9393). Docs: 📃
Fix: Use frameworks in Premake generator. (conan-io/conan#9371). Docs: 📃
Fix: The tool conan.tools.files.apply_conandata_patches will use the root source folder to find the patch file and the tool conan.tools.files.patch will take the current source folder declared in the layout() method to know where is the source to apply the patches. (conan-io/conan#9361). Docs: 📃
Fix: Avoid checking other remotes when -r=remote is defined and revisions are activated and binary is not found in the defined remote. (conan-io/conan#9355)
Bugfix: Setting the CMAKE_OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET variable as a cache entry. (conan-io/conan#9498)
BugFix: Use topological ordering to define VirtualBuildEnv composition and precedence of appending variables. (conan-io/conan#9491)
Bugfix: Bazel build files have an extra ] if there are no dependencies. (conan-io/conan#9480)
Bugfix: Add AlmaLinux to with_yum. (conan-io/conan#9463)
Bugfix: CMakeToolchain. Fixed a bugfix whereby a variable declared at the .variables containing a boolean ended at CMake with a quoted "True" or "False" values, instead of ON / OFF (conan-io/conan#9455). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fixed bug whereby Conan failed when using compiler=gcc with compiler.version=5 (without specifying a minor version) and compiler.cppstd=17. (conan-io/conan#9431)
Bugfix: No verbose traceback was been printed for conanfile.layout() method. (conan-io/conan#9384)
Bugfix: Fix Bazel cc_library: deps and linkopts. (conan-io/conan#9381)
Bugfix: Fixed bug whereby using new layout() method together with cppinfo.components in the package_info method caused an exception. (conan-io/conan#9360)
Bugfix: Fix PkgConfigDeps that was failing in the case of components with requirements. (conan-io/conan#9341)

1.39.0 (27-Jul-2021)

Feature: Use CMAKE_OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET to get -version-min set in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#9301)
Feature: Display python_requires information in the conan info output. (conan-io/conan#9290)
Feature: Now it is possible to define settings for a downstream consumer using -s &:setting=value or the same syntax in the profile even if the consumer is a conanfile.txt or a conanfile.py not declaring a name. e.g: Building a Debug application with Release dependencies: -s build_type=Release -s &:build_type=Debug (conan-io/conan#9267). Docs: 📃
Feature: The AutotoolsDeps allows to alter the generated environment corresponding to the information read from the dependencies before calling the generate() method. (conan-io/conan#9256). Docs: 📃
Feature: new remove and items methods for the Environment objects. (conan-io/conan#9256). Docs: 📃



... (truncated)


Commits

9a1f43b release 1.40.1
3dbc4ea Change default cmake_layout() source folder (#9596)
5f2a6c8 not caching and overwriting CMAKE_XXX_INIT vars in CMakeToolchain (#9576)
8494959 Use base_path as a relative folder from conanfile.source_folder (#9593)
10dc536 aggregate conf from build_requires earlier for declarative generators (#9573)
da49f32 qmake:  fix sharedlinkFlags and exelinkflags (#9568)
ca969ba upgrade requests>=2.25 (#9562)
f3eb73d adding new confs (#9526)
ef947e7 release 1.40
320644e remove unwanted var (#9525)
Additional commits viewable in compare view




Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting @dependabot rebase.


Dependabot commands and options

You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR:

@dependabot rebase will rebase this PR
@dependabot recreate will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it

Bugfix: Aggregate [conf] from build_requires earlier so it is available for generators declared as generators. attribute. Close conan-io/conan#9571 (conan-io/conan#9573)
Bugfix: The qmake generator now assigns QMAKE_LFLAGS_SHLIB and QMAKE_LFLAGS_APP variables instead of the incorrect QMAKE_LFLAGS following the official docs. (conan-io/conan#9568). Docs: 📃

1.40.0 (06-Sep-2021)

Feature: Update conan new modern templates --template=cmake_lib and --template=cmake_exe. (conan-io/conan#9516). Docs: 📃
Feature: Introduced a new cpp_info property cmake_target_namespace to declare the target namespace for the CMakeDeps generator. This feature allows declaring a global target with a different namespace like Foo::Bar. (conan-io/conan#9513). Docs: 📃
Feature: Detect Visual Studio 2022 as msvc. (conan-io/conan#9504)
Feature: Add Clang 13 support. (conan-io/conan#9502). Docs: 📃
Feature: Testing support for Windows CMake + Clang (independent LLVM, not VS) + Ninja/MinGW builds, and CMake + Clang (Visual Studio 16 internal LLVM 11 via ClangCL toolset). (conan-io/conan#9477)
Feature: Provide new [conf] core:default_build_profile to enable the usage of the build profile as default, and to allow definition of the host profile default in new [conf] core:default_profile. (conan-io/conan#9468). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMakeToolchain new member find_builddirs defaulted to True to add the cpp_info.builddirs from the requirements to the CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH/CMAKE_MODULE_PATH. That would allow finding the config files packaged and to be able to include() them from the consumer CMakeLists.txt. (conan-io/conan#9455). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMakeDeps. Added a new property cmake_find_mode with possible values to config(default), module, both or none to control the files to be generated from a package itself. The none replaces the current skip_deps_file property. (conan-io/conan#9455). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMakeDeps: Added two new properties cmake_module_file_name and cmake_module_target_name, analog to cmake_file_name and cmake_target_name, but to configure the name of FindXXX.cmake file and the target declared inside. (conan-io/conan#9455). Docs: 📃
Feature: Remove conan-center (https://conan.bintray.com) default remote. (conan-io/conan#9401). Docs: 📃
Feature: Implement round trip new profile [buildenv] section, necessary for lockfiles, and specially stdout printing. (conan-io/conan#9320)
Feature: Allow -o &:option=value wildcard for consumer, too, same it was done for settings in 1.39 (conan-io/conan#9316). Docs: 📃
Fix: Adding management of private dependencies, via new visible trait compatible with 2.0 for new CMakeDeps and MSBuildDeps. (conan-io/conan#9517)
Fix: Remove unused deprecation pip dependency (conan-io/conan#9478)
Fix: Upgrade distro dependency to allow 1.6.0 (conan-io/conan#9462)
Fix: Make conan remove accept package reference syntax. (conan-io/conan#9459). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fixed old CMake build helper to cross-build to iOS when two profiles are specified. (conan-io/conan#9437)
Fix: Fix conan export typo in help message. (conan-io/conan#9408). Docs: 📃
Fix:  Relax python six dependency to allow 1.16 (conan-io/conan#9407)
Fix: Bump urllib3 version to 1.26.6 (conan-io/conan#9405)
Fix: The new Autotools build helper accepts a build_script_folder  argument in the configure() method to specify are subfolder where the configure script is. (conan-io/conan#9393). Docs: 📃
Fix: Use frameworks in Premake generator. (conan-io/conan#9371). Docs: 📃
Fix: The tool conan.tools.files.apply_conandata_patches will use the root source folder to find the patch file and the tool conan.tools.files.patch will take the current source folder declared in the layout() method to know where is the source to apply the patches. (conan-io/conan#9361). Docs: 📃
Fix: Avoid checking other remotes when -r=remote is defined and revisions are activated and binary is not found in the defined remote. (conan-io/conan#9355)
Bugfix: Setting the CMAKE_OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET variable as a cache entry. (conan-io/conan#9498)
BugFix: Use topological ordering to define VirtualBuildEnv composition and precedence of appending variables. (conan-io/conan#9491)
Bugfix: Bazel build files have an extra ] if there are no dependencies. (conan-io/conan#9480)
Bugfix: Add AlmaLinux to with_yum. (conan-io/conan#9463)
Bugfix: CMakeToolchain. Fixed a bugfix whereby a variable declared at the .variables containing a boolean ended at CMake with a quoted "True" or "False" values, instead of ON / OFF (conan-io/conan#9455). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fixed bug whereby Conan failed when using compiler=gcc with compiler.version=5 (without specifying a minor version) and compiler.cppstd=17. (conan-io/conan#9431)
Bugfix: No verbose traceback was been printed for conanfile.layout() method. (conan-io/conan#9384)
Bugfix: Fix Bazel cc_library: deps and linkopts. (conan-io/conan#9381)
Bugfix: Fixed bug whereby using new layout() method together with cppinfo.components in the package_info method caused an exception. (conan-io/conan#9360)
Bugfix: Fix PkgConfigDeps that was failing in the case of components with requirements. (conan-io/conan#9341)

1.39.0 (27-Jul-2021)

Feature: Use CMAKE_OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET to get -version-min set in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#9301)
Feature: Display python_requires information in the conan info output. (conan-io/conan#9290)
Feature: Now it is possible to define settings for a downstream consumer using -s &:setting=value or the same syntax in the profile even if the consumer is a conanfile.txt or a conanfile.py not declaring a name. e.g: Building a Debug application with Release dependencies: -s build_type=Release -s &:build_type=Debug (conan-io/conan#9267). Docs: 📃
Feature: The AutotoolsDeps allows to alter the generated environment corresponding to the information read from the dependencies before calling the generate() method. (conan-io/conan#9256). Docs: 📃
Feature: new remove and items methods for the Environment objects. (conan-io/conan#9256). Docs: 📃



... (truncated)


Commits

9a1f43b release 1.40.1
3dbc4ea Change default cmake_layout() source folder (#9596)
5f2a6c8 not caching and overwriting CMAKE_XXX_INIT vars in CMakeToolchain (#9576)
8494959 Use base_path as a relative folder from conanfile.source_folder (#9593)
10dc536 aggregate conf from build_requires earlier for declarative generators (#9573)
da49f32 qmake:  fix sharedlinkFlags and exelinkflags (#9568)
ca969ba upgrade requests>=2.25 (#9562)
f3eb73d adding new confs (#9526)
ef947e7 release 1.40
320644e remove unwanted var (#9525)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

column20:
Bumps black from 19.10b0 to 21.9b0.

Release notes
Sourced from black's releases.

21.9b0
Packaging

Fix missing modules in self-contained binaries (#2466)
Fix missing toml extra used during installation (#2475)

21.8b0
Black

Add support for formatting Jupyter Notebook files (#2357)
Move from appdirs dependency to platformdirs (#2375)
Present a more user-friendly error if .gitignore is invalid (#2414)
The failsafe for accidentally added backslashes in f-string expressions has been hardened to handle more edge cases during quote normalization (#2437)
Avoid changing a function return type annotation's type to a tuple by adding a trailing comma (#2384)
Parsing support has been added for unparenthesized walruses in set literals, set comprehensions, and indices (#2447).
Pin setuptools-scm build-time dependency version (#2457)
Exclude typing-extensions version 3.10.0.1 due to it being broken on Python 3.10 (#2460)

Blackd

Replace sys.exit(-1) with raise ImportError as it plays more nicely with tools that scan installed packages (#2440)

Integrations

The provided pre-commit hooks no longer specify language_version to avoid overriding default_language_version (#2430)

21.7b0
Black

Configuration files using TOML features higher than spec v0.5.0 are now supported
(#2301)
Add primer support and test for code piped into black via STDIN (#2315)
Fix internal error when FORCE_OPTIONAL_PARENTHESES feature is enabled (#2332)
Accept empty stdin (#2346)
Provide a more useful error when parsing fails during AST safety checks (#2304)

Docker

Add new latest_release tag automation to follow latest black release on docker
images (#2374)

Integrations

The vim plugin now searches upwards from the directory containing the current buffer
instead of the current working directory for pyproject.toml. (#1871)
The vim plugin now reads the correct string normalization option in pyproject.toml
(#1869)
The vim plugin no longer crashes Black when there's boolean values in pyproject.toml
(#1869)



... (truncated)

column21:
OK, I won't notify you again about this release, but will get in touch when a new version is available. If you'd rather skip all updates until the next major or minor version, let me know by commenting @dependabot ignore this major version or @dependabot ignore this minor version. You can also ignore all major, minor, or patch releases for a dependency by adding an ignore condition with the desired update_types to your config file.
If you change your mind, just re-open this PR and I'll resolve any conflicts on it.

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.40.2.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.40.2 (21-Sep-2021)

Bugfix: Add support for Xcode 13/Apple clang 13.0 (conan-io/conan#9643)

1.40.1 (14-Sep-2021)

Feature: Change default cmake_layout() source folder from 'src' to '.' (conan-io/conan#9596). Docs: 📃
Feature: Recovered base_path argument for conan.tools.files.patch and conan.tools.files.apply_conandata_patches to be able to specify a relative folder from the conanfile.source_folder directory (that follows the layout() method). (conan-io/conan#9593). Docs: 📃
Fix: Allow user definition of CMAKE_XXX_INIT variables in user toolchains when using CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#9576)
Fix: Upgrade minimum requests>=2.25 in requirements.txt to make it compatible with latest upgrade of urllib3 to 1.26.6 (conan-io/conan#9562)
Bugfix: Aggregate [conf] from build_requires earlier so it is available for generators declared as generators. attribute. Close conan-io/conan#9571 (conan-io/conan#9573)
Bugfix: The qmake generator now assigns QMAKE_LFLAGS_SHLIB and QMAKE_LFLAGS_APP variables instead of the incorrect QMAKE_LFLAGS following the official docs. (conan-io/conan#9568). Docs: 📃

That would allow finding the config files packaged and to be able to include() them from the consumer CMakeLists.txt. (conan-io/conan#9455). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMakeDeps. Added a new property cmake_find_mode with possible values to config(default), module, both or none to control the files to be generated from a package itself. The none replaces the current skip_deps_file property. (conan-io/conan#9455). Docs: 📃

Feature: Implement round trip new profile [buildenv] section, necessary for lockfiles, and specially stdout printing. (conan-io/conan#9320)
Feature: Allow -o &:option=value wildcard for consumer, too, same it was done for settings in 1.39 (conan-io/conan#9316). Docs: 📃
Fix: Adding management of private dependencies, via new visible trait compatible with 2.0 for new CMakeDeps and MSBuildDeps. (conan-io/conan#9517)
Fix: Remove unused deprecation pip dependency (conan-io/conan#9478)
Fix: Upgrade distro dependency to allow 1.6.0 (conan-io/conan#9462)
Fix: Make conan remove accept package reference syntax. (conan-io/conan#9459). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fixed old CMake build helper to cross-build to iOS when two profiles are specified. (conan-io/conan#9437)
Fix: Fix conan export typo in help message. (conan-io/conan#9408). Docs: 📃
Fix:  Relax python six dependency to allow 1.16 (conan-io/conan#9407)
Fix: Bump urllib3 version to 1.26.6 (conan-io/conan#9405)
Fix: The new Autotools build helper accepts a build_script_folder  argument in the configure() method to specify are subfolder where the configure script is. (conan-io/conan#9393). Docs: 📃
Fix: Use frameworks in Premake generator. (conan-io/conan#9371). Docs: 📃
Fix: The tool conan.tools.files.apply_conandata_patches will use the root source folder to find the patch file and the tool conan.tools.files.patch will take the current source folder declared in the layout() method to know where is the source to apply the patches. (conan-io/conan#9361). Docs: 📃
Fix: Avoid checking other remotes when -r=remote is defined and revisions are activated and binary is not found in the defined remote. (conan-io/conan#9355)
Bugfix: Setting the CMAKE_OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET variable as a cache entry. (conan-io/conan#9498)
BugFix: Use topological ordering to define VirtualBuildEnv composition and precedence of appending variables. (conan-io/conan#9491)
Bugfix: Bazel build files have an extra ] if there are no dependencies. (conan-io/conan#9480)
Bugfix: Add AlmaLinux to with_yum. (conan-io/conan#9463)
Bugfix: CMakeToolchain. Fixed a bugfix whereby a variable declared at the .variables containing a boolean ended at CMake with a quoted "True" or "False" values, instead of ON / OFF (conan-io/conan#9455). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fixed bug whereby Conan failed when using compiler=gcc with compiler.version=5 (without specifying a minor version) and compiler.cppstd=17. (conan-io/conan#9431)
Bugfix: No verbose traceback was been printed for conanfile.layout() method. (conan-io/conan#9384)
Bugfix: Fix Bazel cc_library: deps and linkopts. (conan-io/conan#9381)
Bugfix: Fixed bug whereby using new layout() method together with cppinfo.components in the package_info method caused an exception. (conan-io/conan#9360)
Bugfix: Fix PkgConfigDeps that was failing in the case of components with requirements. (conan-io/conan#9341)

1.39.0 (27-Jul-2021)

Feature: Use CMAKE_OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET to get -version-min set in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#9301)
Feature: Display python_requires information in the conan info output. (conan-io/conan#9290)



... (truncated)

column21:
Bumps conan from 1.27.0 to 1.40.2.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.40.2 (21-Sep-2021)

Bugfix: Add support for Xcode 13/Apple clang 13.0 (conan-io/conan#9643)

1.40.1 (14-Sep-2021)

Feature: Change default cmake_layout() source folder from 'src' to '.' (conan-io/conan#9596). Docs: 📃
Feature: Recovered base_path argument for conan.tools.files.patch and conan.tools.files.apply_conandata_patches to be able to specify a relative folder from the conanfile.source_folder directory (that follows the layout() method). (conan-io/conan#9593). Docs: 📃
Fix: Allow user definition of CMAKE_XXX_INIT variables in user toolchains when using CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#9576)
Fix: Upgrade minimum requests>=2.25 in requirements.txt to make it compatible with latest upgrade of urllib3 to 1.26.6 (conan-io/conan#9562)
Bugfix: Aggregate [conf] from build_requires earlier so it is available for generators declared as generators. attribute. Close conan-io/conan#9571 (conan-io/conan#9573)
Bugfix: The qmake generator now assigns QMAKE_LFLAGS_SHLIB and QMAKE_LFLAGS_APP variables instead of the incorrect QMAKE_LFLAGS following the official docs. (conan-io/conan#9568). Docs: 📃

1.40.0 (06-Sep-2021)

Feature: Update conan new modern templates --template=cmake_lib and --template=cmake_exe. (conan-io/conan#9516). Docs: 📃
Feature: Introduced a new cpp_info property cmake_target_namespace to declare the target namespace for the CMakeDeps generator. This feature allows declaring a global target with a different namespace like Foo::Bar. (conan-io/conan#9513). Docs: 📃
Feature: Detect Visual Studio 2022 as msvc. (conan-io/conan#9504)
Feature: Add Clang 13 support. (conan-io/conan#9502). Docs: 📃
Feature: Testing support for Windows CMake + Clang (independent LLVM, not VS) + Ninja/MinGW builds, and CMake + Clang (Visual Studio 16 internal LLVM 11 via ClangCL toolset). (conan-io/conan#9477)
Feature: Provide new [conf] core:default_build_profile to enable the usage of the build profile as default, and to allow definition of the host profile default in new [conf] core:default_profile. (conan-io/conan#9468). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMakeToolchain new member find_builddirs defaulted to True to add the cpp_info.builddirs from the requirements to the CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH/CMAKE_MODULE_PATH. That would allow finding the config files packaged and to be able to include() them from the consumer CMakeLists.txt. (conan-io/conan#9455). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMakeDeps. Added a new property cmake_find_mode with possible values to config(default), module, both or none to control the files to be generated from a package itself. The none replaces the current skip_deps_file property. (conan-io/conan#9455). Docs: 📃
Feature: CMakeDeps: Added two new properties cmake_module_file_name and cmake_module_target_name, analog to cmake_file_name and cmake_target_name, but to configure the name of FindXXX.cmake file and the target declared inside. (conan-io/conan#9455). Docs: 📃
Feature: Remove conan-center (https://conan.bintray.com) default remote. (conan-io/conan#9401). Docs: 📃
Feature: Implement round trip new profile [buildenv] section, necessary for lockfiles, and specially stdout printing. (conan-io/conan#9320)
Feature: Allow -o &:option=value wildcard for consumer, too, same it was done for settings in 1.39 (conan-io/conan#9316). Docs: 📃
Fix: Adding management of private dependencies, via new visible trait compatible with 2.0 for new CMakeDeps and MSBuildDeps. (conan-io/conan#9517)
Fix: Remove unused deprecation pip dependency (conan-io/conan#9478)
Fix: Upgrade distro dependency to allow 1.6.0 (conan-io/conan#9462)
Fix: Make conan remove accept package reference syntax. (conan-io/conan#9459). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fixed old CMake build helper to cross-build to iOS when two profiles are specified. (conan-io/conan#9437)
Fix: Fix conan export typo in help message. (conan-io/conan#9408). Docs: 📃
Fix:  Relax python six dependency to allow 1.16 (conan-io/conan#9407)
Fix: Bump urllib3 version to 1.26.6 (conan-io/conan#9405)
Fix: The new Autotools build helper accepts a build_script_folder  argument in the configure() method to specify are subfolder where the configure script is. (conan-io/conan#9393). Docs: 📃
Fix: Use frameworks in Premake generator. (conan-io/conan#9371). Docs: 📃
Fix: The tool conan.tools.files.apply_conandata_patches will use the root source folder to find the patch file and the tool conan.tools.files.patch will take the current source folder declared in the layout() method to know where is the source to apply the patches. (conan-io/conan#9361). Docs: 📃
Fix: Avoid checking other remotes when -r=remote is defined and revisions are activated and binary is not found in the defined remote. (conan-io/conan#9355)
Bugfix: Setting the CMAKE_OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET variable as a cache entry. (conan-io/conan#9498)
BugFix: Use topological ordering to define VirtualBuildEnv composition and precedence of appending variables. (conan-io/conan#9491)
Bugfix: Bazel build files have an extra ] if there are no dependencies. (conan-io/conan#9480)
Bugfix: Add AlmaLinux to with_yum. (conan-io/conan#9463)
Bugfix: CMakeToolchain. Fixed a bugfix whereby a variable declared at the .variables containing a boolean ended at CMake with a quoted "True" or "False" values, instead of ON / OFF (conan-io/conan#9455). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Fixed bug whereby Conan failed when using compiler=gcc with compiler.version=5 (without specifying a minor version) and compiler.cppstd=17. (conan-io/conan#9431)
Bugfix: No verbose traceback was been printed for conanfile.layout() method. (conan-io/conan#9384)
Bugfix: Fix Bazel cc_library: deps and linkopts. (conan-io/conan#9381)
Bugfix: Fixed bug whereby using new layout() method together with cppinfo.components in the package_info method caused an exception. (conan-io/conan#9360)
Bugfix: Fix PkgConfigDeps that was failing in the case of components with requirements. (conan-io/conan#9341)

1.39.0 (27-Jul-2021)

Feature: Use CMAKE_OSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET to get -version-min set in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#9301)
Feature: Display python_requires information in the conan info output. (conan-io/conan#9290)



... (truncated)


Commits

946362f Merge pull request #9643 from czoido/add_support-for-xcode-13
2c2ec85 Add support for Xcode 13
4172839 conan 1.40.2
9a1f43b release 1.40.1
3dbc4ea Change default cmake_layout() source folder (#9596)
5f2a6c8 not caching and overwriting CMAKE_XXX_INIT vars in CMakeToolchain (#9576)
8494959 Use base_path as a relative folder from conanfile.source_folder (#9593)
10dc536 aggregate conf from build_requires earlier for declarative generators (#9573)
da49f32 qmake:  fix sharedlinkFlags and exelinkflags (#9568)
ca969ba upgrade requests>=2.25 (#9562)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

column21: Looks like conan is up-to-date now, so this is no longer needed.

OK, I won't notify you again about this release, but will get in touch when a new version is available. If you'd rather skip all updates until the next major or minor version, let me know by commenting @dependabot ignore this major version or @dependabot ignore this minor version. You can also ignore all major, minor, or patch releases for a dependency by adding an ignore condition with the desired update_types to your config file.
If you change your mind, just re-open this PR and I'll resolve any conflicts on it.
Superseded by #224.

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.40.3 to 1.41.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.41.0 (06-Oct-2021)

Feature: Added IntelCC as public generator. (conan-io/conan#9747). Docs: 📃
feature: Prepare conan.tools.files download, get, ftp_download for adoption. (conan-io/conan#9715). Docs: 📃
Feature: Support multiple toolchains in one recipe. (conan-io/conan#9688). Docs: 📃
Feature: MSBuildDeps generator learned how to handle build_requires to use executables from them. (conan-io/conan#9686). Docs: 📃
Feature: PkgConfig helper now honors PKG_CONFIG environment variable. (conan-io/conan#9627)
Feature: Make new environment generators multi-config (Release/Debug and arch). (conan-io/conan#9543). Docs: 📃
Feature: Environment activate scripts will generate deactivate scripts by default. (conan-io/conan#9539)
Feature: Support remote archives other than zip in conan config install. (conan-io/conan#9530)
Feature: New "compiler" intel-cc with different modes (icx, dpcpp, classic) for Intel oneAPI. (conan-io/conan#9522). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add Intel oneAPI support for CMakeToolChain, MSBuildToolchain and VCVars. (conan-io/conan#9522). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add objects attribute to the cpp_info so that we can add object files to the linker without having to add those mixed with linker flags. (conan-io/conan#9520). Docs: 📃
Feature: New setttings: xtensalx6 and xtensalx106 for ESP32/ESP8266 platforms. (conan-io/conan#7977)
Fix: New environment deactivate scripts fail in Windows because env-var different casing. (conan-io/conan#9741)
Fix: Avoid "overcrowding" Windows environment variables with LD_LIBRARY_PATH and DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH, not used in Windows. (conan-io/conan#9678)
Fix: Command conan package now works for new layout() with generators folder. (conan-io/conan#9674)
Fix:  Don't just print  "ERROR: True" on unresolvable conflict. (conan-io/conan#9624)
Fix: Fix migrations settings comparison. (conan-io/conan#9615)
Fix: Removed unused future dependency from Python requirements.txt. (conan-io/conan#9563)
Fix: Make automatic call of VirtualBuildEnv and VirtualRunEnv independent. (conan-io/conan#9543). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: generator_folder was using the cwd instead of a relative folder to the conanfile, producing layout errors. (conan-io/conan#9668)
Bugfix: Support components with symbolic imports. (conan-io/conan#9667)
Bugfix: Fix conan.tools.files.patch bug with strip argument. (conan-io/conan#9653)
Bugfix: Add support for Xcode 13/Apple clang 13.0 (conan-io/conan#9642)
Bugfix: Fixed bad Requires declaration in *.pc files. (conan-io/conan#9635)
Bugfix: Fixed bug whereby when a conflict of requirements happens, in some special situations, just a message ERROR: True was printed in the terminal, making it hard to guess what was going on. (conan-io/conan#9633)
BugFix: Fixed a bug where using the new layout() the exports went to the conanfile.source_folder instead of the base source folder in the cache and only the exports_sources should go there. (conan-io/conan#9536)

1.40.4 (05-Oct-2021)

Fix: Check current cacert.pem file when updating Conan and only migrate if the user has not modified the file. If  the local file is modified then create a new cacert file but don't overwrite current. (conan-io/conan#9734)
Fix: Update Conan debian package to fix ssl certificates problem. (conan-io/conan#9723)




Commits

e2e9ff1 Added IntelCC as public generator (#9747)
8e7e40c fix deactivation in .bat scripts (#9741)
a7ce59d branched 1.41
e4ae8c2 Merge branch 'release/1.40' into develop
0f66845 Check old cacert.pem before deleting when updating Conan (#9734)
2c86176 VirtualRunEnv: avoid generating linux/mac env variables on Windows (#9678)
9dd8a7b Adding cpp_info objects model for linking object files (#9520)
edc5462 fix generators_folder relative path to conanfile (#9668)
a0b2ab7 new tools.downloads integration and testing (#9715)
fff8474 conan 1.40.4 (#9723)

feature: Prepare conan.tools.files download, get, ftp_download for adoption. (conan-io/conan#9715). Docs: 📃
Feature: Support multiple toolchains in one recipe. (conan-io/conan#9688). Docs: 📃
Feature: MSBuildDeps generator learned how to handle build_requires to use executables from them. (conan-io/conan#9686). Docs: 📃
Feature: PkgConfig helper now honors PKG_CONFIG environment variable. (conan-io/conan#9627)
Feature: Make new environment generators multi-config (Release/Debug and arch). (conan-io/conan#9543). Docs: 📃
Feature: Environment activate scripts will generate deactivate scripts by default. (conan-io/conan#9539)
Feature: Support remote archives other than zip in conan config install. (conan-io/conan#9530)
Feature: New "compiler" intel-cc with different modes (icx, dpcpp, classic) for Intel oneAPI. (conan-io/conan#9522). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add Intel oneAPI support for CMakeToolChain, MSBuildToolchain and VCVars. (conan-io/conan#9522). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add objects attribute to the cpp_info so that we can add object files to the linker without having to add those mixed with linker flags. (conan-io/conan#9520). Docs: 📃
Feature: New setttings: xtensalx6 and xtensalx106 for ESP32/ESP8266 platforms. (conan-io/conan#7977)
Fix: New environment deactivate scripts fail in Windows because env-var different casing. (conan-io/conan#9741)
Fix: Avoid "overcrowding" Windows environment variables with LD_LIBRARY_PATH and DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH, not used in Windows. (conan-io/conan#9678)
Fix: Command conan package now works for new layout() with generators folder. (conan-io/conan#9674)
Fix:  Don't just print  "ERROR: True" on unresolvable conflict. (conan-io/conan#9624)
Fix: Fix migrations settings comparison. (conan-io/conan#9615)
Fix: Removed unused future dependency from Python requirements.txt. (conan-io/conan#9563)
Fix: Make automatic call of VirtualBuildEnv and VirtualRunEnv independent. (conan-io/conan#9543). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: generator_folder was using the cwd instead of a relative folder to the conanfile, producing layout errors. (conan-io/conan#9668)
Bugfix: Support components with symbolic imports. (conan-io/conan#9667)
Bugfix: Fix conan.tools.files.patch bug with strip argument. (conan-io/conan#9653)
Bugfix: Add support for Xcode 13/Apple clang 13.0 (conan-io/conan#9642)
Bugfix: Fixed bad Requires declaration in *.pc files. (conan-io/conan#9635)
Bugfix: Fixed bug whereby when a conflict of requirements happens, in some special situations, just a message ERROR: True was printed in the terminal, making it hard to guess what was going on. (conan-io/conan#9633)
BugFix: Fixed a bug where using the new layout() the exports went to the conanfile.source_folder instead of the base source folder in the cache and only the exports_sources should go there. (conan-io/conan#9536)

1.40.4 (05-Oct-2021)

Fix: Check current cacert.pem file when updating Conan and only migrate if the user has not modified the file. If  the local file is modified then create a new cacert file but don't overwrite current. (conan-io/conan#9734)
Fix: Update Conan debian package to fix ssl certificates problem. (conan-io/conan#9723)




Commits

e2e9ff1 Added IntelCC as public generator (#9747)
8e7e40c fix deactivation in .bat scripts (#9741)
a7ce59d branched 1.41
e4ae8c2 Merge branch 'release/1.40' into develop
0f66845 Check old cacert.pem before deleting when updating Conan (#9734)
2c86176 VirtualRunEnv: avoid generating linux/mac env variables on Windows (#9678)
9dd8a7b Adding cpp_info objects model for linking object files (#9520)
edc5462 fix generators_folder relative path to conanfile (#9668)
a0b2ab7 new tools.downloads integration and testing (#9715)
fff8474 conan 1.40.4 (#9723)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

column13: Update prost-build requirement from 0.8.0 to 0.9.0 in /src/util
column20:
Updates the requirements on prost-build to permit the latest version.

Release notes
Sourced from prost-build's releases.

v0.9.0
PROST! is a Protocol Buffers implementation for the Rust Language. prost generates simple, idiomatic Rust code from proto2 and proto3 files.
Release 0.9.0 brings in many helpful changes and fixes, here are a few highlights:

Apple silicon support
Improve encode/decode varint performance
Support no package declaration
Support single include files
Fix multiple attribute support




Commits

7c0916d release 0.9.0
75e87f3 Fix derive macro build error when using map and bytes together (#546)
1825b38 Fix path in include_file function when outdir used (#544)
db9cd5c Fix doc comment for field_attribute (#539)
d7324c4 Escape comments (#510)
87cea1d Protect encoding::decode_varint from overflow (#527)
4c12921 Updated petgraph to 0.6. (#536)
3f2e465 Add option to prost-build to skip the run of protoc (#442)
859f243 explicitly use core::default::Default to avoid collisions (#534)
d45a37c Fix multiple attributes support (#522)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.41.0 to 1.42.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.42.0 (29-Oct-2021)

Feature: Remove sdk condition in .xcconfig files generated by XcodeDeps. (conan-io/conan#9887)
Feature: Add new Macos version 12.0 (Monterey). (conan-io/conan#9886)
Feature: Add CMAKE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE in CMakeToolchain if it's set in the conanfile independently from the value of the shared option. (conan-io/conan#9868)
Feature: Generate aggregated deactivation file for aggregated environments. (conan-io/conan#9862). Docs: 📃
Feature: adding preprocessor definitions to MSBuildTolchain ResourceCompile. (conan-io/conan#9843)
Feature: Support cmake_module_target_name and cmake_module_file_name properties in cmake_find_package generator. (conan-io/conan#9832). Docs: 📃
Feature: Define new conf["tools.microsoft.msbuild:install_path"] for the MSBuild toolchain and remove generation of intel_vars files by VCVars. (conan-io/conan#9827). Docs: 📃
Feature: New Conan XcodeDeps multi-config generator for Xcode. (conan-io/conan#9807). Docs: 📃
Feature: Refactor conan.tools.gnu.pkgconfigdeps module. (conan-io/conan#9806)
Feature: Decoupled Environment as an abstract environment representation (do not depend on conanfile), and EnvVars, as the specialization for a given conanfile, settings/settings_build, and win_bash. (conan-io/conan#9755). Docs: 📃
Feature: Enabled patch_string when using apply_conandata_patches. (conan-io/conan#9740). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add property "cmake_target_aliases" to create some CMake alias targets using CMakeDeps. (conan-io/conan#8533)
Fix: Do not fall back for the property "filename" to target properties, only to legacy "names" definition. (conan-io/conan#9894)
Fix: Fix build settings conditional logic to work correctly with Xcode IDE. (conan-io/conan#9892)
Fix: Show a more specific error message on 'conan search' when a package version is not valid (conan-io/conan#9891)
Fix: Removed the new layout folders.package property as it was not clear the value/usage. (conan-io/conan#9884). Docs: 📃
Fix: The "conan package" method now raises an exception when declaring the layout() method. This is part of the migration to Conan 2.0 where the local method "conan package" is removed. (conan-io/conan#9884). Docs: 📃
Fix: Moved experimental LayoutPackager to a conan.tools.files.AutoPackager with a new interface. Removed also the conanfile.patterns attribute that now is configured directly in the AutoPackager. (conan-io/conan#9882). Docs: 📃
Fix: When the layout() method is declared inside the conanfile.py of a test-package, Conan won't generate temporary folders at build/HASH anymore. The build folder will follow the structure declared at the layout() method. (conan-io/conan#9882). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix frameworks aggregation in XcodeDeps. (conan-io/conan#9881)
Fix: Remove python requests version from User-Agent header, it can be problematic sometimes and adds no value. (conan-io/conan#9861)
Fix: Change MesonToolchain to define preprocessor_definitions as [constant], because Meson 0.60 now raises errors on it defined in [built-in options]. (conan-io/conan#9858)
Fix: Rename ConanFileInterface.new_cpp_info to ConanFileInterface.cpp_info (being it a NewCppInfo object). The ConanFileInterface object is only used when accessing self.dependencies in a conanfile, so we can make sure that the new develop generators use the final cpp_info name. (conan-io/conan#9800). Docs: 📃
Fix: Renamed group argument in Environment classes to scope, that can get "build" and "run" values. (conan-io/conan#9755). Docs: 📃
Fix: New win_bash behavior failed for dual profile, the new computation of subsystem paths completely depend now on defined settings, but not on platform.system() or auto-detection. (conan-io/conan#9755). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Avoid lockfile raising because of incorrect options when using compatible_packages. Close conan-io/conan#9591 (conan-io/conan#9890)
Bugfix: Avoid VCVars defining -vcvars argument for VS<=2015. Close conan-io/conan#9888 (conan-io/conan#9889)
Bugfix: Respect the previous value of sys.dont_write_bytecode. (conan-io/conan#9865)
Bugfix: conan export-pkg now raises an error (ConanInvalidConfiguration exception) if the validate() method raise that error and results in an invalid package_id. (conan-io/conan#9818)
Bugfix: Respect the build_policy="never" even for --build=missing cli argument. (conan-io/conan#9817)
Bugfix: Avoid crash in CMakeToolchain for custom generator when compiler is not defined. (conan-io/conan#9801)
Bugfix: Do not force new authentication when a token is expired, it might not be needed. (conan-io/conan#9781)
Bugfix: The CMakeToolchain generator always sets fPIC enabled due to a typo where the actual parameter is not templated but instead hard-coded as ON. (conan-io/conan#9752)
Bugfix: The path to a patch file in a conandata.yml is also relative to the base source folder when the patches are not associated with a version (list of patches). (conan-io/conan#9740). Docs: 📃




Commits

950e175 Merge pull request #9894 from memsharded/fix/property_filename_indepdent
f348515 release 1.42.0
4783958 Improve 'conan search' error message (#9891)
578a641 making the filename property independent
f4c7680 fix conditional logic to work in Xcode IDE (#9892)
636baac fixing compatible_package options lockfile (#9890)
63b4453 Removed folders.package (#9884)
d697ac6 remove sdk condition for xcodedeps (#9887)
3e8d95c Fix some tests to use MSVC (#9879)
fc50c80 fix VCvars defining -vcvars for 2015) (#9889)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

Fix: Fix build settings conditional logic to work correctly with Xcode IDE. (conan-io/conan#9892)
Fix: Show a more specific error message on 'conan search' when a package version is not valid (conan-io/conan#9891)
Fix: Removed the new layout folders.package property as it was not clear the value/usage. (conan-io/conan#9884). Docs: 📃
Fix: The "conan package" method now raises an exception when declaring the layout() method. This is part of the migration to Conan 2.0 where the local method "conan package" is removed. (conan-io/conan#9884). Docs: 📃
Fix: Moved experimental LayoutPackager to a conan.tools.files.AutoPackager with a new interface. Removed also the conanfile.patterns attribute that now is configured directly in the AutoPackager. (conan-io/conan#9882). Docs: 📃
Fix: When the layout() method is declared inside the conanfile.py of a test-package, Conan won't generate temporary folders at build/HASH anymore. The build folder will follow the structure declared at the layout() method. (conan-io/conan#9882). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix frameworks aggregation in XcodeDeps. (conan-io/conan#9881)
Fix: Remove python requests version from User-Agent header, it can be problematic sometimes and adds no value. (conan-io/conan#9861)
Fix: Change MesonToolchain to define preprocessor_definitions as [constant], because Meson 0.60 now raises errors on it defined in [built-in options]. (conan-io/conan#9858)
Fix: Rename ConanFileInterface.new_cpp_info to ConanFileInterface.cpp_info (being it a NewCppInfo object). The ConanFileInterface object is only used when accessing self.dependencies in a conanfile, so we can make sure that the new develop generators use the final cpp_info name. (conan-io/conan#9800). Docs: 📃
Fix: Renamed group argument in Environment classes to scope, that can get "build" and "run" values. (conan-io/conan#9755). Docs: 📃
Fix: New win_bash behavior failed for dual profile, the new computation of subsystem paths completely depend now on defined settings, but not on platform.system() or auto-detection. (conan-io/conan#9755). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Avoid lockfile raising because of incorrect options when using compatible_packages. Close conan-io/conan#9591 (conan-io/conan#9890)
Bugfix: Avoid VCVars defining -vcvars argument for VS<=2015. Close conan-io/conan#9888 (conan-io/conan#9889)
Bugfix: Respect the previous value of sys.dont_write_bytecode. (conan-io/conan#9865)
Bugfix: conan export-pkg now raises an error (ConanInvalidConfiguration exception) if the validate() method raise that error and results in an invalid package_id. (conan-io/conan#9818)
Bugfix: Respect the build_policy="never" even for --build=missing cli argument. (conan-io/conan#9817)
Bugfix: Avoid crash in CMakeToolchain for custom generator when compiler is not defined. (conan-io/conan#9801)
Bugfix: Do not force new authentication when a token is expired, it might not be needed. (conan-io/conan#9781)
Bugfix: The CMakeToolchain generator always sets fPIC enabled due to a typo where the actual parameter is not templated but instead hard-coded as ON. (conan-io/conan#9752)
Bugfix: The path to a patch file in a conandata.yml is also relative to the base source folder when the patches are not associated with a version (list of patches). (conan-io/conan#9740). Docs: 📃




Commits

950e175 Merge pull request #9894 from memsharded/fix/property_filename_indepdent
f348515 release 1.42.0
4783958 Improve 'conan search' error message (#9891)
578a641 making the filename property independent
f4c7680 fix conditional logic to work in Xcode IDE (#9892)
636baac fixing compatible_package options lockfile (#9890)
63b4453 Removed folders.package (#9884)
d697ac6 remove sdk condition for xcodedeps (#9887)
3e8d95c Fix some tests to use MSVC (#9879)
fc50c80 fix VCvars defining -vcvars for 2015) (#9889)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

column20:
Bumps tonic from 0.5.2 to 0.6.1.

Changelog
Sourced from tonic's changelog.

0.6.1 (2021-10-27)
Bug Fixes

transport: Bump hyper to 0.14.14 (#813) (2a3e9b2)

0.6.0 (2021-10-25)
Breaking changes

tonic: Remove Sync requirement for streams (#804) (23c1392)
tonic: change connect_lazy to be infallible (#712) (2e47154)
build: split path types in compile (#721) (53ecc1f)
Update prost and friends to 0.9 (#791) (09805ec)

Bug Fixes

build: Correctly convert Empty to () (#734) (ff6a690)
tonic: fix extensions disappearing during streaming requests (5c1bb90), closes #770
tonic: Status code to set correct source on unkown error (#799) (4054d61)
transport: AddOrigin panic on invalid uri (#801) (3ab00f3)
transport: Correctly map hyper errors (#629) (4947b07)
tonic: compression: handle compression flag but no header (#763)

Features

build: Support prost's include_file option (#774) (3f9ab80)
health, reflection: make rustfmt dependency optional (#785)




Commits

column20:
Bumps tokio from 1.12.0 to 1.13.0.

Release notes
Sourced from tokio's releases.

Tokio v1.13.0
1.13.0 (October 29, 2021)
Fixed

sync: fix Notify to clone the waker before locking its waiter list (#4129)
tokio: add riscv32 to non atomic64 architectures (#4185)

Added

net: add poll_{recv,send}_ready methods to udp and uds_datagram (#4131)
net: add try_*, readable, writable, ready, and peer_addr methods to split halves (#4120)
sync: add blocking_lock to Mutex (#4130)
sync: add watch::Sender::send_replace (#3962, #4195)
sync: expand Debug for Mutex<T> impl to unsized T (#4134)
tracing: instrument time::Sleep (#4072)
tracing: use structured location fields for spawned tasks (#4128)

Changed

io: add assert in copy_bidirectional that poll_write is sensible (#4125)
macros: use qualified syntax when polling in select! (#4192)
runtime: handle block_on wakeups better (#4157)
task: allocate callback on heap immediately in debug mode (#4203)
tokio: assert platform-minimum requirements at build time (#3797)

Documented

docs: conversion of doc comments to indicative mood (#4174)
docs: add returning on the first error example for try_join! (#4133)
docs: fixing broken links in tokio/src/lib.rs (#4132)
signal: add example with background listener (#4171)
sync: add more oneshot examples (#4153)
time: document Interval::tick cancel safety (#4152)

#3797: tokio-rs/tokio#3797

column20:
Bumps prost from 0.8.0 to 0.9.0.

Release notes
Sourced from prost's releases.

v0.9.0
PROST! is a Protocol Buffers implementation for the Rust Language. prost generates simple, idiomatic Rust code from proto2 and proto3 files.
Release 0.9.0 brings in many helpful changes and fixes, here are a few highlights:

Apple silicon support
Improve encode/decode varint performance
Support no package declaration
Support single include files
Fix multiple attribute support




Commits

7c0916d release 0.9.0
75e87f3 Fix derive macro build error when using map and bytes together (#546)
1825b38 Fix path in include_file function when outdir used (#544)
db9cd5c Fix doc comment for field_attribute (#539)
d7324c4 Escape comments (#510)
87cea1d Protect encoding::decode_varint from overflow (#527)
4c12921 Updated petgraph to 0.6. (#536)
3f2e465 Add option to prost-build to skip the run of protoc (#442)
859f243 explicitly use core::default::Default to avoid collisions (#534)
d45a37c Fix multiple attributes support (#522)

column21:
Bumps prost from 0.8.0 to 0.9.0.

Release notes
Sourced from prost's releases.

v0.9.0
PROST! is a Protocol Buffers implementation for the Rust Language. prost generates simple, idiomatic Rust code from proto2 and proto3 files.
Release 0.9.0 brings in many helpful changes and fixes, here are a few highlights:

Apple silicon support
Improve encode/decode varint performance
Support no package declaration
Support single include files
Fix multiple attribute support




Commits

7c0916d release 0.9.0
75e87f3 Fix derive macro build error when using map and bytes together (#546)
1825b38 Fix path in include_file function when outdir used (#544)
db9cd5c Fix doc comment for field_attribute (#539)
d7324c4 Escape comments (#510)
87cea1d Protect encoding::decode_varint from overflow (#527)
4c12921 Updated petgraph to 0.6. (#536)
3f2e465 Add option to prost-build to skip the run of protoc (#442)
859f243 explicitly use core::default::Default to avoid collisions (#534)
d45a37c Fix multiple attributes support (#522)

column20:
Bumps tonic-build from 0.5.2 to 0.6.0.

Changelog
Sourced from tonic-build's changelog.

0.6.0 (2021-10-25)
Breaking changes

tonic: Remove Sync requirement for streams (#804) (23c1392)
tonic: change connect_lazy to be infallible (#712) (2e47154)
build: split path types in compile (#721) (53ecc1f)
Update prost and friends to 0.9 (#791) (09805ec)

Bug Fixes

build: Correctly convert Empty to () (#734) (ff6a690)
tonic: fix extensions disappearing during streaming requests (5c1bb90), closes #770
tonic: Status code to set correct source on unkown error (#799) (4054d61)
transport: AddOrigin panic on invalid uri (#801) (3ab00f3)
transport: Correctly map hyper errors (#629) (4947b07)
tonic: compression: handle compression flag but no header (#763)

Features

build: Support prost's include_file option (#774) (3f9ab80)
health, reflection: make rustfmt dependency optional (#785)




Commits

2fe7131 chore: Prepare 0.6.0 release (#811)
23c1392 fix(tonic): Remove Sync requirement for streams (#804)
1f3df8d chore: Upgrade to 2021 edition (#808)

bbcacd0 chore: Fix routeguide example warning (#807)
3ab00f3 fix(transport): AddOrigin panic on invalid uri (#801)
ff6a690 fix(build): Correctly convert Empty to () (#734)
4947b07 fix(transport): Correctly map hyper errors (#629)

column20:
Bumps tonic-reflection from 0.2.0 to 0.3.0.

Changelog
Sourced from tonic-reflection's changelog.

0.3.0 (2020-07-13)
Bug Fixes

Status::details leaking base64 encoding (#395) (2c4c544), closes #379
build: Allow empty packages (#382) (f085aba), closes #381
build: Make generated server service public (#347) (8cd6f05)
transport: Propagate errors in tls_config instead of unwrap/panic (#385) (3b9d6a6)
Remove uses of pin_project::project attribute (#367) (5bda615)

Features

codec: Improve compression flag log (#374) (d68dd36)
transport: Add Endpoint::connect_lazy method (#392) (ec9046d), closes #167
transport: Add optional service methods (#275) (2b997b0)
transport: Dynamic load balancing (#341) (85ae0a4)
types: Add tonic-types crate (#391) (ea7fe66)
Add Display implementation for Code (#386) (ab1de44)
Add Status::to_http (#376) (327b4ff)
Add metadata to error responses (#348) (372da52)
add new method get_uri for Endpoint (#371) (54d7a7a)

0.2.1 (2020-05-07)
Bug Fixes

base64 encode details header (#345) (e683ffe)
build: Remove ambiguity in service method call (#327) (5d56daa)
transport: Apply tls-connector for discovery when applicable (#334) (#338) (99fbe22)

Features

transport: Add AsRef impl for Certificate (#326) (d2ad8df)




Commits

ecb1920 fix doc link
62b8ab0 chore: Prepare 0.3.0 release (#399)
570c606 chore: Upgrade base64 and tokio-rustls packages (#397)
a567f17 chore: Prepare 0.2.2 release (#396)
2c4c544 fix: Status::details leaking base64 encoding (#395)
2b997b0 feat(transport): Add optional service methods (#275)
034c850 examples: update to tracing 0.1.16, use #[instrument] (#354)
98bcc33 Rename get_uri to uri (#393)
c9b3c7f Fix hyper_warp example warnings (#390)
ec9046d feat(transport): Add Endpoint::connect_lazy method (#392)

Sourced from conan's releases.

Release notes
Sourced from serde_json's releases.

v1.0.72

Interpret \u-encoded lone surrogates when deserializing into a byte string (#828, #829, thanks @​lucacasonato)

v1.0.71

Add serde_json::Map::get_key_value (#821, thanks @​timothee-haudebourg)
Add impl From<Box<RawValue>> for Box<str> (#824, thanks @​jplatte)

v1.0.70

Add serde_json::Map::retain method (#822, thanks @​deankarn)




Commits

77915eb Merge pull request #829 from serde-rs/surrogate

column20:
Bumps pre-commit from 2.15.0 to 2.16.0.

Release notes
Sourced from pre-commit's releases.

pre-commit v2.16.0
Features

add warning for regexes containing [\/] or [/\\].

#2053 PR by @​radek-sprta.
#2043 issue by @​asottile.


move hook template back to bash resolving shebang-portability issues.

#2065 PR by @​asottile.


add support for fail_fast at the individual hook level.

#2097 PR by @​colens3.
#1143 issue by @​potiuk.


allow passthrough of GIT_CONFIG_KEY_*, GIT_CONFIG_VALUE_*, and GIT_CONFIG_COUNT.

#2136 PR by @​emzeat.



Fixes

fix pre-commit autoupdate for core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=true on windows.

#2047 PR by @​asottile.
#2046 issue by @​lcnittl.


fix temporary file stashing with for submodule.recurse=1.

#2071 PR by @​asottile.
#2063 issue by @​a666.


ban broken importlib-resources versions.

#2098 PR by @​asottile.


replace exit(...) with raise SystemExit(...) for portability.

#2103 PR by @​asottile.
#2104 PR by @​asottile.

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.42.0 to 1.43.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.43.0 (03-Dec-2021)

Feature: Remove cmake_target_namespace and cmake_module_target_namespace properties. (conan-io/conan#10099). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow CMakeDeps to set cmake_target_name property as an absolute target. (conan-io/conan#10099). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add warning in CMakeDeps generated CMake files when target names collide. (conan-io/conan#10099). Docs: 📃
Feature: Legacy cmake generators (cmake_find_package, cmake_find_package_multi) don't listen to new set_properties model anymore. (conan-io/conan#10098). Docs: 📃
Feature: pkg_config_name is used as the main name for a package/component and it will be used as the name for the *.pc file. (conan-io/conan#10084). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added new propertypkg_config_aliases which admits a  list of strings to define different aliases for any package/component. (conan-io/conan#10084). Docs: 📃
Feature: Define os=baremetal in settings.yml to represent platforms without OS "bare metal". (conan-io/conan#10067). Docs: 📃
Feature: Modern tools.gnu.PkgConfig to supersede legacy tools.PkgConfig. Includes management of PKG_CONFIG_PATH and mapping to a cpp_info structure (conan-io/conan#10065). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add test_requires() for 2.0 migration of force_host_context. (conan-io/conan#10027). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added C++23 support for Visual Studio and GCC 11.2 one. (conan-io/conan#10021)
Feature: Enable from conan import ConanFile to prepare for future namespace. (conan-io/conan#10016). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add backend support to MesonToolchain. (conan-io/conan#9990). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix <PackageName>_FIND_COMPONENTS CMake generated variable to the correct value associated with the filename, not the package name. (conan-io/conan#10098). Docs: 📃
Fix: Updated the ConanException in installer.py to improve the error message handling. (conan-io/conan#10089). Docs: 📃
Fix: Simplify parallel definition in new conf, leaving only tools.build:jobs. Use max number of CPUs by default to build in parallel. (conan-io/conan#10068). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix the msvc version model, which is comparison broken with the "main" 19.3 version < 19.22. (conan-io/conan#10057). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix the EnvVar.save_ps1() method. (conan-io/conan#10049)
Fix: CMakeToolchain will not crash if build_type not defined. (conan-io/conan#9984)
Fix: Avoid raising an exception for conan info --paths when there are editables in the graph. (conan-io/conan#9944)
Fix: Fix wrong parameter name in CMakeDeps find_library function. (conan-io/conan#9932)
Fix: Improve error message when unzipping Conan .tgz artifacts. (conan-io/conan#9925)
Fix: Respect error code 6 in some situations. (conan-io/conan#9905)
Bugfix: Fix parallel package downloading. While downloading conan locks incorrect package ref. (conan-io/conan#10038)
Bugfix: Add import for CMakeToolchainBlock custom Blocks in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#10026). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Option --require-override is not working for conanfile.txt. (conan-io/conan#10013)
Bugfix: Fix unescaped double-quotes for defines in Premake generator. (conan-io/conan#10008)
Bugfix: Use new tools.cross_building in MesonToolchain . (conan-io/conan#9992)
Bugfix: CMakeDeps generated *-data.cmake was not including properly the set of link flags. (conan-io/conan#9980)
Bugfix: CMakeDeps was not populating INTERFACE_LINK_OPTIONS to each target. (conan-io/conan#9980)
Bugfix: PkgConfigDeps was not adding correctly the Requires for all the package dependencies. (conan-io/conan#9945)
Bugfix: user_toolchain properly included and path quoted in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#9916)
Bugfix: Solved an issue with the conan config install whereby a cryptic error was raised when a user tried to install a directory that previously was a file and vice-versa. (conan-io/conan#9908)
Bugfix: Missing framework for Xcode generator with no compiler setting. (conan-io/conan#9896)

1.42.2 (22-Nov-2021)

Bugfix: Legacy cmake_multi generator is not affected by set_property. (conan-io/conan#10062)

1.42.1 (08-Nov-2021)

Fix: Fix XcodeDeps architecture name translation from Conan to Apple identifiers. (conan-io/conan#9955)
Bugfix: Fix XcodeDeps bad xcconfig generation when using dash-case-named packages (conan-io/conan#9955)
Bugfix: Avoid exception if msvc compiler not defined in settings.yml file. (conan-io/conan#9954)
Bugfix: legacy cmake generator is not affected by set_property. (conan-io/conan#9952)




Commits

ab4b12a fixing msvc version model (breaking) (#10057)
ed5ba1b branched 1.43
fd19835 fix concurrent test
a083455 fix Py27 tests
d3ce9e2 printing only 1 ref at missing binary message (#10113)
bc83dfa simplify parallel jobs (#10068)
cbc9586 [cmake] Added NO_SONAME tests for Linux (#10107)
3d0cb0f Remove cmake_target_namespace and cmake_module_target_namespace properties in...
14d01da let CMakeToolchain not crash if build_type not defined (#9984)
fc164d5 Refactored conan.tools.gnu.pkgconfigdeps module and added new `pkg_config_a...
Additional commits viewable in compare view

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.42.0 to 1.43.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.43.0 (03-Dec-2021)

Feature: Remove cmake_target_namespace and cmake_module_target_namespace properties. (conan-io/conan#10099). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow CMakeDeps to set cmake_target_name property as an absolute target. (conan-io/conan#10099). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add warning in CMakeDeps generated CMake files when target names collide. (conan-io/conan#10099). Docs: 📃
Feature: Legacy cmake generators (cmake_find_package, cmake_find_package_multi) don't listen to new set_properties model anymore. (conan-io/conan#10098). Docs: 📃
Feature: pkg_config_name is used as the main name for a package/component and it will be used as the name for the *.pc file. (conan-io/conan#10084). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added new propertypkg_config_aliases which admits a  list of strings to define different aliases for any package/component. (conan-io/conan#10084). Docs: 📃
Feature: Define os=baremetal in settings.yml to represent platforms without OS "bare metal". (conan-io/conan#10067). Docs: 📃
Feature: Modern tools.gnu.PkgConfig to supersede legacy tools.PkgConfig. Includes management of PKG_CONFIG_PATH and mapping to a cpp_info structure (conan-io/conan#10065). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add test_requires() for 2.0 migration of force_host_context. (conan-io/conan#10027). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added C++23 support for Visual Studio and GCC 11.2 one. (conan-io/conan#10021)
Feature: Enable from conan import ConanFile to prepare for future namespace. (conan-io/conan#10016). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add backend support to MesonToolchain. (conan-io/conan#9990). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix <PackageName>_FIND_COMPONENTS CMake generated variable to the correct value associated with the filename, not the package name. (conan-io/conan#10098). Docs: 📃
Fix: Updated the ConanException in installer.py to improve the error message handling. (conan-io/conan#10089). Docs: 📃
Fix: Simplify parallel definition in new conf, leaving only tools.build:jobs. Use max number of CPUs by default to build in parallel. (conan-io/conan#10068). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix the msvc version model, which is comparison broken with the "main" 19.3 version < 19.22. (conan-io/conan#10057). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix the EnvVar.save_ps1() method. (conan-io/conan#10049)
Fix: CMakeToolchain will not crash if build_type not defined. (conan-io/conan#9984)
Fix: Avoid raising an exception for conan info --paths when there are editables in the graph. (conan-io/conan#9944)
Fix: Fix wrong parameter name in CMakeDeps find_library function. (conan-io/conan#9932)
Fix: Improve error message when unzipping Conan .tgz artifacts. (conan-io/conan#9925)
Fix: Respect error code 6 in some situations. (conan-io/conan#9905)
Bugfix: Fix parallel package downloading. While downloading conan locks incorrect package ref. (conan-io/conan#10038)
Bugfix: Add import for CMakeToolchainBlock custom Blocks in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#10026). Docs: 📃
Bugfix: Option --require-override is not working for conanfile.txt. (conan-io/conan#10013)
Bugfix: Fix unescaped double-quotes for defines in Premake generator. (conan-io/conan#10008)
Bugfix: Use new tools.cross_building in MesonToolchain . (conan-io/conan#9992)
Bugfix: CMakeDeps generated *-data.cmake was not including properly the set of link flags. (conan-io/conan#9980)
Bugfix: CMakeDeps was not populating INTERFACE_LINK_OPTIONS to each target. (conan-io/conan#9980)
Bugfix: PkgConfigDeps was not adding correctly the Requires for all the package dependencies. (conan-io/conan#9945)
Bugfix: user_toolchain properly included and path quoted in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#9916)
Bugfix: Solved an issue with the conan config install whereby a cryptic error was raised when a user tried to install a directory that previously was a file and vice-versa. (conan-io/conan#9908)
Bugfix: Missing framework for Xcode generator with no compiler setting. (conan-io/conan#9896)

1.42.2 (22-Nov-2021)

Bugfix: Legacy cmake_multi generator is not affected by set_property. (conan-io/conan#10062)

1.42.1 (08-Nov-2021)

Fix: Fix XcodeDeps architecture name translation from Conan to Apple identifiers. (conan-io/conan#9955)
Bugfix: Fix XcodeDeps bad xcconfig generation when using dash-case-named packages (conan-io/conan#9955)
Bugfix: Avoid exception if msvc compiler not defined in settings.yml file. (conan-io/conan#9954)
Bugfix: legacy cmake generator is not affected by set_property. (conan-io/conan#9952)




Commits

ab4b12a fixing msvc version model (breaking) (#10057)
ed5ba1b branched 1.43
fd19835 fix concurrent test
a083455 fix Py27 tests
d3ce9e2 printing only 1 ref at missing binary message (#10113)
bc83dfa simplify parallel jobs (#10068)
cbc9586 [cmake] Added NO_SONAME tests for Linux (#10107)
3d0cb0f Remove cmake_target_namespace and cmake_module_target_namespace properties in...
14d01da let CMakeToolchain not crash if build_type not defined (#9984)
fc164d5 Refactored conan.tools.gnu.pkgconfigdeps module and added new `pkg_config_a...

column20:
Bumps rusqlite from 0.26.1 to 0.26.2.

Release notes
Sourced from rusqlite's releases.

rusqlite v0.25.2 (yanked) / libsqlite3-sys v0.22.2
Note: rusqlite v0.25.2 has been yanked because it accidentally enabled bundled-full as a default feature. v0.25.3 has been cut that is equivalent but without that change. The libsqlite3-sys release that happened at the same time is still fine.
This release is a patch release that enables builds on some older versions of Rust. Rusqlite does not commit to a particular MSRV, but this release is known to work at least back to Rust 1.41.0.
It is likely that the next release will require a newer version of Rust, whether or not it is mentioned in the release notes.
rusqlite 0.25.1, libsqlite3-sys 0.22.1

Use SQLITE_TEMP_STORE=3 on android. (#937)
Upgrade to bindgen 0.58 (#933)

rusqlite 0.24.1, libsqlite3-sys 0.20.1


The lru-cache crate has been replaced with hashlink, which may fix panics on Rust nightly caused by unsoundness in some versions of the lru-cache crate (#811).


A positional BLOB I/O API has been added, which more closely mirrors SQLites actual BLOB I/O api, and is similar to unix-style pwrite/pread. (#780).


A winsqlite3 feature as been added to both rusqlite and libsqlite3-sys which allows linking against the SQLite present in newer versions of Windows 10 (#796).


Rusqlite's iterator types are now #[must_use] (#799).


Several dependencies have been updated.


rusqlite 0.24.0, libsqlite-sys 0.20.0

BREAKING CHANGE: Upgrade to time v0.2 and put it behind a feature flag (#653)
impl TryFrom<&Row<'_>> for (...)
This change implements TryFrom<&Row> for tuples up to 16 fields. This
is a convenience function that can be used to map rows more easily.
adding ability to work with sqlite compiled with SQLITE_OMIT_DECLTYPE (feature column_decltype)
LIBSQLITE3_FLAGS hook
Enables compiling bundled sources with different flags.
Add cross-compilation with mingw (#774)
Support wasm32-wasi target (#785)
Implement our own sqlite3_execwhich supports unlock notify (#767)
Fix order of parameters in InvalidParameterCount message (#779)
Don't implement Into for Statement (#763)
Publically expose Map
little speedup for bundled sqlite3.c on unix (HAVE_LOCALTIME_R)
BREAKING CHANGE: VTabCursor lifetime should be bound to VTab lifetime (#753)
preupdate_hook feature requires buildtime_bindgen
Upgrade SQLite bundled sources to 3.33.0
Upgrade to bindgen 0.54
Fix missing docs
Add link to gitter channel (#738)
Include LICENSE into the libsqlite3-sys crate (#736)

rusqlite 0.23.0, libsqlite-sys 0.18.0
The release primarily contains a number of security/memory safety fixes, which were mostly found due to an audit of the unsafe code in the crate. An advisory will be published for these shortly.
They mostly impact APIs exposed through features, so while there are a lot of them, if you're using rusqlite under default features, you're fine. None of them impact libsqlite3-sys.


... (truncated)


Commits

03dbb78 Prep releases libsqlite3-sys:0.23.2 and rusqlite:0.26.2
934e0c7 Fix callbacks lifetime
6121585 Fix callbacks lifetime
30f8c8c Fix callbacks lifetime
d70fbac Merge pull request #1046 from gwenn/split_upgrade_script
75e17a6 Merge pull request #1047 from gwenn/upgrade
aede11e Upgrade checks
4ec670e Split upgrade script
c5b9624 Merge pull request #1045 from gwenn/3.37.0
9acc6f8 Rustfmt
Additional commits viewable in compare view

rusqlite 0.24.1, libsqlite3-sys 0.20.1


The lru-cache crate has been replaced with hashlink, which may fix panics on Rust nightly caused by unsoundness in some versions of the lru-cache crate (#811).


A positional BLOB I/O API has been added, which more closely mirrors SQLites actual BLOB I/O api, and is similar to unix-style pwrite/pread. (#780).


A winsqlite3 feature as been added to both rusqlite and libsqlite3-sys which allows linking against the SQLite present in newer versions of Windows 10 (#796).


Rusqlite's iterator types are now #[must_use] (#799).


Several dependencies have been updated.


rusqlite 0.24.0, libsqlite-sys 0.20.0

BREAKING CHANGE: Upgrade to time v0.2 and put it behind a feature flag (#653)
impl TryFrom<&Row<'_>> for (...)
This change implements TryFrom<&Row> for tuples up to 16 fields. This
is a convenience function that can be used to map rows more easily.
adding ability to work with sqlite compiled with SQLITE_OMIT_DECLTYPE (feature column_decltype)
LIBSQLITE3_FLAGS hook
Enables compiling bundled sources with different flags.
Add cross-compilation with mingw (#774)
Support wasm32-wasi target (#785)
Implement our own sqlite3_execwhich supports unlock notify (#767)
Fix order of parameters in InvalidParameterCount message (#779)
Don't implement Into for Statement (#763)
Publically expose Map
little speedup for bundled sqlite3.c on unix (HAVE_LOCALTIME_R)
BREAKING CHANGE: VTabCursor lifetime should be bound to VTab lifetime (#753)
preupdate_hook feature requires buildtime_bindgen
Upgrade SQLite bundled sources to 3.33.0
Upgrade to bindgen 0.54
Fix missing docs
Add link to gitter channel (#738)
Include LICENSE into the libsqlite3-sys crate (#736)

rusqlite 0.23.0, libsqlite-sys 0.18.0
The release primarily contains a number of security/memory safety fixes, which were mostly found due to an audit of the unsafe code in the crate. An advisory will be published for these shortly.
They mostly impact APIs exposed through features, so while there are a lot of them, if you're using rusqlite under default features, you're fine. None of them impact libsqlite3-sys.


... (truncated)


Commits

287b0ea Undo transition to edition 2021, prep release 0.26.3
03dbb78 Prep releases libsqlite3-sys:0.23.2 and rusqlite:0.26.2
934e0c7 Fix callbacks lifetime
6121585 Fix callbacks lifetime
30f8c8c Fix callbacks lifetime
d70fbac Merge pull request #1046 from gwenn/split_upgrade_script
75e17a6 Merge pull request #1047 from gwenn/upgrade
aede11e Upgrade checks
4ec670e Split upgrade script
c5b9624 Merge pull request #1045 from gwenn/3.37.0
