column21: Superseded by #332.

column20:
Bumps cached from 0.26.2 to 0.33.0.

Changelog
Sourced from cached's changelog.

[0.33.0]
Added

Allow specifying the namespace added to cache keys generated by redis stores

Changed

Bump hashbrown 0.11.2 -> 0.12: https://github.com/rust-lang/hashbrown/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#v0120---2022-01-17
Bump smartstring 0.2 -> 1: https://github.com/bodil/smartstring/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#100---2022-02-24

Removed
[0.32.1]
Added
Changed

Fix redis features so redis/aio is only included when async redis
features (redis_tokio / redis_async_std) are enabled

Removed
[0.32.0] / [cached_proc_macro[0.11.0]]
Added

Fix how doc strings are handled by proc-macros. Capture all documentation on the
cached function definitions and add them to the function definitions generated
by the proc-macros. Add doc strings to generated static caches. Link to relevant static
caches in generated function definitions. Add documentation to the generated
cache-priming function.

Changed
Removed
[0.31.0] / [cached_proc_macro[0.10.0]]
Added

IOCached and IOCachedAsync traits
RedisCache and AsyncRedisCache store types
Add #[io_cached] proc macro for defining cached functions backed
by stores that implement IOCached/IOCachedAsync

Changed

Convert from travis-ci to github actions
Update build status badge to link to github actions

Removed
[0.30.0]
Added

Add flush method to TimedSize and TimedSized caches

Changed

Fix timed/timed-sized cache-get/insert/remove to remove and not
return expired values

Removed
[0.29.0] / [cached_proc_macro[0.9.0]]
Added

proc-macro: support arguments of the wrapped function being prefixed with mut

Changed
Removed


... (truncated)


Commits

See full diff in compare view

Don't panic when validating delimited defaults (#3514)

v3.1.2
[3.1.2] - 2022-02-23
Fixes

(derive) Allow other attribute with a subcommand that has subcommands

Documentation

(examples) List example topics
(derive) Clarify syntax and relation to builder API

v3.1.1
[3.1.1] - 2022-02-21
Fixes

Track caller for ArgMatches assertions so the user more easily sees where they need to fix the call

v3.1.0
[3.1.0] - 2022-02-16
Compatibility
Changes in behavior of note that are not guaranteed to be compatible across releases:

(help) help subcommand shows long help like --help, rather than short help (-h), deprecated clap::AppSettings::UseLongFormatForHelpSubcommand (#3440)
(help) Pacman-style subcommands are now ordered the same as usage errors (#3470)
(help) Pacman-style subcommands use standard alternate syntax in usage (#3470)



... (truncated)


Changelog
Sourced from clap's changelog.

Dependency upgrade

Deprecations

clap::Command is now preferred over clap::App (#3089 in #3472)

clap::command! is now preferred over clap::app_from_crate (#3089 in #3474)
clap::CommandFactory::command is now preferred over clap::IntoApp::into_app (#3089 in #3473)

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.44.0 to 1.46.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.46.0 (07-Mar-2022)

Feature: Configuration field tools.cmake.cmaketoolchain:user_toolchain defined as list-like object (conan-io/conan#10729). Docs: 📃
Feature: Prepare Conan for search remote repos with mix of 1.X and 2.0 binaries. Conan 1.X will not list binaries (conan search <ref>) stored in remote repos that were created with Conan 2.0. (conan-io/conan#10692)
Feature: Adding jinja rendering of global.conf config file. (conan-io/conan#10687). Docs: 📃
Feature: Improve markdown generator instructions. (conan-io/conan#10673). Docs: 📃
Feature: The CMakeToolchain and AutotoolsToolchain take into account the cpp.package info to set the output directories for libraries, executables, and so on when running cmake.install or make install. (conan-io/conan#10672). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added basic_layout, removed meson_layout and added argument src_folder to cmake_layoutas a shortcut for adjusting conanfile.folders.source. (conan-io/conan#10659). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adding self.base_source_folder for exports_sources explicit layouts. (conan-io/conan#10654). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adding root to layout model to allow conanfile.py in subfolders. (conan-io/conan#10654). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added new property component_version for PkgConfigDeps and legacy PkgConfig. (conan-io/conan#10633). Docs: 📃
Feature: Changed .pc file description field for components in PkgConfigDeps. (conan-io/conan#10633). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add sdk_version setting for Macos, iOS, watchOS and tvOS. (conan-io/conan#10608). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add new XcodeBuild build helper. (conan-io/conan#10608). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add new XcodeToolchain helper. (conan-io/conan#10608). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add compiler.version 12 for GCC in settings. (conan-io/conan#10595)
Feature: Introduce new conan.tools.scm.Git helper, for direct use in export() method to capture git url and commit, and to be used in source() method to clone and checkout a git repo. (conan-io/conan#10594). Docs: 📃
Feature: New from conan.tools.files import update_conandata() helper to add data to conandata.yml in the export() method. (conan-io/conan#10586). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add CMake variables, cli arguments and native build system arguments to new conan.tools.cmake.CMake helper. (conan-io/conan#10573). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adding more functionality to ConfDefinition and Conf, something similar to ProfileEnvironment and Environment ones. (conan-io/conan#10537). Docs: 📃
Feature: Port conan.tools.Version to Conan 1.X. (conan-io/conan#10536). Docs: 📃
Feature: Port conan.tools.build.cross_building to Conan 1.X. (conan-io/conan#10536). Docs: 📃
Feature: New copy tool at conan.tools.files namespace that will replace the self.copy in Conan 2.0. (conan-io/conan#10530). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add recipe_folder to pylint plugin. (conan-io/conan#10527)
Fix: Pin Markupsafe==2.0.1 for py27 and upgrade Jinja2>3 for py3, after Markupsafe latest 2.1 release broke Jinja2 2.11. (conan-io/conan#10710)
Fix: Fixed templates for conan new with --template cmake_lib and --template cmake_exe to include Conan 2.0 compatible syntax. (conan-io/conan#10706)
Fix: Moved new tool cross_building from conan.tool.cross_building to conan.tool.build to match the location in develop2. (conan-io/conan#10706)
Fix: Don't compose folders in Xcode generator using dep.package_folder, now cpp_info.bindirs, cpp_info.includedirs, etc. are absolute. (conan-io/conan#10694)
Fix: When the layout() method is declared, the self.package_folder in the recipe is now available even when doing a conan install . , pointing to the specified output folder (-of ) or the path of the conanfile if not specified. (conan-io/conan#10655)
Fix: Fix creation path of deactivate scripts. (conan-io/conan#10653)
Fix: Add support for [tool_requires] section in conanfile.txt. (conan-io/conan#10642)
Fix: When layout() is defined, the exports will not be considered sources anymore, but only the exports_sources. The exports are used exclusively by the recipe, but not as package source. (conan-io/conan#10625)
Fix: Make the source() method run inside the self.source_folder, in the same way build() runs in self.build_folder. But only for recipes that define the layout() method, to not break unless using layout(). (conan-io/conan#10612). Docs: 📃
Fix: Remove the --source-folder new argument to install and editable, not necessary at the moment. (conan-io/conan#10590). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix conf True and False handling in tools.system.package_manage helpers. (conan-io/conan#10583)
Fix: Change the CMakeToolchain message to use CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_FILE. (conan-io/conan#10552)
Fix: BazelDeps was generating invalid bazel files cause the static_library paths were absolute and not relative. (conan-io/conan#10484)
Fix: BazelDeps was crashing when generating packages without libs cause the context was not checking the array size. (conan-io/conan#10484)
Fix: Fix Premake test failing on Linux because the Premake executable isn't found. (conan-io/conan#10250)
Bugfix: Fix MesonToolchain extra quotes in cpp_std (conan-io/conan#10707)
Bugfix: Add missing system_libs management in AutotoolsDeps. (conan-io/conan#10681)
Bugfix: GnuDepsFlags attributes like frameworks and frameworkdirs are only available for Apple OS. (conan-io/conan#10675)
Bugfix: Remove tmp folders created in Conan while checking the output of a command and detecting the compiler. (conan-io/conan#10663)
Bugfix: Fix conan_server circular import do to conan.tools namespace. (conan-io/conan#10635)
bugfix: Fix meson_layout() issue with shared folders. (conan-io/conan#10600)
Bugfix: Fix SystemPackageTool when mode=verify, it was still installing packages. (conan-io/conan#10596)
Bugfix: self.build_folder not being computed even if layout() method is defined in local conan install. Close conan-io/conan#10566 (conan-io/conan#10567)
Bugfix: Fix conan_manifest.txt parse error when the filename has ":" in it. (conan-io/conan#10492)
Bugfix: Use meson toolchain file from install folder. (conan-io/conan#8965)

1.45.0 (02-Feb-2022)


... (truncated)


Commits

b20dc02 [conf] Defining user_toolchain as list (#10729)
a9e7d35 move version to scm (#10712)
65a8db3 markupsafe pinning (#10710)
669157e templates cmake v2 and cross_building (#10706)
ccc9ff7 fix MesonToolchain quotes (#10707)
142235b Conan 1.46.0
3c3a718 introducing modern conan.tool.scm.Git helper (#10594)
c50a39d Better template isolation (#10700)
2dc2093 Fixing xfails of conan-io/conan#10689 (#10695)
a3023ff Dont use package_folder in Xcode generator (#10694)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

Bugfix: Fix conan_manifest.txt parse error when the filename has ":" in it. (conan-io/conan#10492)
Bugfix: Use meson toolchain file from install folder. (conan-io/conan#8965)

1.45.0 (02-Feb-2022)

column20:
Bumps clap from 3.0.8 to 3.1.6.

Release notes
Sourced from clap's releases.

v3.1.6
[3.1.6] - 2022-03-07
Fixes

Don't panic when validating delimited defaults (#3541)
Make it clearer that cargo feature is needed
Documentation improvements

v3.1.5
[3.1.5] - 2022-03-02
Fixes

Dependency upgrade

v3.1.4
[3.1.4] - 2022-03-02
Features

(help) Show PossibleValue::help in long help (--help)  (gated behind unstable-v4) (#3312)

v3.1.3
[3.1.3] - 2022-02-28
Fixes

Don't panic when validating delimited defaults (#3514)

v3.1.2
[3.1.2] - 2022-02-23
Fixes

(derive) Allow other attribute with a subcommand that has subcommands

Documentation

(examples) List example topics
(derive) Clarify syntax and relation to builder API

v3.1.1
[3.1.1] - 2022-02-21
Fixes

Track caller for ArgMatches assertions so the user more easily sees where they need to fix the call

v3.1.0


... (truncated)


Changelog
Sourced from clap's changelog.

[3.1.6] - 2022-03-07
Fixes

Don't panic when validating delimited defaults (#3541)
Make it clearer that cargo feature is needed
Documentation improvements

Fixes

Dependency upgrade

[3.1.4] - 2022-03-02

(derive) Allow other attribute with a subcommand that has subcommands

Documentation

(examples) List example topics

[3.1.1] - 2022-02-21

Track caller for ArgMatches assertions so the user more easily sees where they need to fix the call

[3.1.0] - 2022-02-16
Compatibility
Changes in behavior of note that are not guaranteed to be compatible across releases:

(help) help subcommand shows long help like --help, rather than short help (-h), deprecated clap::AppSettings::UseLongFormatForHelpSubcommand (#3440)

column20:
Bumps cxx-build from 1.0.62 to 1.0.66.

Release notes
Sourced from cxx-build's releases.

1.0.66

Support C arrays as struct fields inside types with a handwritten ExternType impl (#1021)

1.0.65

Update command line argument parser to clap 3.1 (#1016)

1.0.64

Support #[cfg(debug_assertions)] inside ffi module in Cargo-based builds
Improve error messages on async fn inside ffi module

1.0.63

Add support for conditional compilation using #[cfg(...)] attributes inside the bridge module (#989)

    #[cfg(target_os = "android")]
    type CallInvokerHolder;
#[cfg(target_os = "android")]
fn getCallInvoker(self: Pin<&mut CallInvokerHolder>) -> SharedPtr<CallInvoker>;




Commits

f13e68f Release 1.0.66
4b69f59 Lockfile update
a6e1cd1 Merge pull request #1021 from dtolnay/carray
033294e Add test of struct containing C array
993353f Recognize C array of relocatable element type in struct as relocatable
c53e4bc Release 1.0.65
6d3e9ac Merge pull request #1016 from dtolnay/clap
feec8a1 Resolve clap deprecations
19ed7f8 Pull in clap 3.1.0
32e3036 Lockfile update
Additional commits viewable in compare view

column20:
Bumps cached from 0.26.2 to 0.34.0.

Changelog
Sourced from cached's changelog.

[0.34.0] / [cached_proc_macro[0.12.0]]
Added
Changed

Replace async-mutex and async-rwlock used by proc-macros with tokio::sync versions
Add optional version field to CachedRedisValue struct
Cleanup feature flags so async redis features include redis_store and async features automatically

Removed
[0.33.0]
Added

Allow specifying the namespace added to cache keys generated by redis stores

Changed

Bump hashbrown 0.11.2 -> 0.12: https://github.com/rust-lang/hashbrown/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#v0120---2022-01-17
Bump smartstring 0.2 -> 1: https://github.com/bodil/smartstring/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#100---2022-02-24

Removed
[0.32.1]
Added
Changed

Fix redis features so redis/aio is only included when async redis
features (redis_tokio / redis_async_std) are enabled

Removed
[0.32.0] / [cached_proc_macro[0.11.0]]
Added

Fix how doc strings are handled by proc-macros. Capture all documentation on the
cached function definitions and add them to the function definitions generated
by the proc-macros. Add doc strings to generated static caches. Link to relevant static
caches in generated function definitions. Add documentation to the generated
cache-priming function.

Changed
Removed
[0.31.0] / [cached_proc_macro[0.10.0]]
Added

IOCached and IOCachedAsync traits
RedisCache and AsyncRedisCache store types
Add #[io_cached] proc macro for defining cached functions backed
by stores that implement IOCached/IOCachedAsync

Changed

Convert from travis-ci to github actions
Update build status badge to link to github actions

Removed
[0.30.0]
Added

Add flush method to TimedSize and TimedSized caches

Changed

Fix timed/timed-sized cache-get/insert/remove to remove and not
return expired values



... (truncated)


Commits

See full diff in compare view

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.44.0 to 1.46.1.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.46.1 (17-Mar-2022)

Feature: Added a checker for Conan 2.x deprecated from conans imports in pylint_plugin. (conan-io/conan#10811)
Feature: Add apple-clang 13 major version to settings. (conan-io/conan#10807)
Feature: Make apple-clang 13 version package-id compatible with 13.0. (conan-io/conan#10807)
Feature: Autodetect only major version for apple-clang profile starting in version 13. (conan-io/conan#10807)
Feature: Add clang 15 version to settings. (conan-io/conan#10807)
Bugfix: Fix call to undefined function for markdown generator when components add system_libs. (conan-io/conan#10810)

1.46.0 (07-Mar-2022)

Feature: Configuration field tools.cmake.cmaketoolchain:user_toolchain defined as list-like object (conan-io/conan#10729). Docs: 📃
Feature: Prepare Conan for search remote repos with mix of 1.X and 2.0 binaries. Conan 1.X will not list binaries (conan search <ref>) stored in remote repos that were created with Conan 2.0. (conan-io/conan#10692)
Feature: Adding jinja rendering of global.conf config file. (conan-io/conan#10687). Docs: 📃
Feature: Improve markdown generator instructions. (conan-io/conan#10673). Docs: 📃
Feature: The CMakeToolchain and AutotoolsToolchain take into account the cpp.package info to set the output directories for libraries, executables, and so on when running cmake.install or make install. (conan-io/conan#10672). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added basic_layout, removed meson_layout and added argument src_folder to cmake_layoutas a shortcut for adjusting conanfile.folders.source. (conan-io/conan#10659). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adding self.base_source_folder for exports_sources explicit layouts. (conan-io/conan#10654). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adding root to layout model to allow conanfile.py in subfolders. (conan-io/conan#10654). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added new property component_version for PkgConfigDeps and legacy PkgConfig. (conan-io/conan#10633). Docs: 📃
Feature: Changed .pc file description field for components in PkgConfigDeps. (conan-io/conan#10633). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add sdk_version setting for Macos, iOS, watchOS and tvOS. (conan-io/conan#10608). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add new XcodeBuild build helper. (conan-io/conan#10608). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add new XcodeToolchain helper. (conan-io/conan#10608). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add compiler.version 12 for GCC in settings. (conan-io/conan#10595)
Feature: Introduce new conan.tools.scm.Git helper, for direct use in export() method to capture git url and commit, and to be used in source() method to clone and checkout a git repo. (conan-io/conan#10594). Docs: 📃
Feature: New from conan.tools.files import update_conandata() helper to add data to conandata.yml in the export() method. (conan-io/conan#10586). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add CMake variables, cli arguments and native build system arguments to new conan.tools.cmake.CMake helper. (conan-io/conan#10573). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adding more functionality to ConfDefinition and Conf, something similar to ProfileEnvironment and Environment ones. (conan-io/conan#10537). Docs: 📃
Feature: Port conan.tools.Version to Conan 1.X. (conan-io/conan#10536). Docs: 📃
Feature: Port conan.tools.build.cross_building to Conan 1.X. (conan-io/conan#10536). Docs: 📃
Feature: New copy tool at conan.tools.files namespace that will replace the self.copy in Conan 2.0. (conan-io/conan#10530). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add recipe_folder to pylint plugin. (conan-io/conan#10527)
Fix: Pin Markupsafe==2.0.1 for py27 and upgrade Jinja2>3 for py3, after Markupsafe latest 2.1 release broke Jinja2 2.11. (conan-io/conan#10710)
Fix: Fixed templates for conan new with --template cmake_lib and --template cmake_exe to include Conan 2.0 compatible syntax. (conan-io/conan#10706)
Fix: Moved new tool cross_building from conan.tool.cross_building to conan.tool.build to match the location in develop2. (conan-io/conan#10706)
Fix: Don't compose folders in Xcode generator using dep.package_folder, now cpp_info.bindirs, cpp_info.includedirs, etc. are absolute. (conan-io/conan#10694)
Fix: When the layout() method is declared, the self.package_folder in the recipe is now available even when doing a conan install . , pointing to the specified output folder (-of ) or the path of the conanfile if not specified. (conan-io/conan#10655)
Fix: Fix creation path of deactivate scripts. (conan-io/conan#10653)
Fix: Add support for [tool_requires] section in conanfile.txt. (conan-io/conan#10642)
Fix: When layout() is defined, the exports will not be considered sources anymore, but only the exports_sources. The exports are used exclusively by the recipe, but not as package source. (conan-io/conan#10625)
Fix: Make the source() method run inside the self.source_folder, in the same way build() runs in self.build_folder. But only for recipes that define the layout() method, to not break unless using layout(). (conan-io/conan#10612). Docs: 📃
Fix: Remove the --source-folder new argument to install and editable, not necessary at the moment. (conan-io/conan#10590). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix conf True and False handling in tools.system.package_manage helpers. (conan-io/conan#10583)
Fix: Change the CMakeToolchain message to use CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_FILE. (conan-io/conan#10552)
Fix: BazelDeps was generating invalid bazel files cause the static_library paths were absolute and not relative. (conan-io/conan#10484)
Fix: BazelDeps was crashing when generating packages without libs cause the context was not checking the array size. (conan-io/conan#10484)
Fix: Fix Premake test failing on Linux because the Premake executable isn't found. (conan-io/conan#10250)
Bugfix: Fix MesonToolchain extra quotes in cpp_std (conan-io/conan#10707)
Bugfix: Add missing system_libs management in AutotoolsDeps. (conan-io/conan#10681)
Bugfix: GnuDepsFlags attributes like frameworks and frameworkdirs are only available for Apple OS. (conan-io/conan#10675)
Bugfix: Remove tmp folders created in Conan while checking the output of a command and detecting the compiler. (conan-io/conan#10663)



... (truncated)


Commits

084b21f Merge pull request #10811 from czoido/port_deprecated_imports_checker
2ace493 Merge pull request #10810 from czoido/port_markdown_gen_fix
72f3918 Port apple-clang new versions and compatibility to 1.46.1 (#10807)
4d8a780 Fix call to undefined function for markdown generator when components add `sy...
e58a396 [pylint_plugin] Added deprecated imports checker (#10746)
b20dc02 [conf] Defining user_toolchain as list (#10729)
a9e7d35 move version to scm (#10712)
65a8db3 markupsafe pinning (#10710)
669157e templates cmake v2 and cross_building (#10706)
ccc9ff7 fix MesonToolchain quotes (#10707)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

Feature: Introduce new conan.tools.scm.Git helper, for direct use in export() method to capture git url and commit, and to be used in source() method to clone and checkout a git repo. (conan-io/conan#10594). Docs: 📃
Feature: New from conan.tools.files import update_conandata() helper to add data to conandata.yml in the export() method. (conan-io/conan#10586). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add CMake variables, cli arguments and native build system arguments to new conan.tools.cmake.CMake helper. (conan-io/conan#10573). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adding more functionality to ConfDefinition and Conf, something similar to ProfileEnvironment and Environment ones. (conan-io/conan#10537). Docs: 📃
Feature: Port conan.tools.Version to Conan 1.X. (conan-io/conan#10536). Docs: 📃
Feature: Port conan.tools.build.cross_building to Conan 1.X. (conan-io/conan#10536). Docs: 📃
Feature: New copy tool at conan.tools.files namespace that will replace the self.copy in Conan 2.0. (conan-io/conan#10530). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add recipe_folder to pylint plugin. (conan-io/conan#10527)
Fix: Pin Markupsafe==2.0.1 for py27 and upgrade Jinja2>3 for py3, after Markupsafe latest 2.1 release broke Jinja2 2.11. (conan-io/conan#10710)
Fix: Fixed templates for conan new with --template cmake_lib and --template cmake_exe to include Conan 2.0 compatible syntax. (conan-io/conan#10706)
Fix: Moved new tool cross_building from conan.tool.cross_building to conan.tool.build to match the location in develop2. (conan-io/conan#10706)
Fix: Don't compose folders in Xcode generator using dep.package_folder, now cpp_info.bindirs, cpp_info.includedirs, etc. are absolute. (conan-io/conan#10694)
Fix: When the layout() method is declared, the self.package_folder in the recipe is now available even when doing a conan install . , pointing to the specified output folder (-of ) or the path of the conanfile if not specified. (conan-io/conan#10655)
Fix: Fix creation path of deactivate scripts. (conan-io/conan#10653)
Fix: Add support for [tool_requires] section in conanfile.txt. (conan-io/conan#10642)
Fix: When layout() is defined, the exports will not be considered sources anymore, but only the exports_sources. The exports are used exclusively by the recipe, but not as package source. (conan-io/conan#10625)
Fix: Make the source() method run inside the self.source_folder, in the same way build() runs in self.build_folder. But only for recipes that define the layout() method, to not break unless using layout(). (conan-io/conan#10612). Docs: 📃
Fix: Remove the --source-folder new argument to install and editable, not necessary at the moment. (conan-io/conan#10590). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix conf True and False handling in tools.system.package_manage helpers. (conan-io/conan#10583)
Fix: Change the CMakeToolchain message to use CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_FILE. (conan-io/conan#10552)
Fix: BazelDeps was generating invalid bazel files cause the static_library paths were absolute and not relative. (conan-io/conan#10484)
Fix: BazelDeps was crashing when generating packages without libs cause the context was not checking the array size. (conan-io/conan#10484)
Fix: Fix Premake test failing on Linux because the Premake executable isn't found. (conan-io/conan#10250)
Bugfix: Fix MesonToolchain extra quotes in cpp_std (conan-io/conan#10707)
Bugfix: Add missing system_libs management in AutotoolsDeps. (conan-io/conan#10681)
Bugfix: GnuDepsFlags attributes like frameworks and frameworkdirs are only available for Apple OS. (conan-io/conan#10675)
Bugfix: Remove tmp folders created in Conan while checking the output of a command and detecting the compiler. (conan-io/conan#10663)



... (truncated)


Commits

084b21f Merge pull request #10811 from czoido/port_deprecated_imports_checker
2ace493 Merge pull request #10810 from czoido/port_markdown_gen_fix
72f3918 Port apple-clang new versions and compatibility to 1.46.1 (#10807)
4d8a780 Fix call to undefined function for markdown generator when components add `sy...
e58a396 [pylint_plugin] Added deprecated imports checker (#10746)
b20dc02 [conf] Defining user_toolchain as list (#10729)
a9e7d35 move version to scm (#10712)
65a8db3 markupsafe pinning (#10710)
669157e templates cmake v2 and cross_building (#10706)
ccc9ff7 fix MesonToolchain quotes (#10707)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.44.0 to 1.46.2.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.46.2 (18-Mar-2022)

Bugfix: Fix deprecated imports checker line number. (conan-io/conan#10822)
Bugfix: Specifying compiler.version=13 for apple-clang raised a CMake error when using the old cmake generator. (conan-io/conan#10820)

1.46.1 (17-Mar-2022)

Feature: Added a checker for Conan 2.x deprecated from conans imports in pylint_plugin. (conan-io/conan#10811)
Feature: Add apple-clang 13 major version to settings. (conan-io/conan#10807)
Feature: Make apple-clang 13 version package-id compatible with 13.0. (conan-io/conan#10807)
Feature: Autodetect only major version for apple-clang profile starting in version 13. (conan-io/conan#10807)
Feature: Add clang 15 version to settings. (conan-io/conan#10807)
Bugfix: Fix call to undefined function for markdown generator when components add system_libs. (conan-io/conan#10810)

1.46.0 (07-Mar-2022)

Feature: Configuration field tools.cmake.cmaketoolchain:user_toolchain defined as list-like object (conan-io/conan#10729). Docs: 📃
Feature: Prepare Conan for search remote repos with mix of 1.X and 2.0 binaries. Conan 1.X will not list binaries (conan search <ref>) stored in remote repos that were created with Conan 2.0. (conan-io/conan#10692)
Feature: Adding jinja rendering of global.conf config file. (conan-io/conan#10687). Docs: 📃
Feature: Improve markdown generator instructions. (conan-io/conan#10673). Docs: 📃
Feature: The CMakeToolchain and AutotoolsToolchain take into account the cpp.package info to set the output directories for libraries, executables, and so on when running cmake.install or make install. (conan-io/conan#10672). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added basic_layout, removed meson_layout and added argument src_folder to cmake_layoutas a shortcut for adjusting conanfile.folders.source. (conan-io/conan#10659). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adding self.base_source_folder for exports_sources explicit layouts. (conan-io/conan#10654). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adding root to layout model to allow conanfile.py in subfolders. (conan-io/conan#10654). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added new property component_version for PkgConfigDeps and legacy PkgConfig. (conan-io/conan#10633). Docs: 📃
Feature: Changed .pc file description field for components in PkgConfigDeps. (conan-io/conan#10633). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add sdk_version setting for Macos, iOS, watchOS and tvOS. (conan-io/conan#10608). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add new XcodeBuild build helper. (conan-io/conan#10608). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add new XcodeToolchain helper. (conan-io/conan#10608). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add compiler.version 12 for GCC in settings. (conan-io/conan#10595)
Feature: Introduce new conan.tools.scm.Git helper, for direct use in export() method to capture git url and commit, and to be used in source() method to clone and checkout a git repo. (conan-io/conan#10594). Docs: 📃
Feature: New from conan.tools.files import update_conandata() helper to add data to conandata.yml in the export() method. (conan-io/conan#10586). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add CMake variables, cli arguments and native build system arguments to new conan.tools.cmake.CMake helper. (conan-io/conan#10573). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adding more functionality to ConfDefinition and Conf, something similar to ProfileEnvironment and Environment ones. (conan-io/conan#10537). Docs: 📃
Feature: Port conan.tools.Version to Conan 1.X. (conan-io/conan#10536). Docs: 📃
Feature: Port conan.tools.build.cross_building to Conan 1.X. (conan-io/conan#10536). Docs: 📃
Feature: New copy tool at conan.tools.files namespace that will replace the self.copy in Conan 2.0. (conan-io/conan#10530). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add recipe_folder to pylint plugin. (conan-io/conan#10527)
Fix: Pin Markupsafe==2.0.1 for py27 and upgrade Jinja2>3 for py3, after Markupsafe latest 2.1 release broke Jinja2 2.11. (conan-io/conan#10710)
Fix: Fixed templates for conan new with --template cmake_lib and --template cmake_exe to include Conan 2.0 compatible syntax. (conan-io/conan#10706)
Fix: Moved new tool cross_building from conan.tool.cross_building to conan.tool.build to match the location in develop2. (conan-io/conan#10706)
Fix: Don't compose folders in Xcode generator using dep.package_folder, now cpp_info.bindirs, cpp_info.includedirs, etc. are absolute. (conan-io/conan#10694)
Fix: When the layout() method is declared, the self.package_folder in the recipe is now available even when doing a conan install . , pointing to the specified output folder (-of ) or the path of the conanfile if not specified. (conan-io/conan#10655)
Fix: Fix creation path of deactivate scripts. (conan-io/conan#10653)
Fix: Add support for [tool_requires] section in conanfile.txt. (conan-io/conan#10642)
Fix: When layout() is defined, the exports will not be considered sources anymore, but only the exports_sources. The exports are used exclusively by the recipe, but not as package source. (conan-io/conan#10625)
Fix: Make the source() method run inside the self.source_folder, in the same way build() runs in self.build_folder. But only for recipes that define the layout() method, to not break unless using layout(). (conan-io/conan#10612). Docs: 📃
Fix: Remove the --source-folder new argument to install and editable, not necessary at the moment. (conan-io/conan#10590). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix conf True and False handling in tools.system.package_manage helpers. (conan-io/conan#10583)
Fix: Change the CMakeToolchain message to use CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_FILE. (conan-io/conan#10552)
Fix: BazelDeps was generating invalid bazel files cause the static_library paths were absolute and not relative. (conan-io/conan#10484)
Fix: BazelDeps was crashing when generating packages without libs cause the context was not checking the array size. (conan-io/conan#10484)
Fix: Fix Premake test failing on Linux because the Premake executable isn't found. (conan-io/conan#10250)



... (truncated)


Commits

4152068 Old cmake check fixed (#10820)
10f8deb linter: Add link to migration guide (#10821)
610fb3a ConanDeprecatedImportsChecker: fix line numbers (#10822)
084b21f Merge pull request #10811 from czoido/port_deprecated_imports_checker
2ace493 Merge pull request #10810 from czoido/port_markdown_gen_fix
72f3918 Port apple-clang new versions and compatibility to 1.46.1 (#10807)
4d8a780 Fix call to undefined function for markdown generator when components add `sy...
e58a396 [pylint_plugin] Added deprecated imports checker (#10746)
b20dc02 [conf] Defining user_toolchain as list (#10729)
a9e7d35 move version to scm (#10712)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

Fix: Moved new tool cross_building from conan.tool.cross_building to conan.tool.build to match the location in develop2. (conan-io/conan#10706)

Fix: When the layout() method is declared, the self.package_folder in the recipe is now available even when doing a conan install . , pointing to the specified output folder (-of ) or the path of the conanfile if not specified. (conan-io/conan#10655)
Fix: Fix creation path of deactivate scripts. (conan-io/conan#10653)
Fix: Add support for [tool_requires] section in conanfile.txt. (conan-io/conan#10642)
Fix: When layout() is defined, the exports will not be considered sources anymore, but only the exports_sources. The exports are used exclusively by the recipe, but not as package source. (conan-io/conan#10625)
Fix: Make the source() method run inside the self.source_folder, in the same way build() runs in self.build_folder. But only for recipes that define the layout() method, to not break unless using layout(). (conan-io/conan#10612). Docs: 📃
Fix: Remove the --source-folder new argument to install and editable, not necessary at the moment. (conan-io/conan#10590). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix conf True and False handling in tools.system.package_manage helpers. (conan-io/conan#10583)
Fix: Change the CMakeToolchain message to use CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_FILE. (conan-io/conan#10552)
Fix: BazelDeps was generating invalid bazel files cause the static_library paths were absolute and not relative. (conan-io/conan#10484)
Fix: BazelDeps was crashing when generating packages without libs cause the context was not checking the array size. (conan-io/conan#10484)
Fix: Fix Premake test failing on Linux because the Premake executable isn't found. (conan-io/conan#10250)



... (truncated)


Commits

10f8deb linter: Add link to migration guide (#10821)
610fb3a ConanDeprecatedImportsChecker: fix line numbers (#10822)
084b21f Merge pull request #10811 from czoido/port_deprecated_imports_checker
2ace493 Merge pull request #10810 from czoido/port_markdown_gen_fix
72f3918 Port apple-clang new versions and compatibility to 1.46.1 (#10807)
4d8a780 Fix call to undefined function for markdown generator when components add `sy...
e58a396 [pylint_plugin] Added deprecated imports checker (#10746)
b20dc02 [conf] Defining user_toolchain as list (#10729)
a9e7d35 move version to scm (#10712)

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.44.0 to 1.47.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.47.0 (31-Mar-2022)

Feature: Renamed tools.build:cppflags to tools.build:defines and removed tools.build:ldflags (now it's the union between tools.build:sharedlinkflags and tools.build:exelinkflags in mostly all the cases). (conan-io/conan#10928). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adding cross-compilation for Android in MesonToolchain. (conan-io/conan#10908). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add extra flags via [conf] into XcodeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#10906). Docs: 📃
Feature: Preliminar support for CMakePresets.json. (conan-io/conan#10903). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added wrap_mode=nofallback project-option into MesonToolchain as default value. (conan-io/conan#10884)
Feature: Added basic rmdir tool at conan.tools.files. (conan-io/conan#10874). Docs: 📃
Feature: Backport of 2.0 compatibility() recipe method. (conan-io/conan#10868)
Feature: Add detection in meson toolchain for cross conditions and requirement of needs_exe_wrapper. Users may specify the exe wrapper in their meson.build now. (conan-io/conan#10846)
Feature: Allow tested_reference_str to be None. (conan-io/conan#10834)
Feature: New templates for the conan new command with bazel examples: bazel_exe and bazel_lib. (conan-io/conan#10812). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add some support for msvc compiler older versions. (conan-io/conan#10808)
Feature: Added mechanism to inject extra flags via [conf] into several toolchains like AutotoolsToolchain, MesonToolchain and CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#10800). Docs: 📃
Feature: Support selecting the target to build for XcodeBuild helper. (conan-io/conan#10799). Docs: 📃
Feature:  Support for Xcode 13.3, iOS 15.4, watchOS 8.5 and tvOS 15.4. (conan-io/conan#10797)
Feature: New modern "conan new --template=msbuild_lib|exe" for modern MSBuild VS integration. (conan-io/conan#10760). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added a checker for Conan 2.x deprecated from conans imports in pylint_plugin. (conan-io/conan#10746). Docs: 📃
Feature: New conan.tool.microsoft.unix_path to convert paths to any subsystem when using conanfile.win_bash. (conan-io/conan#10743). Docs: 📃
Feature: New from conan.errors import XXX new namespace to be ready for 2.0. (conan-io/conan#10734). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow specifying default_options = {"pkg/*:option": "value"} or default_options = {"pkg*:option": "value"}   instead of default_options = {"pkg:option": "value"} to make compatible recipes with 2.0. (conan-io/conan#10731). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add Clang 15 to default settings. (conan-io/conan#10558)
Feature: When the layout is declared, the cwd() in the source() method will follow the declared self.folders.source but the exports_sources will still be copied to the base source folder. (conan-io/conan#10091). Docs: 📃
Fix: Add support for clang to msvc_runtime_flag(). It requires defining compiler.runtime = static/dynamic definition, same as modern msvc compiler setting. (conan-io/conan#10898). Docs: 📃
Fix: Generate the correct --target triple when building for Apple catalyst. (conan-io/conan#10880)
Fix: The "conan.tools.files.patch" will (by default) look for the patch files in the self.base_source_folder instead of self.source_folder but will apply them with self.source_folder as the base folder. (conan-io/conan#10875). Docs: 📃
Fix: Setting CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR for Apple cross-compiling including M1. (conan-io/conan#10856). Docs: 📃
Fix: Do not overwrite values for CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME, CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION and CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR set from the [conf] or the user_toolchain. (conan-io/conan#10856). Docs: 📃
Fix: Fix architecture translation from Conan syntax to build system in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#10856). Docs: 📃
Fix: Several improvements of the Bazel integration (Bazel, BazelToolchain, BazelDeps), new functional tests in all platforms. (conan-io/conan#10812). Docs: 📃
Fix: Conf.get() always returns default value if internal conf_value.value is None, i.e., it was unset. (conan-io/conan#10800). Docs: 📃
Fix: Set -DCMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM when the generator is for MinGW and the conf tools.gnu:make_program is set. (conan-io/conan#10770)
Fix: Remove unused clion_layout. (conan-io/conan#10760). Docs: 📃
Fix: AutotoolsToolchain adjust the runtime flag of msvc (MTd, MT, MDd or MD) to CFLAGS and CXXFLAGS when using the msvc as settings.compiler. (conan-io/conan#10755). Docs: 📃
Fix: Removed subsystem_path from the conan.tool.microsoft namespace, superseded by unix_path. (conan-io/conan#10743). Docs: 📃
Fix: Show an error message at conan install if the validate() method raises ConanInvalidConfiguration. (conan-io/conan#10725)
BugFix: The find_dependency called internally in CMakeDeps generator to locate transitive dependencies now use the MODULE/NO_MODULE following the cmake_find_mode property when declared in the dependency. (conan-io/conan#10917)
Bugfix: Fix virtualrunenv wrong build scope. (conan-io/conan#10904)
BugFix: Make self.folders.root apply at package conan install . too. (conan-io/conan#10842)
Bugfix: Fix call to undefined function for markdown generator when components add system_libs. (conan-io/conan#10783)
Bugfix: solve build_policy=never bug when conan export-pkg --force and there already exists a package in the cache. (conan-io/conan#10738)
Bugfix: Add transitive dependencies to generated Bazel BUILD files. (conan-io/conan#10686)

1.46.2 (18-Mar-2022)

Bugfix: Fix deprecated imports checker line number. (conan-io/conan#10822)
Bugfix: Specifying compiler.version=13 for apple-clang raised a CMake error when using the old cmake generator. (conan-io/conan#10820)

1.46.1 (17-Mar-2022)

Feature: Added a checker for Conan 2.x deprecated from conans imports in pylint_plugin. (conan-io/conan#10811)
Feature: Add apple-clang 13 major version to settings. (conan-io/conan#10807)
Feature: Make apple-clang 13 version package-id compatible with 13.0. (conan-io/conan#10807)



... (truncated)


Commits

5b4f149 conan 1.47.0
bc7fab0 Fix/cmake find mode (#10931)
c6e3f96 Fix patch test
42d27ed Add extra flags via [conf] into XcodeToolchain (#10906)
7383a8b Fix cross-build vars in CMakeToolchain (#10856)
c5049b1 find_dependency following cmake_find_mode property (#10917)
2cb332e backport of compatibility() recipe method (#10868)
214c556 patchfile read from base source but using self.source_folder as base folder (...
7c5f0af [conf] Global flags changes (#10928)
fa4936a CMakePresets instead of config file (#10903)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

Bumps clap from 3.0.8 to 3.1.7.

Release notes
Sourced from clap's releases.

v3.1.7
[3.1.7] - 2022-03-31
Fixes

*(derive)* Abort, rather than ignore, when deriving ArgEnum` with non-unit unskipped variants

v3.1.6
[3.1.6] - 2022-03-07
Fixes

Don't panic when validating delimited defaults (#3541)
Make it clearer that cargo feature is needed
Documentation improvements

v3.1.5
[3.1.5] - 2022-03-02
Fixes

Dependency upgrade

v3.1.4
[3.1.4] - 2022-03-02
Features

(help) Show PossibleValue::help in long help (--help)  (gated behind unstable-v4) (#3312)

v3.1.3
[3.1.3] - 2022-02-28
Fixes

Don't panic when validating delimited defaults (#3514)

v3.1.2
[3.1.2] - 2022-02-23
Fixes

(derive) Allow other attribute with a subcommand that has subcommands

Documentation

(examples) List example topics
(derive) Clarify syntax and relation to builder API

v3.1.1

column20:
Bumps pre-commit from 2.16.0 to 2.18.1.

Release notes
Sourced from pre-commit's releases.

pre-commit v2.18.1
Fixes

Fix regression for repo: local hooks running python<3.7

#2324 PR by @​asottile.



pre-commit v2.18.0
Features

Keep GIT_HTTP_PROXY_AUTHMETHOD in git environ.

#2272 PR by @​VincentBerthier.
#2271 issue by @​VincentBerthier.


Support both cs and coursier executables for coursier hooks.

#2293 PR by @​Holzhaus.


Include more information in errors for language_version / additional_dependencies for languages which do not support them.

#2315 PR by @​asottile.


Have autoupdate preferentially pick tags which look like versions when there are multiple equivalent tags.

#2312 PR by @​mblayman.
#2311 issue by @​mblayman.


Upgrade ruby-build.

#2319 PR by @​jalessio.


Add top level default_install_hook_types which will be installed when --hook-types is not specified in pre-commit install.

#2322 PR by @​asottile.



Fixes

Fix typo in help message for --from-ref and --to-ref.

#2266 PR by @​leetrout.


Prioritize binary builds for R dependencies.

#2277 PR by @​lorenzwalthert.


Fix handling of git worktrees.

#2252 PR by @​daschuer.


Fix handling of $R_HOME for R hooks.

#2301 PR by @​jeff-m-sullivan.
#2300 issue by @​jeff-m-sullivan.


Fix a rare race condition in change stashing.

#2323 PR by @​asottile.
#2287 issue by @​ian-h-chamberlain.



Updating

Remove python3.6 support.  Note that pre-commit still supports running hooks written in older versions, but pre-commit itself requires python 3.7+.

#2215 PR by @​asottile.


pre-commit has migrated from the master branch to main.

#2302 PR by @​asottile.



pre-commit v2.17.0
Features

add warnings for regexes containing [\\/].

#2151 issue by @​sanjioh.
#2154 PR by @​kuviokelluja.


upgrade supported ruby versions.

#2205 PR by @​jalessio.


allow language: conda to use mamba or micromamba via PRE_COMMIT_USE_MAMBA=1 or PRE_COMMIT_USE_MICROMAMBA=1 respectively.



... (truncated)

#2277 PR by @​lorenzwalthert.


Fix handling of git worktrees.

#2252 PR by @​daschuer.


Fix handling of $R_HOME for R hooks.

#2301 PR by @​jeff-m-sullivan.
#2300 issue by @​jeff-m-sullivan.


Fix a rare race condition in change stashing.

#2323 PR by @​asottile.
#2287 issue by @​ian-h-chamberlain.



Updating

Remove python3.6 support.  Note that pre-commit still supports running hooks written in older versions, but pre-commit itself requires python 3.7+.

#2215 PR by @​asottile.


pre-commit has migrated from the master branch to main.

#2302 PR by @​asottile.



pre-commit v2.17.0
Features

add warnings for regexes containing [\\/].

#2151 issue by @​sanjioh.
#2154 PR by @​kuviokelluja.


upgrade supported ruby versions.

#2205 PR by @​jalessio.


allow language: conda to use mamba or micromamba via PRE_COMMIT_USE_MAMBA=1 or PRE_COMMIT_USE_MICROMAMBA=1 respectively.



... (truncated)


Changelog
Sourced from pre-commit's changelog.

2.18.1 - 2022-04-02
Fixes

Fix regression for repo: local hooks running python<3.7

#2324 PR by @​asottile.



2.18.0 - 2022-04-02
Features

Keep GIT_HTTP_PROXY_AUTHMETHOD in git environ.

#2272 PR by @​VincentBerthier.
#2271 issue by @​VincentBerthier.


Support both cs and coursier executables for coursier hooks.

#2293 PR by @​Holzhaus.


Include more information in errors for language_version /
additional_dependencies for languages which do not support them.

#2315 PR by @​asottile.


Have autoupdate preferentially pick tags which look like versions when
there are multiple equivalent tags.

#2312 PR by @​mblayman.
#2311 issue by @​mblayman.


Upgrade ruby-build.

#2319 PR by @​jalessio.


Add top level default_install_hook_types which will be installed when
--hook-types is not specified in pre-commit install.

#2322 PR by @​asottile.



Fixes

Fix typo in help message for --from-ref and --to-ref.

#2266 PR by @​leetrout.


Prioritize binary builds for R dependencies.

#2277 PR by @​lorenzwalthert.


Fix handling of git worktrees.

#2252 PR by @​daschuer.


Fix handling of $R_HOME for R hooks.

#2301 PR by @​jeff-m-sullivan.
#2300 issue by @​jeff-m-sullivan.


Fix a rare race condition in change stashing.

#2323 PR by @​asottile.
#2287 issue by @​ian-h-chamberlain.



Updating

Remove python3.6 support.  Note that pre-commit still supports running hooks
written in older versions, but pre-commit itself requires python 3.7+.

#2215 PR by @​asottile.


pre-commit has migrated from the master branch to main.

#2302 PR by @​asottile.

column20:
Bumps clap from 3.0.8 to 3.1.8.

Release notes
Sourced from clap's releases.

v3.1.8
[3.1.8] - 2022-04-01
Fixes

Add Debug impls to more types

v3.1.7
[3.1.7] - 2022-03-31
Fixes

*(derive)* Abort, rather than ignore, when deriving ArgEnum` with non-unit unskipped variants

v3.1.6
[3.1.6] - 2022-03-07
Fixes

Don't panic when validating delimited defaults (#3541)
Make it clearer that cargo feature is needed
Documentation improvements

v3.1.5
[3.1.5] - 2022-03-02
Fixes

Dependency upgrade

v3.1.4
[3.1.4] - 2022-03-02
Features

(help) Show PossibleValue::help in long help (--help)  (gated behind unstable-v4) (#3312)

v3.1.3
[3.1.3] - 2022-02-28
Fixes

Don't panic when validating delimited defaults (#3514)

v3.1.2
[3.1.2] - 2022-02-23
Fixes

(derive) Allow other attribute with a subcommand that has subcommands



... (truncated)

Bumps clap from 3.0.8 to 3.1.11.

Release notes
Sourced from clap's releases.

v3.1.11
[3.1.11] - 2022-04-22
Fixes

Implied conflicts override Arg::required, making the behavior consistent with how we calculate conflicts for error reporting
Members of a mutually exclusive ArgGroup  override Arg::required, making the behavior consistent with how we calculate conflicts for error reporting
Arg::overrides_with always override Arg::required, not just when the parser processes an override

v3.1.9

Make it clearer that cargo feature is needed
Documentation improvements

v3.1.5
[3.1.5] - 2022-03-02
Fixes


... (truncated)


Changelog
Sourced from clap's changelog.

[3.1.12] - 2022-04-22
Fixes

Regression in 3.1.11 where the (output) streams were crossed

[3.1.11] - 2022-04-22
Fixes

Implied conflicts override Arg::required, making the behavior consistent with how we calculate conflicts for error reporting
Members of a mutually exclusive ArgGroup  override Arg::required, making the behavior consistent with how we calculate conflicts for error reporting
Arg::overrides_with always override Arg::required, not just when the parser processes an override

[3.1.10] - 2022-04-19
Features

Expose Command::build for custom help generation or other command introspection needs

[3.1.9] - 2022-04-15
Fixes

Pin the clap_derive version so a compatible version is always used with clap

[3.1.8] - 2022-04-01
Fixes

Add Debug impls to more types

[3.1.7] - 2022-03-31
Fixes

(derive) Abort, rather than ignore, when deriving ArgEnum with non-unit unskipped variants

[3.1.6] - 2022-03-07
Fixes

Don't panic when validating delimited defaults (#3541)
Make it clearer that cargo feature is needed
Documentation improvements

[3.1.5] - 2022-03-02
Fixes


... (truncated)

column20:
Bumps cxx from 1.0.62 to 1.0.67.

Release notes
Sourced from cxx's releases.

1.0.67

Improvements to the Bazel build rules:

Use the default linker on macOS C++ toolchains from Apple (#1029, thanks @​keith)
Support Arm target triples on Bazel 5.1+ (#1038, thanks @​snowp)
Ensure that cxx and its third-party dependencies are built with the correct edition even if the downstream repo uses a different default one (#1034, #1035, #1040, bazelbuild/rules_rust#1256)



1.0.66

Support C arrays as struct fields inside types with a handwritten ExternType impl (#1021)

1.0.65

Update command line argument parser to clap 3.1 (#1016)

1.0.64

Support #[cfg(debug_assertions)] inside ffi module in Cargo-based builds
Improve error messages on async fn inside ffi module

1.0.63

Add support for conditional compilation using #[cfg(...)] attributes inside the bridge module (#989)

    #[cfg(target_os = "android")]
    type CallInvokerHolder;
#[cfg(target_os = "android")]
fn getCallInvoker(self: Pin<&mut CallInvokerHolder>) -> SharedPtr<CallInvoker>;




Commits

0006c00 Release 1.0.67
267b90d Merge pull request #1040 from dtolnay/bazel
e31ca99 Pull in my landed edition-related PRs from Bazel rules_rust
f9f215f Run buildifier on WORKSPACE
2059646 Update workflows to actions/checkout@v3
36737e4 Ignore unused ignore attribute warning in some configurations
2ec5f2b Disable ui test on miri
95ff482 Remove default value of vendor's cargo_version attribute
5b62339 Lockfile update
3ebcb56 Compute target triple as {arch}-{os}
Additional commits viewable in compare view

column21: Superseded by #362.

column20:
Bumps serde_json from 1.0.75 to 1.0.80.

Release notes
Sourced from serde_json's releases.

v1.0.79

Allow RawValue deserialization to propagate \u escapes for unmatched surrogates, which can later by deserialized to Vec<u8> (#830, thanks @​lucacasonato)

v1.0.78

Support deserializing as &RawValue in map key position, which would previously fail with "invalid type: newtype struct" (#851)

v1.0.77

Include discord invite links in the published readme
Improve compile error on compiling with neither std nor alloc feature enabled
Include integration tests in published package (#578)

v1.0.76

Fix a build error when features raw_value and alloc are enabled while std is disabled (#850)




Commits

585e4c5 Release 1.0.80
52a9c05 Pull miri from miri branch of dtolnay/rust-toolchain
aff685b Drop unneeded quoting from env variable in workflows yaml
6995bbf Update workflows to actions/checkout@v3
829175e Fix dev dependencies on serde's derive feature
2733e63 Rewrap readme to 80 columns
c5475a3 Apply readme changes from PR 864 to crate-level rustdoc
56cf16f Merge pull request 864 from novedevo/patch-1
16b68b0 Tweak grammar to improve readability
7025523 Release 1.0.79

Release notes
Sourced from serde's releases.

v1.0.137

Update documentation links to some data formats whose repos have moved (#2201, thanks @​atouchet)
Fix declared rust-version of serde and serde_test (#2168)

v1.0.136

Improve default error message when Visitor fails to deserialize a u128 or i128 (#2167)

v1.0.135

Update discord channels listed in readme

v1.0.134

Improve error messages on deserializing NonZero integers from a 0 value (#2158)

column20:
Bumps clap from 3.0.8 to 3.1.14.

Release notes
Sourced from clap's releases.

v3.1.14
[3.1.14] - 2022-05-01
Fixes

Panic when calling Command::build with a required positional argument nested several layers in subcommands

v3.1.13
[3.1.13] - 2022-04-30
Fixes

Help subcommand and Command::write_help now report required arguments in usage in more circumstances
Unknown subcommand for help subcommand flag now reports an error with more context
More details reported when using debug feature
Allow disabling color feature with debug feature enabled

v3.1.12
[3.1.12] - 2022-04-22
Fixes

Regression in 3.1.11 where the (output) streams were crossed

v3.1.11
[3.1.11] - 2022-04-22
Fixes

Implied conflicts override Arg::required, making the behavior consistent with how we calculate conflicts for error reporting
Members of a mutually exclusive ArgGroup  override Arg::required, making the behavior consistent with how we calculate conflicts for error reporting
Arg::overrides_with always override Arg::required, not just when the parser processes an override

v3.1.9
[3.1.9] - 2022-04-15
Fixes

Pin the clap_derive version so a compatible version is always used with clap

v3.1.8
[3.1.8] - 2022-04-01
Fixes

Add Debug impls to more types

v3.1.7
[3.1.7] - 2022-03-31


... (truncated)

Implied conflicts override Arg::required, making the behavior consistent with how we calculate conflicts for error reporting

Arg::overrides_with always override Arg::required, not just when the parser processes an override

[3.1.10] - 2022-04-19
Features

Expose Command::build for custom help generation or other command introspection needs

[3.1.9] - 2022-04-15
Fixes

Pin the clap_derive version so a compatible version is always used with clap

(error) Render actual usage for unrecognized subcommands
(multicall) Improve bad command error
(multicall) Always require a multicall command
(multicall) Disallow arguments on multicall parent command
(multicall) More consistent with rest of clap errors

[3.1.14] - 2022-05-01
Fixes

Panic when calling Command::build with a required positional argument nested several layers in subcommands

[3.1.13] - 2022-04-30
Fixes

Help subcommand and Command::write_help now report required arguments in usage in more circumstances
Unknown subcommand for help subcommand flag now reports an error with more context
More details reported when using debug feature
Allow disabling color feature with debug feature enabled

[3.1.12] - 2022-04-22
Fixes

Regression in 3.1.11 where the (output) streams were crossed

[3.1.11] - 2022-04-22
Fixes

Implied conflicts override Arg::required, making the behavior consistent with how we calculate conflicts for error reporting
Members of a mutually exclusive ArgGroup  override Arg::required, making the behavior consistent with how we calculate conflicts for error reporting
Arg::overrides_with always override Arg::required, not just when the parser processes an override

[3.1.10] - 2022-04-19
Features

Expose Command::build for custom help generation or other command introspection needs

[3.1.9] - 2022-04-15
Fixes

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.44.0 to 1.48.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.48.0 (03-May-2022)

Feature: Do not recommend to set PKG_CONFIG_PATH in markdown generator any more as it is already set by the AutotoolsToolchain. (conan-io/conan#11120)
Feature: The cmake_layout declares folders.generators = "build/generators" that is common for different configurations, enabling CMakePresets.json to support different configurePresets and buildPresets for single-config and multi-config generators. (conan-io/conan#11117). Docs: 📃
Feature: The CMakeToolchain generator will create (if missing) a CMakeUserPresets.json if the CMakeLists.txt file is found in the root folder of the project. That file will include automatically the CMakePresets.json file contained at build/generators folder to allow CMake and IDEs to locate automatically the presets generated by Conan. (conan-io/conan#11117). Docs: 📃
Feature: The CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE is not adjusted in the conan_toolchain.cmake anymore, the configuration is moved to the CMakePresets.json preparing Conan to support multiple "single-config" configurations in one CMakePresets.json file (conan-io/conan#11112). Docs: 📃
Feature: The CMakePresets.json (file generated when specified the CMakeToolchain generator) is appended with a new buildPresets after a conan install with a different build_type when using a multiconfiguration generator like Visual Studio. (conan-io/conan#11103). Docs: 📃
Feature: Removed PlatformToolset and added conantoolchain.props  from *.vcxproj file. (conan-io/conan#11101)
Feature: Append the folder where the Conan generators were installed to PKG_CONFIG_PATH in AutotoolsToolchain. (conan-io/conan#11063). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adding new tools.env.virtualenv:powershell conf to opt-in to generate and use powershell scripts instead of .bat ones. (conan-io/conan#11061). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added new configuration fields: tools.apple:enable_bitcode, tools.apple:enable_arc and tools.apple:enable_visibility. (conan-io/conan#10985). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added new mechanism to inject common Xcode flags in CMakeToolchain generator if enabled Bitcode, ARC, or Visibility configurations. (conan-io/conan#10985). Docs: 📃
Feature: New templates for autotools exe and lib. (conan-io/conan#10978). Docs: 📃
Feature: Change build_script_folder argument from the configure to the Autotools build helper constructor. (conan-io/conan#10978). Docs: 📃
Feature: Replaced add_definitions by add_compile_definitions in conan.tools.cmake.* package. (conan-io/conan#10974)
Feature: Added cxxflags, cflags, and ldflags attributes to MSBuildToolchain. (conan-io/conan#10972). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added mechanism to inject extra flags to MSBuildToolchain via [conf]. (conan-io/conan#10972). Docs: 📃
Fix: Allow Version(self.settings.compiler.version) to work for new tools.scm.Version``. (conan-io/conan#11119)
Fix: Make shared libraries build with Autotools relocatable in Macos by patching the install name (LC_ID_DYLIB) and setting to @rpath/libname.dylib. (conan-io/conan#11114). Docs: 📃
Fix: using CMAKE_PROJECT_INCLUDE instead of presets to define variables that don't work in toolchains (conan-io/conan#11098)
Fix: Fix quote escaping for defines in pkg_config generator. (conan-io/conan#11073)
Fix: Fix quote escaping for defines in PkgConfigDeps generator. (conan-io/conan#11073)
Fix: Quote add_compile_definitions correctly in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#11057)
Fix: Escape quotes in definitions in CMakeToochain. (conan-io/conan#11057)
Fix: Renamed self.base_source_folder to self.export_source_folder. That variable was introduced to reference the folder where the export_sources are. Currently, they are copied to the source folder but might be changed in the future to avoid copying them, so self.export_source_folder will always point to the folder containing the exports_sources. (conan-io/conan#11055). Docs: 📃
Fix: Ensure correct order for libraries in AutotoolsDeps. (conan-io/conan#11054)
Fix: Escape quotes in XCodeDeps generator. (conan-io/conan#11039)
Fix: The CMakeDeps generator now set INTERFACE_LINK_DIRECTORIES necessary when using auto link '#pragma comment(lib, "foo")'  when the required library sets the property cmake_set_interface_link_directories. (conan-io/conan#10984). Docs: 📃
Fix: Renamed variables from the CMakeToolchain context in blocks to be all lowercase. e.g: CMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES to cmake_osx_architectures. (conan-io/conan#10981)
Bugfix: Avoid BazelDeps to find a library when a directory with the same name exists. (conan-io/conan#11090)
Bugfix: The binaryDir field at CMakePresets.json is not set if the conanfile.build_folder is not available, avoiding a null value breaking the specification. (conan-io/conan#11088)
Bugfix: Fixed unziping while using tools.get or tools.unzip with the strip_root=True in a tgz file with hardlinks inside. (conan-io/conan#11074)
Bugfix: The method get_commit from the new conan.tools.scm.Git was capturing a wrong commit, for example, ignoring commits in subfolders when checking the parent folder. (conan-io/conan#11015)
Bugfix: The json generator was showing "None" in the version field of the dependencies when the layout() method was used. (conan-io/conan#10960)
Bugfix: The config default_python_requires_id_mode=unrelated_mode raised an error, it has been fixed. (conan-io/conan#10959)
Bugfix: The CMakeToolchain now declares CACHE BOOL variables when a bool is stored in a variable: toolchain.variables["FOO"] = True. (conan-io/conan#10941)

1.47.0 (31-Mar-2022)

Feature: Renamed tools.build:cppflags to tools.build:defines and removed tools.build:ldflags (now it's the union between tools.build:sharedlinkflags and tools.build:exelinkflags in mostly all the cases). (conan-io/conan#10928). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adding cross-compilation for Android in MesonToolchain. (conan-io/conan#10908). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add extra flags via [conf] into XcodeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#10906). Docs: 📃
Feature: Preliminar support for CMakePresets.json. (conan-io/conan#10903). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added wrap_mode=nofallback project-option into MesonToolchain as default value. (conan-io/conan#10884)
Feature: Added basic rmdir tool at conan.tools.files. (conan-io/conan#10874). Docs: 📃
Feature: Backport of 2.0 compatibility() recipe method. (conan-io/conan#10868)
Feature: Add detection in meson toolchain for cross conditions and requirement of needs_exe_wrapper. Users may specify the exe wrapper in their meson.build now. (conan-io/conan#10846)
Feature: Allow tested_reference_str to be None. (conan-io/conan#10834)
Feature: New templates for the conan new command with bazel examples: bazel_exe and bazel_lib. (conan-io/conan#10812). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add some support for msvc compiler older versions. (conan-io/conan#10808)
Feature: Added mechanism to inject extra flags via [conf] into several toolchains like AutotoolsToolchain, MesonToolchain and CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#10800). Docs: 📃
Feature: Support selecting the target to build for XcodeBuild helper. (conan-io/conan#10799). Docs: 📃



... (truncated)


Commits

68378fa conan 1.48.0
0e8fa63 Define CMP0091 CMake policy directly in Presets, and add a check in toolchain...
49c7938 fix tools.scm.Version construction from non-str (#11119)
6324d08 skip py2 test
ca22f2d Relocatable libs for Macos (#11114)
0851d53 cmake_layout single generators folder (#11117)
815342c update info (#11120)
fba4215 Part1: Move CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE from toolchain to CMakePresets.json (#11112)
8ce1c50 CMakePresets.json multi build configurations (#11103)
d383bb2 [CMakeToolchain] Adding Xcode flags (#10985)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

Feature: Renamed tools.build:cppflags to tools.build:defines and removed tools.build:ldflags (now it's the union between tools.build:sharedlinkflags and tools.build:exelinkflags in mostly all the cases). (conan-io/conan#10928). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adding cross-compilation for Android in MesonToolchain. (conan-io/conan#10908). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add extra flags via [conf] into XcodeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#10906). Docs: 📃
Feature: Preliminar support for CMakePresets.json. (conan-io/conan#10903). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added wrap_mode=nofallback project-option into MesonToolchain as default value. (conan-io/conan#10884)
Feature: Added basic rmdir tool at conan.tools.files. (conan-io/conan#10874). Docs: 📃
Feature: Backport of 2.0 compatibility() recipe method. (conan-io/conan#10868)
Feature: Add detection in meson toolchain for cross conditions and requirement of needs_exe_wrapper. Users may specify the exe wrapper in their meson.build now. (conan-io/conan#10846)
Feature: Allow tested_reference_str to be None. (conan-io/conan#10834)
Feature: New templates for the conan new command with bazel examples: bazel_exe and bazel_lib. (conan-io/conan#10812). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add some support for msvc compiler older versions. (conan-io/conan#10808)
Feature: Added mechanism to inject extra flags via [conf] into several toolchains like AutotoolsToolchain, MesonToolchain and CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#10800). Docs: 📃
Feature: Support selecting the target to build for XcodeBuild helper. (conan-io/conan#10799). Docs: 📃



... (truncated)

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.44.0 to 1.48.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.48.0 (03-May-2022)

Feature: Do not recommend to set PKG_CONFIG_PATH in markdown generator any more as it is already set by the AutotoolsToolchain. (conan-io/conan#11120)
Feature: The cmake_layout declares folders.generators = "build/generators" that is common for different configurations, enabling CMakePresets.json to support different configurePresets and buildPresets for single-config and multi-config generators. (conan-io/conan#11117). Docs: 📃
Feature: The CMakeToolchain generator will create (if missing) a CMakeUserPresets.json if the CMakeLists.txt file is found in the root folder of the project. That file will include automatically the CMakePresets.json file contained at build/generators folder to allow CMake and IDEs to locate automatically the presets generated by Conan. (conan-io/conan#11117). Docs: 📃
Feature: The CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE is not adjusted in the conan_toolchain.cmake anymore, the configuration is moved to the CMakePresets.json preparing Conan to support multiple "single-config" configurations in one CMakePresets.json file (conan-io/conan#11112). Docs: 📃
Feature: The CMakePresets.json (file generated when specified the CMakeToolchain generator) is appended with a new buildPresets after a conan install with a different build_type when using a multiconfiguration generator like Visual Studio. (conan-io/conan#11103). Docs: 📃
Feature: Removed PlatformToolset and added conantoolchain.props  from *.vcxproj file. (conan-io/conan#11101)
Feature: Append the folder where the Conan generators were installed to PKG_CONFIG_PATH in AutotoolsToolchain. (conan-io/conan#11063). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adding new tools.env.virtualenv:powershell conf to opt-in to generate and use powershell scripts instead of .bat ones. (conan-io/conan#11061). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added new configuration fields: tools.apple:enable_bitcode, tools.apple:enable_arc and tools.apple:enable_visibility. (conan-io/conan#10985). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added new mechanism to inject common Xcode flags in CMakeToolchain generator if enabled Bitcode, ARC, or Visibility configurations. (conan-io/conan#10985). Docs: 📃
Feature: New templates for autotools exe and lib. (conan-io/conan#10978). Docs: 📃
Feature: Change build_script_folder argument from the configure to the Autotools build helper constructor. (conan-io/conan#10978). Docs: 📃
Feature: Replaced add_definitions by add_compile_definitions in conan.tools.cmake.* package. (conan-io/conan#10974)
Feature: Added cxxflags, cflags, and ldflags attributes to MSBuildToolchain. (conan-io/conan#10972). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added mechanism to inject extra flags to MSBuildToolchain via [conf]. (conan-io/conan#10972). Docs: 📃
Fix: Allow Version(self.settings.compiler.version) to work for new tools.scm.Version``. (conan-io/conan#11119)
Fix: Make shared libraries build with Autotools relocatable in Macos by patching the install name (LC_ID_DYLIB) and setting to @rpath/libname.dylib. (conan-io/conan#11114). Docs: 📃
Fix: using CMAKE_PROJECT_INCLUDE instead of presets to define variables that don't work in toolchains (conan-io/conan#11098)
Fix: Fix quote escaping for defines in pkg_config generator. (conan-io/conan#11073)
Fix: Fix quote escaping for defines in PkgConfigDeps generator. (conan-io/conan#11073)
Fix: Quote add_compile_definitions correctly in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#11057)
Fix: Escape quotes in definitions in CMakeToochain. (conan-io/conan#11057)
Fix: Renamed self.base_source_folder to self.export_source_folder. That variable was introduced to reference the folder where the export_sources are. Currently, they are copied to the source folder but might be changed in the future to avoid copying them, so self.export_source_folder will always point to the folder containing the exports_sources. (conan-io/conan#11055). Docs: 📃
Fix: Ensure correct order for libraries in AutotoolsDeps. (conan-io/conan#11054)
Fix: Escape quotes in XCodeDeps generator. (conan-io/conan#11039)
Fix: The CMakeDeps generator now set INTERFACE_LINK_DIRECTORIES necessary when using auto link '#pragma comment(lib, "foo")'  when the required library sets the property cmake_set_interface_link_directories. (conan-io/conan#10984). Docs: 📃
Fix: Renamed variables from the CMakeToolchain context in blocks to be all lowercase. e.g: CMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES to cmake_osx_architectures. (conan-io/conan#10981)
Bugfix: Avoid BazelDeps to find a library when a directory with the same name exists. (conan-io/conan#11090)
Bugfix: The binaryDir field at CMakePresets.json is not set if the conanfile.build_folder is not available, avoiding a null value breaking the specification. (conan-io/conan#11088)
Bugfix: Fixed unziping while using tools.get or tools.unzip with the strip_root=True in a tgz file with hardlinks inside. (conan-io/conan#11074)
Bugfix: The method get_commit from the new conan.tools.scm.Git was capturing a wrong commit, for example, ignoring commits in subfolders when checking the parent folder. (conan-io/conan#11015)
Bugfix: The json generator was showing "None" in the version field of the dependencies when the layout() method was used. (conan-io/conan#10960)
Bugfix: The config default_python_requires_id_mode=unrelated_mode raised an error, it has been fixed. (conan-io/conan#10959)
Bugfix: The CMakeToolchain now declares CACHE BOOL variables when a bool is stored in a variable: toolchain.variables["FOO"] = True. (conan-io/conan#10941)

1.47.0 (31-Mar-2022)

Feature: Renamed tools.build:cppflags to tools.build:defines and removed tools.build:ldflags (now it's the union between tools.build:sharedlinkflags and tools.build:exelinkflags in mostly all the cases). (conan-io/conan#10928). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adding cross-compilation for Android in MesonToolchain. (conan-io/conan#10908). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add extra flags via [conf] into XcodeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#10906). Docs: 📃
Feature: Preliminar support for CMakePresets.json. (conan-io/conan#10903). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added wrap_mode=nofallback project-option into MesonToolchain as default value. (conan-io/conan#10884)
Feature: Added basic rmdir tool at conan.tools.files. (conan-io/conan#10874). Docs: 📃
Feature: Backport of 2.0 compatibility() recipe method. (conan-io/conan#10868)
Feature: Add detection in meson toolchain for cross conditions and requirement of needs_exe_wrapper. Users may specify the exe wrapper in their meson.build now. (conan-io/conan#10846)
Feature: Allow tested_reference_str to be None. (conan-io/conan#10834)
Feature: New templates for the conan new command with bazel examples: bazel_exe and bazel_lib. (conan-io/conan#10812). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add some support for msvc compiler older versions. (conan-io/conan#10808)
Feature: Added mechanism to inject extra flags via [conf] into several toolchains like AutotoolsToolchain, MesonToolchain and CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#10800). Docs: 📃
Feature: Support selecting the target to build for XcodeBuild helper. (conan-io/conan#10799). Docs: 📃



... (truncated)


Commits

68378fa conan 1.48.0
0e8fa63 Define CMP0091 CMake policy directly in Presets, and add a check in toolchain...
49c7938 fix tools.scm.Version construction from non-str (#11119)
6324d08 skip py2 test
ca22f2d Relocatable libs for Macos (#11114)
0851d53 cmake_layout single generators folder (#11117)
815342c update info (#11120)
fba4215 Part1: Move CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE from toolchain to CMakePresets.json (#11112)

column20:
Bumps serde_json from 1.0.75 to 1.0.81.

Release notes
Sourced from serde_json's releases.

v1.0.81

Work around indexmap/autocfg not always properly detecting whether a std sysroot crate is available (#885, thanks @​cuviper)

v1.0.80

Documentation improvements

v1.0.79

Allow RawValue deserialization to propagate \u escapes for unmatched surrogates, which can later by deserialized to Vec<u8> (#830, thanks @​lucacasonato)

v1.0.78

Support deserializing as &RawValue in map key position, which would previously fail with "invalid type: newtype struct" (#851)

v1.0.77

Include discord invite links in the published readme
Improve compile error on compiling with neither std nor alloc feature enabled
Include integration tests in published package (#578)

v1.0.76

Fix a build error when features raw_value and alloc are enabled while std is disabled (#850)




Commits

a0ea937 Release 1.0.81
6c3dfe9 Make it clearer that preserve_order implies a std dependency
f34ef95 Merge pull request #885 from cuviper/indexmap-std
27939bb Explicitly enable indexmap/std
c0f9343 Ignore trait_duplication_in_bounds clippy false positives
048a64c Resolve type_repetition_in_bounds clippy lint
585e4c5 Release 1.0.80
52a9c05 Pull miri from miri branch of dtolnay/rust-toolchain
aff685b Drop unneeded quoting from env variable in workflows yaml
6995bbf Update workflows to actions/checkout@v3

Features

Allow multiple outputs from language: dotnet hooks.

#2332 PR by @​WallucePinkham.


Add more information to healthy() failure.

#2348 PR by @​asottile.


Upgrade ruby-build.

#2342 PR by @​jalessio.


Add pre-commit validate-config / pre-commit validate-manifest and deprecate pre-commit-validate-config and pre-commit-validate-manifest.

column20:
Bumps clap from 3.0.8 to 3.1.16.

Release notes
Sourced from clap's releases.

v3.1.16
[3.1.16] - 2022-05-06
Fixes

(parser) Arg::exclusive overrides Arg::required, like other conflicts
(error) Don't duplicate arguments in usage
(error) Don't show hidden arguments in conflict error usage
(help) New help_template variable {name} to fix problems with {bin}
(help) Don't wrap URLs

gated behind unstable-v4

Leading dashes in Arg::long are no longer allowed
(help) Use Command::display_name in the help title rather than Command::bin_name

v3.1.15
[3.1.15] - 2022-05-02
Fixes

(error) Render actual usage for unrecognized subcommands
(multicall) Improve bad command error
(multicall) Always require a multicall command
(multicall) Disallow arguments on multicall parent command
(multicall) More consistent with rest of clap errors

v3.1.14
[3.1.14] - 2022-05-01
Fixes

Panic when calling Command::build with a required positional argument nested several layers in subcommands

v3.1.13
[3.1.13] - 2022-04-30
Fixes

Help subcommand and Command::write_help now report required arguments in usage in more circumstances
Unknown subcommand for help subcommand flag now reports an error with more context
More details reported when using debug feature
Allow disabling color feature with debug feature enabled

v3.1.12
[3.1.12] - 2022-04-22
Fixes

Regression in 3.1.11 where the (output) streams were crossed



... (truncated)

(error) Render actual usage for unrecognized subcommands
(multicall) Improve bad command error
(multicall) Always require a multicall command
(multicall) Disallow arguments on multicall parent command
(multicall) More consistent with rest of clap errors

[3.1.14] - 2022-05-01
Fixes

Panic when calling Command::build with a required positional argument nested several layers in subcommands

[3.1.13] - 2022-04-30
Fixes

Help subcommand and Command::write_help now report required arguments in usage in more circumstances
Unknown subcommand for help subcommand flag now reports an error with more context
More details reported when using debug feature
Allow disabling color feature with debug feature enabled

[3.1.12] - 2022-04-22
Fixes

column20:
Bumps clap from 3.0.8 to 3.1.18.

Release notes
Sourced from clap's releases.

v3.1.18
[3.1.18] - 2022-05-10
Fixes

Fix deprecated arg_enum! for users migrating to clap3 (#3717)
Verify all required_unless_present_all arguments exist
Verify group members exist before processing group members (#3711)
(help) Use ... when not enough value_names are supplied

gated behind unstable-v4

Verify required is not used with conditional required settings (#3660)
Disallow more value_names than number_of_values (#2695)
(parser) Assert on unknown args when using external subcommands (#3703)
(parser) Always fill in "" argument for external subcommands (#3263)
(derive) Detect escaped external subcommands that look like built-in subcommands (#3703)
(derive) Leave Arg::id as verbatim casing (#3282)

v3.1.17
[3.1.17] - 2022-05-06
Fixes

Allow value names for arg! macro to have dashes when quoted, like longs

v3.1.16
[3.1.16] - 2022-05-06
Fixes

(parser) Arg::exclusive overrides Arg::required, like other conflicts
(error) Don't duplicate arguments in usage
(error) Don't show hidden arguments in conflict error usage
(help) New help_template variable {name} to fix problems with {bin}
(help) Don't wrap URLs

gated behind unstable-v4

Leading dashes in Arg::long are no longer allowed
(help) Use Command::display_name in the help title rather than Command::bin_name

v3.1.15
[3.1.15] - 2022-05-02
Fixes

(error) Render actual usage for unrecognized subcommands
(multicall) Improve bad command error
(multicall) Always require a multicall command
(multicall) Disallow arguments on multicall parent command
(multicall) More consistent with rest of clap errors

column20:
Bumps cxx from 1.0.62 to 1.0.68.

Release notes
Sourced from cxx's releases.

1.0.68

Eliminate unused_attributes warning in generated code

1.0.67

Improvements to the Bazel build rules:

Use the default linker on macOS C++ toolchains from Apple (#1029, thanks @​keith)
Support Arm target triples on Bazel 5.1+ (#1038, thanks @​snowp)
Ensure that cxx and its third-party dependencies are built with the correct edition even if the downstream repo uses a different default one (#1034, #1035, #1040, bazelbuild/rules_rust#1256)



1.0.66

Support C arrays as struct fields inside types with a handwritten ExternType impl (#1021)

1.0.65

Update command line argument parser to clap 3.1 (#1016)

1.0.64

Support #[cfg(debug_assertions)] inside ffi module in Cargo-based builds
Improve error messages on async fn inside ffi module

1.0.63

Add support for conditional compilation using #[cfg(...)] attributes inside the bridge module (#989)

    #[cfg(target_os = "android")]
    type CallInvokerHolder;
#[cfg(target_os = "android")]
fn getCallInvoker(self: Pin<&mut CallInvokerHolder>) -> SharedPtr<CallInvoker>;




Commits

7455a97 Lockfile update
13cc5d9 Resolve unused_attributes lints in generated code
af2620c Suppress bad unused_attributes lint on doc(hidden) attr
0b878cc Remove doc(hidden) attribute that is being phased out
44762a6 Update ui test suite to nightly-2022-04-30
21e66f6 Update ui test suite to nightly-2022-04-28
5d8f38c Merge pull request #1042 from dtolnay/bazel
b828c00 Replace half-baked repository_os logic with get_host_triple
07b30a5 Pull in newer Bazel rules_rust
