column20:
Bumps conan from 1.44.0 to 1.48.1.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.48.1 (18-May-2022)

Fix: Add -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE to markdown generator instructions for CMake single config. (conan-io/conan#11234)
Bugfix: Fix case where CMakeDeps assumes a module dependency when transitive dependencies do not define cmake_find_mode and fallback to a config one. (conan-io/conan#11240)
Bugfix: Fixed broken apple-clang 13.0 compatibility. (conan-io/conan#11231)

1.48.0 (03-May-2022)

Feature: Do not recommend to set PKG_CONFIG_PATH in markdown generator any more as it is already set by the AutotoolsToolchain. (conan-io/conan#11120)
Feature: The cmake_layout declares folders.generators = "build/generators" that is common for different configurations, enabling CMakePresets.json to support different configurePresets and buildPresets for single-config and multi-config generators. (conan-io/conan#11117). Docs: 📃
Feature: The CMakeToolchain generator will create (if missing) a CMakeUserPresets.json if the CMakeLists.txt file is found in the root folder of the project. That file will include automatically the CMakePresets.json file contained at build/generators folder to allow CMake and IDEs to locate automatically the presets generated by Conan. (conan-io/conan#11117). Docs: 📃
Feature: The CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE is not adjusted in the conan_toolchain.cmake anymore, the configuration is moved to the CMakePresets.json preparing Conan to support multiple "single-config" configurations in one CMakePresets.json file (conan-io/conan#11112). Docs: 📃
Feature: The CMakePresets.json (file generated when specified the CMakeToolchain generator) is appended with a new buildPresets after a conan install with a different build_type when using a multiconfiguration generator like Visual Studio. (conan-io/conan#11103). Docs: 📃
Feature: Removed PlatformToolset and added conantoolchain.props  from *.vcxproj file. (conan-io/conan#11101)
Feature: Append the folder where the Conan generators were installed to PKG_CONFIG_PATH in AutotoolsToolchain. (conan-io/conan#11063). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adding new tools.env.virtualenv:powershell conf to opt-in to generate and use powershell scripts instead of .bat ones. (conan-io/conan#11061). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added new configuration fields: tools.apple:enable_bitcode, tools.apple:enable_arc and tools.apple:enable_visibility. (conan-io/conan#10985). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added new mechanism to inject common Xcode flags in CMakeToolchain generator if enabled Bitcode, ARC, or Visibility configurations. (conan-io/conan#10985). Docs: 📃
Feature: New templates for autotools exe and lib. (conan-io/conan#10978). Docs: 📃
Feature: Change build_script_folder argument from the configure to the Autotools build helper constructor. (conan-io/conan#10978). Docs: 📃
Feature: Replaced add_definitions by add_compile_definitions in conan.tools.cmake.* package. (conan-io/conan#10974)
Feature: Added cxxflags, cflags, and ldflags attributes to MSBuildToolchain. (conan-io/conan#10972). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added mechanism to inject extra flags to MSBuildToolchain via [conf]. (conan-io/conan#10972). Docs: 📃
Fix: Allow Version(self.settings.compiler.version) to work for new tools.scm.Version``. (conan-io/conan#11119)
Fix: Make shared libraries build with Autotools relocatable in Macos by patching the install name (LC_ID_DYLIB) and setting to @rpath/libname.dylib. (conan-io/conan#11114). Docs: 📃
Fix: using CMAKE_PROJECT_INCLUDE instead of presets to define variables that don't work in toolchains (conan-io/conan#11098)
Fix: Fix quote escaping for defines in pkg_config generator. (conan-io/conan#11073)
Fix: Fix quote escaping for defines in PkgConfigDeps generator. (conan-io/conan#11073)
Fix: Quote add_compile_definitions correctly in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#11057)
Fix: Escape quotes in definitions in CMakeToochain. (conan-io/conan#11057)
Fix: Renamed self.base_source_folder to self.export_source_folder. That variable was introduced to reference the folder where the export_sources are. Currently, they are copied to the source folder but might be changed in the future to avoid copying them, so self.export_source_folder will always point to the folder containing the exports_sources. (conan-io/conan#11055). Docs: 📃
Fix: Ensure correct order for libraries in AutotoolsDeps. (conan-io/conan#11054)
Fix: Escape quotes in XCodeDeps generator. (conan-io/conan#11039)
Fix: The CMakeDeps generator now set INTERFACE_LINK_DIRECTORIES necessary when using auto link '#pragma comment(lib, "foo")'  when the required library sets the property cmake_set_interface_link_directories. (conan-io/conan#10984). Docs: 📃
Fix: Renamed variables from the CMakeToolchain context in blocks to be all lowercase. e.g: CMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES to cmake_osx_architectures. (conan-io/conan#10981)
Bugfix: Avoid BazelDeps to find a library when a directory with the same name exists. (conan-io/conan#11090)
Bugfix: The binaryDir field at CMakePresets.json is not set if the conanfile.build_folder is not available, avoiding a null value breaking the specification. (conan-io/conan#11088)
Bugfix: Fixed unziping while using tools.get or tools.unzip with the strip_root=True in a tgz file with hardlinks inside. (conan-io/conan#11074)
Bugfix: The method get_commit from the new conan.tools.scm.Git was capturing a wrong commit, for example, ignoring commits in subfolders when checking the parent folder. (conan-io/conan#11015)
Bugfix: The json generator was showing "None" in the version field of the dependencies when the layout() method was used. (conan-io/conan#10960)
Bugfix: The config default_python_requires_id_mode=unrelated_mode raised an error, it has been fixed. (conan-io/conan#10959)
Bugfix: The CMakeToolchain now declares CACHE BOOL variables when a bool is stored in a variable: toolchain.variables["FOO"] = True. (conan-io/conan#10941)

1.47.0 (31-Mar-2022)

Feature: Renamed tools.build:cppflags to tools.build:defines and removed tools.build:ldflags (now it's the union between tools.build:sharedlinkflags and tools.build:exelinkflags in mostly all the cases). (conan-io/conan#10928). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adding cross-compilation for Android in MesonToolchain. (conan-io/conan#10908). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add extra flags via [conf] into XcodeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#10906). Docs: 📃
Feature: Preliminar support for CMakePresets.json. (conan-io/conan#10903). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added wrap_mode=nofallback project-option into MesonToolchain as default value. (conan-io/conan#10884)
Feature: Added basic rmdir tool at conan.tools.files. (conan-io/conan#10874). Docs: 📃
Feature: Backport of 2.0 compatibility() recipe method. (conan-io/conan#10868)
Feature: Add detection in meson toolchain for cross conditions and requirement of needs_exe_wrapper. Users may specify the exe wrapper in their meson.build now. (conan-io/conan#10846)



... (truncated)


Commits

ba8c97f Assume only config files are generated in CMakeDeps generator when none is sp...
3063757 add build type (#11220) (#11234)
ed9c46a fixing clang 13.0 compatibility (#11231)
68378fa conan 1.48.0
0e8fa63 Define CMP0091 CMake policy directly in Presets, and add a check in toolchain...
49c7938 fix tools.scm.Version construction from non-str (#11119)
6324d08 skip py2 test
ca22f2d Relocatable libs for Macos (#11114)
0851d53 cmake_layout single generators folder (#11117)
815342c update info (#11120)
Additional commits viewable in compare view

column21:
Bumps conan from 1.44.0 to 1.48.1.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.48.1 (18-May-2022)

Fix: Add -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE to markdown generator instructions for CMake single config. (conan-io/conan#11234)
Bugfix: Fix case where CMakeDeps assumes a module dependency when transitive dependencies do not define cmake_find_mode and fallback to a config one. (conan-io/conan#11240)
Bugfix: Fixed broken apple-clang 13.0 compatibility. (conan-io/conan#11231)

1.48.0 (03-May-2022)

Feature: Do not recommend to set PKG_CONFIG_PATH in markdown generator any more as it is already set by the AutotoolsToolchain. (conan-io/conan#11120)
Feature: The cmake_layout declares folders.generators = "build/generators" that is common for different configurations, enabling CMakePresets.json to support different configurePresets and buildPresets for single-config and multi-config generators. (conan-io/conan#11117). Docs: 📃
Feature: The CMakeToolchain generator will create (if missing) a CMakeUserPresets.json if the CMakeLists.txt file is found in the root folder of the project. That file will include automatically the CMakePresets.json file contained at build/generators folder to allow CMake and IDEs to locate automatically the presets generated by Conan. (conan-io/conan#11117). Docs: 📃
Feature: The CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE is not adjusted in the conan_toolchain.cmake anymore, the configuration is moved to the CMakePresets.json preparing Conan to support multiple "single-config" configurations in one CMakePresets.json file (conan-io/conan#11112). Docs: 📃
Feature: The CMakePresets.json (file generated when specified the CMakeToolchain generator) is appended with a new buildPresets after a conan install with a different build_type when using a multiconfiguration generator like Visual Studio. (conan-io/conan#11103). Docs: 📃
Feature: Removed PlatformToolset and added conantoolchain.props  from *.vcxproj file. (conan-io/conan#11101)
Feature: Append the folder where the Conan generators were installed to PKG_CONFIG_PATH in AutotoolsToolchain. (conan-io/conan#11063). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adding new tools.env.virtualenv:powershell conf to opt-in to generate and use powershell scripts instead of .bat ones. (conan-io/conan#11061). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added new configuration fields: tools.apple:enable_bitcode, tools.apple:enable_arc and tools.apple:enable_visibility. (conan-io/conan#10985). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added new mechanism to inject common Xcode flags in CMakeToolchain generator if enabled Bitcode, ARC, or Visibility configurations. (conan-io/conan#10985). Docs: 📃
Feature: New templates for autotools exe and lib. (conan-io/conan#10978). Docs: 📃
Feature: Change build_script_folder argument from the configure to the Autotools build helper constructor. (conan-io/conan#10978). Docs: 📃
Feature: Replaced add_definitions by add_compile_definitions in conan.tools.cmake.* package. (conan-io/conan#10974)
Feature: Added cxxflags, cflags, and ldflags attributes to MSBuildToolchain. (conan-io/conan#10972). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added mechanism to inject extra flags to MSBuildToolchain via [conf]. (conan-io/conan#10972). Docs: 📃
Fix: Allow Version(self.settings.compiler.version) to work for new tools.scm.Version``. (conan-io/conan#11119)
Fix: Make shared libraries build with Autotools relocatable in Macos by patching the install name (LC_ID_DYLIB) and setting to @rpath/libname.dylib. (conan-io/conan#11114). Docs: 📃
Fix: using CMAKE_PROJECT_INCLUDE instead of presets to define variables that don't work in toolchains (conan-io/conan#11098)
Fix: Fix quote escaping for defines in pkg_config generator. (conan-io/conan#11073)
Fix: Fix quote escaping for defines in PkgConfigDeps generator. (conan-io/conan#11073)
Fix: Quote add_compile_definitions correctly in CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#11057)
Fix: Escape quotes in definitions in CMakeToochain. (conan-io/conan#11057)
Fix: Renamed self.base_source_folder to self.export_source_folder. That variable was introduced to reference the folder where the export_sources are. Currently, they are copied to the source folder but might be changed in the future to avoid copying them, so self.export_source_folder will always point to the folder containing the exports_sources. (conan-io/conan#11055). Docs: 📃
Fix: Ensure correct order for libraries in AutotoolsDeps. (conan-io/conan#11054)
Fix: Escape quotes in XCodeDeps generator. (conan-io/conan#11039)
Fix: The CMakeDeps generator now set INTERFACE_LINK_DIRECTORIES necessary when using auto link '#pragma comment(lib, "foo")'  when the required library sets the property cmake_set_interface_link_directories. (conan-io/conan#10984). Docs: 📃
Fix: Renamed variables from the CMakeToolchain context in blocks to be all lowercase. e.g: CMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES to cmake_osx_architectures. (conan-io/conan#10981)
Bugfix: Avoid BazelDeps to find a library when a directory with the same name exists. (conan-io/conan#11090)
Bugfix: The binaryDir field at CMakePresets.json is not set if the conanfile.build_folder is not available, avoiding a null value breaking the specification. (conan-io/conan#11088)
Bugfix: Fixed unziping while using tools.get or tools.unzip with the strip_root=True in a tgz file with hardlinks inside. (conan-io/conan#11074)
Bugfix: The method get_commit from the new conan.tools.scm.Git was capturing a wrong commit, for example, ignoring commits in subfolders when checking the parent folder. (conan-io/conan#11015)
Bugfix: The json generator was showing "None" in the version field of the dependencies when the layout() method was used. (conan-io/conan#10960)
Bugfix: The config default_python_requires_id_mode=unrelated_mode raised an error, it has been fixed. (conan-io/conan#10959)
Bugfix: The CMakeToolchain now declares CACHE BOOL variables when a bool is stored in a variable: toolchain.variables["FOO"] = True. (conan-io/conan#10941)

1.47.0 (31-Mar-2022)

Feature: Renamed tools.build:cppflags to tools.build:defines and removed tools.build:ldflags (now it's the union between tools.build:sharedlinkflags and tools.build:exelinkflags in mostly all the cases). (conan-io/conan#10928). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adding cross-compilation for Android in MesonToolchain. (conan-io/conan#10908). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add extra flags via [conf] into XcodeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#10906). Docs: 📃
Feature: Preliminar support for CMakePresets.json. (conan-io/conan#10903). Docs: 📃
Feature: Added wrap_mode=nofallback project-option into MesonToolchain as default value. (conan-io/conan#10884)
Feature: Added basic rmdir tool at conan.tools.files. (conan-io/conan#10874). Docs: 📃
Feature: Backport of 2.0 compatibility() recipe method. (conan-io/conan#10868)
Feature: Add detection in meson toolchain for cross conditions and requirement of needs_exe_wrapper. Users may specify the exe wrapper in their meson.build now. (conan-io/conan#10846)



... (truncated)


Commits

ba8c97f Assume only config files are generated in CMakeDeps generator when none is sp...
3063757 add build type (#11220) (#11234)
ed9c46a fixing clang 13.0 compatibility (#11231)
68378fa conan 1.48.0
0e8fa63 Define CMP0091 CMake policy directly in Presets, and add a check in toolchain...
49c7938 fix tools.scm.Version construction from non-str (#11119)
6324d08 skip py2 test
ca22f2d Relocatable libs for Macos (#11114)
0851d53 cmake_layout single generators folder (#11117)
815342c update info (#11120)
Additional commits viewable in compare view




Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting @dependabot rebase.


Dependabot commands and options

You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR:

@dependabot rebase will rebase this PR

column20:
Bumps conan from 1.44.0 to 1.49.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.49.0 (02-Jun-2022)

Feature: Add install_substitutes to system package manager tools to be able to install sets of packages that are equivalent with different names for different distros. (conan-io/conan#11367). Docs: 📃
Feature: Do not automatically fix the shared libraries to add the rpath in Apple and add an external tool tools.apple.fix_apple_shared_install_name to do it optionally in recipes for packages that do not set the correct LC_ID_DYLIB. (conan-io/conan#11365). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow pyyaml 6.0 dependency. (conan-io/conan#11363)
Feature: Removed Python 2.7 support, as a result of an unsolvable security vulnerability in pyjwt. (conan-io/conan#11357). Docs: 📃
Feature: The conanfile.txt file now accepts a [layout] that can be filled with 3 predefined layouts: cmake_layout, vs_layout and bazel_layout. (conan-io/conan#11348). Docs: 📃
Feature: Remove the parameter copy_symlink_folders of the conan.tool.files.copy  function and now, any symlink file pointing to a folder will be treated as a regular file. (conan-io/conan#11330). Docs: 📃
Feature: Tools can_run validates if it is possible to run a and application build for a non-native architecture. (conan-io/conan#11321). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add CMAKE_SYSROOT support for CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#11317). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add --sysroot support for AutotoolsToolchain and remove support for cpp_info.sysroot in AutotoolsDeps. (conan-io/conan#11317). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add tools.build:sysroot conf. (conan-io/conan#11317). Docs: 📃
Feature: Improved cmake_layout and CMakePresets.json feature so you can manage different configurations using the same CMakeUserPresets.json not only for multi-config (Debug/Release) but for any set of settings specified in a new conf tools.cmake.cmake_layout:build_folder_vars that accepts a list of settings to use. e.g tools.cmake.cmake_layout:build_folder_vars=["settings.compiler", "options.shared"] (conan-io/conan#11308). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adds GCC 9.4 in the list of compilers supported in the settings file. (conan-io/conan#11296)
Feature: Raise an error when running CMake if CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE is not defined and the generator is not multi-config. (conan-io/conan#11294). Docs: 📃
Feature: Implement a check_min_vs() checker that will work for both Visual Studio and msvc to allow migration from 1.X to 2.0 (conan-io/conan#11292). Docs: 📃
Feature: More flexibility in Autotools tools to override arguments and avoid all default arguments for make, autoreconf and configure. (conan-io/conan#11284). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add components support in XcodeDeps. (conan-io/conan#11233). Docs: 📃
Feature: Define new tools.cmake.cmaketoolchain:toolset_arch to define VS toolset x64 or x86 architecture (conan-io/conan#11147). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add new xtensalx7 option for the arch_target and arch settings, allowing targeting Espressif's ESP32-S2 and ESP32-S3 microcontrollers. (conan-io/conan#11143)
Fix: Use interface_library with shared_library on Windows in BazelDeps. (conan-io/conan#11355)
Fix: BazelDeps generator cannot find a lib when it's named with the basename of the lib file. (conan-io/conan#11343)
Fix: Avoid empty paths in run environments PATH, LD_LIBRARY_PATH, DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH env-vars. (conan-io/conan#11298)
Fix: Use DESTDIR argument in make install step instead of using the --prefix in configure. (conan-io/conan#11284). Docs: 📃
Fix: Add -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE to markdown generator instructions for CMake single config. (conan-io/conan#11220)
Fix: Fixing --require-override over conditional requirements() method. (conan-io/conan#11209)
Fix: Placing quote marks around echo statement in save_sh function. (conan-io/conan#11123)
Bugfix: Force conan_server to use pyjwt>=2.4.0 to solve a known vulnerability. (conan-io/conan#11350)
Bugfix: Fix case where CMakeDeps generator may use the wrong dependency name for transitive dependencies. (conan-io/conan#11307)
Bugfix: Link cpp_info.objects first in CMakeDeps generator, as they can have dependencies to system_libs that need to be after them in some platforms to correctly link. (conan-io/conan#11272)
Bugfix: Update cmake_layout generators folder to honor os path format. (conan-io/conan#11252)
Bugfix: Catching KeyError if USERNAME is not set as env variable on Windows. (conan-io/conan#11223)
Bugfix: Add Rocky Linux to with_yum. (conan-io/conan#11212)

1.48.2 (02-Jun-2022)

Feature: Port conan-io/conan#11365 and conan-io/conan#11284 to 1.48.2 (conan-io/conan#11381)

1.48.1 (18-May-2022)

Fix: Add -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE to markdown generator instructions for CMake single config. (conan-io/conan#11234)
Bugfix: Fix case where CMakeDeps assumes a module dependency when transitive dependencies do not define cmake_find_mode and fallback to a config one. (conan-io/conan#11240)
Bugfix: Fixed broken apple-clang 13.0 compatibility. (conan-io/conan#11231)

1.48.0 (03-May-2022)

Feature: Do not recommend to set PKG_CONFIG_PATH in markdown generator any more as it is already set by the AutotoolsToolchain. (conan-io/conan#11120)
Feature: The cmake_layout declares folders.generators = "build/generators" that is common for different configurations, enabling CMakePresets.json to support different configurePresets and buildPresets for single-config and multi-config generators. (conan-io/conan#11117). Docs: 📃
Feature: The CMakeToolchain generator will create (if missing) a CMakeUserPresets.json if the CMakeLists.txt file is found in the root folder of the project. That file will include automatically the CMakePresets.json file contained at build/generators folder to allow CMake and IDEs to locate automatically the presets generated by Conan. (conan-io/conan#11117). Docs: 📃
Feature: The CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE is not adjusted in the conan_toolchain.cmake anymore, the configuration is moved to the CMakePresets.json preparing Conan to support multiple "single-config" configurations in one CMakePresets.json file (conan-io/conan#11112). Docs: 📃
Feature: The CMakePresets.json (file generated when specified the CMakeToolchain generator) is appended with a new buildPresets after a conan install with a different build_type when using a multiconfiguration generator like Visual Studio. (conan-io/conan#11103). Docs: 📃
Feature: Removed PlatformToolset and added conantoolchain.props  from *.vcxproj file. (conan-io/conan#11101)
Feature: Append the folder where the Conan generators were installed to PKG_CONFIG_PATH in AutotoolsToolchain. (conan-io/conan#11063). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adding new tools.env.virtualenv:powershell conf to opt-in to generate and use powershell scripts instead of .bat ones. (conan-io/conan#11061). Docs: 📃



... (truncated)


Commits

cb69c45 fix conf typo (#11372)
d02459c System package manager install set of equivalent packages (#11367)
ab6f8be Add fix_apple_shared_install_name tool (#11365)
a98bb36 Fix: interface_library should be used with shared_library on Windows (#11355)
eadf41f Fix case where CMakeDeps generator may use the wrong dependency name for tran...
f6e2219 accept pyyaml 6.0 (#11363)
9060e68 Add [layout] to conanfile.txt (#11348)
9590653 refactor run_in_windows_bash (#11328)
2cd2560 Conan declares python 3.7 as minimum with nice failure for python2 (#11360)

column21:
Bumps conan from 1.44.0 to 1.49.0.

Release notes
Sourced from conan's releases.

1.49.0 (02-Jun-2022)

Feature: Add install_substitutes to system package manager tools to be able to install sets of packages that are equivalent with different names for different distros. (conan-io/conan#11367). Docs: 📃
Feature: Do not automatically fix the shared libraries to add the rpath in Apple and add an external tool tools.apple.fix_apple_shared_install_name to do it optionally in recipes for packages that do not set the correct LC_ID_DYLIB. (conan-io/conan#11365). Docs: 📃
Feature: Allow pyyaml 6.0 dependency. (conan-io/conan#11363)
Feature: Removed Python 2.7 support, as a result of an unsolvable security vulnerability in pyjwt. (conan-io/conan#11357). Docs: 📃
Feature: The conanfile.txt file now accepts a [layout] that can be filled with 3 predefined layouts: cmake_layout, vs_layout and bazel_layout. (conan-io/conan#11348). Docs: 📃
Feature: Remove the parameter copy_symlink_folders of the conan.tool.files.copy  function and now, any symlink file pointing to a folder will be treated as a regular file. (conan-io/conan#11330). Docs: 📃
Feature: Tools can_run validates if it is possible to run a and application build for a non-native architecture. (conan-io/conan#11321). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add CMAKE_SYSROOT support for CMakeToolchain. (conan-io/conan#11317). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add --sysroot support for AutotoolsToolchain and remove support for cpp_info.sysroot in AutotoolsDeps. (conan-io/conan#11317). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add tools.build:sysroot conf. (conan-io/conan#11317). Docs: 📃
Feature: Improved cmake_layout and CMakePresets.json feature so you can manage different configurations using the same CMakeUserPresets.json not only for multi-config (Debug/Release) but for any set of settings specified in a new conf tools.cmake.cmake_layout:build_folder_vars that accepts a list of settings to use. e.g tools.cmake.cmake_layout:build_folder_vars=["settings.compiler", "options.shared"] (conan-io/conan#11308). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adds GCC 9.4 in the list of compilers supported in the settings file. (conan-io/conan#11296)
Feature: Raise an error when running CMake if CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE is not defined and the generator is not multi-config. (conan-io/conan#11294). Docs: 📃
Feature: Implement a check_min_vs() checker that will work for both Visual Studio and msvc to allow migration from 1.X to 2.0 (conan-io/conan#11292). Docs: 📃
Feature: More flexibility in Autotools tools to override arguments and avoid all default arguments for make, autoreconf and configure. (conan-io/conan#11284). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add components support in XcodeDeps. (conan-io/conan#11233). Docs: 📃
Feature: Define new tools.cmake.cmaketoolchain:toolset_arch to define VS toolset x64 or x86 architecture (conan-io/conan#11147). Docs: 📃
Feature: Add new xtensalx7 option for the arch_target and arch settings, allowing targeting Espressif's ESP32-S2 and ESP32-S3 microcontrollers. (conan-io/conan#11143)
Fix: Use interface_library with shared_library on Windows in BazelDeps. (conan-io/conan#11355)
Fix: BazelDeps generator cannot find a lib when it's named with the basename of the lib file. (conan-io/conan#11343)
Fix: Avoid empty paths in run environments PATH, LD_LIBRARY_PATH, DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH env-vars. (conan-io/conan#11298)
Fix: Use DESTDIR argument in make install step instead of using the --prefix in configure. (conan-io/conan#11284). Docs: 📃
Fix: Add -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE to markdown generator instructions for CMake single config. (conan-io/conan#11220)
Fix: Fixing --require-override over conditional requirements() method. (conan-io/conan#11209)
Fix: Placing quote marks around echo statement in save_sh function. (conan-io/conan#11123)
Bugfix: Force conan_server to use pyjwt>=2.4.0 to solve a known vulnerability. (conan-io/conan#11350)
Bugfix: Fix case where CMakeDeps generator may use the wrong dependency name for transitive dependencies. (conan-io/conan#11307)
Bugfix: Link cpp_info.objects first in CMakeDeps generator, as they can have dependencies to system_libs that need to be after them in some platforms to correctly link. (conan-io/conan#11272)
Bugfix: Update cmake_layout generators folder to honor os path format. (conan-io/conan#11252)
Bugfix: Catching KeyError if USERNAME is not set as env variable on Windows. (conan-io/conan#11223)
Bugfix: Add Rocky Linux to with_yum. (conan-io/conan#11212)

1.48.2 (02-Jun-2022)

Feature: Port conan-io/conan#11365 and conan-io/conan#11284 to 1.48.2 (conan-io/conan#11381)

1.48.1 (18-May-2022)

Fix: Add -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE to markdown generator instructions for CMake single config. (conan-io/conan#11234)
Bugfix: Fix case where CMakeDeps assumes a module dependency when transitive dependencies do not define cmake_find_mode and fallback to a config one. (conan-io/conan#11240)
Bugfix: Fixed broken apple-clang 13.0 compatibility. (conan-io/conan#11231)

1.48.0 (03-May-2022)

Feature: Do not recommend to set PKG_CONFIG_PATH in markdown generator any more as it is already set by the AutotoolsToolchain. (conan-io/conan#11120)
Feature: The cmake_layout declares folders.generators = "build/generators" that is common for different configurations, enabling CMakePresets.json to support different configurePresets and buildPresets for single-config and multi-config generators. (conan-io/conan#11117). Docs: 📃
Feature: The CMakeToolchain generator will create (if missing) a CMakeUserPresets.json if the CMakeLists.txt file is found in the root folder of the project. That file will include automatically the CMakePresets.json file contained at build/generators folder to allow CMake and IDEs to locate automatically the presets generated by Conan. (conan-io/conan#11117). Docs: 📃
Feature: The CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE is not adjusted in the conan_toolchain.cmake anymore, the configuration is moved to the CMakePresets.json preparing Conan to support multiple "single-config" configurations in one CMakePresets.json file (conan-io/conan#11112). Docs: 📃
Feature: The CMakePresets.json (file generated when specified the CMakeToolchain generator) is appended with a new buildPresets after a conan install with a different build_type when using a multiconfiguration generator like Visual Studio. (conan-io/conan#11103). Docs: 📃
Feature: Removed PlatformToolset and added conantoolchain.props  from *.vcxproj file. (conan-io/conan#11101)
Feature: Append the folder where the Conan generators were installed to PKG_CONFIG_PATH in AutotoolsToolchain. (conan-io/conan#11063). Docs: 📃
Feature: Adding new tools.env.virtualenv:powershell conf to opt-in to generate and use powershell scripts instead of .bat ones. (conan-io/conan#11061). Docs: 📃



... (truncated)

column20:
Bumps regex from 1.5.4 to 1.5.6.

Changelog
Sourced from regex's changelog.

1.5.6 (2022-05-20)
This release includes a few bug fixes, including a bug that produced incorrect
matches when a non-greedy ? operator was used.

[BUG #680](rust-lang/regex#680):
Fixes a bug where [[:alnum:][:^ascii:]] dropped [:alnum:] from the class.
[BUG #859](rust-lang/regex#859):
Fixes a bug where Hir::is_match_empty returned false for \b.
[BUG #862](rust-lang/regex#862):
Fixes a bug where 'ab??' matches 'ab' instead of 'a' in 'ab'.

1.5.5 (2022-03-08)
This releases fixes a security bug in the regex compiler. This bug permits a
vector for a denial-of-service attack in cases where the regex being compiled
is untrusted. There are no known problems where the regex is itself trusted,
including in cases of untrusted haystacks.

SECURITY #GHSA-m5pq-gvj9-9vr8:
Fixes a bug in the regex compiler where empty sub-expressions subverted the
existing mitigations in place to enforce a size limit on compiled regexes.
The Rust Security Response WG published an advisory about this:
https://groups.google.com/g/rustlang-security-announcements/c/NcNNL1Jq7Yw




Commits

9aef5b1 1.5.6
2931b07 syntax: bump minimum regex-syntax version to 0.6.26
b41bde0 regex-syntax-0.6.26
d98da65 changelog: 1.5.6
1c19619 syntax: fix literal extraction for 'ab??'
88a2a62 syntax: fix 'is_match_empty' predicate
72f09f1 syntax: fix ascii class union bug
b537286 doc: fix some typos
258bdf7 changelog: 1.5.5
d130381 1.5.5
